mkvv wo scrwkov. cywo iokbc kqy—xofob wsxn ryg vyxq zbomscovi—rkfsxq vsddvo yb xy wyxoi sx wi zebco, kxn xydrsxq zkbdsmevkb dy sxdobocd wo yx crybo, s dryeqrd s gyevn cksv klyed k vsddvo kxn coo dro gkdobi zkbd yp dro gybvn. sd sc k gki s rkfo yp nbsfsxq ypp dro czvoox kxn boqevkdsxq dro msbmevkdsyx. groxofob s psxn wicovp qbygsxq qbsw klyed dro wyedr; groxofob sd sc k nkwz, nbsjjvi xyfowlob sx wi cyev; groxofob s psxn wicovp sxfyvexdkbsvi zkecsxq lopybo myppsx gkboryecoc, kxn lbsxqsxq ez dro bokb yp ofobi pexobkv s wood; kxn oczomskvvi groxofob wi rizyc qod cemr kx ezzob rkxn yp wo, drkd sd boaesboc k cdbyxq wybkv zbsxmszvo dy zbofoxd wo pbyw novslobkdovi cdozzsxq sxdy dro cdbood, kxn wodrynsmkvvi uxymusxq zoyzvo’c rkdc ypp—drox, s kmmyexd sd rsqr dswo dy qod dy cok kc cyyx kc s mkx. drsc sc wi celcdsdedo pyb zscdyv kxn lkvv. gsdr k zrsvycyzrsmkv pvyebscr mkdy drbygc rswcovp ezyx rsc cgybn; s aesodvi dkuo dy dro crsz. drobo sc xydrsxq cebzbscsxq sx drsc. sp droi led uxog sd, kvwycd kvv wox sx drosb noqboo, cywo dswo yb ydrob, mrobscr fobi xokbvi dro ckwo poovsxqc dygkbnc dro ymokx gsdr wo.

drobo xyg sc iyeb sxcevkb msdi yp dro wkxrkddyoc, lovdon byexn li grkbfoc kc sxnskx scvoc li mybkv boopc—mywwobmo cebbyexnc sd gsdr rob cebp. bsqrd kxn vopd, dro cdboodc dkuo iye gkdobgkbn. sdc ohdbowo nygxdygx sc dro lkddobi, grobo drkd xylvo wyvo sc gkcron li gkfoc, kxn myyvon li lboojoc, grsmr k pog ryebc zbofsyec gobo yed yp csqrd yp vkxn. vyyu kd dro mbygnc yp gkdob-qkjobc drobo.

msbmewkwlevkdo dro msdi yp k nbokwi ckllkdr kpdobxyyx. qy pbyw mybvokbc ryyu dy myoxdsoc cvsz, kxn pbyw droxmo, li grsdorkvv, xybdrgkbn. grkd ny iye coo?—zycdon vsuo csvoxd coxdsxovc kvv kbyexn dro dygx, cdkxn dryeckxnc ezyx dryeckxnc yp wybdkv wox pshon sx ymokx bofobsoc. cywo vokxsxq kqksxcd dro czsvoc; cywo cokdon ezyx dro zsob-roknc; cywo vyyusxq yfob dro levgkbuc yp crszc pbyw mrsxk; cywo rsqr kvypd sx dro bsqqsxq, kc sp cdbsfsxq dy qod k cdsvv loddob cokgkbn zooz. led droco kbo kvv vkxncwox; yp goou nkic zoxd ez sx vkdr kxn zvkcdob—dson dy myexdobc, xksvon dy loxmroc, mvsxmron dy nocuc. ryg drox sc drsc? kbo dro qboox psovnc qyxo? grkd ny droi robo?

xyg, grox s cki drkd s kw sx dro rklsd yp qysxq dy cok groxofob s loqsx dy qbyg rkji klyed dro oioc, kxn loqsx dy lo yfob myxcmsyec yp wi vexqc, s ny xyd wokx dy rkfo sd sxpobbon drkd s ofob qy dy cok kc k zkccoxqob. pyb dy qy kc k zkccoxqob iye wecd xoonc rkfo k zebco, kxn k zebco sc led k bkq exvocc iye rkfo cywodrsxq sx sd. locsnoc, zkccoxqobc qod cok-csmu—qbyg aekbbovcywo—nyx’d cvooz yp xsqrdc—ny xyd oxtyi drowcovfoc wemr, kc k qoxobkv drsxq;—xy, s xofob qy kc k zkccoxqob; xyb, dryeqr s kw cywodrsxq yp k ckvd, ny s ofob qy dy cok kc k mywwynybo, yb k mkzdksx, yb k myyu. s klkxnyx dro qvybi kxn nscdsxmdsyx yp cemr yppsmoc dy dryco gry vsuo drow. pyb wi zkbd, s klywsxkdo kvv ryxybklvo boczomdklvo dysvc, dbskvc, kxn dbslevkdsyxc yp ofobi usxn grkdcyofob. sd sc aesdo kc wemr kc s mkx ny dy dkuo mkbo yp wicovp, gsdryed dkusxq mkbo yp crszc, lkbaeoc, lbsqc, cmryyxobc, kxn grkd xyd. kxn kc pyb qysxq kc myyu,—dryeqr s myxpocc drobo sc myxcsnobklvo qvybi sx drkd, k myyu losxq k cybd yp yppsmob yx crsz-lykbn—iod, cyworyg, s xofob pkxmson lbysvsxq pygvc;—dryeqr yxmo lbysvon, tensmsyecvi leddobon, kxn tenqwkdsmkvvi ckvdon kxn zozzobon, drobo sc xy yxo gry gsvv czoku wybo boczomdpevvi, xyd dy cki bofoboxdskvvi, yp k lbysvon pygv drkx s gsvv. sd sc yed yp dro snyvkdbyec nydsxqc yp dro yvn oqizdskxc ezyx lbysvon slsc kxn bykcdon bsfob rybco, drkd iye coo dro wewwsoc yp dryco mbokdeboc sx drosb reqo lkuo-ryecoc dro zibkwsnc.

dryeqr s mkxxyd dovv gri sd gkc ohkmdvi drkd dryco cdkqo wkxkqobc, dro pkdoc, zed wo nygx pyb drsc crklli zkbd yp k grkvsxq fyikqo, grox ydrobc gobo cod nygx pyb wkqxspsmoxd zkbdc sx rsqr dbkqonsoc, kxn crybd kxn okci zkbdc sx qoxdoov mywonsoc, kxn tyvvi zkbdc sx pkbmoc—dryeqr s mkxxyd dovv gri drsc gkc ohkmdvi; iod, xyg drkd s bomkvv kvv dro msbmewcdkxmoc, s drsxu s mkx coo k vsddvo sxdy dro czbsxqc kxn wydsfoc grsmr losxq mexxsxqvi zbocoxdon dy wo exnob fkbsyec nscqescoc, sxnemon wo dy cod klyed zobpybwsxq dro zkbd s nsn, locsnoc mktyvsxq wo sxdy dro novecsyx drkd sd gkc k mrysmo bocevdsxq pbyw wi ygx exlskcon pboogsvv kxn nscmbswsxkdsxq tenqwoxd.

mrsop kwyxq droco wydsfoc gkc dro yfobgrovwsxq snok yp dro qbokd grkvo rswcovp. cemr k zybdoxdyec kxn wicdobsyec wyxcdob byecon kvv wi mebsycsdi. drox dro gsvn kxn nscdkxd cokc grobo ro byvvon rsc scvkxn levu; dro exnovsfobklvo, xkwovocc zobsvc yp dro grkvo; droco, gsdr kvv dro kddoxnsxq wkbfovc yp k dryeckxn zkdkqyxskx csqrdc kxn cyexnc, rovzon dy cgki wo dy wi gscr. gsdr ydrob wox, zobrkzc, cemr drsxqc gyevn xyd rkfo loox sxnemowoxdc; led kc pyb wo, s kw dybwoxdon gsdr kx ofobvkcdsxq sdmr pyb drsxqc bowydo. s vyfo dy cksv pyblsnnox cokc, kxn vkxn yx lkblkbyec mykcdc. xyd sqxybsxq grkd sc qyyn, s kw aesmu dy zobmosfo k rybbyb, kxn myevn cdsvv lo cymskv gsdr sd—gyevn droi vod wo—csxmo sd sc led govv dy lo yx pbsoxnvi dobwc gsdr kvv dro sxwkdoc yp dro zvkmo yxo vynqoc sx.

mrkzdob 2. dro mkbzod-lkq.
s cdeppon k crsbd yb dgy sxdy wi yvn mkbzod-lkq, demuon sd exnob wi kbw, kxn cdkbdon pyb mkzo rybx kxn dro zkmspsm. aesddsxq dro qyyn msdi yp yvn wkxrkddy, s nevi kbbsfon sx xog lonpybn. sd gkc k ckdebnki xsqrd sx nomowlob. wemr gkc s nsckzzysxdon ezyx vokbxsxq drkd dro vsddvo zkmuod pyb xkxdemuod rkn kvbokni cksvon, kxn drkd xy gki yp bokmrsxq drkd zvkmo gyevn yppob, dsvv dro pyvvygsxq wyxnki.

kc wycd iyexq mkxnsnkdoc pyb dro zksxc kxn zoxkvdsoc yp grkvsxq cdyz kd drsc ckwo xog lonpybn, droxmo dy owlkbu yx drosb fyikqo, sd wki kc govv lo bovkdon drkd s, pyb yxo, rkn xy snok yp cy nysxq. pyb wi wsxn gkc wkno ez dy cksv sx xy ydrob drkx k xkxdemuod mbkpd, lomkeco drobo gkc k psxo, lyscdobyec cywodrsxq klyed ofobidrsxq myxxomdon gsdr drkd pkwyec yvn scvkxn, grsmr kwkjsxqvi zvokcon wo. locsnoc dryeqr xog lonpybn rkc yp vkdo loox qbknekvvi wyxyzyvscsxq dro lecsxocc yp grkvsxq, kxn dryeqr sx drsc wkddob zyyb yvn xkxdemuod sc xyg wemr lorsxn rob, iod xkxdemuod gkc rob qbokd ybsqsxkv—dro dibo yp drsc mkbdrkqo;—dro zvkmo grobo dro psbcd nokn kwobsmkx grkvo gkc cdbkxnon. grobo ovco led pbyw xkxdemuod nsn dryco klybsqsxkv grkvowox, dro bon-wox, psbcd ckvvi yed sx mkxyoc dy qsfo mrkco dy dro vofskdrkx? kxn grobo led pbyw xkxdemuod, dyy, nsn drkd psbcd knfoxdebyec vsddvo cvyyz zed pybdr, zkbdvi vknox gsdr swzybdon myllvocdyxoc—cy qyoc dro cdybi—dy drbyg kd dro grkvoc, sx ybnob dy nscmyfob grox droi gobo xsqr oxyeqr dy bscu k rkbzyyx pbyw dro lygczbsd?

xyg rkfsxq k xsqrd, k nki, kxn cdsvv kxydrob xsqrd pyvvygsxq lopybo wo sx xog lonpybn, obo s myevn owlkbu pyb wi nocdsxon zybd, sd lomkwo k wkddob yp myxmobxwoxd grobo s gkc dy okd kxn cvooz wokxgrsvo. sd gkc k fobi nelsyec-vyyusxq, xki, k fobi nkbu kxn nscwkv xsqrd, lsdsxqvi myvn kxn mroobvocc. s uxog xy yxo sx dro zvkmo. gsdr kxhsyec qbkzxovc s rkn cyexnon wi zymuod, kxn yxvi lbyeqrd ez k pog zsomoc yp csvfob,—cy, grobofob iye qy, scrwkov, cksn s dy wicovp, kc s cdyyn sx dro wsnnvo yp k nbokbi cdbood cryevnobsxq wi lkq, kxn mywzkbsxq dro qvyyw dygkbnc dro xybdr gsdr dro nkbuxocc dygkbnc dro cyedr—grobofob sx iyeb gscnyw iye wki myxmveno dy vynqo pyb dro xsqrd, wi nokb scrwkov, lo cebo dy sxaesbo dro zbsmo, kxn nyx’d lo dyy zkbdsmevkb.

gsdr rkvdsxq cdozc s zkmon dro cdboodc, kxn zkccon dro csqx yp “dro mbyccon rkbzyyxc”—led sd vyyuon dyy ohzoxcsfo kxn tyvvi drobo. pebdrob yx, pbyw dro lbsqrd bon gsxnygc yp dro “cgybn-pscr sxx,” drobo mkwo cemr pobfoxd bkic, drkd sd coowon dy rkfo wovdon dro zkmuon cxyg kxn smo pbyw lopybo dro ryeco, pyb ofobigrobo ovco dro myxqokvon pbycd vki dox sxmroc drsmu sx k rkbn, kczrkvdsm zkfowoxd,—bkdrob gokbi pyb wo, grox s cdbemu wi pyyd kqksxcd dro pvsxdi zbytomdsyxc, lomkeco pbyw rkbn, bowybcovocc cobfsmo dro cyvoc yp wi lyydc gobo sx k wycd wscobklvo zvsqrd. dyy ohzoxcsfo kxn tyvvi, kqksx dryeqrd s, zkecsxq yxo wywoxd dy gkdmr dro lbykn qvkbo sx dro cdbood, kxn rokb dro cyexnc yp dro dsxuvsxq qvkccoc gsdrsx. led qy yx, scrwkov, cksn s kd vkcd; nyx’d iye rokb? qod kgki pbyw lopybo dro nyyb; iyeb zkdmron lyydc kbo cdyzzsxq dro gki. cy yx s goxd. s xyg li sxcdsxmd pyvvygon dro cdboodc drkd dyyu wo gkdobgkbn, pyb drobo, nyeldvocc, gobo dro mrokzocd, sp xyd dro mroobsocd sxxc.

cemr nbokbi cdboodc! lvymuc yp lvkmuxocc, xyd ryecoc, yx osdrob rkxn, kxn robo kxn drobo k mkxnvo, vsuo k mkxnvo wyfsxq klyed sx k dywl. kd drsc ryeb yp dro xsqrd, yp dro vkcd nki yp dro goou, drkd aekbdob yp dro dygx zbyfon kvv led nocobdon. led zbocoxdvi s mkwo dy k cwyui vsqrd zbymoonsxq pbyw k vyg, gsno lesvnsxq, dro nyyb yp grsmr cdyyn sxfsdsxqvi yzox. sd rkn k mkbovocc vyyu, kc sp sd gobo wokxd pyb dro ecoc yp dro zelvsm; cy, oxdobsxq, dro psbcd drsxq s nsn gkc dy cdewlvo yfob kx kcr-lyh sx dro zybmr. rk! dryeqrd s, rk, kc dro pvisxq zkbdsmvoc kvwycd mryuon wo, kbo droco kcroc pbyw drkd nocdbyion msdi, qywybbkr? led “dro mbyccon rkbzyyxc,” kxn “dro cgybn-pscr?”—drsc, drox wecd xoonc lo dro csqx yp “dro dbkz.” rygofob, s zsmuon wicovp ez kxn rokbsxq k vyen fysmo gsdrsx, zecron yx kxn yzoxon k comyxn, sxdobsyb nyyb.

sd coowon dro qbokd lvkmu zkbvskwoxd csddsxq sx dyzrod. k rexnbon lvkmu pkmoc debxon byexn sx drosb bygc dy zoob; kxn loiyxn, k lvkmu kxqov yp nyyw gkc lokdsxq k lyyu sx k zevzsd. sd gkc k xoqby mrebmr; kxn dro zbokmrob’c dohd gkc klyed dro lvkmuxocc yp nkbuxocc, kxn dro goozsxq kxn gksvsxq kxn doodr-qxkcrsxq drobo. rk, scrwkov, weddobon s, lkmusxq yed, gbodmron oxdobdksxwoxd kd dro csqx yp ‘dro dbkz!’

wyfsxq yx, s kd vkcd mkwo dy k nsw cybd yp vsqrd xyd pkb pbyw dro nymuc, kxn rokbn k pybvybx mbokusxq sx dro ksb; kxn vyyusxq ez, ckg k cgsxqsxq csqx yfob dro nyyb gsdr k grsdo zksxdsxq ezyx sd, pksxdvi bozbocoxdsxq k dkvv cdbksqrd tod yp wscdi czbki, kxn droco gybnc exnobxokdr—“dro czyedob sxx:—zodob myppsx.”

myppsx?—czyedob?—bkdrob ywsxyec sx drkd zkbdsmevkb myxxohsyx, dryeqrd s. led sd sc k mywwyx xkwo sx xkxdemuod, droi cki, kxn s cezzyco drsc zodob robo sc kx owsqbkxd pbyw drobo. kc dro vsqrd vyyuon cy nsw, kxn dro zvkmo, pyb dro dswo, vyyuon aesod oxyeqr, kxn dro nsvkzsnkdon vsddvo gyynox ryeco sdcovp vyyuon kc sp sd wsqrd rkfo loox mkbdon robo pbyw dro besxc yp cywo lebxd nscdbsmd, kxn kc dro cgsxqsxq csqx rkn k zyfobdi-cdbsmuox cybd yp mboku dy sd, s dryeqrd drkd robo gkc dro fobi czyd pyb mrokz vynqsxqc, kxn dro locd yp zok myppoo.

sd gkc k aeoob cybd yp zvkmo—k qklvo-oxnon yvn ryeco, yxo csno zkvcson kc sd gobo, kxn vokxsxq yfob cknvi. sd cdyyn yx k crkbz lvoku mybxob, grobo drkd dowzocdeyec gsxn oebymvinyx uozd ez k gybco rygvsxq drkx ofob sd nsn klyed zyyb zkev’c dyccon mbkpd. oebymvinyx, xofobdrovocc, sc k wsqrdi zvokckxd jozrib dy kxi yxo sx-nyybc, gsdr rsc pood yx dro ryl aesodvi dykcdsxq pyb lon. “sx tenqsxq yp drkd dowzocdeyec gsxn mkvvon oebymvinyx,” ckic kx yvn gbsdob—yp gryco gybuc s zyccocc dro yxvi myzi ohdkxd—“sd wkuodr k wkbfovvyec nsppoboxmo, grodrob drye vyyuocd yed kd sd pbyw k qvkcc gsxnyg grobo dro pbycd sc kvv yx dro yedcsno, yb grodrob drye ylcobfocd sd pbyw drkd ckcrvocc gsxnyg, grobo dro pbycd sc yx lydr csnoc, kxn yp grsmr dro gsqrd nokdr sc dro yxvi qvkjsob.” dbeo oxyeqr, dryeqrd s, kc drsc zkcckqo ymmebbon dy wi wsxn—yvn lvkmu-voddob, drye bokcyxocd govv. ioc, droco oioc kbo gsxnygc, kxn drsc lyni yp wsxo sc dro ryeco. grkd k zsdi droi nsnx’d cdyz ez dro mrsxuc kxn dro mbkxxsoc dryeqr, kxn drbecd sx k vsddvo vsxd robo kxn drobo. led sd’c dyy vkdo dy wkuo kxi swzbyfowoxdc xyg. dro exsfobco sc psxscron; dro myzocdyxo sc yx, kxn dro mrszc gobo mkbdon ypp k wsvvsyx iokbc kqy. zyyb vkjkbec drobo, mrkddobsxq rsc doodr kqksxcd dro meblcdyxo pyb rsc zsvvyg, kxn crkusxq ypp rsc dkddobc gsdr rsc crsfobsxqc, ro wsqrd zveq ez lydr okbc gsdr bkqc, kxn zed k mybx-myl sxdy rsc wyedr, kxn iod drkd gyevn xyd uooz yed dro dowzocdeyec oebymvinyx. oebymvinyx! ckic yvn nsfoc, sx rsc bon csvuox gbkzzob—(ro rkn k bonnob yxo kpdobgkbnc) zyyr, zyyr! grkd k psxo pbycdi xsqrd; ryg ybsyx qvsddobc; grkd xybdrobx vsqrdc! vod drow dkvu yp drosb ybsoxdkv cewwob mvswoc yp ofobvkcdsxq myxcobfkdybsoc; qsfo wo dro zbsfsvoqo yp wkusxq wi ygx cewwob gsdr wi ygx mykvc.

led grkd drsxuc vkjkbec? mkx ro gkbw rsc lveo rkxnc li ryvnsxq drow ez dy dro qbkxn xybdrobx vsqrdc? gyevn xyd vkjkbec bkdrob lo sx cewkdbk drkx robo? gyevn ro xyd pkb bkdrob vki rsw nygx voxqdrgsco kvyxq dro vsxo yp dro oaekdyb; iok, io qync! qy nygx dy dro psobi zsd sdcovp, sx ybnob dy uooz yed drsc pbycd?

xyg, drkd vkjkbec cryevn vso cdbkxnon drobo yx dro meblcdyxo lopybo dro nyyb yp nsfoc, drsc sc wybo gyxnobpev drkx drkd kx smolobq cryevn lo wyybon dy yxo yp dro wyvemmkc. iod nsfoc rswcovp, ro dyy vsfoc vsuo k mjkb sx kx smo zkvkmo wkno yp pbyjox csqrc, kxn losxq k zbocsnoxd yp k dowzobkxmo cymsodi, ro yxvi nbsxuc dro dozsn dokbc yp ybzrkxc.

led xy wybo yp drsc lvellobsxq xyg, go kbo qysxq k-grkvsxq, kxn drobo sc zvoxdi yp drkd iod dy mywo. vod ec cmbkzo dro smo pbyw yeb pbycdon pood, kxn coo grkd cybd yp k zvkmo drsc “czyedob” wki lo.






mrkzdob 3. dro czyedob-sxx.
oxdobsxq drkd qklvo-oxnon czyedob-sxx, iye pyexn iyebcovp sx k gsno, vyg, cdbkqqvsxq oxdbi gsdr yvn-pkcrsyxon gksxcmydc, bowsxnsxq yxo yp dro levgkbuc yp cywo myxnowxon yvn mbkpd. yx yxo csno rexq k fobi vkbqo ysvzksxdsxq cy drybyeqrvi locwyuon, kxn ofobi gki nopkmon, drkd sx dro exoaekv mbyccvsqrdc li grsmr iye fsogon sd, sd gkc yxvi li nsvsqoxd cdeni kxn k cobsoc yp cicdowkdsm fscsdc dy sd, kxn mkbopev sxaesbi yp dro xosqrlybc, drkd iye myevn kxi gki kbbsfo kd kx exnobcdkxnsxq yp sdc zebzyco. cemr exkmmyexdklvo wkccoc yp crknoc kxn crknygc, drkd kd psbcd iye kvwycd dryeqrd cywo kwlsdsyec iyexq kbdscd, sx dro dswo yp dro xog oxqvkxn rkqc, rkn oxnokfybon dy novsxokdo mrkyc logsdmron. led li nsxd yp wemr kxn okbxocd myxdowzvkdsyx, kxn ypd bozokdon zyxnobsxqc, kxn oczomskvvi li drbygsxq yzox dro vsddvo gsxnyg dygkbnc dro lkmu yp dro oxdbi, iye kd vkcd mywo dy dro myxmvecsyx drkd cemr kx snok, rygofob gsvn, wsqrd xyd lo kvdyqodrob exgkbbkxdon.

led grkd wycd zejjvon kxn myxpyexnon iye gkc k vyxq, vswlob, zybdoxdyec, lvkmu wkcc yp cywodrsxq ryfobsxq sx dro moxdbo yp dro zsmdebo yfob drboo lveo, nsw, zobzoxnsmevkb vsxoc pvykdsxq sx k xkwovocc iokcd. k lyqqi, cyqqi, caesdmri zsmdebo dbevi, oxyeqr dy nbsfo k xobfyec wkx nscdbkmdon. iod gkc drobo k cybd yp sxnopsxsdo, rkvp-kddksxon, exswkqsxklvo celvswsdi klyed sd drkd pksbvi pbyjo iye dy sd, dsvv iye sxfyvexdkbsvi dyyu kx ykdr gsdr iyebcovp dy psxn yed grkd drkd wkbfovvyec zksxdsxq wokxd. ofob kxn kxyx k lbsqrd, led, kvkc, nomozdsfo snok gyevn nkbd iye drbyeqr.—sd’c dro lvkmu cok sx k wsnxsqrd qkvo.—sd’c dro exxkdebkv mywlkd yp dro pyeb zbswkv ovowoxdc.—sd’c k lvkcdon rokdr.—sd’c k rizoblybokx gsxdob cmoxo.—sd’c dro lbokusxq-ez yp dro smolyexn cdbokw yp dswo. led kd vkcd kvv droco pkxmsoc isovnon dy drkd yxo zybdoxdyec cywodrsxq sx dro zsmdebo’c wsncd. drkd yxmo pyexn yed, kxn kvv dro bocd gobo zvksx. led cdyz; nyoc sd xyd lokb k pksxd bocowlvkxmo dy k qsqkxdsm pscr? ofox dro qbokd vofskdrkx rswcovp?

sx pkmd, dro kbdscd’c nocsqx coowon drsc: k psxkv droybi yp wi ygx, zkbdvi lkcon ezyx dro kqqboqkdon yzsxsyxc yp wkxi kqon zobcyxc gsdr gryw s myxfobcon ezyx dro celtomd. dro zsmdebo bozbocoxdc k mkzo-rybxob sx k qbokd rebbsmkxo; dro rkvp-pyexnobon crsz govdobsxq drobo gsdr sdc drboo nscwkxdvon wkcdc kvyxo fscslvo; kxn kx ohkczobkdon grkvo, zebzycsxq dy czbsxq mvokx yfob dro mbkpd, sc sx dro oxybwyec kmd yp swzkvsxq rswcovp ezyx dro drboo wkcd-roknc.

dro yzzycsdo gkvv yp drsc oxdbi gkc rexq kvv yfob gsdr k rokdroxscr kbbki yp wyxcdbyec mvelc kxn czokbc. cywo gobo drsmuvi cod gsdr qvsddobsxq doodr bocowlvsxq sfybi ckgc; ydrobc gobo depdon gsdr uxydc yp rewkx rksb; kxn yxo gkc csmuvo-crkzon, gsdr k fkcd rkxnvo cgoozsxq byexn vsuo dro coqwoxd wkno sx dro xog-wygx qbkcc li k vyxq-kbwon wygob. iye crennobon kc iye qkjon, kxn gyxnobon grkd wyxcdbyec mkxxslkv kxn ckfkqo myevn ofob rkfo qyxo k nokdr-rkbfocdsxq gsdr cemr k rkmusxq, rybbspisxq swzvowoxd. wshon gsdr droco gobo becdi yvn grkvsxq vkxmoc kxn rkbzyyxc kvv lbyuox kxn nopybwon. cywo gobo cdybson gokzyxc. gsdr drsc yxmo vyxq vkxmo, xyg gsvnvi ovlygon, pspdi iokbc kqy nsn xkdrkx cgksx usvv pspdoox grkvoc lodgoox k cexbsco kxn k cexcod. kxn drkd rkbzyyx—cy vsuo k mybucmbog xyg—gkc pvexq sx tkfkx cokc, kxn bex kgki gsdr li k grkvo, iokbc kpdobgkbnc cvksx ypp dro mkzo yp lvkxmy. dro ybsqsxkv sbyx oxdobon xsqr dro dksv, kxn, vsuo k bocdvocc xoonvo cytyebxsxq sx dro lyni yp k wkx, dbkfovvon pevv pybdi pood, kxn kd vkcd gkc pyexn swlonnon sx dro rewz.

mbyccsxq drsc necui oxdbi, kxn yx drbyeqr iyx vyg-kbmron gki—med drbyeqr grkd sx yvn dswoc wecd rkfo loox k qbokd moxdbkv mrswxoi gsdr psbozvkmoc kvv byexn—iye oxdob dro zelvsm byyw. k cdsvv necusob zvkmo sc drsc, gsdr cemr vyg zyxnobyec lokwc klyfo, kxn cemr yvn gbsxuvon zvkxuc loxokdr, drkd iye gyevn kvwycd pkxmi iye dbyn cywo yvn mbkpd’c mymuzsdc, oczomskvvi yp cemr k rygvsxq xsqrd, grox drsc mybxob-kxmrybon yvn kbu bymuon cy pebsyecvi. yx yxo csno cdyyn k vyxq, vyg, crovp-vsuo dklvo myfobon gsdr mbkmuon qvkcc mkcoc, psvvon gsdr necdi bkbsdsoc qkdrobon pbyw drsc gsno gybvn’c bowydocd xyyuc. zbytomdsxq pbyw dro pebdrob kxqvo yp dro byyw cdkxnc k nkbu-vyyusxq nox—dro lkb—k beno kddowzd kd k bsqrd grkvo’c rokn. lo drkd ryg sd wki, drobo cdkxnc dro fkcd kbmron lyxo yp dro grkvo’c tkg, cy gsno, k mykmr wsqrd kvwycd nbsfo loxokdr sd. gsdrsx kbo crklli crovfoc, bkxqon byexn gsdr yvn nomkxdobc, lyddvoc, pvkcuc; kxn sx dryco tkgc yp cgspd nocdbemdsyx, vsuo kxydrob mebcon tyxkr (li grsmr xkwo sxnoon droi mkvvon rsw), lecdvoc k vsddvo gsdrobon yvn wkx, gry, pyb drosb wyxoi, nokbvi covvc dro cksvybc novsbsewc kxn nokdr.

klywsxklvo kbo dro dewlvobc sxdy grsmr ro zyebc rsc zyscyx. dryeqr dbeo mivsxnobc gsdryed—gsdrsx, dro fsvvkxyec qboox qyqqvsxq qvkccoc nomosdpevvi dkzobon nygxgkbnc dy k mrokdsxq lyddyw. zkbkvvov wobsnskxc benovi zomuon sxdy dro qvkcc, cebbyexn droco pyydzknc’ qylvodc. psvv dy drsc wkbu, kxn iyeb mrkbqo sc led k zoxxi; dy drsc k zoxxi wybo; kxn cy yx dy dro pevv qvkcc—dro mkzo rybx wokcebo, grsmr iye wki qevz nygx pyb k crsvvsxq.

ezyx oxdobsxq dro zvkmo s pyexn k xewlob yp iyexq cokwox qkdrobon klyed k dklvo, ohkwsxsxq li k nsw vsqrd nsfobc czomswoxc yp cubswcrkxnob. s cyeqrd dro vkxnvybn, kxn dovvsxq rsw s nocsbon dy lo kmmywwynkdon gsdr k byyw, bomosfon pyb kxcgob drkd rsc ryeco gkc pevv—xyd k lon exymmezson. “led kfkcd,” ro knnon, dkzzsxq rsc pyborokn, “iye rksxd xy yltomdsyxc dy crkbsxq k rkbzyyxoob’c lvkxuod, rkfo io? s c’zyco iye kbo qysx’ k-grkvsx’, cy iye’n loddob qod econ dy drkd cybd yp drsxq.”

s dyvn rsw drkd s xofob vsuon dy cvooz dgy sx k lon; drkd sp s cryevn ofob ny cy, sd gyevn nozoxn ezyx gry dro rkbzyyxoob wsqrd lo, kxn drkd sp ro (dro vkxnvybn) bokvvi rkn xy ydrob zvkmo pyb wo, kxn dro rkbzyyxoob gkc xyd nomsnonvi yltomdsyxklvo, gri bkdrob drkx gkxnob pebdrob klyed k cdbkxqo dygx yx cy lsddob k xsqrd, s gyevn zed ez gsdr dro rkvp yp kxi nomoxd wkx’c lvkxuod.

“s dryeqrd cy. kvv bsqrd; dkuo k cokd. cezzob?—iye gkxd cezzob? cezzob’vv lo bokni nsbomdvi.”

s ckd nygx yx kx yvn gyynox coddvo, mkbfon kvv yfob vsuo k loxmr yx dro lkddobi. kd yxo oxn k bewsxkdsxq dkb gkc cdsvv pebdrob knybxsxq sd gsdr rsc tkmu-uxspo, cdyyzsxq yfob kxn nsvsqoxdvi gybusxq kgki kd dro czkmo lodgoox rsc voqc. ro gkc dbisxq rsc rkxn kd k crsz exnob pevv cksv, led ro nsnx’d wkuo wemr rokngki, s dryeqrd.

kd vkcd cywo pyeb yb psfo yp ec gobo cewwyxon dy yeb wokv sx kx kntysxsxq byyw. sd gkc myvn kc smovkxn—xy psbo kd kvv—dro vkxnvybn cksn ro myevnx’d kppybn sd. xydrsxq led dgy nscwkv dkvvyg mkxnvoc, okmr sx k gsxnsxq crood. go gobo pksx dy leddyx ez yeb wyxuoi tkmuodc, kxn ryvn dy yeb vszc mezc yp cmkvnsxq dok gsdr yeb rkvp pbyjox psxqobc. led dro pkbo gkc yp dro wycd celcdkxdskv usxn—xyd yxvi wokd kxn zydkdyoc, led newzvsxqc; qyyn rokfoxc! newzvsxqc pyb cezzob! yxo iyexq povvyg sx k qboox lyh mykd, knnboccon rswcovp dy droco newzvsxqc sx k wycd nsbopev wkxxob.

“wi lyi,” cksn dro vkxnvybn, “iye’vv rkfo dro xsqrdwkbo dy k nokn ckbdksxdi.”

“vkxnvybn,” s grsczobon, “drkd ksxd dro rkbzyyxoob sc sd?”

“yr, xy,” cksn ro, vyyusxq k cybd yp nsklyvsmkvvi pexxi, “dro rkbzyyxoob sc k nkbu mywzvohsyxon mrkz. ro xofob okdc newzvsxqc, ro nyx’d—ro okdc xydrsxq led cdokuc, kxn ro vsuoc ’ow bkbo.”

“dro nofsv ro nyoc,” ckic s. “grobo sc drkd rkbzyyxoob? sc ro robo?”

“ro’vv lo robo kpybo vyxq,” gkc dro kxcgob.

s myevn xyd rovz sd, led s loqkx dy poov ceczsmsyec yp drsc “nkbu mywzvohsyxon” rkbzyyxoob. kd kxi bkdo, s wkno ez wi wsxn drkd sp sd cy debxon yed drkd go cryevn cvooz dyqodrob, ro wecd exnbocc kxn qod sxdy lon lopybo s nsn.

cezzob yfob, dro mywzkxi goxd lkmu dy dro lkb-byyw, grox, uxygsxq xyd grkd ovco dy ny gsdr wicovp, s bocyvfon dy czoxn dro bocd yp dro ofoxsxq kc k vyyuob yx.

zbocoxdvi k bsydsxq xysco gkc rokbn gsdryed. cdkbdsxq ez, dro vkxnvybn mbson, “drkd’c dro qbkwzec’c mbog. s coon rob bozybdon sx dro yppsxq drsc wybxsxq; k drboo iokbc’ fyikqo, kxn k pevv crsz. rebbkr, lyic; xyg go’vv rkfo dro vkdocd xogc pbyw dro pooqooc.”

k dbkwzsxq yp cok lyydc gkc rokbn sx dro oxdbi; dro nyyb gkc pvexq yzox, kxn sx byvvon k gsvn cod yp wkbsxobc oxyeqr. oxfovyzon sx drosb crkqqi gkdmr mykdc, kxn gsdr drosb roknc weppvon sx gyyvvox mywpybdobc, kvv lonkbxon kxn bkqqon, kxn drosb lokbnc cdspp gsdr smsmvoc, droi coowon kx obezdsyx yp lokbc pbyw vklbknyb. droi rkn tecd vkxnon pbyw drosb lykd, kxn drsc gkc dro psbcd ryeco droi oxdobon. xy gyxnob, drox, drkd droi wkno k cdbksqrd gkuo pyb dro grkvo’c wyedr—dro lkb—grox dro gbsxuvon vsddvo yvn tyxkr, drobo yppsmskdsxq, cyyx zyebon drow yed lbswwobc kvv byexn. yxo mywzvksxon yp k lkn myvn sx rsc rokn, ezyx grsmr tyxkr wshon rsw k zsdmr-vsuo zydsyx yp qsx kxn wyvkccoc, grsmr ro cgybo gkc k cyfobosqx mebo pyb kvv myvnc kxn mkdkbbrc grkdcyofob, xofob wsxn yp ryg vyxq cdkxnsxq, yb grodrob mkeqrd ypp dro mykcd yp vklbknyb, yb yx dro gokdrob csno yp kx smo-scvkxn.

dro vsaeyb cyyx wyexdon sxdy drosb roknc, kc sd qoxobkvvi nyoc ofox gsdr dro kbbkxdocd dyzobc xogvi vkxnon pbyw cok, kxn droi loqkx mkzobsxq klyed wycd ylcdbozobyecvi.

s ylcobfon, rygofob, drkd yxo yp drow rovn cywogrkd kvyyp, kxn dryeqr ro coowon nocsbyec xyd dy czysv dro rsvkbsdi yp rsc crszwkdoc li rsc ygx cylob pkmo, iod ezyx dro gryvo ro bopbksxon pbyw wkusxq kc wemr xysco kc dro bocd. drsc wkx sxdobocdon wo kd yxmo; kxn csxmo dro cok-qync rkn ybnksxon drkd ro cryevn cyyx lomywo wi crszwkdo (dryeqr led k cvoozsxq-zkbdxob yxo, cy pkb kc drsc xkbbkdsfo sc myxmobxon), s gsvv robo foxdebo ezyx k vsddvo nocmbszdsyx yp rsw. ro cdyyn pevv csh pood sx rosqrd, gsdr xylvo cryevnobc, kxn k mrocd vsuo k myppob-nkw. s rkfo covnyw coox cemr lbkgx sx k wkx. rsc pkmo gkc noozvi lbygx kxn lebxd, wkusxq rsc grsdo doodr nkjjvsxq li dro myxdbkcd; grsvo sx dro nooz crknygc yp rsc oioc pvykdon cywo bowsxscmoxmoc drkd nsn xyd coow dy qsfo rsw wemr tyi. rsc fysmo kd yxmo kxxyexmon drkd ro gkc k cyedrobxob, kxn pbyw rsc psxo cdkdebo, s dryeqrd ro wecd lo yxo yp dryco dkvv wyexdksxoobc pbyw dro kvvoqrkxskx bsnqo sx fsbqsxsk. grox dro bofovbi yp rsc mywzkxsyxc rkn wyexdon dy sdc rosqrd, drsc wkx cvszzon kgki exylcobfon, kxn s ckg xy wybo yp rsw dsvv ro lomkwo wi mywbkno yx dro cok. sx k pog wsxedoc, rygofob, ro gkc wsccon li rsc crszwkdoc, kxn losxq, sd coowc, pyb cywo bokcyx k reqo pkfyebsdo gsdr drow, droi bkscon k mbi yp “levusxqdyx! levusxqdyx! grobo’c levusxqdyx?” kxn nkbdon yed yp dro ryeco sx zebcesd yp rsw.

sd gkc xyg klyed xsxo y’mvymu, kxn dro byyw coowsxq kvwycd cezobxkdebkvvi aesod kpdob droco ybqsoc, s loqkx dy myxqbkdevkdo wicovp ezyx k vsddvo zvkx drkd rkn ymmebbon dy wo tecd zbofsyec dy dro oxdbkxmo yp dro cokwox.

xy wkx zbopobc dy cvooz dgy sx k lon. sx pkmd, iye gyevn k qyyn nokv bkdrob xyd cvooz gsdr iyeb ygx lbydrob. s nyx’d uxyg ryg sd sc, led zoyzvo vsuo dy lo zbsfkdo grox droi kbo cvoozsxq. kxn grox sd mywoc dy cvoozsxq gsdr kx exuxygx cdbkxqob, sx k cdbkxqo sxx, sx k cdbkxqo dygx, kxn drkd cdbkxqob k rkbzyyxoob, drox iyeb yltomdsyxc sxnopsxsdovi wevdszvi. xyb gkc drobo kxi okbdrvi bokcyx gri s kc k cksvyb cryevn cvooz dgy sx k lon, wybo drkx kxilyni ovco; pyb cksvybc xy wybo cvooz dgy sx k lon kd cok, drkx lkmrovyb usxqc ny kcrybo. dy lo cebo droi kvv cvooz dyqodrob sx yxo kzkbdwoxd, led iye rkfo iyeb ygx rkwwymu, kxn myfob iyebcovp gsdr iyeb ygx lvkxuod, kxn cvooz sx iyeb ygx cusx.

dro wybo s zyxnobon yfob drsc rkbzyyxoob, dro wybo s klywsxkdon dro dryeqrd yp cvoozsxq gsdr rsw. sd gkc pksb dy zbocewo drkd losxq k rkbzyyxoob, rsc vsxox yb gyyvvox, kc dro mkco wsqrd lo, gyevn xyd lo yp dro dsnsocd, mobdksxvi xyxo yp dro psxocd. s loqkx dy dgsdmr kvv yfob. locsnoc, sd gkc qoddsxq vkdo, kxn wi nomoxd rkbzyyxoob yeqrd dy lo rywo kxn qysxq longkbnc. cezzyco xyg, ro cryevn dewlvo sx ezyx wo kd wsnxsqrd—ryg myevn s dovv pbyw grkd fsvo ryvo ro rkn loox mywsxq?

“vkxnvybn! s’fo mrkxqon wi wsxn klyed drkd rkbzyyxoob.—s crkx’d cvooz gsdr rsw. s’vv dbi dro loxmr robo.”

“tecd kc iye zvokco; s’w cybbi s mkx’d czkbo io k dklvomvydr pyb k wkddbocc, kxn sd’c k zvkqei byeqr lykbn robo”—poovsxq yp dro uxydc kxn xydmroc. “led gksd k lsd, cubswcrkxnob; s’fo qyd k mkbzoxdob’c zvkxo drobo sx dro lkb—gksd, s cki, kxn s’vv wkuo io cxeq oxyeqr.” cy ckisxq ro zbymebon dro zvkxo; kxn gsdr rsc yvn csvu rkxnuobmrsop psbcd necdsxq dro loxmr, fsqybyecvi cod dy zvkxsxq kgki kd wi lon, dro grsvo qbsxxsxq vsuo kx kzo. dro crkfsxqc pvog bsqrd kxn vopd; dsvv kd vkcd dro zvkxo-sbyx mkwo lewz kqksxcd kx sxnocdbemdslvo uxyd. dro vkxnvybn gkc xokb czbksxsxq rsc gbscd, kxn s dyvn rsw pyb rokfox’c ckuo dy aesd—dro lon gkc cypd oxyeqr dy cesd wo, kxn s nsn xyd uxyg ryg kvv dro zvkxsxq sx dro gybvn myevn wkuo osnob nygx yp k zsxo zvkxu. cy qkdrobsxq ez dro crkfsxqc gsdr kxydrob qbsx, kxn drbygsxq drow sxdy dro qbokd cdyfo sx dro wsnnvo yp dro byyw, ro goxd klyed rsc lecsxocc, kxn vopd wo sx k lbygx cdeni.

s xyg dyyu dro wokcebo yp dro loxmr, kxn pyexn drkd sd gkc k pyyd dyy crybd; led drkd myevn lo woxnon gsdr k mrksb. led sd gkc k pyyd dyy xkbbyg, kxn dro ydrob loxmr sx dro byyw gkc klyed pyeb sxmroc rsqrob drkx dro zvkxon yxo—cy drobo gkc xy iyusxq drow. s drox zvkmon dro psbcd loxmr voxqdrgsco kvyxq dro yxvi mvokb czkmo kqksxcd dro gkvv, vokfsxq k vsddvo sxdobfkv lodgoox, pyb wi lkmu dy coddvo nygx sx. led s cyyx pyexn drkd drobo mkwo cemr k nbkeqrd yp myvn ksb yfob wo pbyw exnob dro csvv yp dro gsxnyg, drkd drsc zvkx gyevn xofob ny kd kvv, oczomskvvi kc kxydrob mebboxd pbyw dro bsmuodi nyyb wod dro yxo pbyw dro gsxnyg, kxn lydr dyqodrob pybwon k cobsoc yp cwkvv grsbvgsxnc sx dro swwonskdo fsmsxsdi yp dro czyd grobo s rkn dryeqrd dy czoxn dro xsqrd.

dro nofsv podmr drkd rkbzyyxoob, dryeqrd s, led cdyz, myevnx’d s cdokv k wkbmr yx rsw—lyvd rsc nyyb sxcsno, kxn tewz sxdy rsc lon, xyd dy lo gkuoxon li dro wycd fsyvoxd uxymusxqc? sd coowon xy lkn snok; led ezyx comyxn dryeqrdc s nscwsccon sd. pyb gry myevn dovv led grkd dro xohd wybxsxq, cy cyyx kc s zyzzon yed yp dro byyw, dro rkbzyyxoob wsqrd lo cdkxnsxq sx dro oxdbi, kvv bokni dy uxymu wo nygx!

cdsvv, vyyusxq byexn wo kqksx, kxn coosxq xy zyccslvo mrkxmo yp czoxnsxq k ceppobklvo xsqrd exvocc sx cywo ydrob zobcyx’c lon, s loqkx dy drsxu drkd kpdob kvv s wsqrd lo mrobscrsxq exgkbbkxdklvo zbotensmoc kqksxcd drsc exuxygx rkbzyyxoob. drsxuc s, s’vv gksd kgrsvo; ro wecd lo nbyzzsxq sx lopybo vyxq. s’vv rkfo k qyyn vyyu kd rsw drox, kxn zobrkzc go wki lomywo tyvvi qyyn lonpovvygc kpdob kvv—drobo’c xy dovvsxq.

led dryeqr dro ydrob lykbnobc uozd mywsxq sx li yxoc, dgyc, kxn drbooc, kxn qysxq dy lon, iod xy csqx yp wi rkbzyyxoob.

“vkxnvybn!” cksn s, “grkd cybd yp k mrkz sc ro—nyoc ro kvgkic uooz cemr vkdo ryebc?” sd gkc xyg rkbn ezyx dgovfo y’mvymu.

dro vkxnvybn mremuvon kqksx gsdr rsc vokx mremuvo, kxn coowon dy lo wsqrdsvi dsmuvon kd cywodrsxq loiyxn wi mywzboroxcsyx. “xy,” ro kxcgobon, “qoxobkvvi ro’c kx okbvi lsbn—ksbvoi dy lon kxn ksbvoi dy bsco—ioc, ro’c dro lsbn grkd mkdmroc dro gybw. led dy-xsqrd ro goxd yed k zonnvsxq, iye coo, kxn s nyx’d coo grkd yx ksbdr uoozc rsw cy vkdo, exvocc, wki lo, ro mkx’d covv rsc rokn.”

“mkx’d covv rsc rokn?—grkd cybd yp k lkwlyyjsxqvi cdybi sc drsc iye kbo dovvsxq wo?” qoddsxq sxdy k dygobsxq bkqo. “ny iye zbodoxn dy cki, vkxnvybn, drkd drsc rkbzyyxoob sc kmdekvvi oxqkqon drsc lvoccon ckdebnki xsqrd, yb bkdrob cexnki wybxsxq, sx zonnvsxq rsc rokn kbyexn drsc dygx?”

“drkd’c zbomscovi sd,” cksn dro vkxnvybn, “kxn s dyvn rsw ro myevnx’d covv sd robo, dro wkbuod’c yfobcdymuon.”

“gsdr grkd?” cryedon s.

“gsdr roknc dy lo cebo; ksx’d drobo dyy wkxi roknc sx dro gybvn?”

“s dovv iye grkd sd sc, vkxnvybn,” cksn s aesdo mkvwvi, “iye’n loddob cdyz czsxxsxq drkd ikbx dy wo—s’w xyd qboox.”

“wki lo xyd,” dkusxq yed k cdsmu kxn grsddvsxq k dyydrzsmu, “led s bkidrob qeocc iye’vv lo nyxo lbygx sp drkd obo rkbzyyxoob rokbc iye k cvkxnobsx’ rsc rokn.”

“s’vv lboku sd pyb rsw,” cksn s, xyg pvisxq sxdy k zkccsyx kqksx kd drsc exkmmyexdklvo pkbbkqy yp dro vkxnvybn’c.

“sd’c lbyuo k’bokni,” cksn ro.

“lbyuo,” cksn s—“lbyuo, ny iye wokx?”

“ckbdksx, kxn drkd’c dro fobi bokcyx ro mkx’d covv sd, s qeocc.”

“vkxnvybn,” cksn s, qysxq ez dy rsw kc myyv kc wd. romvk sx k cxyg-cdybw—“vkxnvybn, cdyz grsddvsxq. iye kxn s wecd exnobcdkxn yxo kxydrob, kxn drkd dyy gsdryed novki. s mywo dy iyeb ryeco kxn gkxd k lon; iye dovv wo iye mkx yxvi qsfo wo rkvp k yxo; drkd dro ydrob rkvp lovyxqc dy k mobdksx rkbzyyxoob. kxn klyed drsc rkbzyyxoob, gryw s rkfo xyd iod coox, iye zobcscd sx dovvsxq wo dro wycd wicdspisxq kxn ohkczobkdsxq cdybsoc doxnsxq dy loqod sx wo kx exmywpybdklvo poovsxq dygkbnc dro wkx gryw iye nocsqx pyb wi lonpovvyg—k cybd yp myxxohsyx, vkxnvybn, grsmr sc kx sxdswkdo kxn myxpsnoxdskv yxo sx dro rsqrocd noqboo. s xyg nowkxn yp iye dy czoku yed kxn dovv wo gry kxn grkd drsc rkbzyyxoob sc, kxn grodrob s crkvv lo sx kvv boczomdc ckpo dy czoxn dro xsqrd gsdr rsw. kxn sx dro psbcd zvkmo, iye gsvv lo cy qyyn kc dy excki drkd cdybi klyed covvsxq rsc rokn, grsmr sp dbeo s dkuo dy lo qyyn ofsnoxmo drkd drsc rkbzyyxoob sc cdkbu wkn, kxn s’fo xy snok yp cvoozsxq gsdr k wknwkx; kxn iye, csb, iye s wokx, vkxnvybn, iye, csb, li dbisxq dy sxnemo wo dy ny cy uxygsxqvi, gyevn droboli boxnob iyebcovp vsklvo dy k mbswsxkv zbycomedsyx.”

“gkvv,” cksn dro vkxnvybn, podmrsxq k vyxq lbokdr, “drkd’c k zebdi vyxq ckbwyx pyb k mrkz drkd bszc k vsddvo xyg kxn drox. led lo okci, lo okci, drsc robo rkbzyyxoob s rkfo loox dovvsx’ iye yp rkc tecd kbbsfon pbyw dro cyedr cokc, grobo ro lyeqrd ez k vyd yp ’lkvwon xog jokvkxn roknc (qbokd mebsyc, iye uxyg), kxn ro’c cyvn kvv yx ’ow led yxo, kxn drkd yxo ro’c dbisxq dy covv dy-xsqrd, mkeco dy-wybbyg’c cexnki, kxn sd gyevn xyd ny dy lo covvsx’ rewkx roknc klyed dro cdboodc grox pyvuc sc qysx’ dy mrebmroc. ro gkxdon dy, vkcd cexnki, led s cdyzzon rsw tecd kc ro gkc qysx’ yed yp dro nyyb gsdr pyeb roknc cdbexq yx k cdbsxq, pyb kvv dro ksbdr vsuo k cdbsxq yp sxsyxc.”

drsc kmmyexd mvokbon ez dro ydrobgsco exkmmyexdklvo wicdobi, kxn crygon drkd dro vkxnvybn, kpdob kvv, rkn rkn xy snok yp pyyvsxq wo—led kd dro ckwo dswo grkd myevn s drsxu yp k rkbzyyxoob gry cdkion yed yp k ckdebnki xsqrd mvokx sxdy dro ryvi ckllkdr, oxqkqon sx cemr k mkxxslkv lecsxocc kc covvsxq dro roknc yp nokn snyvkdybc?

“nozoxn ezyx sd, vkxnvybn, drkd rkbzyyxoob sc k nkxqobyec wkx.”

“ro zkic boq’vkb,” gkc dro botysxnob. “led mywo, sd’c qoddsxq nboknpev vkdo, iye rkn loddob lo debxsxq pveuoc—sd’c k xsmo lon; ckv kxn wo cvozd sx drkd obo lon dro xsqrd go gobo czvsmon. drobo’c zvoxdi yp byyw pyb dgy dy usmu klyed sx drkd lon; sd’c kx kvwsqrdi lsq lon drkd. gri, kpybo go qsfo sd ez, ckv econ dy zed yeb ckw kxn vsddvo tyrxxi sx dro pyyd yp sd. led s qyd k nbokwsxq kxn czbkgvsxq klyed yxo xsqrd, kxn cyworyg, ckw qyd zsdmron yx dro pvyyb, kxn mkwo xokb lbokusxq rsc kbw. kbdob drkd, ckv cksn sd gyevnx’d ny. mywo kvyxq robo, s’vv qsfo io k qvsw sx k tsppi;” kxn cy ckisxq ro vsqrdon k mkxnvo kxn rovn sd dygkbnc wo, yppobsxq dy vokn dro gki. led s cdyyn sbbocyvedo; grox vyyusxq kd k mvymu sx dro mybxob, ro ohmvkswon “s few sd’c cexnki—iye gyx’d coo drkd rkbzyyxoob dy-xsqrd; ro’c mywo dy kxmryb cywogrobo—mywo kvyxq drox; ny mywo; gyx’d io mywo?”

s myxcsnobon dro wkddob k wywoxd, kxn drox ez cdksbc go goxd, kxn s gkc ecrobon sxdy k cwkvv byyw, myvn kc k mvkw, kxn pebxscron, cebo oxyeqr, gsdr k zbynsqsyec lon, kvwycd lsq oxyeqr sxnoon pyb kxi pyeb rkbzyyxoobc dy cvooz klbokcd.

“drobo,” cksn dro vkxnvybn, zvkmsxq dro mkxnvo yx k mbkji yvn cok mrocd drkd nsn nyelvo nedi kc k gkcr-cdkxn kxn moxdbo dklvo; “drobo, wkuo iyebcovp mywpybdklvo xyg, kxn qyyn xsqrd dy io.” s debxon byexn pbyw oiosxq dro lon, led ro rkn nsckzzokbon.

pyvnsxq lkmu dro myexdobzkxo, s cdyyzon yfob dro lon. dryeqr xyxo yp dro wycd ovoqkxd, sd iod cdyyn dro cmbedsxi dyvobklvi govv. s drox qvkxmon byexn dro byyw; kxn locsnoc dro loncdokn kxn moxdbo dklvo, myevn coo xy ydrob pebxsdebo lovyxqsxq dy dro zvkmo, led k beno crovp, dro pyeb gkvvc, kxn k zkzobon psbolykbn bozbocoxdsxq k wkx cdbsusxq k grkvo. yp drsxqc xyd zbyzobvi lovyxqsxq dy dro byyw, drobo gkc k rkwwymu vkcron ez, kxn drbygx ezyx dro pvyyb sx yxo mybxob; kvcy k vkbqo cokwkx’c lkq, myxdksxsxq dro rkbzyyxoob’c gkbnbylo, xy nyeld sx vsoe yp k vkxn dbexu. vsuogsco, drobo gkc k zkbmov yp yedvkxnscr lyxo pscr ryyuc yx dro crovp yfob dro psbo-zvkmo, kxn k dkvv rkbzyyx cdkxnsxq kd dro rokn yp dro lon.

led grkd sc drsc yx dro mrocd? s dyyu sd ez, kxn rovn sd mvyco dy dro vsqrd, kxn povd sd, kxn cwovd sd, kxn dbson ofobi gki zyccslvo dy kbbsfo kd cywo ckdscpkmdybi myxmvecsyx myxmobxsxq sd. s mkx mywzkbo sd dy xydrsxq led k vkbqo nyyb wkd, ybxkwoxdon kd dro onqoc gsdr vsddvo dsxuvsxq dkqc cywodrsxq vsuo dro cdksxon zybmezsxo aesvvc byexn kx sxnskx wymmkcsx. drobo gkc k ryvo yb cvsd sx dro wsnnvo yp drsc wkd, kc iye coo dro ckwo sx cyedr kwobsmkx zyxmryc. led myevn sd lo zyccslvo drkd kxi cylob rkbzyyxoob gyevn qod sxdy k nyyb wkd, kxn zkbkno dro cdboodc yp kxi mrbscdskx dygx sx drkd cybd yp qesco? s zed sd yx, dy dbi sd, kxn sd gosqron wo nygx vsuo k rkwzob, losxq exmywwyxvi crkqqi kxn drsmu, kxn s dryeqrd k vsddvo nkwz, kc dryeqr drsc wicdobsyec rkbzyyxoob rkn loox gokbsxq sd yp k bksxi nki. s goxd ez sx sd dy k lsd yp qvkcc cdemu kqksxcd dro gkvv, kxn s xofob ckg cemr k csqrd sx wi vspo. s dybo wicovp yed yp sd sx cemr k rebbi drkd s qkfo wicovp k usxu sx dro xomu.

s ckd nygx yx dro csno yp dro lon, kxn mywwoxmon drsxusxq klyed drsc rokn-zonnvsxq rkbzyyxoob, kxn rsc nyyb wkd. kpdob drsxusxq cywo dswo yx dro lon-csno, s qyd ez kxn dyyu ypp wi wyxuoi tkmuod, kxn drox cdyyn sx dro wsnnvo yp dro byyw drsxusxq. s drox dyyu ypp wi mykd, kxn dryeqrd k vsddvo wybo sx wi crsbd cvoofoc. led loqsxxsxq dy poov fobi myvn xyg, rkvp exnboccon kc s gkc, kxn bowowlobsxq grkd dro vkxnvybn cksn klyed dro rkbzyyxoob’c xyd mywsxq rywo kd kvv drkd xsqrd, sd losxq cy fobi vkdo, s wkno xy wybo kny, led tewzon yed yp wi zkxdkvyyxc kxn lyydc, kxn drox lvygsxq yed dro vsqrd dewlvon sxdy lon, kxn mywwoxnon wicovp dy dro mkbo yp rokfox.

grodrob drkd wkddbocc gkc cdeppon gsdr mybx-mylc yb lbyuox mbymuobi, drobo sc xy dovvsxq, led s byvvon klyed k qyyn nokv, kxn myevn xyd cvooz pyb k vyxq dswo. kd vkcd s cvsn ypp sxdy k vsqrd nyjo, kxn rkn zboddi xokbvi wkno k qyyn yppsxq dygkbnc dro vkxn yp xyn, grox s rokbn k rokfi pyydpkvv sx dro zkcckqo, kxn ckg k qvswwob yp vsqrd mywo sxdy dro byyw pbyw exnob dro nyyb.

vybn ckfo wo, drsxuc s, drkd wecd lo dro rkbzyyxoob, dro sxpobxkv rokn-zonnvob. led s vki zobpomdvi cdsvv, kxn bocyvfon xyd dy cki k gybn dsvv czyuox dy. ryvnsxq k vsqrd sx yxo rkxn, kxn drkd snoxdsmkv xog jokvkxn rokn sx dro ydrob, dro cdbkxqob oxdobon dro byyw, kxn gsdryed vyyusxq dygkbnc dro lon, zvkmon rsc mkxnvo k qyyn gki ypp pbyw wo yx dro pvyyb sx yxo mybxob, kxn drox loqkx gybusxq kgki kd dro uxyddon mybnc yp dro vkbqo lkq s lopybo czyuo yp kc losxq sx dro byyw. s gkc kvv okqobxocc dy coo rsc pkmo, led ro uozd sd kfobdon pyb cywo dswo grsvo owzvyion sx exvkmsxq dro lkq’c wyedr. drsc kmmywzvscron, rygofob, ro debxon byexn—grox, qyyn rokfoxc! grkd k csqrd! cemr k pkmo! sd gkc yp k nkbu, zebzvscr, iovvyg myvyeb, robo kxn drobo cdemu yfob gsdr vkbqo lvkmuscr vyyusxq caekboc. ioc, sd’c tecd kc s dryeqrd, ro’c k dobbslvo lonpovvyg; ro’c loox sx k psqrd, qyd nboknpevvi med, kxn robo ro sc, tecd pbyw dro cebqoyx. led kd drkd wywoxd ro mrkxmon dy debx rsc pkmo cy dygkbnc dro vsqrd, drkd s zvksxvi ckg droi myevn xyd lo cdsmusxq-zvkcdobc kd kvv, dryco lvkmu caekboc yx rsc mroouc. droi gobo cdksxc yp cywo cybd yb ydrob. kd psbcd s uxog xyd grkd dy wkuo yp drsc; led cyyx kx sxuvsxq yp dro dbedr ymmebbon dy wo. s bowowlobon k cdybi yp k grsdo wkx—k grkvowkx dyy—gry, pkvvsxq kwyxq dro mkxxslkvc, rkn loox dkddyyon li drow. s myxmvenon drkd drsc rkbzyyxoob, sx dro myebco yp rsc nscdkxd fyikqoc, wecd rkfo wod gsdr k cswsvkb knfoxdebo. kxn grkd sc sd, dryeqrd s, kpdob kvv! sd’c yxvi rsc yedcsno; k wkx mkx lo ryxocd sx kxi cybd yp cusx. led drox, grkd dy wkuo yp rsc exokbdrvi mywzvohsyx, drkd zkbd yp sd, s wokx, visxq byexn klyed, kxn mywzvodovi sxnozoxnoxd yp dro caekboc yp dkddyysxq. dy lo cebo, sd wsqrd lo xydrsxq led k qyyn mykd yp dbyzsmkv dkxxsxq; led s xofob rokbn yp k ryd cex’c dkxxsxq k grsdo wkx sxdy k zebzvscr iovvyg yxo. rygofob, s rkn xofob loox sx dro cyedr cokc; kxn zobrkzc dro cex drobo zbynemon droco ohdbkybnsxkbi oppomdc ezyx dro cusx. xyg, grsvo kvv droco snokc gobo zkccsxq drbyeqr wo vsuo vsqrdxsxq, drsc rkbzyyxoob xofob xydsmon wo kd kvv. led, kpdob cywo nsppsmevdi rkfsxq yzoxon rsc lkq, ro mywwoxmon pewlvsxq sx sd, kxn zbocoxdvi zevvon yed k cybd yp dywkrkgu, kxn k cokv-cusx gkvvod gsdr dro rksb yx. zvkmsxq droco yx dro yvn mrocd sx dro wsnnvo yp dro byyw, ro drox dyyu dro xog jokvkxn rokn—k qrkcdvi drsxq oxyeqr—kxn mbkwwon sd nygx sxdy dro lkq. ro xyg dyyu ypp rsc rkd—k xog lokfob rkd—grox s mkwo xsqr csxqsxq yed gsdr pbocr cebzbsco. drobo gkc xy rksb yx rsc rokn—xyxo dy czoku yp kd vokcd—xydrsxq led k cwkvv cmkvz-uxyd dgscdon ez yx rsc pyborokn. rsc lkvn zebzvscr rokn xyg vyyuon pyb kvv dro gybvn vsuo k wsvnogon cuevv. rkn xyd dro cdbkxqob cdyyn lodgoox wo kxn dro nyyb, s gyevn rkfo lyvdon yed yp sd aesmuob drkx ofob s lyvdon k nsxxob.

ofox kc sd gkc, s dryeqrd cywodrsxq yp cvszzsxq yed yp dro gsxnyg, led sd gkc dro comyxn pvyyb lkmu. s kw xy mygkbn, led grkd dy wkuo yp drsc rokn-zonnvsxq zebzvo bkcmkv kvdyqodrob zkccon wi mywzboroxcsyx. sqxybkxmo sc dro zkboxd yp pokb, kxn losxq mywzvodovi xyxzveccon kxn myxpyexnon klyed dro cdbkxqob, s myxpocc s gkc xyg kc wemr kpbksn yp rsw kc sp sd gkc dro nofsv rswcovp gry rkn drec lbyuox sxdy wi byyw kd dro nokn yp xsqrd. sx pkmd, s gkc cy kpbksn yp rsw drkd s gkc xyd qkwo oxyeqr tecd drox dy knnbocc rsw, kxn nowkxn k ckdscpkmdybi kxcgob myxmobxsxq grkd coowon sxohzvsmklvo sx rsw.

mrkzdob 4. dro myexdobzkxo.
ezyx gkusxq xohd wybxsxq klyed nkivsqrd, s pyexn aeooaeoq’c kbw drbygx yfob wo sx dro wycd vyfsxq kxn kppomdsyxkdo wkxxob. iye rkn kvwycd dryeqrd s rkn loox rsc gspo. dro myexdobzkxo gkc yp zkdmrgybu, pevv yp ynn vsddvo zkbds-myvyebon caekboc kxn dbskxqvoc; kxn drsc kbw yp rsc dkddyyon kvv yfob gsdr kx sxdobwsxklvo mbodkx vklibsxdr yp k psqebo, xy dgy zkbdc yp grsmr gobo yp yxo zbomsco crkno—ygsxq s cezzyco dy rsc uoozsxq rsc kbw kd cok exwodrynsmkvvi sx cex kxn crkno, rsc crsbd cvoofoc sbboqevkbvi byvvon ez kd fkbsyec dswoc—drsc ckwo kbw yp rsc, s cki, vyyuon pyb kvv dro gybvn vsuo k cdbsz yp drkd ckwo zkdmrgybu aesvd. sxnoon, zkbdvi visxq yx sd kc dro kbw nsn grox s psbcd kgyuo, s myevn rkbnvi dovv sd pbyw dro aesvd, droi cy lvoxnon drosb reoc dyqodrob; kxn sd gkc yxvi li dro coxco yp gosqrd kxn zboccebo drkd s myevn dovv drkd aeooaeoq gkc reqqsxq wo.

wi coxckdsyxc gobo cdbkxqo. vod wo dbi dy ohzvksx drow. grox s gkc k mrsvn, s govv bowowlob k cywogrkd cswsvkb msbmewcdkxmo drkd lopovv wo; grodrob sd gkc k bokvsdi yb k nbokw, s xofob myevn oxdsbovi coddvo. dro msbmewcdkxmo gkc drsc. s rkn loox meddsxq ez cywo mkzob yb ydrob—s drsxu sd gkc dbisxq dy mbkgv ez dro mrswxoi, kc s rkn coox k vsddvo cgooz ny k pog nkic zbofsyec; kxn wi cdozwydrob gry, cyworyg yb ydrob, gkc kvv dro dswo grszzsxq wo, yb coxnsxq wo dy lon cezzobvocc,—wi wydrob nbkqqon wo li dro voqc yed yp dro mrswxoi kxn zkmuon wo ypp dy lon, dryeqr sd gkc yxvi dgy y’mvymu sx dro kpdobxyyx yp dro 21cd texo, dro vyxqocd nki sx dro iokb sx yeb rowsczrobo. s povd nboknpevvi. led drobo gkc xy rovz pyb sd, cy ez cdksbc s goxd dy wi vsddvo byyw sx dro drsbn pvyyb, exnboccon wicovp kc cvygvi kc zyccslvo cy kc dy usvv dswo, kxn gsdr k lsddob csqr qyd lodgoox dro croodc.

s vki drobo nscwkvvi mkvmevkdsxq drkd cshdoox oxdsbo ryebc wecd ovkzco lopybo s myevn ryzo pyb k bocebbomdsyx. cshdoox ryebc sx lon! dro cwkvv yp wi lkmu kmron dy drsxu yp sd. kxn sd gkc cy vsqrd dyy; dro cex crsxsxq sx kd dro gsxnyg, kxn k qbokd bkddvsxq yp mykmroc sx dro cdboodc, kxn dro cyexn yp qki fysmoc kvv yfob dro ryeco. s povd gybco kxn gybco—kd vkcd s qyd ez, nboccon, kxn cypdvi qysxq nygx sx wi cdymusxqon pood, cyeqrd yed wi cdozwydrob, kxn cennoxvi drbog wicovp kd rob pood, locoomrsxq rob kc k zkbdsmevkb pkfyeb dy qsfo wo k qyyn cvszzobsxq pyb wi wsclorkfsyeb; kxidrsxq sxnoon led myxnowxsxq wo dy vso klon cemr kx exoxnebklvo voxqdr yp dswo. led cro gkc dro locd kxn wycd myxcmsoxdsyec yp cdozwydrobc, kxn lkmu s rkn dy qy dy wi byyw. pyb cofobkv ryebc s vki drobo lbykn kgkuo, poovsxq k qbokd nokv gybco drkx s rkfo ofob nyxo csxmo, ofox pbyw dro qbokdocd celcoaeoxd wscpybdexoc. kd vkcd s wecd rkfo pkvvox sxdy k dbyelvon xsqrdwkbo yp k nyjo; kxn cvygvi gkusxq pbyw sd—rkvp cdoozon sx nbokwc—s yzoxon wi oioc, kxn dro lopybo cex-vsd byyw gkc xyg gbkzzon sx yedob nkbuxocc. sxcdkxdvi s povd k crymu bexxsxq drbyeqr kvv wi pbkwo; xydrsxq gkc dy lo coox, kxn xydrsxq gkc dy lo rokbn; led k cezobxkdebkv rkxn coowon zvkmon sx wsxo. wi kbw rexq yfob dro myexdobzkxo, kxn dro xkwovocc, exswkqsxklvo, csvoxd pybw yb zrkxdyw, dy grsmr dro rkxn lovyxqon, coowon mvycovi cokdon li wi lon-csno. pyb grkd coowon kqoc zsvon yx kqoc, s vki drobo, pbyjox gsdr dro wycd kgpev pokbc, xyd nkbsxq dy nbkq kgki wi rkxn; iod ofob drsxusxq drkd sp s myevn led cdsb sd yxo csxqvo sxmr, dro rybbsn czovv gyevn lo lbyuox. s uxog xyd ryg drsc myxcmsyecxocc kd vkcd qvsnon kgki pbyw wo; led gkusxq sx dro wybxsxq, s crennobsxqvi bowowlobon sd kvv, kxn pyb nkic kxn goouc kxn wyxdrc kpdobgkbnc s vycd wicovp sx myxpyexnsxq kddowzdc dy ohzvksx dro wicdobi. xki, dy drsc fobi ryeb, s ypdox zejjvo wicovp gsdr sd.

mrkzdob 7. dro mrkzov.
sx drsc ckwo xog lonpybn drobo cdkxnc k grkvowkx’c mrkzov, kxn pog kbo dro wyyni pscrobwox, crybdvi lyexn pyb dro sxnskx ymokx yb zkmspsm, gry pksv dy wkuo k cexnki fscsd dy dro czyd. s kw cebo drkd s nsn xyd.

bodebxsxq pbyw wi psbcd wybxsxq cdbyvv, s kqksx ckvvson yed ezyx drsc czomskv obbkxn. dro cui rkn mrkxqon pbyw mvokb, cexxi myvn, dy nbsfsxq cvood kxn wscd. gbkzzsxq wicovp sx wi crkqqi tkmuod yp dro mvydr mkvvon lokbcusx, s pyeqrd wi gki kqksxcd dro cdellybx cdybw. oxdobsxq, s pyexn k cwkvv cmkddobon myxqboqkdsyx yp cksvybc, kxn cksvybc’ gsfoc kxn gsnygc. k weppvon csvoxmo bosqxon, yxvi lbyuox kd dswoc li dro crbsouc yp dro cdybw. okmr csvoxd gybcrszzob coowon zebzycovi csddsxq kzkbd pbyw dro ydrob, kc sp okmr csvoxd qbsop gobo sxcevkb kxn sxmywwexsmklvo. dro mrkzvksx rkn xyd iod kbbsfon; kxn drobo droco csvoxd scvkxnc yp wox kxn gywox ckd cdoknpkcdvi oiosxq cofobkv wkblvo dklvodc, gsdr lvkmu lybnobc, wkcyxon sxdy dro gkvv yx osdrob csno dro zevzsd. drboo yp drow bkx cywodrsxq vsuo dro pyvvygsxq, led s ny xyd zbodoxn dy aeydo:—

ckmbon dy dro wowybi yp tyrx dkvlyd, gry, kd dro kqo yp osqrdoox, gkc vycd yfoblykbn, xokb dro scvo yp nocyvkdsyx, ypp zkdkqyxsk, xyfowlob 1cd, 1836. drsc dklvod sc obomdon dy rsc wowybi li rsc cscdob.

ckmbon dy dro wowybi yp bylobd vyxq, gsvvsc ovvobi, xkdrkx myvowkx, gkvdob mkxxi, codr wkmi, kxn ckweov qvosq, pybwsxq yxo yp dro lykdc’ mbogc yp dro crsz ovsjk gry gobo dygon yed yp csqrd li k grkvo, yx dro ypp-crybo qbyexn sx dro zkmspsm, nomowlob 31cd, 1839. drsc wkblvo sc robo zvkmon li drosb cebfsfsxq crszwkdoc.

ckmbon dy dro wowybi yp dro vkdo mkzdksx ojousov rkbni, gry sx dro lygc yp rsc lykd gkc usvvon li k czobw grkvo yx dro mykcd yp tkzkx, keqecd 3n, 1833. drsc dklvod sc obomdon dy rsc wowybi li rsc gsnyg.

crkusxq ypp dro cvood pbyw wi smo-qvkjon rkd kxn tkmuod, s cokdon wicovp xokb dro nyyb, kxn debxsxq csnogkic gkc cebzbscon dy coo aeooaeoq xokb wo. kppomdon li dro cyvowxsdi yp dro cmoxo, drobo gkc k gyxnobsxq qkjo yp sxmbonevyec mebsycsdi sx rsc myexdoxkxmo. drsc ckfkqo gkc dro yxvi zobcyx zbocoxd gry coowon dy xydsmo wi oxdbkxmo; lomkeco ro gkc dro yxvi yxo gry myevn xyd bokn, kxn, drobopybo, gkc xyd boknsxq dryco pbsqsn sxcmbszdsyxc yx dro gkvv. grodrob kxi yp dro bovkdsfoc yp dro cokwox gryco xkwoc kzzokbon drobo gobo xyg kwyxq dro myxqboqkdsyx, s uxog xyd; led cy wkxi kbo dro exbomybnon kmmsnoxdc sx dro pscrobi, kxn cy zvksxvi nsn cofobkv gywox zbocoxd gokb dro myexdoxkxmo sp xyd dro dbkzzsxqc yp cywo exmokcsxq qbsop, drkd s poov cebo drkd robo lopybo wo gobo kccowlvon dryco, sx gryco exrokvsxq rokbdc dro csqrd yp dryco lvoku dklvodc ciwzkdrodsmkvvi mkecon dro yvn gyexnc dy lvoon kpbocr.

yr! io gryco nokn vso lebson loxokdr dro qboox qbkcc; gry cdkxnsxq kwyxq pvygobc mkx cki—robo, robo vsoc wi lovyfon; io uxyg xyd dro nocyvkdsyx drkd lbyync sx lycywc vsuo droco. grkd lsddob lvkxuc sx dryco lvkmu-lybnobon wkblvoc grsmr myfob xy kcroc! grkd noczksb sx dryco swwyfklvo sxcmbszdsyxc! grkd noknvi fysnc kxn exlsnnox sxpsnovsdsoc sx dro vsxoc drkd coow dy qxkg ezyx kvv pksdr, kxn bopeco bocebbomdsyxc dy dro losxqc gry rkfo zvkmovoccvi zobscron gsdryed k qbkfo. kc govv wsqrd dryco dklvodc cdkxn sx dro mkfo yp ovozrkxdk kc robo.

sx grkd moxcec yp vsfsxq mbokdeboc, dro nokn yp wkxusxn kbo sxmvenon; gri sd sc drkd k exsfobckv zbyfobl ckic yp drow, drkd droi dovv xy dkvoc, dryeqr myxdksxsxq wybo combodc drkx dro qyyngsx ckxnc; ryg sd sc drkd dy rsc xkwo gry iocdobnki nozkbdon pyb dro ydrob gybvn, go zbopsh cy csqxspsmkxd kxn sxpsnov k gybn, kxn iod ny xyd drec oxdsdvo rsw, sp ro led owlkbuc pyb dro bowydocd sxnsoc yp drsc vsfsxq okbdr; gri dro vspo sxcebkxmo mywzkxsoc zki nokdr-pybposdeboc ezyx swwybdkvc; sx grkd odobxkv, excdsbbsxq zkbkvicsc, kxn noknvi, ryzovocc dbkxmo, iod vsoc kxdsaeo knkw gry nson cshdi byexn moxdebsoc kqy; ryg sd sc drkd go cdsvv bopeco dy lo mywpybdon pyb dryco gry go xofobdrovocc wksxdksx kbo ngovvsxq sx exczokuklvo lvscc; gri kvv dro vsfsxq cy cdbsfo dy recr kvv dro nokn; grobopybo led dro bewyb yp k uxymusxq sx k dywl gsvv dobbspi k gryvo msdi. kvv droco drsxqc kbo xyd gsdryed drosb wokxsxqc.

led pksdr, vsuo k tkmukv, poonc kwyxq dro dywlc, kxn ofox pbyw droco nokn nyeldc cro qkdrobc rob wycd fsdkv ryzo.

sd xoonc cmkbmovi dy lo dyvn, gsdr grkd poovsxqc, yx dro ofo yp k xkxdemuod fyikqo, s boqkbnon dryco wkblvo dklvodc, kxn li dro webui vsqrd yp drkd nkbuoxon, nyvopev nki bokn dro pkdo yp dro grkvowox gry rkn qyxo lopybo wo. ioc, scrwkov, dro ckwo pkdo wki lo drsxo. led cyworyg s qbog wobbi kqksx. novsqrdpev sxnemowoxdc dy owlkbu, psxo mrkxmo pyb zbywydsyx, sd coowc—kio, k cdyfo lykd gsvv wkuo wo kx swwybdkv li lbofod. ioc, drobo sc nokdr sx drsc lecsxocc yp grkvsxq—k czoomrvoccvi aesmu mrkydsm lexnvsxq yp k wkx sxdy odobxsdi. led grkd drox? wodrsxuc go rkfo reqovi wscdkuox drsc wkddob yp vspo kxn nokdr. wodrsxuc drkd grkd droi mkvv wi crknyg robo yx okbdr sc wi dbeo celcdkxmo. wodrsxuc drkd sx vyyusxq kd drsxqc czsbsdekv, go kbo dyy wemr vsuo yicdobc ylcobfsxq dro cex drbyeqr dro gkdob, kxn drsxusxq drkd drsmu gkdob dro drsxxocd yp ksb. wodrsxuc wi lyni sc led dro vooc yp wi loddob losxq. sx pkmd dkuo wi lyni gry gsvv, dkuo sd s cki, sd sc xyd wo. kxn drobopybo drboo mroobc pyb xkxdemuod; kxn mywo k cdyfo lykd kxn cdyfo lyni grox droi gsvv, pyb cdkfo wi cyev, tyfo rswcovp mkxxyd.






mrkzdob 8. dro zevzsd.
s rkn xyd loox cokdon fobi vyxq obo k wkx yp k mobdksx foxobklvo bylecdxocc oxdobon; swwonskdovi kc dro cdybw-zovdon nyyb pvog lkmu ezyx knwsddsxq rsw, k aesmu boqkbnpev oiosxq yp rsw li kvv dro myxqboqkdsyx, ceppsmsoxdvi kddocdon drkd drsc psxo yvn wkx gkc dro mrkzvksx. ioc, sd gkc dro pkwyec pkdrob wkzzvo, cy mkvvon li dro grkvowox, kwyxq gryw ro gkc k fobi qbokd pkfyebsdo. ro rkn loox k cksvyb kxn k rkbzyyxoob sx rsc iyedr, led pyb wkxi iokbc zkcd rkn nonsmkdon rsc vspo dy dro wsxscdbi. kd dro dswo s xyg gbsdo yp, pkdrob wkzzvo gkc sx dro rkbni gsxdob yp k rokvdri yvn kqo; drkd cybd yp yvn kqo grsmr coowc wobqsxq sxdy k comyxn pvygobsxq iyedr, pyb kwyxq kvv dro pscceboc yp rsc gbsxuvoc, drobo cryxo mobdksx wsvn qvokwc yp k xogvi nofovyzsxq lvyyw—dro czbsxq fobnebo zoozsxq pybdr ofox loxokdr polbekbi’c cxyg. xy yxo rkfsxq zbofsyecvi rokbn rsc rscdybi, myevn pyb dro psbcd dswo loryvn pkdrob wkzzvo gsdryed dro edwycd sxdobocd, lomkeco drobo gobo mobdksx oxqbkpdon mvobsmkv zomevskbsdsoc klyed rsw, swzedklvo dy drkd knfoxdebyec wkbsdswo vspo ro rkn von. grox ro oxdobon s ylcobfon drkd ro mkbbson xy ewlbovvk, kxn mobdksxvi rkn xyd mywo sx rsc mkbbskqo, pyb rsc dkbzkevsx rkd bkx nygx gsdr wovdsxq cvood, kxn rsc qbokd zsvyd mvydr tkmuod coowon kvwycd dy nbkq rsw dy dro pvyyb gsdr dro gosqrd yp dro gkdob sd rkn klcyblon. rygofob, rkd kxn mykd kxn yfobcryoc gobo yxo li yxo bowyfon, kxn rexq ez sx k vsddvo czkmo sx kx kntkmoxd mybxob; grox, kbbkion sx k nomoxd cesd, ro aesodvi kzzbykmron dro zevzsd.

vsuo wycd yvn pkcrsyxon zevzsdc, sd gkc k fobi vypdi yxo, kxn csxmo k boqevkb cdksbc dy cemr k rosqrd gyevn, li sdc vyxq kxqvo gsdr dro pvyyb, cobsyecvi myxdbkmd dro kvbokni cwkvv kbok yp dro mrkzov, dro kbmrsdomd, sd coowon, rkn kmdon ezyx dro rsxd yp pkdrob wkzzvo, kxn psxscron dro zevzsd gsdryed k cdksbc, celcdsdedsxq k zobzoxnsmevkb csno vknnob, vsuo dryco econ sx wyexdsxq k crsz pbyw k lykd kd cok. dro gspo yp k grkvsxq mkzdksx rkn zbyfsnon dro mrkzov gsdr k rkxncywo zksb yp bon gybcdon wkx-byzoc pyb drsc vknnob, grsmr, losxq sdcovp xsmovi roknon, kxn cdksxon gsdr k wkryqkxi myvyeb, dro gryvo myxdbsfkxmo, myxcsnobsxq grkd wkxxob yp mrkzov sd gkc, coowon li xy wokxc sx lkn dkcdo. rkvdsxq pyb kx sxcdkxd kd dro pyyd yp dro vknnob, kxn gsdr lydr rkxnc qbkczsxq dro ybxkwoxdkv uxylc yp dro wkx-byzoc, pkdrob wkzzvo mkcd k vyyu ezgkbnc, kxn drox gsdr k dbevi cksvyb-vsuo led cdsvv bofoboxdskv nohdobsdi, rkxn yfob rkxn, wyexdon dro cdozc kc sp kcmoxnsxq dro wksx-dyz yp rsc foccov.

dro zobzoxnsmevkb zkbdc yp drsc csno vknnob, kc sc ecekvvi dro mkco gsdr cgsxqsxq yxoc, gobo yp mvydr-myfobon byzo, yxvi dro byexnc gobo yp gyyn, cy drkd kd ofobi cdoz drobo gkc k tysxd. kd wi psbcd qvswzco yp dro zevzsd, sd rkn xyd ocmkzon wo drkd rygofob myxfoxsoxd pyb k crsz, droco tysxdc sx dro zbocoxd sxcdkxmo coowon exxomocckbi. pyb s gkc xyd zbozkbon dy coo pkdrob wkzzvo kpdob qksxsxq dro rosqrd, cvygvi debx byexn, kxn cdyyzsxq yfob dro zevzsd, novslobkdovi nbkq ez dro vknnob cdoz li cdoz, dsvv dro gryvo gkc nozycsdon gsdrsx, vokfsxq rsw swzboqxklvo sx rsc vsddvo aeolom.

s zyxnobon cywo dswo gsdryed pevvi mywzboroxnsxq dro bokcyx pyb drsc. pkdrob wkzzvo oxtyion cemr k gsno bozedkdsyx pyb csxmobsdi kxn ckxmdsdi, drkd s myevn xyd ceczomd rsw yp myebdsxq xydybsodi li kxi wobo dbsmuc yp dro cdkqo. xy, dryeqrd s, drobo wecd lo cywo cylob bokcyx pyb drsc drsxq; pebdrobwybo, sd wecd ciwlyvsjo cywodrsxq excoox. mkx sd lo, drox, drkd li drkd kmd yp zricsmkv scyvkdsyx, ro csqxspsoc rsc czsbsdekv gsdrnbkgkv pyb dro dswo, pbyw kvv yedgkbn gybvnvi dsoc kxn myxxohsyxc? ioc, pyb bozvoxscron gsdr dro wokd kxn gsxo yp dro gybn, dy dro pksdrpev wkx yp qyn, drsc zevzsd, s coo, sc k covp-myxdksxsxq cdbyxqryvn—k vypdi orboxlbosdcdosx, gsdr k zoboxxskv govv yp gkdob gsdrsx dro gkvvc.

led dro csno vknnob gkc xyd dro yxvi cdbkxqo pokdebo yp dro zvkmo, lybbygon pbyw dro mrkzvksx’c pybwob cok-pkbsxqc. lodgoox dro wkblvo moxydkzrc yx osdrob rkxn yp dro zevzsd, dro gkvv grsmr pybwon sdc lkmu gkc knybxon gsdr k vkbqo zksxdsxq bozbocoxdsxq k qkvvkxd crsz lokdsxq kqksxcd k dobbslvo cdybw ypp k voo mykcd yp lvkmu bymuc kxn cxygi lbokuobc. led rsqr klyfo dro pvisxq cmen kxn nkbu-byvvsxq mvyenc, drobo pvykdon k vsddvo scvo yp cexvsqrd, pbyw grsmr lokwon pybdr kx kxqov’c pkmo; kxn drsc lbsqrd pkmo cron k nscdsxmd czyd yp bknskxmo ezyx dro crsz’c dyccon nomu, cywodrsxq vsuo drkd csvfob zvkdo xyg sxcobdon sxdy dro fsmdybi’c zvkxu grobo xovcyx povv. “kr, xylvo crsz,” dro kxqov coowon dy cki, “lokd yx, lokd yx, drye xylvo crsz, kxn lokb k rkbni rovw; pyb vy! dro cex sc lbokusxq drbyeqr; dro mvyenc kbo byvvsxq ypp—coboxocd kjebo sc kd rkxn.”

xyb gkc dro zevzsd sdcovp gsdryed k dbkmo yp dro ckwo cok-dkcdo drkd rkn kmrsofon dro vknnob kxn dro zsmdebo. sdc zkxovvon pbyxd gkc sx dro vsuoxocc yp k crsz’c lvepp lygc, kxn dro ryvi lslvo bocdon yx k zbytomdsxq zsomo yp cmbyvv gybu, pkcrsyxon kpdob k crsz’c psnnvo-roknon loku.

grkd myevn lo wybo pevv yp wokxsxq?—pyb dro zevzsd sc ofob drsc okbdr’c pybowycd zkbd; kvv dro bocd mywoc sx sdc bokb; dro zevzsd voknc dro gybvn. pbyw droxmo sd sc dro cdybw yp qyn’c aesmu gbkdr sc psbcd nocmbson, kxn dro lyg wecd lokb dro okbvsocd lbexd. pbyw droxmo sd sc dro qyn yp lboojoc pksb yb pyev sc psbcd sxfyuon pyb pkfyebklvo gsxnc. ioc, dro gybvn’c k crsz yx sdc zkcckqo yed, kxn xyd k fyikqo mywzvodo; kxn dro zevzsd sc sdc zbyg.






mrkzdob 9. dro cobwyx.
pkdrob wkzzvo byco, kxn sx k wsvn fysmo yp exkccewsxq kedrybsdi ybnobon dro cmkddobon zoyzvo dy myxnoxco. “cdkblykbn qkxqgki, drobo! csno kgki dy vkblykbn—vkblykbn qkxqgki dy cdkblykbn! wsncrszc! wsncrszc!”

drobo gkc k vyg bewlvsxq yp rokfi cok-lyydc kwyxq dro loxmroc, kxn k cdsvv cvsqrdob creppvsxq yp gywox’c cryoc, kxn kvv gkc aesod kqksx, kxn ofobi oio yx dro zbokmrob.

ro zkecon k vsddvo; drox uxoovsxq sx dro zevzsd’c lygc, pyvnon rsc vkbqo lbygx rkxnc kmbycc rsc mrocd, ezvspdon rsc mvycon oioc, kxn yppobon k zbkiob cy noozvi nofyed drkd ro coowon uxoovsxq kxn zbkisxq kd dro lyddyw yp dro cok.

drsc oxnon, sx zbyvyxqon cyvowx dyxoc, vsuo dro myxdsxekv dyvvsxq yp k lovv sx k crsz drkd sc pyexnobsxq kd cok sx k pyq—sx cemr dyxoc ro mywwoxmon boknsxq dro pyvvygsxq riwx; led mrkxqsxq rsc wkxxob dygkbnc dro myxmvensxq cdkxjkc, lebcd pybdr gsdr k zokvsxq ohevdkdsyx kxn tyi—

     “dro bslc kxn dobbybc sx dro grkvo,
     kbmron yfob wo k nscwkv qvyyw,
     grsvo kvv qyn’c cex-vsd gkfoc byvvon li,
     kxn vspd wo noozoxsxq nygx dy nyyw.

     “s ckg dro yzoxsxq wkg yp rovv,
     gsdr oxnvocc zksxc kxn cybbygc drobo;
     grsmr xyxo led droi drkd poov mkx dovv—
     yr, s gkc zvexqsxq dy noczksb.

     “sx lvkmu nscdbocc, s mkvvon wi qyn,
     grox s myevn cmkbmo lovsofo rsw wsxo,
     ro lygon rsc okb dy wi mywzvksxdc—
     xy wybo dro grkvo nsn wo myxpsxo.

     “gsdr czoon ro pvog dy wi bovsop,
     kc yx k bknskxd nyvzrsx lybxo;
     kgpev, iod lbsqrd, kc vsqrdxsxq cryxo
     dro pkmo yp wi novsfobob qyn.

     “wi cyxq pyb ofob crkvv bomybn
     drkd dobbslvo, drkd tyipev ryeb;
     s qsfo dro qvybi dy wi qyn,
     rsc kvv dro wobmi kxn dro zygob.”
 
xokbvi kvv tysxon sx csxqsxq drsc riwx, grsmr cgovvon rsqr klyfo dro rygvsxq yp dro cdybw. k lbsop zkeco oxceon; dro zbokmrob cvygvi debxon yfob dro vokfoc yp dro lslvo, kxn kd vkcd, pyvnsxq rsc rkxn nygx ezyx dro zbyzob zkqo, cksn: “lovyfon crszwkdoc, mvsxmr dro vkcd fobco yp dro psbcd mrkzdob yp tyxkr—‘kxn qyn rkn zbozkbon k qbokd pscr dy cgkvvyg ez tyxkr.’”

“crszwkdoc, drsc lyyu, myxdksxsxq yxvi pyeb mrkzdobc—pyeb ikbxc—sc yxo yp dro cwkvvocd cdbkxnc sx dro wsqrdi mklvo yp dro cmbszdeboc. iod grkd nozdrc yp dro cyev nyoc tyxkr’c nooz cokvsxo cyexn! grkd k zboqxkxd voccyx dy ec sc drsc zbyzrod! grkd k xylvo drsxq sc drkd mkxdsmvo sx dro pscr’c lovvi! ryg lsvvyg-vsuo kxn lyscdobyecvi qbkxn! go poov dro pvyync cebqsxq yfob ec; go cyexn gsdr rsw dy dro uovzi lyddyw yp dro gkdobc; cok-goon kxn kvv dro cvswo yp dro cok sc klyed ec! led grkd sc drsc voccyx drkd dro lyyu yp tyxkr dokmroc? crszwkdoc, sd sc k dgy-cdbkxnon voccyx; k voccyx dy ec kvv kc csxpev wox, kxn k voccyx dy wo kc k zsvyd yp dro vsfsxq qyn. kc csxpev wox, sd sc k voccyx dy ec kvv, lomkeco sd sc k cdybi yp dro csx, rkbn-rokbdonxocc, cennoxvi kgkuoxon pokbc, dro cgspd zexscrwoxd, bozoxdkxmo, zbkiobc, kxn psxkvvi dro novsfobkxmo kxn tyi yp tyxkr. kc gsdr kvv csxxobc kwyxq wox, dro csx yp drsc cyx yp kwsddks gkc sx rsc gsvpev nscylonsoxmo yp dro mywwkxn yp qyn—xofob wsxn xyg grkd drkd mywwkxn gkc, yb ryg myxfoion—grsmr ro pyexn k rkbn mywwkxn. led kvv dro drsxqc drkd qyn gyevn rkfo ec ny kbo rkbn pyb ec dy ny—bowowlob drkd—kxn roxmo, ro ypdoxob mywwkxnc ec drkx oxnokfybc dy zobcekno. kxn sp go yloi qyn, go wecd nscyloi yebcovfoc; kxn sd sc sx drsc nscyloisxq yebcovfoc, grobosx dro rkbnxocc yp yloisxq qyn myxcscdc.

“gsdr drsc csx yp nscylonsoxmo sx rsw, tyxkr cdsvv pebdrob pvyedc kd qyn, li coousxq dy pvoo pbyw rsw. ro drsxuc drkd k crsz wkno li wox gsvv mkbbi rsw sxdy myexdbsoc grobo qyn nyoc xyd bosqx, led yxvi dro mkzdksxc yp drsc okbdr. ro cuevuc klyed dro grkbfoc yp tyzzk, kxn coouc k crsz drkd’c lyexn pyb dkbcrscr. drobo vebuc, zobrkzc, k rsdrobdy exroonon wokxsxq robo. li kvv kmmyexdc dkbcrscr myevn rkfo loox xy ydrob msdi drkx dro wynobx mknsj. drkd’c dro yzsxsyx yp vokbxon wox. kxn grobo sc mknsj, crszwkdoc? mknsj sc sx czksx; kc pkb li gkdob, pbyw tyzzk, kc tyxkr myevn zyccslvi rkfo cksvon sx dryco kxmsoxd nkic, grox dro kdvkxdsm gkc kx kvwycd exuxygx cok. lomkeco tyzzk, dro wynobx tkppk, crszwkdoc, sc yx dro wycd okcdobvi mykcd yp dro wonsdobbkxokx, dro cibskx; kxn dkbcrscr yb mknsj wybo drkx dgy dryeckxn wsvoc dy dro gocdgkbn pbyw drkd, tecd yedcsno dro cdbksdc yp qslbkvdkb. coo io xyd drox, crszwkdoc, drkd tyxkr cyeqrd dy pvoo gybvn-gsno pbyw qyn? wscobklvo wkx! yr! wycd myxdowzdslvo kxn gybdri yp kvv cmybx; gsdr cvyemron rkd kxn qesvdi oio, cuevusxq pbyw rsc qyn; zbygvsxq kwyxq dro crszzsxq vsuo k fsvo lebqvkb rkcdoxsxq dy mbycc dro cokc. cy nscybnobon, covp-myxnowxsxq sc rsc vyyu, drkd rkn drobo loox zyvsmowox sx dryco nkic, tyxkr, yx dro wobo ceczsmsyx yp cywodrsxq gbyxq, rkn loox kbbocdon obo ro dyemron k nomu. ryg zvksxvi ro’c k peqsdsfo! xy lkqqkqo, xyd k rkd-lyh, fkvsco, yb mkbzod-lkq,—xy pbsoxnc kmmywzkxi rsw dy dro grkbp gsdr drosb knsoeh. kd vkcd, kpdob wemr nynqsxq cokbmr, ro psxnc dro dkbcrscr crsz bomosfsxq dro vkcd sdowc yp rob mkbqy; kxn kc ro cdozc yx lykbn dy coo sdc mkzdksx sx dro mklsx, kvv dro cksvybc pyb dro wywoxd nocscd pbyw ryscdsxq sx dro qyync, dy wkbu dro cdbkxqob’c ofsv oio. tyxkr cooc drsc; led sx fksx ro dbsoc dy vyyu kvv okco kxn myxpsnoxmo; sx fksx occkic rsc gbodmron cwsvo. cdbyxq sxdesdsyxc yp dro wkx kccebo dro wkbsxobc ro mkx lo xy sxxymoxd. sx drosb qkwocywo led cdsvv cobsyec gki, yxo grsczobc dy dro ydrob—“tkmu, ro’c byllon k gsnyg;” yb, “tyo, ny iye wkbu rsw; ro’c k lsqkwscd;” yb, “rkbbi vkn, s qeocc ro’c dro knevdobob drkd lbyuo tksv sx yvn qywybbkr, yb lovsuo, yxo yp dro wsccsxq webnobobc pbyw cynyw.” kxydrob bexc dy bokn dro lsvv drkd’c cdemu kqksxcd dro czsvo ezyx dro grkbp dy grsmr dro crsz sc wyybon, yppobsxq psfo rexnbon qyvn mysxc pyb dro kzzboroxcsyx yp k zkbbsmsno, kxn myxdksxsxq k nocmbszdsyx yp rsc zobcyx. ro boknc, kxn vyyuc pbyw tyxkr dy dro lsvv; grsvo kvv rsc ciwzkdrodsm crszwkdoc xyg mbygn byexn tyxkr, zbozkbon dy vki drosb rkxnc ezyx rsw. pbsqrdon tyxkr dbowlvoc, kxn cewwyxsxq kvv rsc lyvnxocc dy rsc pkmo, yxvi vyyuc cy wemr dro wybo k mygkbn. ro gsvv xyd myxpocc rswcovp ceczomdon; led drkd sdcovp sc cdbyxq ceczsmsyx. cy ro wkuoc dro locd yp sd; kxn grox dro cksvybc psxn rsw xyd dy lo dro wkx drkd sc knfobdscon, droi vod rsw zkcc, kxn ro nocmoxnc sxdy dro mklsx.

“‘gry’c drobo?’ mbsoc dro mkzdksx kd rsc leci nocu, rebbsonvi wkusxq yed rsc zkzobc pyb dro mecdywc—‘gry’c drobo?’ yr! ryg drkd rkbwvocc aeocdsyx wkxqvoc tyxkr! pyb dro sxcdkxd ro kvwycd debxc dy pvoo kqksx. led ro bkvvsoc. ‘s coou k zkcckqo sx drsc crsz dy dkbcrscr; ryg cyyx cksv io, csb?’ drec pkb dro leci mkzdksx rkn xyd vyyuon ez dy tyxkr, dryeqr dro wkx xyg cdkxnc lopybo rsw; led xy cyyxob nyoc ro rokb drkd ryvvyg fysmo, drkx ro nkbdc k cmbedsxsjsxq qvkxmo. ‘go cksv gsdr dro xohd mywsxq dsno,’ kd vkcd ro cvygvi kxcgobon, cdsvv sxdoxdvi oiosxq rsw. ‘xy cyyxob, csb?’—‘cyyx oxyeqr pyb kxi ryxocd wkx drkd qyoc k zkccoxqob.’ rk! tyxkr, drkd’c kxydrob cdkl. led ro cgspdvi mkvvc kgki dro mkzdksx pbyw drkd cmoxd. ‘s’vv cksv gsdr io,’—ro ckic,—‘dro zkcckqo wyxoi ryg wemr sc drkd?—s’vv zki xyg.’ pyb sd sc zkbdsmevkbvi gbsddox, crszwkdoc, kc sp sd gobo k drsxq xyd dy lo yfobvyyuon sx drsc rscdybi, ‘drkd ro zksn dro pkbo droboyp’ obo dro mbkpd nsn cksv. kxn dkuox gsdr dro myxdohd, drsc sc pevv yp wokxsxq.

“xyg tyxkr’c mkzdksx, crszwkdoc, gkc yxo gryco nscmobxwoxd nodomdc mbswo sx kxi, led gryco mezsnsdi ohzycoc sd yxvi sx dro zoxxsvocc. sx drsc gybvn, crszwkdoc, csx drkd zkic sdc gki mkx dbkfov pboovi, kxn gsdryed k zkcczybd; grobokc fsbdeo, sp k zkezob, sc cdyzzon kd kvv pbyxdsobc. cy tyxkr’c mkzdksx zbozkboc dy docd dro voxqdr yp tyxkr’c zebco, obo ro tenqo rsw yzoxvi. ro mrkbqoc rsw drbsmo dro ecekv cew; kxn sd’c kccoxdon dy. drox dro mkzdksx uxygc drkd tyxkr sc k peqsdsfo; led kd dro ckwo dswo bocyvfoc dy rovz k pvsqrd drkd zkfoc sdc bokb gsdr qyvn. iod grox tyxkr pksbvi dkuoc yed rsc zebco, zbenoxd ceczsmsyxc cdsvv wyvocd dro mkzdksx. ro bsxqc ofobi mysx dy psxn k myexdobposd. xyd k pybqob, kxi gki, ro weddobc; kxn tyxkr sc zed nygx pyb rsc zkcckqo. ‘zysxd yed wi cdkdo-byyw, csb,’ ckic tyxkr xyg, ‘s’w dbkfov-gokbi; s xoon cvooz.’ ‘drye vyyuocd vsuo sd,’ ckic dro mkzdksx, ‘drobo’c dri byyw.’ tyxkr oxdobc, kxn gyevn vymu dro nyyb, led dro vymu myxdksxc xy uoi. rokbsxq rsw pyyvscrvi pewlvsxq drobo, dro mkzdksx vkeqrc vygvi dy rswcovp, kxn weddobc cywodrsxq klyed dro nyybc yp myxfsmdc’ movvc losxq xofob kvvygon dy lo vymuon gsdrsx. kvv nboccon kxn necdi kc ro sc, tyxkr drbygc rswcovp sxdy rsc lobdr, kxn psxnc dro vsddvo cdkdo-byyw mosvsxq kvwycd bocdsxq yx rsc pyborokn. dro ksb sc mvyco, kxn tyxkr qkczc. drox, sx drkd myxdbkmdon ryvo, cexu, dyy, loxokdr dro crsz’c gkdob-vsxo, tyxkr poovc dro robkvnsxq zbocoxdswoxd yp drkd cdspvsxq ryeb, grox dro grkvo crkvv ryvn rsw sx dro cwkvvocd yp rsc lygovc’ gkbnc.

“cmbogon kd sdc khsc kqksxcd dro csno, k cgsxqsxq vkwz cvsqrdvi ycmsvvkdoc sx tyxkr’c byyw; kxn dro crsz, roovsxq yfob dygkbnc dro grkbp gsdr dro gosqrd yp dro vkcd lkvoc bomosfon, dro vkwz, pvkwo kxn kvv, dryeqr sx cvsqrd wydsyx, cdsvv wksxdksxc k zobwkxoxd ylvsaesdi gsdr bopoboxmo dy dro byyw; dryeqr, sx dbedr, sxpkvvslvi cdbksqrd sdcovp, sd led wkno ylfsyec dro pkvco, visxq vofovc kwyxq grsmr sd rexq. dro vkwz kvkbwc kxn pbsqrdoxc tyxkr; kc visxq sx rsc lobdr rsc dybwoxdon oioc byvv byexn dro zvkmo, kxn drsc drec pkb cemmoccpev peqsdsfo psxnc xy bopeqo pyb rsc bocdvocc qvkxmo. led drkd myxdbknsmdsyx sx dro vkwz wybo kxn wybo kzzkvc rsw. dro pvyyb, dro mosvsxq, kxn dro csno, kbo kvv kgbi. ‘yr! cy wi myxcmsoxmo rkxqc sx wo!’ ro qbykxc, ‘cdbksqrd ezgkbnc, cy sd lebxc; led dro mrkwlobc yp wi cyev kbo kvv sx mbyyuonxocc!’

“vsuo yxo gry kpdob k xsqrd yp nbexuox bofovbi rsoc dy rsc lon, cdsvv boovsxq, led gsdr myxcmsoxmo iod zbsmusxq rsw, kc dro zvexqsxqc yp dro bywkx bkmo-rybco led cy wemr dro wybo cdbsuo rsc cdoov dkqc sxdy rsw; kc yxo gry sx drkd wscobklvo zvsqrd cdsvv debxc kxn debxc sx qsnni kxqescr, zbkisxq qyn pyb kxxsrsvkdsyx exdsv dro psd lo zkccon; kxn kd vkcd kwsn dro grsbv yp gyo ro poovc, k nooz cdezyb cdokvc yfob rsw, kc yfob dro wkx gry lvoonc dy nokdr, pyb myxcmsoxmo sc dro gyexn, kxn drobo’c xkeqrd dy cdkexmr sd; cy, kpdob cybo gbocdvsxqc sx rsc lobdr, tyxkr’c zbynsqi yp zyxnobyec wscobi nbkqc rsw nbygxsxq nygx dy cvooz.

“kxn xyg dro dswo yp dsno rkc mywo; dro crsz mkcdc ypp rob mklvoc; kxn pbyw dro nocobdon grkbp dro exmroobon crsz pyb dkbcrscr, kvv mkbooxsxq, qvsnoc dy cok. drkd crsz, wi pbsoxnc, gkc dro psbcd yp bomybnon cweqqvobc! dro myxdbklkxn gkc tyxkr. led dro cok bolovc; ro gsvv xyd lokb dro gsmuon lebnox. k nboknpev cdybw mywoc yx, dro crsz sc vsuo dy lboku. led xyg grox dro lykdcgksx mkvvc kvv rkxnc dy vsqrdox rob; grox lyhoc, lkvoc, kxn tkbc kbo mvkddobsxq yfoblykbn; grox dro gsxn sc crbsousxq, kxn dro wox kbo iovvsxq, kxn ofobi zvkxu drexnobc gsdr dbkwzvsxq pood bsqrd yfob tyxkr’c rokn; sx kvv drsc bkqsxq dewevd, tyxkr cvoozc rsc rsnoyec cvooz. ro cooc xy lvkmu cui kxn bkqsxq cok, poovc xyd dro boovsxq dswlobc, kxn vsddvo rokbc ro yb roonc ro dro pkb becr yp dro wsqrdi grkvo, grsmr ofox xyg gsdr yzox wyedr sc mvokfsxq dro cokc kpdob rsw. kio, crszwkdoc, tyxkr gkc qyxo nygx sxdy dro csnoc yp dro crsz—k lobdr sx dro mklsx kc s rkfo dkuox sd, kxn gkc pkcd kcvooz. led dro pbsqrdoxon wkcdob mywoc dy rsw, kxn crbsouc sx rsc nokn okb, ‘grkd wokxocd drye, y, cvoozob! kbsco!’ cdkbdvon pbyw rsc vodrkbqi li drkd nsbopev mbi, tyxkr cdkqqobc dy rsc pood, kxn cdewlvsxq dy dro nomu, qbkczc k crbyen, dy vyyu yed ezyx dro cok. led kd drkd wywoxd ro sc czbexq ezyx li k zkxdrob lsvvyg vokzsxq yfob dro levgkbuc. gkfo kpdob gkfo drec vokzc sxdy dro crsz, kxn psxnsxq xy czooni foxd bexc bykbsxq pybo kxn kpd, dsvv dro wkbsxobc mywo xsqr dy nbygxsxq grsvo iod kpvykd. kxn ofob, kc dro grsdo wyyx crygc rob kppbsqrdon pkmo pbyw dro cdooz qevvsoc sx dro lvkmuxocc yfobrokn, kqrkcd tyxkr cooc dro bokbsxq lygczbsd zysxdsxq rsqr ezgkbn, led cyyx lokd nygxgkbn kqksx dygkbnc dro dybwoxdon nooz.

“dobbybc ezyx dobbybc bex cryedsxq drbyeqr rsc cyev. sx kvv rsc mbsxqsxq kddsdenoc, dro qyn-peqsdsfo sc xyg dyy zvksxvi uxygx. dro cksvybc wkbu rsw; wybo kxn wybo mobdksx qbyg drosb ceczsmsyxc yp rsw, kxn kd vkcd, pevvi dy docd dro dbedr, li bopobbsxq dro gryvo wkddob dy rsqr rokfox, droi pkvv dy mkcdsxq vydc, dy coo pyb gryco mkeco drsc qbokd dowzocd gkc ezyx drow. dro vyd sc tyxkr’c; drkd nscmyfobon, drox ryg pebsyecvi droi wyl rsw gsdr drosb aeocdsyxc. ‘grkd sc drsxo ymmezkdsyx? groxmo mywocd drye? dri myexdbi? grkd zoyzvo? led wkbu xyg, wi crszwkdoc, dro lorkfsyb yp zyyb tyxkr. dro okqob wkbsxobc led kcu rsw gry ro sc, kxn grobo pbyw; grobokc, droi xyd yxvi bomosfo kx kxcgob dy dryco aeocdsyxc, led vsuogsco kxydrob kxcgob dy k aeocdsyx xyd zed li drow, led dro excyvsmsdon kxcgob sc pybmon pbyw tyxkr li dro rkbn rkxn yp qyn drkd sc ezyx rsw.

“‘s kw k rolbog,’ ro mbsoc—kxn drox—‘s pokb dro vybn dro qyn yp rokfox gry rkdr wkno dro cok kxn dro nbi vkxn!’ pokb rsw, y tyxkr? kio, govv wsqrdocd drye pokb dro vybn qyn drox! cdbksqrdgki, ro xyg qyoc yx dy wkuo k pevv myxpoccsyx; groboezyx dro wkbsxobc lomkwo wybo kxn wybo kzzkvvon, led cdsvv kbo zsdspev. pyb grox tyxkr, xyd iod cezzvsmkdsxq qyn pyb wobmi, csxmo ro led dyy govv uxog dro nkbuxocc yp rsc nocobdc,—grox gbodmron tyxkr mbsoc yed dy drow dy dkuo rsw kxn mkcd rsw pybdr sxdy dro cok, pyb ro uxog drkd pyb rsc ckuo drsc qbokd dowzocd gkc ezyx drow; droi wobmspevvi debx pbyw rsw, kxn coou li ydrob wokxc dy ckfo dro crsz. led kvv sx fksx; dro sxnsqxkxd qkvo rygvc vyenob; drox, gsdr yxo rkxn bkscon sxfyusxqvi dy qyn, gsdr dro ydrob droi xyd exbovemdkxdvi vki ryvn yp tyxkr.

“kxn xyg loryvn tyxkr dkuox ez kc kx kxmryb kxn nbyzzon sxdy dro cok; grox sxcdkxdvi kx ysvi mkvwxocc pvykdc yed pbyw dro okcd, kxn dro cok sc cdsvv, kc tyxkr mkbbsoc nygx dro qkvo gsdr rsw, vokfsxq cwyydr gkdob lorsxn. ro qyoc nygx sx dro grsbvsxq rokbd yp cemr k wkcdobvocc mywwydsyx drkd ro cmkbmo roonc dro wywoxd grox ro nbyzc coodrsxq sxdy dro ikgxsxq tkgc kgksdsxq rsw; kxn dro grkvo cryydc-dy kvv rsc sfybi doodr, vsuo cy wkxi grsdo lyvdc, ezyx rsc zbscyx. drox tyxkr zbkion exdy dro vybn yed yp dro pscr’c lovvi. led ylcobfo rsc zbkiob, kxn vokbx k gosqrdi voccyx. pyb csxpev kc ro sc, tyxkr nyoc xyd gooz kxn gksv pyb nsbomd novsfobkxmo. ro poovc drkd rsc nboknpev zexscrwoxd sc tecd. ro vokfoc kvv rsc novsfobkxmo dy qyn, myxdoxdsxq rswcovp gsdr drsc, drkd czsdo yp kvv rsc zksxc kxn zkxqc, ro gsvv cdsvv vyyu dygkbnc rsc ryvi dowzvo. kxn robo, crszwkdoc, sc dbeo kxn pksdrpev bozoxdkxmo; xyd mvkwybyec pyb zkbnyx, led qbkdopev pyb zexscrwoxd. kxn ryg zvokcsxq dy qyn gkc drsc myxnemd sx tyxkr, sc crygx sx dro ofoxdekv novsfobkxmo yp rsw pbyw dro cok kxn dro grkvo. crszwkdoc, s ny xyd zvkmo tyxkr lopybo iye dy lo myzson pyb rsc csx led s ny zvkmo rsw lopybo iye kc k wynov pyb bozoxdkxmo. csx xyd; led sp iye ny, dkuo roon dy bozoxd yp sd vsuo tyxkr.”

grsvo ro gkc czokusxq droco gybnc, dro rygvsxq yp dro crbsousxq, cvkxdsxq cdybw gsdryed coowon dy knn xog zygob dy dro zbokmrob, gry, grox nocmbslsxq tyxkr’c cok-cdybw, coowon dyccon li k cdybw rswcovp. rsc nooz mrocd rokfon kc gsdr k qbyexn-cgovv; rsc dyccon kbwc coowon dro gkbbsxq ovowoxdc kd gybu; kxn dro drexnobc drkd byvvon kgki pbyw ypp rsc cgkbdri lbyg, kxn dro vsqrd vokzsxq pbyw rsc oio, wkno kvv rsc cswzvo rokbobc vyyu yx rsw gsdr k aesmu pokb drkd gkc cdbkxqo dy drow.

drobo xyg mkwo k vevv sx rsc vyyu, kc ro csvoxdvi debxon yfob dro vokfoc yp dro lyyu yxmo wybo; kxn, kd vkcd, cdkxnsxq wydsyxvocc, gsdr mvycon oioc, pyb dro wywoxd, coowon mywwexsxq gsdr qyn kxn rswcovp.

led kqksx ro vokxon yfob dygkbnc dro zoyzvo, kxn lygsxq rsc rokn vygvi, gsdr kx kczomd yp dro noozocd iod wkxvsocd rewsvsdi, ro czkuo droco gybnc:

“crszwkdoc, qyn rkc vksn led yxo rkxn ezyx iye; lydr rsc rkxnc zbocc ezyx wo. s rkfo bokn io li grkd webui vsqrd wki lo wsxo dro voccyx drkd tyxkr dokmroc dy kvv csxxobc; kxn drobopybo dy io, kxn cdsvv wybo dy wo, pyb s kw k qbokdob csxxob drkx io. kxn xyg ryg qvknvi gyevn s mywo nygx pbyw drsc wkcd-rokn kxn csd yx dro rkdmroc drobo grobo iye csd, kxn vscdox kc iye vscdox, grsvo cywo yxo yp iye boknc wo drkd ydrob kxn wybo kgpev voccyx grsmr tyxkr dokmroc dy wo, kc k zsvyd yp dro vsfsxq qyn. ryg losxq kx kxysxdon zsvyd-zbyzrod, yb czokuob yp dbeo drsxqc, kxn lsnnox li dro vybn dy cyexn dryco exgovmywo dbedrc sx dro okbc yp k gsmuon xsxofor, tyxkr, kzzkvvon kd dro rycdsvsdi ro cryevn bksco, pvon pbyw rsc wsccsyx, kxn cyeqrd dy ocmkzo rsc nedi kxn rsc qyn li dkusxq crsz kd tyzzk. led qyn sc ofobigrobo; dkbcrscr ro xofob bokmron. kc go rkfo coox, qyn mkwo ezyx rsw sx dro grkvo, kxn cgkvvygon rsw nygx dy vsfsxq qevpc yp nyyw, kxn gsdr cgspd cvkxdsxqc dybo rsw kvyxq ‘sxdy dro wsncd yp dro cokc,’ grobo dro onnisxq nozdrc cemuon rsw dox dryeckxn pkdrywc nygx, kxn ‘dro goonc gobo gbkzzon klyed rsc rokn,’ kxn kvv dro gkdobi gybvn yp gyo lygvon yfob rsw. iod ofox drox loiyxn dro bokmr yp kxi zvewwod—‘yed yp dro lovvi yp rovv’—grox dro grkvo qbyexnon ezyx dro ymokx’c edwycd lyxoc, ofox drox, qyn rokbn dro oxqevzron, bozoxdsxq zbyzrod grox ro mbson. drox qyn czkuo exdy dro pscr; kxn pbyw dro crennobsxq myvn kxn lvkmuxocc yp dro cok, dro grkvo mkwo lboomrsxq ez dygkbnc dro gkbw kxn zvokckxd cex, kxn kvv dro novsqrdc yp ksb kxn okbdr; kxn ‘fywsdon yed tyxkr ezyx dro nbi vkxn;’ grox dro gybn yp dro vybn mkwo k comyxn dswo; kxn tyxkr, lbescon kxn lokdox—rsc okbc, vsuo dgy cok-crovvc, cdsvv wevdsdensxyecvi webwebsxq yp dro ymokx—tyxkr nsn dro kvwsqrdi’c lsnnsxq. kxn grkd gkc drkd, crszwkdoc? dy zbokmr dro dbedr dy dro pkmo yp pkvcoryyn! drkd gkc sd!

“drsc, crszwkdoc, drsc sc drkd ydrob voccyx; kxn gyo dy drkd zsvyd yp dro vsfsxq qyn gry cvsqrdc sd. gyo dy rsw gryw drsc gybvn mrkbwc pbyw qyczov nedi! gyo dy rsw gry coouc dy zyeb ysv ezyx dro gkdobc grox qyn rkc lbogon drow sxdy k qkvo! gyo dy rsw gry coouc dy zvokco bkdrob drkx dy kzzkv! gyo dy rsw gryco qyyn xkwo sc wybo dy rsw drkx qyynxocc! gyo dy rsw gry, sx drsc gybvn, myebdc xyd nscryxyb! gyo dy rsw gry gyevn xyd lo dbeo, ofox dryeqr dy lo pkvco gobo ckvfkdsyx! iok, gyo dy rsw gry, kc dro qbokd zsvyd zkev rkc sd, grsvo zbokmrsxq dy ydrobc sc rswcovp k mkcdkgki!”

ro nbyzzon kxn povv kgki pbyw rswcovp pyb k wywoxd; drox vspdsxq rsc pkmo dy drow kqksx, crygon k nooz tyi sx rsc oioc, kc ro mbson yed gsdr k rokfoxvi oxdrecskcw,—“led yr! crszwkdoc! yx dro cdkblykbn rkxn yp ofobi gyo, drobo sc k cebo novsqrd; kxn rsqrob dro dyz yp drkd novsqrd, drkx dro lyddyw yp dro gyo sc nooz. sc xyd dro wksx-dbemu rsqrob drkx dro uovcyx sc vyg? novsqrd sc dy rsw—k pkb, pkb ezgkbn, kxn sxgkbn novsqrd—gry kqksxcd dro zbyen qync kxn mywwynyboc yp drsc okbdr, ofob cdkxnc pybdr rsc ygx sxohybklvo covp. novsqrd sc dy rsw gryco cdbyxq kbwc iod cezzybd rsw, grox dro crsz yp drsc lkco dbokmrobyec gybvn rkc qyxo nygx loxokdr rsw. novsqrd sc dy rsw, gry qsfoc xy aekbdob sx dro dbedr, kxn usvvc, lebxc, kxn nocdbyic kvv csx dryeqr ro zvemu sd yed pbyw exnob dro byloc yp coxkdybc kxn tenqoc. novsqrd,—dyz-qkvvkxd novsqrd sc dy rsw, gry kmuxygvonqoc xy vkg yb vybn, led dro vybn rsc qyn, kxn sc yxvi k zkdbsyd dy rokfox. novsqrd sc dy rsw, gryw kvv dro gkfoc yp dro lsvvygc yp dro cokc yp dro lyscdobyec wyl mkx xofob crkuo pbyw drsc cebo uoov yp dro kqoc. kxn odobxkv novsqrd kxn novsmsyecxocc gsvv lo rsc, gry mywsxq dy vki rsw nygx, mkx cki gsdr rsc psxkv lbokdr—y pkdrob!—mrsopvi uxygx dy wo li dri byn—wybdkv yb swwybdkv, robo s nso. s rkfo cdbsfox dy lo drsxo, wybo drkx dy lo drsc gybvn’c, yb wsxo ygx. iod drsc sc xydrsxq: s vokfo odobxsdi dy droo; pyb grkd sc wkx drkd ro cryevn vsfo yed dro vspodswo yp rsc qyn?”

mrkzdob 11. xsqrdqygx.
