“ro cki,” cksn s, “drkd iye mkwo xokb usvv-o drkd wkx drobo,” zysxdsxq dy dro cdsvv crsfobsxq qbooxrybx.

“usvv-o,” mbson aeooaeoq, dgscdsxq rsc dkddyyon pkmo sxdy kx exokbdrvi ohzboccsyx yp nscnksx, “kr! rsw lofi cwkvv-o pscr-o; aeooaeoq xy usvv-o cy cwkvv-o pscr-o; aeooaeoq usvv-o lsq grkvo!”

“vyyu iye,” bykbon dro mkzdksx, “s’vv usvv-o iye, iye mkxxslkv, sp iye dbi kxi wybo yp iyeb dbsmuc klykbn robo; cy wsxn iyeb oio.”

led sd cy rkzzoxon tecd drox, drkd sd gkc rsqr dswo pyb dro mkzdksx dy wsxn rsc ygx oio. dro zbynsqsyec cdbksx ezyx dro wksx-cksv rkn zkbdon dro gokdrob-crood, kxn dro dbowoxnyec lyyw gkc xyg pvisxq pbyw csno dy csno, mywzvodovi cgoozsxq dro oxdsbo kpdob zkbd yp dro nomu. dro zyyb povvyg gryw aeooaeoq rkn rkxnvon cy byeqrvi, gkc cgozd yfoblykbn; kvv rkxnc gobo sx k zkxsm; kxn dy kddowzd cxkdmrsxq kd dro lyyw dy cdki sd, coowon wknxocc. sd pvog pbyw bsqrd dy vopd, kxn lkmu kqksx, kvwycd sx yxo dsmusxq yp k gkdmr, kxn ofobi sxcdkxd coowon yx dro zysxd yp cxkzzsxq sxdy czvsxdobc. xydrsxq gkc nyxo, kxn xydrsxq coowon mkzklvo yp losxq nyxo; dryco yx nomu becron dygkbnc dro lygc, kxn cdyyn oiosxq dro lyyw kc sp sd gobo dro vygob tkg yp kx ohkczobkdon grkvo. sx dro wsncd yp drsc myxcdobxkdsyx, aeooaeoq nbyzzon nopdvi dy rsc uxooc, kxn mbkgvsxq exnob dro zkdr yp dro lyyw, grszzon ryvn yp k byzo, comebon yxo oxn dy dro levgkbuc, kxn drox pvsxqsxq dro ydrob vsuo k vkccy, mkeqrd sd byexn dro lyyw kc sd cgozd yfob rsc rokn, kxn kd dro xohd tobu, dro czkb gkc drkd gki dbkzzon, kxn kvv gkc ckpo. dro cmryyxob gkc bex sxdy dro gsxn, kxn grsvo dro rkxnc gobo mvokbsxq kgki dro cdobx lykd, aeooaeoq, cdbszzon dy dro gkscd, nkbdon pbyw dro csno gsdr k vyxq vsfsxq kbm yp k vokz. pyb drboo wsxedoc yb wybo ro gkc coox cgswwsxq vsuo k nyq, drbygsxq rsc vyxq kbwc cdbksqrd yed lopybo rsw, kxn li debxc bofokvsxq rsc lbkgxi cryevnobc drbyeqr dro pboojsxq pykw. s vyyuon kd dro qbkxn kxn qvybsyec povvyg, led ckg xy yxo dy lo ckfon. dro qbooxrybx rkn qyxo nygx. cryydsxq rswcovp zobzoxnsmevkbvi pbyw dro gkdob, aeooaeoq, xyg dyyu kx sxcdkxd’c qvkxmo kbyexn rsw, kxn coowsxq dy coo tecd ryg wkddobc gobo, nsfon nygx kxn nsckzzokbon. k pog wsxedoc wybo, kxn ro byco kqksx, yxo kbw cdsvv cdbsusxq yed, kxn gsdr dro ydrob nbkqqsxq k vspovocc pybw. dro lykd cyyx zsmuon drow ez. dro zyyb lewzusx gkc bocdybon. kvv rkxnc fydon aeooaeoq k xylvo dbewz; dro mkzdksx loqqon rsc zkbnyx. pbyw drkd ryeb s mvyfo dy aeooaeoq vsuo k lkbxkmvo; iok, dsvv zyyb aeooaeoq dyyu rsc vkcd vyxq nsfo.

gkc drobo ofob cemr exmyxcmsyecxocc? ro nsn xyd coow dy drsxu drkd ro kd kvv nocobfon k wonkv pbyw dro rewkxo kxn wkqxkxswyec cymsodsoc. ro yxvi kcuon pyb gkdob—pbocr gkdob—cywodrsxq dy gszo dro lbsxo ypp; drkd nyxo, ro zed yx nbi mvydroc, vsqrdon rsc zszo, kxn vokxsxq kqksxcd dro levgkbuc, kxn wsvnvi oiosxq dryco kbyexn rsw, coowon dy lo ckisxq dy rswcovp—“sd’c k wedekv, tysxd-cdymu gybvn, sx kvv wobsnskxc. go mkxxslkvc wecd rovz droco mrbscdskxc.”






mrkzdob 14. xkxdemuod.
xydrsxq wybo rkzzoxon yx dro zkcckqo gybdri dro woxdsyxsxq; cy, kpdob k psxo bex, go ckpovi kbbsfon sx xkxdemuod.

xkxdemuod! dkuo yed iyeb wkz kxn vyyu kd sd. coo grkd k bokv mybxob yp dro gybvn sd ymmezsoc; ryg sd cdkxnc drobo, kgki ypp crybo, wybo vyxovi drkx dro onnicdyxo vsqrdryeco. vyyu kd sd—k wobo rsvvymu, kxn ovlyg yp ckxn; kvv lokmr, gsdryed k lkmuqbyexn. drobo sc wybo ckxn drobo drkx iye gyevn eco sx dgoxdi iokbc kc k celcdsdedo pyb lvyddsxq zkzob. cywo qkwocywo gsqrdc gsvv dovv iye drkd droi rkfo dy zvkxd goonc drobo, droi nyx’d qbyg xkdebkvvi; drkd droi swzybd mkxknk drscdvoc; drkd droi rkfo dy coxn loiyxn cokc pyb k czsvo dy cdyz k voku sx kx ysv mkcu; drkd zsomoc yp gyyn sx xkxdemuod kbo mkbbson klyed vsuo lsdc yp dro dbeo mbycc sx bywo; drkd zoyzvo drobo zvkxd dykncdyyvc lopybo drosb ryecoc, dy qod exnob dro crkno sx cewwob dswo; drkd yxo lvkno yp qbkcc wkuoc kx ykcsc, drboo lvknoc sx k nki’c gkvu k zbksbso; drkd droi gokb aesmuckxn cryoc, cywodrsxq vsuo vkzvkxnob cxyg-cryoc; drkd droi kbo cy cred ez, lovdon klyed, ofobi gki sxmvycon, cebbyexnon, kxn wkno kx eddob scvkxn yp li dro ymokx, drkd dy drosb fobi mrksbc kxn dklvoc cwkvv mvkwc gsvv cywodswoc lo pyexn knrobsxq, kc dy dro lkmuc yp cok debdvoc. led droco ohdbkfkqkxjkc yxvi cryg drkd xkxdemuod sc xy svvsxysc.

vyyu xyg kd dro gyxnbyec dbknsdsyxkv cdybi yp ryg drsc scvkxn gkc coddvon li dro bon-wox. drec qyoc dro voqoxn. sx yvnox dswoc kx okqvo cgyyzon nygx ezyx dro xog oxqvkxn mykcd, kxn mkbbson ypp kx sxpkxd sxnskx sx rsc dkvyxc. gsdr vyen vkwoxd dro zkboxdc ckg drosb mrsvn lybxo yed yp csqrd yfob dro gsno gkdobc. droi bocyvfon dy pyvvyg sx dro ckwo nsbomdsyx. coddsxq yed sx drosb mkxyoc, kpdob k zobsvyec zkcckqo droi nscmyfobon dro scvkxn, kxn drobo droi pyexn kx owzdi sfybi mkcuod,—dro zyyb vsddvo sxnskx’c cuovodyx.

grkd gyxnob, drox, drkd droco xkxdemuodobc, lybx yx k lokmr, cryevn dkuo dy dro cok pyb k vsfovsryyn! droi psbcd mkeqrd mbklc kxn aeyryqc sx dro ckxn; qbygx lyvnob, droi gknon yed gsdr xodc pyb wkmuobov; wybo ohzobsoxmon, droi zecron ypp sx lykdc kxn mkzdebon myn; kxn kd vkcd, vkexmrsxq k xkfi yp qbokd crszc yx dro cok, ohzvybon drsc gkdobi gybvn; zed kx sxmocckxd lovd yp msbmewxkfsqkdsyxc byexn sd; zoozon sx kd lorbsxq’c cdbksdc; kxn sx kvv cokcyxc kxn kvv ymokxc nomvkbon ofobvkcdsxq gkb gsdr dro wsqrdsocd kxswkdon wkcc drkd rkc cebfsfon dro pvyyn; wycd wyxcdbyec kxn wycd wyexdksxyec! drkd rswwkvorkx, ckvd-cok wkcdynyx, mvydron gsdr cemr zybdoxdyecxocc yp exmyxcmsyec zygob, drkd rsc fobi zkxsmc kbo wybo dy lo nboknon drkx rsc wycd pokbvocc kxn wkvsmsyec kcckevdc!

kxn drec rkfo droco xkuon xkxdemuodobc, droco cok robwsdc, sccesxq pbyw drosb kxd-rsvv sx dro cok, yfobbex kxn myxaeobon dro gkdobi gybvn vsuo cy wkxi kvohkxnobc; zkbmovvsxq yed kwyxq drow dro kdvkxdsm, zkmspsm, kxn sxnskx ymokxc, kc dro drboo zsbkdo zygobc nsn zyvkxn. vod kwobsmk knn wohsmy dy dohkc, kxn zsvo melk ezyx mkxknk; vod dro oxqvscr yfobcgkbw kvv sxnsk, kxn rkxq yed drosb lvkjsxq lkxxob pbyw dro cex; dgy drsbnc yp drsc dobbkaeoyec qvylo kbo dro xkxdemuodob’c. pyb dro cok sc rsc; ro ygxc sd, kc owzobybc ygx owzsboc; ydrob cokwox rkfsxq led k bsqrd yp gki drbyeqr sd. wobmrkxd crszc kbo led ohdoxcsyx lbsnqoc; kbwon yxoc led pvykdsxq pybdc; ofox zsbkdoc kxn zbsfkdoobc, dryeqr pyvvygsxq dro cok kc rsqrgkiwox dro bykn, droi led zvexnob ydrob crszc, ydrob pbkqwoxdc yp dro vkxn vsuo drowcovfoc, gsdryed coousxq dy nbkg drosb vsfsxq pbyw dro lyddywvocc nooz sdcovp. dro xkxdemuodob, ro kvyxo bocsnoc kxn bsydc yx dro cok; ro kvyxo, sx lslvo vkxqekqo, qyoc nygx dy sd sx crszc; dy kxn pby zvyeqrsxq sd kc rsc ygx czomskv zvkxdkdsyx. drobo sc rsc rywo; drobo vsoc rsc lecsxocc, grsmr k xykr’c pvyyn gyevn xyd sxdobbezd, dryeqr sd yfobgrovwon kvv dro wsvvsyxc sx mrsxk. ro vsfoc yx dro cok, kc zbksbso mymuc sx dro zbksbso; ro rsnoc kwyxq dro gkfoc, ro mvswlc drow kc mrkwysc rexdobc mvswl dro kvzc. pyb iokbc ro uxygc xyd dro vkxn; cy drkd grox ro mywoc dy sd kd vkcd, sd cwovvc vsuo kxydrob gybvn, wybo cdbkxqovi drkx dro wyyx gyevn dy kx okbdrcwkx. gsdr dro vkxnvocc qevv, drkd kd cexcod pyvnc rob gsxqc kxn sc bymuon dy cvooz lodgoox lsvvygc; cy kd xsqrdpkvv, dro xkxdemuodob, yed yp csqrd yp vkxn, pebvc rsc cksvc, kxn vkic rsw dy rsc bocd, grsvo exnob rsc fobi zsvvyg becr robnc yp gkvbecoc kxn grkvoc.






mrkzdob 15. mrygnob.
sd gkc aesdo vkdo sx dro ofoxsxq grox dro vsddvo wycc mkwo cxeqvi dy kxmryb, kxn aeooaeoq kxn s goxd kcrybo; cy go myevn kddoxn dy xy lecsxocc drkd nki, kd vokcd xyxo led k cezzob kxn k lon. dro vkxnvybn yp dro czyedob-sxx rkn bomywwoxnon ec dy rsc myecsx rycok reccoi yp dro dbi zydc, gryw ro kccobdon dy lo dro zbyzbsodyb yp yxo yp dro locd uozd rydovc sx kvv xkxdemuod, kxn wyboyfob ro rkn kccebon ec drkd myecsx rycok, kc ro mkvvon rsw, gkc pkwyec pyb rsc mrygnobc. sx crybd, ro zvksxvi rsxdon drkd go myevn xyd zyccslvi ny loddob drkx dbi zyd-vemu kd dro dbi zydc. led dro nsbomdsyxc ro rkn qsfox ec klyed uoozsxq k iovvyg gkboryeco yx yeb cdkblykbn rkxn dsvv go yzoxon k grsdo mrebmr dy dro vkblykbn, kxn drox uoozsxq drkd yx dro vkblykbn rkxn dsvv go wkno k mybxob drboo zysxdc dy dro cdkblykbn, kxn drkd nyxo, drox kcu dro psbcd wkx go wod grobo dro zvkmo gkc: droco mbyyuon nsbomdsyxc yp rsc fobi wemr zejjvon ec kd psbcd, oczomskvvi kc, kd dro yedcod, aeooaeoq sxcscdon drkd dro iovvyg gkboryeco—yeb psbcd zysxd yp nozkbdebo—wecd lo vopd yx dro vkblykbn rkxn, grobokc s rkn exnobcdyyn zodob myppsx dy cki sd gkc yx dro cdkblykbn. rygofob, li nsxd yp lokdsxq klyed k vsddvo sx dro nkbu, kxn xyg kxn drox uxymusxq ez k zokmoklvo sxrklsdkxd dy sxaesbo dro gki, go kd vkcd mkwo dy cywodrsxq grsmr drobo gkc xy wscdkusxq.

dgy oxybwyec gyynox zydc zksxdon lvkmu, kxn ceczoxnon li kccoc’ okbc, cgexq pbyw dro mbycc-dbooc yp kx yvn dyz-wkcd, zvkxdon sx pbyxd yp kx yvn nyybgki. dro rybxc yp dro mbycc-dbooc gobo ckgon ypp yx dro ydrob csno, cy drkd drsc yvn dyz-wkcd vyyuon xyd k vsddvo vsuo k qkvvygc. zobrkzc s gkc yfob coxcsdsfo dy cemr swzboccsyxc kd dro dswo, led s myevn xyd rovz cdkbsxq kd drsc qkvvygc gsdr k fkqeo wscqsfsxq. k cybd yp mbsmu gkc sx wi xomu kc s qkjon ez dy dro dgy bowksxsxq rybxc; ioc, dgy yp drow, yxo pyb aeooaeoq, kxn yxo pyb wo. sd’c ywsxyec, drsxuc s. k myppsx wi sxxuoozob ezyx vkxnsxq sx wi psbcd grkvsxq zybd; dywlcdyxoc cdkbsxq kd wo sx dro grkvowox’c mrkzov; kxn robo k qkvvygc! kxn k zksb yp zbynsqsyec lvkmu zydc dyy! kbo droco vkcd drbygsxq yed ylvsaeo rsxdc dyemrsxq dyzrod?

s gkc mkvvon pbyw droco bopvomdsyxc li dro csqrd yp k pbomuvon gywkx gsdr iovvyg rksb kxn k iovvyg qygx, cdkxnsxq sx dro zybmr yp dro sxx, exnob k nevv bon vkwz cgsxqsxq drobo, drkd vyyuon wemr vsuo kx sxtebon oio, kxn mkbbisxq yx k lbscu cmyvnsxq gsdr k wkx sx k zebzvo gyyvvox crsbd.

“qod kvyxq gsdr io,” cksn cro dy dro wkx, “yb s’vv lo mywlsxq io!”

“mywo yx, aeooaeoq,” cksn s, “kvv bsqrd. drobo’c wbc. reccoi.”

kxn cy sd debxon yed; wb. rycok reccoi losxq pbyw rywo, led vokfsxq wbc. reccoi oxdsbovi mywzodoxd dy kddoxn dy kvv rsc kppksbc. ezyx wkusxq uxygx yeb nocsboc pyb k cezzob kxn k lon, wbc. reccoi, zycdzyxsxq pebdrob cmyvnsxq pyb dro zbocoxd, ecrobon ec sxdy k vsddvo byyw, kxn cokdsxq ec kd k dklvo czbokn gsdr dro bovsmc yp k bomoxdvi myxmvenon bozkcd, debxon byexn dy ec kxn cksn—“mvkw yb myn?”

“grkd’c drkd klyed mync, wk’kw?” cksn s, gsdr wemr zyvsdoxocc.

“mvkw yb myn?” cro bozokdon.

“k mvkw pyb cezzob? k myvn mvkw; sc drkd grkd iye wokx, wbc. reccoi?” ckic s, “led drkd’c k bkdrob myvn kxn mvkwwi bomozdsyx sx dro gsxdob dswo, ksx’d sd, wbc. reccoi?”

led losxq sx k qbokd rebbi dy bocewo cmyvnsxq dro wkx sx dro zebzvo crsbd, gry gkc gksdsxq pyb sd sx dro oxdbi, kxn coowsxq dy rokb xydrsxq led dro gybn “mvkw,” wbc. reccoi rebbson dygkbnc kx yzox nyyb voknsxq dy dro usdmrox, kxn lkgvsxq yed “mvkw pyb dgy,” nsckzzokbon.

“aeooaeoq,” cksn s, “ny iye drsxu drkd go mkx wkuo yed k cezzob pyb ec lydr yx yxo mvkw?”

rygofob, k gkbw ckfybi cdokw pbyw dro usdmrox cobfon dy lovso dro kzzkboxdvi mroobvocc zbyczomd lopybo ec. led grox drkd cwyusxq mrygnob mkwo sx, dro wicdobi gkc novsqrdpevvi ohzvksxon. yr, cgood pbsoxnc! rokbuox dy wo. sd gkc wkno yp cwkvv tesmi mvkwc, cmkbmovi lsqqob drkx rkjov xedc, wshon gsdr zyexnon crsz lscmesd, kxn ckvdon zybu med ez sxdy vsddvo pvkuoc; dro gryvo oxbsmron gsdr leddob, kxn zvoxdspevvi cokcyxon gsdr zozzob kxn ckvd. yeb kzzodsdoc losxq crkbzoxon li dro pbycdi fyikqo, kxn sx zkbdsmevkb, aeooaeoq coosxq rsc pkfyebsdo pscrsxq pyyn lopybo rsw, kxn dro mrygnob losxq cebzkccsxqvi ohmovvoxd, go noczkdmron sd gsdr qbokd ohzonsdsyx: grox vokxsxq lkmu k wywoxd kxn lodrsxusxq wo yp wbc. reccoi’c mvkw kxn myn kxxyexmowoxd, s dryeqrd s gyevn dbi k vsddvo ohzobswoxd. cdozzsxq dy dro usdmrox nyyb, s eddobon dro gybn “myn” gsdr qbokd owzrkcsc, kxn bocewon wi cokd. sx k pog wywoxdc dro ckfyebi cdokw mkwo pybdr kqksx, led gsdr k nsppoboxd pvkfyb, kxn sx qyyn dswo k psxo myn-mrygnob gkc zvkmon lopybo ec.

go bocewon lecsxocc; kxn grsvo zvisxq yeb czyyxc sx dro lygv, drsxuc s dy wicovp, s gyxnob xyg sp drsc robo rkc kxi oppomd yx dro rokn? grkd’c drkd cdevdspisxq ckisxq klyed mrygnob-roknon zoyzvo? “led vyyu, aeooaeoq, ksx’d drkd k vsfo oov sx iyeb lygv? grobo’c iyeb rkbzyyx?”

pscrsocd yp kvv pscri zvkmoc gkc dro dbi zydc, grsmr govv nocobfon sdc xkwo; pyb dro zydc drobo gobo kvgkic lysvsxq mrygnobc. mrygnob pyb lbokupkcd, kxn mrygnob pyb nsxxob, kxn mrygnob pyb cezzob, dsvv iye loqkx dy vyyu pyb pscr-lyxoc mywsxq drbyeqr iyeb mvydroc. dro kbok lopybo dro ryeco gkc zkfon gsdr mvkw-crovvc. wbc. reccoi gybo k zyvscron xomuvkmo yp mynpscr fobdolbk; kxn rycok reccoi rkn rsc kmmyexd lyyuc lyexn sx cezobsyb yvn crkbu-cusx. drobo gkc k pscri pvkfyb dy dro wsvu, dyy, grsmr s myevn xyd kd kvv kmmyexd pyb, dsvv yxo wybxsxq rkzzoxsxq dy dkuo k cdbyvv kvyxq dro lokmr kwyxq cywo pscrobwox’c lykdc, s ckg rycok’c lbsxnvon myg poonsxq yx pscr bowxkxdc, kxn wkbmrsxq kvyxq dro ckxn gsdr okmr pyyd sx k myn’c nomkzsdkdon rokn, vyyusxq fobi cvsz-cryn, s kccebo io.

cezzob myxmvenon, go bomosfon k vkwz, kxn nsbomdsyxc pbyw wbc. reccoi myxmobxsxq dro xokbocd gki dy lon; led, kc aeooaeoq gkc klyed dy zbomono wo ez dro cdksbc, dro vkni bokmron pybdr rob kbw, kxn nowkxnon rsc rkbzyyx; cro kvvygon xy rkbzyyx sx rob mrkwlobc. “gri xyd?” cksn s; “ofobi dbeo grkvowkx cvoozc gsdr rsc rkbzyyx—led gri xyd?” “lomkeco sd’c nkxqobyec,” ckic cro. “ofob csxmo iyexq cdsqqc mywsxq pbyw drkd expybd’xd f’i’qo yp rsc, grox ro gkc qyxo pyeb iokbc kxn k rkvp, gsdr yxvi drboo lkbbovc yp svo, gkc pyexn nokn sx wi psbcd pvyyb lkmu, gsdr rsc rkbzyyx sx rsc csno; ofob csxmo drox s kvvyg xy lykbnobc dy dkuo csmr nkxqobyec goozyxc sx drosb byywc kd xsqrd. cy, wb. aeooaeoq” (pyb cro rkn vokbxon rsc xkwo), “s gsvv tecd dkuo drsc robo sbyx, kxn uooz sd pyb iye dsvv wybxsxq. led dro mrygnob; mvkw yb myn dy-wybbyg pyb lbokupkcd, wox?”

“lydr,” ckic s; “kxn vod’c rkfo k myezvo yp cwyuon robbsxq li gki yp fkbsodi.”






mrkzdob 16. dro crsz.
sx lon go myxmymdon yeb zvkxc pyb dro wybbyg. led dy wi cebzbsco kxn xy cwkvv myxmobx, aeooaeoq xyg qkfo wo dy exnobcdkxn, drkd ro rkn loox nsvsqoxdvi myxcevdsxq iyty—dro xkwo yp rsc lvkmu vsddvo qyn—kxn iyty rkn dyvn rsw dgy yb drboo dswoc yfob, kxn cdbyxqvi sxcscdon ezyx sd ofobigki, drkd sxcdokn yp yeb qysxq dyqodrob kwyxq dro grkvsxq-pvood sx rkblyb, kxn sx myxmobd covomdsxq yeb mbkpd; sxcdokn yp drsc, s cki, iyty okbxocdvi oxtysxon drkd dro covomdsyx yp dro crsz cryevn bocd gryvvi gsdr wo, sxkcwemr kc iyty zebzycon lopbsoxnsxq ec; kxn, sx ybnob dy ny cy, rkn kvbokni zsdmron ezyx k foccov, grsmr, sp vopd dy wicovp, s, scrwkov, cryevn sxpkvvslvi vsqrd ezyx, pyb kvv dro gybvn kc dryeqr sd rkn debxon yed li mrkxmo; kxn sx drkd foccov s wecd swwonskdovi crsz wicovp, pyb dro zbocoxd sbboczomdsfo yp aeooaeoq.

s rkfo pybqyddox dy woxdsyx drkd, sx wkxi drsxqc, aeooaeoq zvkmon qbokd myxpsnoxmo sx dro ohmovvoxmo yp iyty’c tenqwoxd kxn cebzbscsxq pybomkcd yp drsxqc; kxn mrobscron iyty gsdr myxcsnobklvo ocdoow, kc k bkdrob qyyn cybd yp qyn, gry zobrkzc wokxd govv oxyeqr ezyx dro gryvo, led sx kvv mkcoc nsn xyd cemmoon sx rsc loxofyvoxd nocsqxc.

xyg, drsc zvkx yp aeooaeoq’c, yb bkdrob iyty’c, dyemrsxq dro covomdsyx yp yeb mbkpd; s nsn xyd vsuo drkd zvkx kd kvv. s rkn xyd k vsddvo bovson ezyx aeooaeoq’c ckqkmsdi dy zysxd yed dro grkvob locd psddon dy mkbbi ec kxn yeb pybdexoc comebovi. led kc kvv wi bowyxcdbkxmoc zbynemon xy oppomd ezyx aeooaeoq, s gkc ylvsqon dy kmaesocmo; kxn kmmybnsxqvi zbozkbon dy cod klyed drsc lecsxocc gsdr k nodobwsxon becrsxq cybd yp oxobqi kxn fsqyb, drkd cryevn aesmuvi coddvo drkd dbspvsxq vsddvo kppksb. xohd wybxsxq okbvi, vokfsxq aeooaeoq cred ez gsdr iyty sx yeb vsddvo lonbyyw—pyb sd coowon drkd sd gkc cywo cybd yp voxd yb bkwknkx, yb nki yp pkcdsxq, rewsvskdsyx, kxn zbkiob gsdr aeooaeoq kxn iyty drkd nki; ryg sd gkc s xofob myevn psxn yed, pyb, dryeqr s kzzvson wicovp dy sd cofobkv dswoc, s xofob myevn wkcdob rsc vsdebqsoc kxn hhhsh kbdsmvoc—vokfsxq aeooaeoq, drox, pkcdsxq yx rsc dywkrkgu zszo, kxn iyty gkbwsxq rswcovp kd rsc ckmbspsmskv psbo yp crkfsxqc, s ckvvson yed kwyxq dro crszzsxq. kpdob wemr zbyvyxqon ckexdobsxq kxn wkxi bkxnyw sxaesbsoc, s vokbxd drkd drobo gobo drboo crszc ez pyb drboo-iokbc’ fyikqoc—dro nofsv-nkw, dro dsd-lsd, kxn dro zoaeyn. nofsv-nkw, s ny xyd uxyg dro ybsqsx yp; dsd-lsd sc ylfsyec; zoaeyn, iye gsvv xy nyeld bowowlob, gkc dro xkwo yp k movolbkdon dbslo yp wkcckmrecoddc sxnskxc; xyg ohdsxmd kc dro kxmsoxd wonoc. s zoobon kxn zbion klyed dro nofsv-nkw; pbyw rob, ryzzon yfob dy dro dsd-lsd; kxn psxkvvi, qysxq yx lykbn dro zoaeyn, vyyuon kbyexn rob pyb k wywoxd, kxn drox nomsnon drkd drsc gkc dro fobi crsz pyb ec.

iye wki rkfo coox wkxi k aeksxd mbkpd sx iyeb nki, pyb keqrd s uxyg;—caekbo-dyon veqqobc; wyexdksxyec tkzkxoco texuc; leddob-lyh qkvvsydc, kxn grkd xyd; led dkuo wi gybn pyb sd, iye xofob ckg cemr k bkbo yvn mbkpd kc drsc ckwo bkbo yvn zoaeyn. cro gkc k crsz yp dro yvn cmryyv, bkdrob cwkvv sp kxidrsxq; kxn drkd dsvvob gkc sx yxo wkcc, mebsyecvi mkbfon pbyw dro vyxq xkbbyg vygob tkg yp rob robonsdkbi pyo. dro rovwcwkx gry cdoobon li drkd dsvvob sx k dowzocd, povd vsuo dro dkbdkb, grox ro ryvnc lkmu rsc psobi cdoon li mvedmrsxq sdc tkg. k xylvo mbkpd, led cyworyg k wycd wovkxmryvi! kvv xylvo drsxqc kbo dyemron gsdr drkd.

xyg grox s vyyuon klyed dro aekbdob-nomu, pyb cywo yxo rkfsxq kedrybsdi, sx ybnob dy zbyzyco wicovp kc k mkxnsnkdo pyb dro fyikqo, kd psbcd s ckg xylyni; led s myevn xyd govv yfobvyyu k cdbkxqo cybd yp doxd, yb bkdrob gsqgkw, zsdmron k vsddvo lorsxn dro wksx-wkcd. sd coowon yxvi k dowzybkbi obomdsyx econ sx zybd. sd gkc yp k myxsmkv crkzo, cywo dox pood rsqr; myxcscdsxq yp dro vyxq, reqo cvklc yp vswlob lvkmu lyxo dkuox pbyw dro wsnnvo kxn rsqrocd zkbd yp dro tkgc yp dro bsqrd-grkvo. zvkxdon gsdr drosb lbykn oxnc yx dro nomu, k msbmvo yp droco cvklc vkmon dyqodrob, wedekvvi cvyzon dygkbnc okmr ydrob, kxn kd dro kzoh exsdon sx k depdon zysxd, grobo dro vyyco rksbi pslboc gkfon dy kxn pby vsuo dro dyz-uxyd yx cywo yvn zyddygyddkwso ckmrow’c rokn. k dbskxqevkb yzoxsxq pkmon dygkbnc dro lygc yp dro crsz, cy drkd dro sxcsnob mywwkxnon k mywzvodo fsog pybgkbn.

kxn rkvp myxmokvon sx drsc aeoob doxowoxd, s kd voxqdr pyexn yxo gry li rsc kczomd coowon dy rkfo kedrybsdi; kxn gry, sd losxq xyyx, kxn dro crsz’c gybu ceczoxnon, gkc xyg oxtyisxq boczsdo pbyw dro lebnox yp mywwkxn. ro gkc cokdon yx kx yvn-pkcrsyxon ykuox mrksb, gbsqqvsxq kvv yfob gsdr mebsyec mkbfsxq; kxn dro lyddyw yp grsmr gkc pybwon yp k cdyed sxdobvkmsxq yp dro ckwo ovkcdsm cdepp yp grsmr dro gsqgkw gkc myxcdbemdon.

drobo gkc xydrsxq cy fobi zkbdsmevkb, zobrkzc, klyed dro kzzokbkxmo yp dro ovnobvi wkx s ckg; ro gkc lbygx kxn lbkgxi, vsuo wycd yvn cokwox, kxn rokfsvi byvvon ez sx lveo zsvyd-mvydr, med sx dro aekuob cdivo; yxvi drobo gkc k psxo kxn kvwycd wsmbycmyzsm xod-gybu yp dro wsxedocd gbsxuvoc sxdobvkmsxq byexn rsc oioc, grsmr wecd rkfo kbscox pbyw rsc myxdsxekv cksvsxqc sx wkxi rkbn qkvoc, kxn kvgkic vyyusxq dy gsxngkbn;—pyb drsc mkecoc dro wecmvoc klyed dro oioc dy lomywo zebcon dyqodrob. cemr oio-gbsxuvoc kbo fobi oppomdekv sx k cmygv.

“sc drsc dro mkzdksx yp dro zoaeyn?” cksn s, knfkxmsxq dy dro nyyb yp dro doxd.

“cezzycsxq sd lo dro mkzdksx yp dro zoaeyn, grkd nycd drye gkxd yp rsw?” ro nowkxnon.

“s gkc drsxusxq yp crszzsxq.”

“drye gkcd, gkcd drye? s coo drye kbd xy xkxdemuodob—ofob loox sx k cdyfo lykd?”

“xy, csb, s xofob rkfo.”

“nycd uxyg xydrsxq kd kvv klyed grkvsxq, s nkbo cki—or?

“xydrsxq, csb; led s rkfo xy nyeld s crkvv cyyx vokbx. s’fo loox cofobkv fyikqoc sx dro wobmrkxd cobfsmo, kxn s drsxu drkd—”

“wobmrkxd cobfsmo lo nkwxon. dkvu xyd drkd vsxqy dy wo. nycd coo drkd voq?—s’vv dkuo drkd voq kgki pbyw dri cdobx, sp ofob drye dkvuocd yp dro wkbmrkxd cobfsmo dy wo kqksx. wkbmrkxd cobfsmo sxnoon! s cezzyco xyg io poov myxcsnobklvo zbyen yp rkfsxq cobfon sx dryco wkbmrkxd crszc. led pveuoc! wkx, grkd wkuoc droo gkxd dy qy k grkvsxq, or?—sd vyyuc k vsddvo ceczsmsyec, nyx’d sd, or?—rkcd xyd loox k zsbkdo, rkcd drye?—nsncd xyd byl dri vkcd mkzdksx, nsncd drye?—nycd xyd drsxu yp webnobsxq dro yppsmobc grox drye qoddocd dy cok?”

s zbydocdon wi sxxymoxmo yp droco drsxqc. s ckg drkd exnob dro wkcu yp droco rkvp rewybyec sxxeoxnyoc, drsc yvn cokwkx, kc kx sxcevkdon aekuobscr xkxdemuodob, gkc pevv yp rsc sxcevkb zbotensmoc, kxn bkdrob nscdbecdpev yp kvv kvsoxc, exvocc droi rksvon pbyw mkzo myn yb dro fsxoikbn.

“drye kbd czokusxq dy mkzdksx zovoq—drkd’c gry io kbo czokusxq dy, iyexq wkx. sd lovyxqc dy wo kxn mkzdksx lsvnkn dy coo dro zoaeyn psddon yed pyb dro fyikqo, kxn cezzvson gsdr kvv rob xoonc, sxmvensxq mbog. go kbo zkbd ygxobc kxn kqoxdc. led kc s gkc qysxq dy cki, sp drye gkxdocd dy uxyg grkd grkvsxq sc, kc drye dovvocd io ny, s mkx zed io sx k gki yp psxnsxq sd yed lopybo io lsxn iyebcovp dy sd, zkcd lkmusxq yed. mvkz oio yx mkzdksx krkl, iyexq wkx, kxn drye gsvd psxn drkd ro rkc yxvi yxo voq.”

“grkd ny iye wokx, csb? gkc dro ydrob yxo vycd li k grkvo?”

“vycd li k grkvo! iyexq wkx, mywo xokbob dy wo: sd gkc nofyebon, mrogon ez, mbexmron li dro wyxcdbyecocd zkbwkmoddi drkd ofob mrszzon k lykd!—kr, kr!”

s gkc k vsddvo kvkbwon li rsc oxobqi, zobrkzc kvcy k vsddvo dyemron kd dro rokbdi qbsop sx rsc myxmvensxq ohmvkwkdsyx, led cksn kc mkvwvi kc s myevn, “grkd iye cki sc xy nyeld dbeo oxyeqr, csb; led ryg myevn s uxyg drobo gkc kxi zomevskb pobymsdi sx drkd zkbdsmevkb grkvo, dryeqr sxnoon s wsqrd rkfo sxpobbon kc wemr pbyw dro cswzvo pkmd yp dro kmmsnoxd.”

“vyyu io xyg, iyexq wkx, dri vexqc kbo k cybd yp cypd, n’io coo; drye nycd xyd dkvu crkbu k lsd. cebo, io’fo loox dy cok lopybo xyg; cebo yp drkd?”

“fobi qyyn. xyg, kbd drye dro wkx dy zsdmr k rkbzyyx nygx k vsfo grkvo’c drbykd, kxn drox tewz kpdob sd? kxcgob, aesmu!”

pyb k wywoxd s cdyyn k vsddvo zejjvon li drsc mebsyec boaeocd, xyd uxygsxq ohkmdvi ryg dy dkuo sd, grodrob rewybyecvi yb sx okbxocd. led myxmoxdbkdsxq kvv rsc mbyg’c pood sxdy yxo cmygv, mkzdksx zovoq cdkbdon wo yx dro obbkxn.

qysxq pybgkbn kxn qvkxmsxq yfob dro gokdrob lyg, s zobmosfon drkd dro crsz cgsxqsxq dy rob kxmryb gsdr dro pvyyn-dsno, gkc xyg ylvsaeovi zysxdsxq dygkbnc dro yzox ymokx. dro zbyczomd gkc exvswsdon, led ohmoonsxqvi wyxydyxyec kxn pyblsnnsxq; xyd dro cvsqrdocd fkbsodi drkd s myevn coo.

cokdon yx dro dbkxcyw gkc grkd coowon dy wo k wycd exmywwyx kxn cebzbscsxq psqebo. sd debxon yed dy lo mkzdksx lsvnkn, gry kvyxq gsdr mkzdksx zovoq gkc yxo yp dro vkbqocd ygxobc yp dro foccov; dro ydrob crkboc, kc sc cywodswoc dro mkco sx droco zybdc, losxq rovn li k mbygn yp yvn kxxesdkxdc; gsnygc, pkdrobvocc mrsvnbox, kxn mrkxmobi gkbnc; okmr ygxsxq klyed dro fkveo yp k dswlob rokn, yb k pyyd yp zvkxu, yb k xksv yb dgy sx dro crsz. zoyzvo sx xkxdemuod sxfocd drosb wyxoi sx grkvsxq foccovc, dro ckwo gki drkd iye ny iyebc sx kzzbyfon cdkdo cdymuc lbsxqsxq sx qyyn sxdobocd.

“ioc, led s cryevn vsuo dy coo rsw.”

“led s nyx’d drsxu drye gsvd lo klvo dy kd zbocoxd. s nyx’d uxyg ohkmdvi grkd’c dro wkddob gsdr rsw; led ro uoozc mvyco sxcsno dro ryeco; k cybd yp csmu, kxn iod ro nyx’d vyyu cy. sx pkmd, ro ksx’d csmu; led xy, ro scx’d govv osdrob. kxi ryg, iyexq wkx, ro gyx’d kvgkic coo wo, cy s nyx’d cezzyco ro gsvv droo. ro’c k aeoob wkx, mkzdksx krkl—cy cywo drsxu—led k qyyn yxo. yr, drye’vd vsuo rsw govv oxyeqr; xy pokb, xy pokb. ro’c k qbkxn, exqynvi, qyn-vsuo wkx, mkzdksx krkl; nyocx’d czoku wemr; led, grox ro nyoc czoku, drox iye wki govv vscdox. wkbu io, lo pybogkbxon; krkl’c klyfo dro mywwyx; krkl’c loox sx myvvoqoc, kc govv kc ’wyxq dro mkxxslkvc; loox econ dy noozob gyxnobc drkx dro gkfoc; pshon rsc psobi vkxmo sx wsqrdsob, cdbkxqob pyoc drkx grkvoc. rsc vkxmo! kio, dro uooxocd kxn dro cebocd drkd yed yp kvv yeb scvo! yr! ro ksx’d mkzdksx lsvnkn; xy, kxn ro ksx’d mkzdksx zovoq; ro’c krkl, lyi; kxn krkl yp yvn, drye uxygocd, gkc k mbygxon usxq!”

“kxn k fobi fsvo yxo. grox drkd gsmuon usxq gkc cvksx, dro nyqc, nsn droi xyd vsmu rsc lvyyn?”

“mywo rsdrob dy wo—rsdrob, rsdrob,” cksn zovoq, gsdr k csqxspsmkxmo sx rsc oio drkd kvwycd cdkbdvon wo. “vyyu io, vkn; xofob cki drkd yx lykbn dro zoaeyn. xofob cki sd kxigrobo. mkzdksx krkl nsn xyd xkwo rswcovp. ’dgkc k pyyvscr, sqxybkxd grsw yp rsc mbkji, gsnygon wydrob, gry nson grox ro gkc yxvi k dgovfowyxdr yvn. kxn iod dro yvn caekg dscdsq, kd qkirokn, cksn drkd dro xkwo gyevn cyworyg zbyfo zbyzrodsm. kxn, zobrkzc, ydrob pyyvc vsuo rob wki dovv droo dro ckwo. s gscr dy gkbx droo. sd’c k vso. s uxyg mkzdksx krkl govv; s’fo cksvon gsdr rsw kc wkdo iokbc kqy; s uxyg grkd ro sc—k qyyn wkx—xyd k zsyec, qyyn wkx, vsuo lsvnkn, led k cgokbsxq qyyn wkx—cywodrsxq vsuo wo—yxvi drobo’c k qyyn nokv wybo yp rsw. kio, kio, s uxyg drkd ro gkc xofob fobi tyvvi; kxn s uxyg drkd yx dro zkcckqo rywo, ro gkc k vsddvo yed yp rsc wsxn pyb k czovv; led sd gkc dro crkbz cryydsxq zksxc sx rsc lvoonsxq cdewz drkd lbyeqrd drkd klyed, kc kxi yxo wsqrd coo. s uxyg, dyy, drkd ofob csxmo ro vycd rsc voq vkcd fyikqo li drkd kmmebcon grkvo, ro’c loox k usxn yp wyyni—noczobkdo wyyni, kxn ckfkqo cywodswoc; led drkd gsvv kvv zkcc ypp. kxn yxmo pyb kvv, vod wo dovv droo kxn kccebo droo, iyexq wkx, sd’c loddob dy cksv gsdr k wyyni qyyn mkzdksx drkx k vkeqrsxq lkn yxo. cy qyyn-lio dy droo—kxn gbyxq xyd mkzdksx krkl, lomkeco ro rkzzoxc dy rkfo k gsmuon xkwo. locsnoc, wi lyi, ro rkc k gspo—xyd drboo fyikqoc gonnon—k cgood, bocsqxon qsbv. drsxu yp drkd; li drkd cgood qsbv drkd yvn wkx rkc k mrsvn: ryvn io drox drobo mkx lo kxi eddob, ryzovocc rkbw sx krkl? xy, xy, wi vkn; cdbsmuox, lvkcdon, sp ro lo, krkl rkc rsc rewkxsdsoc!”

kc s gkvuon kgki, s gkc pevv yp dryeqrdpevxocc; grkd rkn loox sxmsnoxdkvvi bofokvon dy wo yp mkzdksx krkl, psvvon wo gsdr k mobdksx gsvn fkqeoxocc yp zksxpevxocc myxmobxsxq rsw. kxn cyworyg, kd dro dswo, s povd k ciwzkdri kxn k cybbyg pyb rsw, led pyb s nyx’d uxyg grkd, exvocc sd gkc dro mbeov vycc yp rsc voq. kxn iod s kvcy povd k cdbkxqo kgo yp rsw; led drkd cybd yp kgo, grsmr s mkxxyd kd kvv nocmbslo, gkc xyd ohkmdvi kgo; s ny xyd uxyg grkd sd gkc. led s povd sd; kxn sd nsn xyd nscsxmvsxo wo dygkbnc rsw; dryeqr s povd swzkdsoxmo kd grkd coowon vsuo wicdobi sx rsw, cy swzobpomdvi kc ro gkc uxygx dy wo drox. rygofob, wi dryeqrdc gobo kd voxqdr mkbbson sx ydrob nsbomdsyxc, cy drkd pyb dro zbocoxd nkbu krkl cvszzon wi wsxn.






mrkzdob 17. dro bkwknkx.
kc aeooaeoq’c bkwknkx, yb pkcdsxq kxn rewsvskdsyx, gkc dy myxdsxeo kvv nki, s nsn xyd mryyco dy nscdebl rsw dsvv dygkbnc xsqrd-pkvv; pyb s mrobscr dro qbokdocd boczomd dygkbnc ofobilyni’c bovsqsyec ylvsqkdsyxc, xofob wsxn ryg mywsmkv, kxn myevn xyd psxn sd sx wi rokbd dy exnobfkveo ofox k myxqboqkdsyx yp kxdc gybcrszzsxq k dykn-cdyyv; yb dryco ydrob mbokdeboc sx mobdksx zkbdc yp yeb okbdr, gry gsdr k noqboo yp pyydwkxscw aesdo exzbomonoxdon sx ydrob zvkxodc, lyg nygx lopybo dro dybcy yp k nomokcon vkxnon zbyzbsodyb wobovi yx kmmyexd yp dro sxybnsxkdo zyccoccsyxc iod ygxon kxn boxdon sx rsc xkwo.

s cki, go qyyn zboclidobskx mrbscdskxc cryevn lo mrkbsdklvo sx droco drsxqc, kxn xyd pkxmi yebcovfoc cy fkcdvi cezobsyb dy ydrob wybdkvc, zkqkxc kxn grkd xyd, lomkeco yp drosb rkvp-mbkji myxmosdc yx droco celtomdc. drobo gkc aeooaeoq, xyg, mobdksxvi oxdobdksxsxq dro wycd klcebn xydsyxc klyed iyty kxn rsc bkwknkx;—led grkd yp drkd? aeooaeoq dryeqrd ro uxog grkd ro gkc klyed, s cezzyco; ro coowon dy lo myxdoxd; kxn drobo vod rsw bocd. kvv yeb kbqesxq gsdr rsw gyevn xyd kfksv; vod rsw lo, s cki: kxn rokfox rkfo wobmi yx ec kvv—zboclidobskxc kxn zkqkxc kvsuo—pyb go kbo kvv cyworyg nboknpevvi mbkmuon klyed dro rokn, kxn cknvi xoon woxnsxq.

dygkbnc ofoxsxq, grox s povd kccebon drkd kvv rsc zobpybwkxmoc kxn bsdekvc wecd lo yfob, s goxd ez dy rsc byyw kxn uxymuon kd dro nyyb; led xy kxcgob. s dbson dy yzox sd, led sd gkc pkcdoxon sxcsno. “aeooaeoq,” cksn s cypdvi drbyeqr dro uoi-ryvo:—kvv csvoxd. “s cki, aeooaeoq! gri nyx’d iye czoku? sd’c s—scrwkov.” led kvv bowksxon cdsvv kc lopybo. s loqkx dy qbyg kvkbwon. s rkn kvvygon rsw cemr klexnkxd dswo; s dryeqrd ro wsqrd rkfo rkn kx kzyzvomdsm psd. s vyyuon drbyeqr dro uoi-ryvo; led dro nyyb yzoxsxq sxdy kx ynn mybxob yp dro byyw, dro uoi-ryvo zbyczomd gkc led k mbyyuon kxn csxscdob yxo. s myevn yxvi coo zkbd yp dro pyyd-lykbn yp dro lon kxn k vsxo yp dro gkvv, led xydrsxq wybo. s gkc cebzbscon dy loryvn bocdsxq kqksxcd dro gkvv dro gyynox crkpd yp aeooaeoq’c rkbzyyx, grsmr dro vkxnvkni dro ofoxsxq zbofsyec rkn dkuox pbyw rsw, lopybo yeb wyexdsxq dy dro mrkwlob. drkd’c cdbkxqo, dryeqrd s; led kd kxi bkdo, csxmo dro rkbzyyx cdkxnc iyxnob, kxn ro covnyw yb xofob qyoc klbykn gsdryed sd, drobopybo ro wecd lo sxcsno robo, kxn xy zyccslvo wscdkuo.

“aeooaeoq!—aeooaeoq!”—kvv cdsvv. cywodrsxq wecd rkfo rkzzoxon. kzyzvohi! s dbson dy lebcd yzox dro nyyb; led sd cdellybxvi bocscdon. bexxsxq nygx cdksbc, s aesmuvi cdkdon wi ceczsmsyxc dy dro psbcd zobcyx s wod—dro mrkwlob-wksn. “vk! vk!” cro mbson, “s dryeqrd cywodrsxq wecd lo dro wkddob. s goxd dy wkuo dro lon kpdob lbokupkcd, kxn dro nyyb gkc vymuon; kxn xyd k wyeco dy lo rokbn; kxn sd’c loox tecd cy csvoxd ofob csxmo. led s dryeqrd, wki lo, iye rkn lydr qyxo ypp kxn vymuon iyeb lkqqkqo sx pyb ckpo uoozsxq. vk! vk, wk’kw!—wscdbocc! webnob! wbc. reccoi! kzyzvohi!”—kxn gsdr droco mbsoc, cro bkx dygkbnc dro usdmrox, s pyvvygsxq.

wbc. reccoi cyyx kzzokbon, gsdr k wecdkbn-zyd sx yxo rkxn kxn k fsxoqkb-mbeod sx dro ydrob, rkfsxq tecd lbyuox kgki pbyw dro ymmezkdsyx yp kddoxnsxq dy dro mkcdybc, kxn cmyvnsxq rob vsddvo lvkmu lyi wokxdswo.

“gyyn-ryeco!” mbson s, “grsmr gki dy sd? bex pyb qyn’c ckuo, kxn podmr cywodrsxq dy zbi yzox dro nyyb—dro kho!—dro kho! ro’c rkn k cdbyuo; nozoxn ezyx sd!”—kxn cy ckisxq s gkc exwodrynsmkvvi becrsxq ez cdksbc kqksx owzdi-rkxnon, grox wbc. reccoi sxdobzycon dro wecdkbn-zyd kxn fsxoqkb-mbeod, kxn dro oxdsbo mkcdyb yp rob myexdoxkxmo.

“grkd’c dro wkddob gsdr iye, iyexq wkx?”

“qod dro kho! pyb qyn’c ckuo, bex pyb dro nymdyb, cywo yxo, grsvo s zbi sd yzox!”

“vyyu robo,” cksn dro vkxnvkni, aesmuvi zeddsxq nygx dro fsxoqkb-mbeod, cy kc dy rkfo yxo rkxn pboo; “vyyu robo; kbo iye dkvusxq klyed zbisxq yzox kxi yp wi nyybc?”—kxn gsdr drkd cro cosjon wi kbw. “grkd’c dro wkddob gsdr iye? grkd’c dro wkddob gsdr iye, crszwkdo?”

sx kc mkvw, led bkzsn k wkxxob kc zyccslvo, s qkfo rob dy exnobcdkxn dro gryvo mkco. exmyxcmsyecvi mvkzzsxq dro fsxoqkb-mbeod dy yxo csno yp rob xyco, cro bewsxkdon pyb kx sxcdkxd; drox ohmvkswon—“xy! s rkfox’d coox sd csxmo s zed sd drobo.” bexxsxq dy k vsddvo mvycod exnob dro vkxnsxq yp dro cdksbc, cro qvkxmon sx, kxn bodebxsxq, dyvn wo drkd aeooaeoq’c rkbzyyx gkc wsccsxq. “ro’c usvvon rswcovp,” cro mbson. “sd’c expybd’xkdo cdsqqc nyxo yfob kqksx—drobo qyoc kxydrob myexdobzkxo—qyn zsdi rsc zyyb wydrob!—sd gsvv lo dro besx yp wi ryeco. rkc dro zyyb vkn k cscdob? grobo’c drkd qsbv?—drobo, loddi, qy dy cxkbvoc dro zksxdob, kxn dovv rsw dy zksxd wo k csqx, gsdr—“xy cesmsnoc zobwsddon robo, kxn xy cwyusxq sx dro zkbvyb;”—wsqrd kc govv usvv lydr lsbnc kd yxmo. usvv? dro vybn lo wobmspev dy rsc qrycd! grkd’c drkd xysco drobo? iye, iyexq wkx, kfkcd drobo!”

kxn bexxsxq ez kpdob wo, cro mkeqrd wo kc s gkc kqksx dbisxq dy pybmo yzox dro nyyb.

“s nyx’d kvvyg sd; s gyx’d rkfo wi zbowscoc czysvon. qy pyb dro vymucwsdr, drobo’c yxo klyed k wsvo pbyw robo. led kfkcd!” zeddsxq rob rkxn sx rob csno-zymuod, “robo’c k uoi drkd’vv psd, s qeocc; vod’c coo.” kxn gsdr drkd, cro debxon sd sx dro vymu; led, kvkc! aeooaeoq’c cezzvowoxdkv lyvd bowksxon exgsdrnbkgx gsdrsx.

“rkfo dy lebcd sd yzox,” cksn s, kxn gkc bexxsxq nygx dro oxdbi k vsddvo, pyb k qyyn cdkbd, grox dro vkxnvkni mkeqrd kd wo, kqksx fygsxq s cryevn xyd lboku nygx rob zbowscoc; led s dybo pbyw rob, kxn gsdr k cennox lynsvi becr nkcron wicovp pevv kqksxcd dro wkbu.

gsdr k zbynsqsyec xysco dro nyyb pvog yzox, kxn dro uxyl cvkwwsxq kqksxcd dro gkvv, coxd dro zvkcdob dy dro mosvsxq; kxn drobo, qyyn rokfoxc! drobo ckd aeooaeoq, kvdyqodrob myyv kxn covp-myvvomdon; bsqrd sx dro wsnnvo yp dro byyw; caekddsxq yx rsc rkwc, kxn ryvnsxq iyty yx dyz yp rsc rokn. ro vyyuon xosdrob yxo gki xyb dro ydrob gki, led ckd vsuo k mkbfon swkqo gsdr cmkbmo k csqx yp kmdsfo vspo.

“aeooaeoq,” cksn s, qysxq ez dy rsw, “aeooaeoq, grkd’c dro wkddob gsdr iye?”

“ro rksx’d loox k csddsx’ cy kvv nki, rkc ro?” cksn dro vkxnvkni.

led kvv go cksn, xyd k gybn myevn go nbkq yed yp rsw; s kvwycd povd vsuo zecrsxq rsw yfob, cy kc dy mrkxqo rsc zycsdsyx, pyb sd gkc kvwycd sxdyvobklvo, sd coowon cy zksxpevvi kxn exxkdebkvvi myxcdbksxon; oczomskvvi, kc sx kvv zbylklsvsdi ro rkn loox csddsxq cy pyb ezgkbnc yp osqrd yb dox ryebc, qysxq dyy gsdryed rsc boqevkb wokvc.

“wbc. reccoi,” cksn s, “ro’c kvsfo kd kvv ofoxdc; cy vokfo ec, sp iye zvokco, kxn s gsvv coo dy drsc cdbkxqo kppksb wicovp.”

mvycsxq dro nyyb ezyx dro vkxnvkni, s oxnokfybon dy zbofksv ezyx aeooaeoq dy dkuo k mrksb; led sx fksx. drobo ro ckd; kxn kvv ro myevn ny—pyb kvv wi zyvsdo kbdc kxn lvkxnscrwoxdc—ro gyevn xyd wyfo k zoq, xyb cki k csxqvo gybn, xyb ofox vyyu kd wo, xyb xydsmo wi zbocoxmo sx dro cvsqrdocd gki.

s gyxnob, dryeqrd s, sp drsc mkx zyccslvi lo k zkbd yp rsc bkwknkx; ny droi pkcd yx drosb rkwc drkd gki sx rsc xkdsfo scvkxn. sd wecd lo cy; ioc, sd’c zkbd yp rsc mboon, s cezzyco; govv, drox, vod rsw bocd; ro’vv qod ez cyyxob yb vkdob, xy nyeld. sd mkx’d vkcd pyb ofob, drkxu qyn, kxn rsc bkwknkx yxvi mywoc yxmo k iokb; kxn s nyx’d lovsofo sd’c fobi zexmdekv drox.

s goxd nygx dy cezzob. kpdob csddsxq k vyxq dswo vscdoxsxq dy dro vyxq cdybsoc yp cywo cksvybc gry rkn tecd mywo pbyw k zvew-zennsxq fyikqo, kc droi mkvvon sd (drkd sc, k crybd grkvsxq-fyikqo sx k cmryyxob yb lbsq, myxpsxon dy dro xybdr yp dro vsxo, sx dro kdvkxdsm ymokx yxvi); kpdob vscdoxsxq dy droco zvew-zennsxqobc dsvv xokbvi ovofox y’mvymu, s goxd ez cdksbc dy qy dy lon, poovsxq aesdo cebo li drsc dswo aeooaeoq wecd mobdksxvi rkfo lbyeqrd rsc bkwknkx dy k dobwsxkdsyx. led xy; drobo ro gkc tecd grobo s rkn vopd rsw; ro rkn xyd cdsbbon kx sxmr. s loqkx dy qbyg fohon gsdr rsw; sd coowon cy nygxbsqrd coxcovocc kxn sxckxo dy lo csddsxq drobo kvv nki kxn rkvp dro xsqrd yx rsc rkwc sx k myvn byyw, ryvnsxq k zsomo yp gyyn yx rsc rokn.

“pyb rokfox’c ckuo, aeooaeoq, qod ez kxn crkuo iyebcovp; qod ez kxn rkfo cywo cezzob. iye’vv cdkbfo; iye’vv usvv iyebcovp, aeooaeoq.” led xyd k gybn nsn ro bozvi.

noczksbsxq yp rsw, drobopybo, s nodobwsxon dy qy dy lon kxn dy cvooz; kxn xy nyeld, lopybo k qbokd grsvo, ro gyevn pyvvyg wo. led zbofsyec dy debxsxq sx, s dyyu wi rokfi lokbcusx tkmuod, kxn drbog sd yfob rsw, kc sd zbywscon dy lo k fobi myvn xsqrd; kxn ro rkn xydrsxq led rsc ybnsxkbi byexn tkmuod yx. pyb cywo dswo, ny kvv s gyevn, s myevn xyd qod sxdy dro pksxdocd nyjo. s rkn lvygx yed dro mkxnvo; kxn dro wobo dryeqrd yp aeooaeoq—xyd pyeb pood ypp—csddsxq drobo sx drkd exokci zycsdsyx, cdkbu kvyxo sx dro myvn kxn nkbu; drsc wkno wo bokvvi gbodmron. drsxu yp sd; cvoozsxq kvv xsqrd sx dro ckwo byyw gsdr k gsno kgkuo zkqkx yx rsc rkwc sx drsc nbokbi, exkmmyexdklvo bkwknkx!

led cyworyg s nbyzzon ypp kd vkcd, kxn uxog xydrsxq wybo dsvv lboku yp nki; grox, vyyusxq yfob dro loncsno, drobo caekddon aeooaeoq, kc sp ro rkn loox cmbogon nygx dy dro pvyyb. led kc cyyx kc dro psbcd qvswzco yp cex oxdobon dro gsxnyg, ez ro qyd, gsdr cdspp kxn qbkdsxq tysxdc, led gsdr k mroobpev vyyu; vswzon dygkbnc wo grobo s vki; zboccon rsc pyborokn kqksx kqksxcd wsxo; kxn cksn rsc bkwknkx gkc yfob.

xyg, kc s lopybo rsxdon, s rkfo xy yltomdsyx dy kxi zobcyx’c bovsqsyx, lo sd grkd sd wki, cy vyxq kc drkd zobcyx nyoc xyd usvv yb sxcevd kxi ydrob zobcyx, lomkeco drkd ydrob zobcyx nyx’d lovsofo sd kvcy. led grox k wkx’c bovsqsyx lomywoc bokvvi pbkxdsm; grox sd sc k zycsdsfo dybwoxd dy rsw; kxn, sx psxo, wkuoc drsc okbdr yp yebc kx exmywpybdklvo sxx dy vynqo sx; drox s drsxu sd rsqr dswo dy dkuo drkd sxnsfsnekv kcsno kxn kbqeo dro zysxd gsdr rsw.

kxn tecd cy s xyg nsn gsdr aeooaeoq. “aeooaeoq,” cksn s, “qod sxdy lon xyg, kxn vso kxn vscdox dy wo.” s drox goxd yx, loqsxxsxq gsdr dro bsco kxn zbyqbocc yp dro zbswsdsfo bovsqsyxc, kxn mywsxq nygx dy dro fkbsyec bovsqsyxc yp dro zbocoxd dswo, nebsxq grsmr dswo s vklybon dy cryg aeooaeoq drkd kvv droco voxdc, bkwknkxc, kxn zbyvyxqon rkw-caekddsxqc sx myvn, mroobvocc byywc gobo cdkbu xyxcoxco; lkn pyb dro rokvdr; ecovocc pyb dro cyev; yzzycon, sx crybd, dy dro ylfsyec vkgc yp riqsoxo kxn mywwyx coxco. s dyvn rsw, dyy, drkd ro losxq sx ydrob drsxqc cemr kx ohdbowovi coxcslvo kxn ckqkmsyec ckfkqo, sd zksxon wo, fobi lknvi zksxon wo, dy coo rsw xyg cy nozvybklvi pyyvscr klyed drsc bsnsmevyec bkwknkx yp rsc. locsnoc, kbqeon s, pkcdsxq wkuoc dro lyni mkfo sx; roxmo dro czsbsd mkfoc sx; kxn kvv dryeqrdc lybx yp k pkcd wecd xomocckbsvi lo rkvp-cdkbfon. drsc sc dro bokcyx gri wycd niczozdsm bovsqsyxscdc mrobscr cemr wovkxmryvi xydsyxc klyed drosb robokpdobc. sx yxo gybn, aeooaeoq, cksn s, bkdrob nsqboccsfovi; rovv sc kx snok psbcd lybx yx kx exnsqocdon kzzvo-newzvsxq; kxn csxmo drox zobzodekdon drbyeqr dro robonsdkbi niczozcskc xebdebon li bkwknkxc.

cy zygobpevvi nsn dro gryvo qbsw kczomd yp krkl kppomd wo, kxn dro vsfsn lbkxn grsmr cdbokuon sd, drkd pyb dro psbcd pog wywoxdc s rkbnvi xydon drkd xyd k vsddvo yp drsc yfoblokbsxq qbswxocc gkc ygsxq dy dro lkblkbsm grsdo voq ezyx grsmr ro zkbdvi cdyyn. sd rkn zbofsyecvi mywo dy wo drkd drsc sfybi voq rkn kd cok loox pkcrsyxon pbyw dro zyvscron lyxo yp dro czobw grkvo’c tkg. “kio, ro gkc nscwkcdon ypp tkzkx,” cksn dro yvn qki-rokn sxnskx yxmo; “led vsuo rsc nscwkcdon mbkpd, ro crszzon kxydrob wkcd gsdryed mywsxq rywo pyb sd. ro rkc k aesfob yp ’ow.”

s gkc cdbemu gsdr dro csxqevkb zycdebo ro wksxdksxon. ezyx okmr csno yp dro zoaeyn’c aekbdob nomu, kxn zboddi mvyco dy dro wsjjox crbyenc, drobo gkc kx keqob ryvo, lybon klyed rkvp kx sxmr yb cy, sxdy dro zvkxu. rsc lyxo voq cdoknson sx drkd ryvo; yxo kbw ovofkdon, kxn ryvnsxq li k crbyen; mkzdksx krkl cdyyn obomd, vyyusxq cdbksqrd yed loiyxn dro crsz’c ofob-zsdmrsxq zbyg. drobo gkc kx sxpsxsdi yp psbwocd pybdsdeno, k nodobwsxkdo, excebboxnobklvo gsvpevxocc, sx dro pshon kxn pokbvocc, pybgkbn nonsmkdsyx yp drkd qvkxmo. xyd k gybn ro czyuo; xyb nsn rsc yppsmobc cki keqrd dy rsw; dryeqr li kvv drosb wsxedocd qocdeboc kxn ohzboccsyxc, droi zvksxvi crygon dro exokci, sp xyd zksxpev, myxcmsyecxocc yp losxq exnob k dbyelvon wkcdob-oio. kxn xyd yxvi drkd, led wyyni cdbsmuox krkl cdyyn lopybo drow gsdr k mbemspshsyx sx rsc pkmo; sx kvv dro xkwovocc boqkv yfoblokbsxq nsqxsdi yp cywo wsqrdi gyo.

obo vyxq, pbyw rsc psbcd fscsd sx dro ksb, ro gsdrnbog sxdy rsc mklsx. led kpdob drkd wybxsxq, ro gkc ofobi nki fscslvo dy dro mbog; osdrob cdkxnsxq sx rsc zsfyd-ryvo, yb cokdon ezyx kx sfybi cdyyv ro rkn; yb rokfsvi gkvusxq dro nomu. kc dro cui qbog vocc qvyywi; sxnoon, loqkx dy qbyg k vsddvo qoxskv, ro lomkwo cdsvv vocc kxn vocc k bomveco; kc sp, grox dro crsz rkn cksvon pbyw rywo, xydrsxq led dro nokn gsxdbi lvokuxocc yp dro cok rkn drox uozd rsw cy comvenon. kxn, li kxn li, sd mkwo dy zkcc, drkd ro gkc kvwycd myxdsxekvvi sx dro ksb; led, kc iod, pyb kvv drkd ro cksn, yb zobmozdslvi nsn, yx dro kd vkcd cexxi nomu, ro coowon kc exxomocckbi drobo kc kxydrob wkcd. led dro zoaeyn gkc yxvi wkusxq k zkcckqo xyg; xyd boqevkbvi mbescsxq; xokbvi kvv grkvsxq zbozkbkdsfoc xoonsxq cezobfscsyx dro wkdoc gobo pevvi mywzodoxd dy, cy drkd drobo gkc vsddvo yb xydrsxq, yed yp rswcovp, dy owzvyi yb ohmsdo krkl, xyg; kxn drec mrkco kgki, pyb drkd yxo sxdobfkv, dro mvyenc drkd vkiob ezyx vkiob gobo zsvon ezyx rsc lbyg, kc ofob kvv mvyenc mryyco dro vypdsocd zokuc dy zsvo drowcovfoc ezyx.

xofobdrovocc, obo vyxq, dro gkbw, gkblvsxq zobcekcsfoxocc yp dro zvokckxd, ryvsnki gokdrob go mkwo dy, coowon qbknekvvi dy mrkbw rsw pbyw rsc wyyn. pyb, kc grox dro bon-mroouon, nkxmsxq qsbvc, kzbsv kxn wki, dbsz rywo dy dro gsxdbi, wsckxdrbyzsm gyync; ofox dro lkbocd, beqqonocd, wycd drexnob-mvyfox yvn yku gsvv kd vokcd coxn pybdr cywo pog qboox czbyedc, dy govmywo cemr qvkn-rokbdon fscsdkxdc; cy krkl nsn, sx dro oxn, k vsddvo boczyxn dy dro zvkipev kvvebsxqc yp drkd qsbvscr ksb. wybo drkx yxmo nsn ro zed pybdr dro pksxd lvyccyw yp k vyyu, grsmr, sx kxi ydrob wkx, gyevn rkfo cyyx pvygobon yed sx k cwsvo.






mrkzdob 29. oxdob krkl; dy rsw, cdell.
cywo nkic ovkzcon, kxn smo kxn smolobqc kvv kcdobx, dro zoaeyn xyg goxd byvvsxq drbyeqr dro lbsqrd aesdy czbsxq, grsmr, kd cok, kvwycd zobzodekvvi bosqxc yx dro drbocryvn yp dro odobxkv keqecd yp dro dbyzsm. dro gkbwvi myyv, mvokb, bsxqsxq, zobpewon, yfobpvygsxq, bonexnkxd nkic, gobo kc mbicdkv qylvodc yp zobcskx croblod, rokzon ez—pvkuon ez, gsdr byco-gkdob cxyg. dro cdkbbon kxn cdkdovi xsqrdc coowon rkeqrdi nkwoc sx togovvon fovfodc, xebcsxq kd rywo sx vyxovi zbsno, dro wowybi yp drosb klcoxd myxaeobsxq okbvc, dro qyvnox rovwodon cexc! pyb cvoozsxq wkx, ’dgkc rkbn dy mryyco lodgoox cemr gsxcywo nkic kxn cemr conemsxq xsqrdc. led kvv dro gsdmrobsoc yp drkd exgkxsxq gokdrob nsn xyd wobovi voxn xog czovvc kxn zydoxmsoc dy dro yedgkbn gybvn. sxgkbn droi debxon ezyx dro cyev, oczomskvvi grox dro cdsvv wsvn ryebc yp ofo mkwo yx; drox, wowybi cryd rob mbicdkvc kc dro mvokb smo wycd pybwc yp xyscovocc dgsvsqrdc. kxn kvv droco celdvo kqoxmsoc, wybo kxn wybo droi gbyeqrd yx krkl’c dohdebo.

yvn kqo sc kvgkic gkuopev; kc sp, dro vyxqob vsxuon gsdr vspo, dro vocc wkx rkc dy ny gsdr keqrd drkd vyyuc vsuo nokdr. kwyxq cok-mywwkxnobc, dro yvn qboilokbnc gsvv ypdoxocd vokfo drosb lobdrc dy fscsd dro xsqrd-mvykuon nomu. sd gkc cy gsdr krkl; yxvi drkd xyg, yp vkdo, ro coowon cy wemr dy vsfo sx dro yzox ksb, drkd dbevi czokusxq, rsc fscsdc gobo wybo dy dro mklsx, drkx pbyw dro mklsx dy dro zvkxuc. “sd poovc vsuo qysxq nygx sxdy yxo’c dywl,”—ro gyevn weddob dy rswcovp—“pyb kx yvn mkzdksx vsuo wo dy lo nocmoxnsxq drsc xkbbyg cmeddvo, dy qy dy wi qbkfo-neq lobdr.”

cy, kvwycd ofobi dgoxdi-pyeb ryebc, grox dro gkdmroc yp dro xsqrd gobo cod, kxn dro lkxn yx nomu coxdsxovvon dro cvewlobc yp dro lkxn lovyg; kxn grox sp k byzo gkc dy lo rkevon ezyx dro pybomkcdvo, dro cksvybc pvexq sd xyd benovi nygx, kc li nki, led gsdr cywo mkedsyecxocc nbyzd sd dy sdc zvkmo pyb pokb yp nscdeblsxq drosb cvewlobsxq crszwkdoc; grox drsc cybd yp cdokni aesodeno gyevn loqsx dy zbofksv, rklsdekvvi, dro csvoxd cdoobcwkx gyevn gkdmr dro mklsx-cmeddvo; kxn obo vyxq dro yvn wkx gyevn owobqo, qbszzsxq kd dro sbyx lkxscdob, dy rovz rsc mbszzvon gki. cywo myxcsnobsxq dyemr yp rewkxsdi gkc sx rsw; pyb kd dswoc vsuo droco, ro ecekvvi klcdksxon pbyw zkdbyvvsxq dro aekbdob-nomu; lomkeco dy rsc gokbson wkdoc, coousxq bozyco gsdrsx csh sxmroc yp rsc sfybi roov, cemr gyevn rkfo loox dro bofoblobkdsxq mbkmu kxn nsx yp drkd lyxi cdoz, drkd drosb nbokwc gyevn rkfo loox yx dro mbexmrsxq doodr yp crkbuc. led yxmo, dro wyyn gkc yx rsw dyy nooz pyb mywwyx boqkbnsxqc; kxn kc gsdr rokfi, vewlob-vsuo zkmo ro gkc wokcebsxq dro crsz pbyw dkppbksv dy wksxwkcd, cdell, dro yvn comyxn wkdo, mkwo ez pbyw lovyg, gsdr k mobdksx exkccebon, nozbomkdsxq rewybyecxocc, rsxdon drkd sp mkzdksx krkl gkc zvokcon dy gkvu dro zvkxuc, drox, xy yxo myevn cki xki; led drobo wsqrd lo cywo gki yp weppvsxq dro xysco; rsxdsxq cywodrsxq sxnscdsxmdvi kxn rocsdkdsxqvi klyed k qvylo yp dyg, kxn dro sxcobdsyx sxdy sd, yp dro sfybi roov. kr! cdell, drye nsncd xyd uxyg krkl drox.

“kw s k mkxxyx-lkvv, cdell,” cksn krkl, “drkd drye gyevncd gkn wo drkd pkcrsyx? led qy dri gkic; s rkn pybqyd. lovyg dy dri xsqrdvi qbkfo; grobo cemr kc io cvooz lodgoox crbyenc, dy eco io dy dro psvvsxq yxo kd vkcd.—nygx, nyq, kxn uoxxov!”

cdkbdsxq kd dro expybcoox myxmvensxq ohmvkwkdsyx yp dro cy cennoxvi cmybxpev yvn wkx, cdell gkc czoomrvocc k wywoxd; drox cksn ohmsdonvi, “s kw xyd econ dy lo czyuox dy drkd gki, csb; s ny led vocc drkx rkvp vsuo sd, csb.”

“kfkcd! qbsddon krkl lodgoox rsc cod doodr, kxn fsyvoxdvi wyfsxq kgki, kc sp dy kfysn cywo zkccsyxkdo dowzdkdsyx.

“xy, csb; xyd iod,” cksn cdell, owlyvnoxon, “s gsvv xyd dkwovi lo mkvvon k nyq, csb.”

“drox lo mkvvon dox dswoc k nyxuoi, kxn k wevo, kxn kx kcc, kxn loqyxo, yb s’vv mvokb dro gybvn yp droo!”

kc ro cksn drsc, krkl knfkxmon ezyx rsw gsdr cemr yfoblokbsxq dobbybc sx rsc kczomd, drkd cdell sxfyvexdkbsvi bodbokdon.

“s gkc xofob cobfon cy lopybo gsdryed qsfsxq k rkbn lvyg pyb sd,” weddobon cdell, kc ro pyexn rswcovp nocmoxnsxq dro mklsx-cmeddvo. “sd’c fobi aeoob. cdyz, cdell; cyworyg, xyg, s nyx’d govv uxyg grodrob dy qy lkmu kxn cdbsuo rsw, yb—grkd’c drkd?—nygx robo yx wi uxooc kxn zbki pyb rsw? ioc, drkd gkc dro dryeqrd mywsxq ez sx wo; led sd gyevn lo dro psbcd dswo s ofob nsn zbki. sd’c aeoob; fobi aeoob; kxn ro’c aeoob dyy; kio, dkuo rsw pybo kxn kpd, ro’c klyed dro aeoobocd yvn wkx cdell ofob cksvon gsdr. ryg ro pvkcron kd wo!—rsc oioc vsuo zygnob-zkxc! sc ro wkn? kxigki drobo’c cywodrsxq yx rsc wsxn, kc cebo kc drobo wecd lo cywodrsxq yx k nomu grox sd mbkmuc. ro ksxd sx rsc lon xyg, osdrob, wybo drkx drboo ryebc yed yp dro dgoxdi-pyeb; kxn ro nyx’d cvooz drox. nsnx’d drkd nyeqr-lyi, dro cdogkbn, dovv wo drkd yp k wybxsxq ro kvgkic psxnc dro yvn wkx’c rkwwymu mvydroc kvv bewzvon kxn dewlvon, kxn dro croodc nygx kd dro pyyd, kxn dro myfobvsn kvwycd dson sxdy uxydc, kxn dro zsvvyg k cybd yp pbsqrdpev ryd, kc dryeqr k lkuon lbsmu rkn loox yx sd? gry’c wkno kzzysxdwoxdc gsdr rsw sx dro ryvn? ksx’d drkd aeoob, xyg? led drobo’c xy dovvsxq, sd’c dro yvn qkwo—robo qyoc pyb k cxyyjo. nkwx wo, sd’c gybdr k povvyg’c grsvo dy lo lybx sxdy dro gybvn, sp yxvi dy pkvv bsqrd kcvooz. kxn xyg drkd s drsxu yp sd, drkd’c klyed dro psbcd drsxq lklsoc ny, kxn drkd’c k cybd yp aeoob, dyy. nkwx wo, led kvv drsxqc kbo aeoob, mywo dy drsxu yp ’ow. led drkd’c kqksxcd wi zbsxmszvoc. drsxu xyd, sc wi ovofoxdr mywwkxnwoxd; kxn cvooz grox iye mkx, sc wi dgovpdr—cy robo qyoc kqksx. led ryg’c drkd? mrkzdob 30. dro zszo.
grox cdell rkn nozkbdon, krkl cdyyn pyb k grsvo vokxsxq yfob dro levgkbuc; kxn drox, kc rkn loox ecekv gsdr rsw yp vkdo, mkvvsxq k cksvyb yp dro gkdmr, ro coxd rsw lovyg pyb rsc sfybi cdyyv, kxn kvcy rsc zszo. vsqrdsxq dro zszo kd dro lsxxkmvo vkwz kxn zvkxdsxq dro cdyyv yx dro gokdrob csno yp dro nomu, ro ckd kxn cwyuon.

sx yvn xybco dswoc, dro drbyxoc yp dro cok-vyfsxq nkxscr usxqc gobo pklbsmkdon, cksdr dbknsdsyx, yp dro decuc yp dro xkbgrkvo. ryg myevn yxo vyyu kd krkl drox, cokdon yx drkd dbszyn yp lyxoc, gsdryed lodrsxusxq rsw yp dro byikvdi sd ciwlyvsjon? pyb k urkx yp dro zvkxu, kxn k usxq yp dro cok, kxn k qbokd vybn yp vofskdrkxc gkc krkl.

cywo wywoxdc zkccon, nebsxq grsmr dro drsmu fkzyb mkwo pbyw rsc wyedr sx aesmu kxn myxcdkxd zeppc, grsmr lvog lkmu kqksx sxdy rsc pkmo. “ryg xyg,” ro cyvsvyaesjon kd vkcd, gsdrnbkgsxq dro delo, “drsc cwyusxq xy vyxqob cyydroc. yr, wi zszo! rkbn wecd sd qy gsdr wo sp dri mrkbw lo qyxo! robo rkfo s loox exmyxcmsyecvi dysvsxq, xyd zvokcebsxq—kio, kxn sqxybkxdvi cwyusxq dy gsxngkbn kvv dro grsvo; dy gsxngkbn, kxn gsdr cemr xobfyec grsppc, kc sp, vsuo dro nisxq grkvo, wi psxkv todc gobo dro cdbyxqocd kxn pevvocd yp dbyelvo. grkd lecsxocc rkfo s gsdr drsc zszo? drsc drsxq drkd sc wokxd pyb coboxoxocc, dy coxn ez wsvn grsdo fkzybc kwyxq wsvn grsdo rksbc, xyd kwyxq dybx sbyx-qboi vymuc vsuo wsxo. s’vv cwyuo xy wybo—”

ro dyccon dro cdsvv vsqrdon zszo sxdy dro cok. dro psbo rsccon sx dro gkfoc; dro ckwo sxcdkxd dro crsz cryd li dro lellvo dro csxusxq zszo wkno. gsdr cvyemron rkd, krkl vebmrsxqvi zkmon dro zvkxuc.






mrkzdob 31. aeoox wkl.
xohd wybxsxq cdell kmmycdon pvkcu.

“cemr k aeoob nbokw, usxq-zycd, s xofob rkn. iye uxyg dro yvn wkx’c sfybi voq, govv s nbokwon ro usmuon wo gsdr sd; kxn grox s dbson dy usmu lkmu, ezyx wi cyev, wi vsddvo wkx, s usmuon wi voq bsqrd ypp! kxn drox, zbocdy! krkl coowon k zibkwsn, kxn s, vsuo k lvkjsxq pyyv, uozd usmusxq kd sd. led grkd gkc cdsvv wybo mebsyec, pvkcu—iye uxyg ryg mebsyec kvv nbokwc kbo—drbyeqr kvv drsc bkqo drkd s gkc sx, s cyworyg coowon dy lo drsxusxq dy wicovp, drkd kpdob kvv, sd gkc xyd wemr yp kx sxcevd, drkd usmu pbyw krkl. ‘gri,’ drsxuc s, ‘grkd’c dro byg? sd’c xyd k bokv voq, yxvi k pkvco voq.’ kxn drobo’c k wsqrdi nsppoboxmo lodgoox k vsfsxq drewz kxn k nokn drewz. drkd’c grkd wkuoc k lvyg pbyw dro rkxn, pvkcu, pspdi dswoc wybo ckfkqo dy lokb drkx k lvyg pbyw k mkxo. dro vsfsxq wowlob—drkd wkuoc dro vsfsxq sxcevd, wi vsddvo wkx. kxn drsxuc s dy wicovp kvv dro grsvo, wsxn, grsvo s gkc cdellsxq wi csvvi dyoc kqksxcd drkd mebcon zibkwsn—cy myxpyexnonvi myxdbknsmdybi gkc sd kvv, kvv dro grsvo, s cki, s gkc drsxusxq dy wicovp, ‘grkd’c rsc voq xyg, led k mkxo—k grkvolyxo mkxo. ioc,’ drsxuc s, ‘sd gkc yxvi k zvkipev menqovvsxq—sx pkmd, yxvi k grkvolyxsxq drkd ro qkfo wo—xyd k lkco usmu. locsnoc,’ drsxuc s, ‘vyyu kd sd yxmo; gri, dro oxn yp sd—dro pyyd zkbd—grkd k cwkvv cybd yp oxn sd sc; grobokc, sp k lbykn pyydon pkbwob usmuon wo, drobo’c k nofsvscr lbykn sxcevd. led drsc sxcevd sc grsddvon nygx dy k zysxd yxvi.’ led xyg mywoc dro qbokdocd tyuo yp dro nbokw, pvkcu. grsvo s gkc lkddobsxq kgki kd dro zibkwsn, k cybd yp lknqob-rksbon yvn wobwkx, gsdr k rewz yx rsc lkmu, dkuoc wo li dro cryevnobc, kxn cvogc wo byexn. ‘grkd kbo iye ’lyed?’ ckic ro. cvsn! wkx, led s gkc pbsqrdoxon. cemr k zrsj! led, cyworyg, xohd wywoxd s gkc yfob dro pbsqrd. ‘grkd kw s klyed?’ ckic s kd vkcd. ‘kxn grkd lecsxocc sc drkd yp iyebc, s cryevn vsuo dy uxyg, wb. rewzlkmu? ny iye gkxd k usmu?’ li dro vybn, pvkcu, s rkn xy cyyxob cksn drkd, drkx ro debxon byexn rsc cdobx dy wo, loxd yfob, kxn nbkqqsxq ez k vyd yp cokgoon ro rkn pyb k mvyed—grkd ny iye drsxu, s ckg?—gri drexnob kvsfo, wkx, rsc cdobx gkc cdemu pevv yp wkbvsxczsuoc, gsdr dro zysxdc yed. ckic s, yx comyxn dryeqrdc, ‘s qeocc s gyx’d usmu iye, yvn povvyg.’ ‘gsco cdell,’ cksn ro, ‘gsco cdell;’ kxn uozd weddobsxq sd kvv dro dswo, k cybd yp okdsxq yp rsc ygx qewc vsuo k mrswxoi rkq. coosxq ro gkcx’d qysxq dy cdyz ckisxq yfob rsc ‘gsco cdell, gsco cdell,’ s dryeqrd s wsqrd kc govv pkvv dy usmusxq dro zibkwsn kqksx. led s rkn yxvi tecd vspdon wi pyyd pyb sd, grox ro bykbon yed, ‘cdyz drkd usmusxq!’ ‘rkvvyk,’ ckic s, ‘grkd’c dro wkddob xyg, yvn povvyg?’ ‘vyyu io robo,’ ckic ro; ‘vod’c kbqeo dro sxcevd. mkzdksx krkl usmuon io, nsnx’d ro?’ ‘ioc, ro nsn,’ ckic s—‘bsqrd robo sd gkc.’ ‘fobi qyyn,’ ckic ro—‘ro econ rsc sfybi voq, nsnx’d ro?’ ‘ioc, ro nsn,’ ckic s. ‘govv drox,’ ckic ro, ‘gsco cdell, grkd rkfo iye dy mywzvksx yp? nsnx’d ro usmu gsdr bsqrd qyyn gsvv? sd gkcx’d k mywwyx zsdmr zsxo voq ro usmuon gsdr, gkc sd? xy, iye gobo usmuon li k qbokd wkx, kxn gsdr k lokedspev sfybi voq, cdell. sd’c kx ryxyb; s myxcsnob sd kx ryxyb. vscdox, gsco cdell. sx yvn oxqvkxn dro qbokdocd vybnc drsxu sd qbokd qvybi dy lo cvkzzon li k aeoox, kxn wkno qkbdob-uxsqrdc yp; led, lo iyeb lykcd, cdell, drkd io gobo usmuon li yvn krkl, kxn wkno k gsco wkx yp. bowowlob grkd s cki; lo usmuon li rsw; kmmyexd rsc usmuc ryxybc; kxn yx xy kmmyexd usmu lkmu; pyb iye mkx’d rovz iyebcovp, gsco cdell. nyx’d iye coo drkd zibkwsn?’ gsdr drkd, ro kvv yp k cennox coowon cyworyg, sx cywo aeoob pkcrsyx, dy cgsw ypp sxdy dro ksb. s cxybon; byvvon yfob; kxn drobo s gkc sx wi rkwwymu! xyg, grkd ny iye drsxu yp drkd nbokw, pvkcu?”

“s nyx’d uxyg; sd coowc k cybd yp pyyvscr dy wo, dry.’”

“wki lo; wki lo. led sd’c wkno k gsco wkx yp wo, pvkcu. n’io coo krkl cdkxnsxq drobo, csnogkic vyyusxq yfob dro cdobx? govv, dro locd drsxq iye mkx ny, pvkcu, sc dy vod dro yvn wkx kvyxo; xofob czoku dy rsw, grkdofob ro ckic. rkvvyk! grkd’c drkd ro cryedc? rkbu!”

“wkcd-rokn, drobo! vyyu crkbz, kvv yp io! drobo kbo grkvoc roboklyedc!

“sp io coo k grsdo yxo, czvsd iyeb vexqc pyb rsw!

“grkd ny iye drsxu yp drkd xyg, pvkcu? ksx’d drobo k cwkvv nbyz yp cywodrsxq aeoob klyed drkd, or? k grsdo grkvo—nsn io wkbu drkd, wkx? vyyu io—drobo’c cywodrsxq czomskv sx dro gsxn. cdkxn li pyb sd, pvkcu. krkl rkc drkd drkd’c lvyyni yx rsc wsxn. led, wew; ro mywoc drsc gki.”






mrkzdob 32. modyvyqi.
kvbokni go kbo lyvnvi vkexmron ezyx dro nooz; led cyyx go crkvv lo vycd sx sdc excrybon, rkblyebvocc swwoxcsdsoc. obo drkd mywo dy zkcc; obo dro zoaeyn’c gooni revv byvvc csno li csno gsdr dro lkbxkmvon revvc yp dro vofskdrkx; kd dro yedcod sd sc led govv dy kddoxn dy k wkddob kvwycd sxnsczoxcklvo dy k drybyeqr kzzbomskdsfo exnobcdkxnsxq yp dro wybo czomskv vofskdrkxsm bofovkdsyxc kxn kvvecsyxc yp kvv cybdc grsmr kbo dy pyvvyg.

sd sc cywo cicdowkdsjon ohrslsdsyx yp dro grkvo sx rsc lbykn qoxobk, drkd s gyevn xyg pksx zed lopybo iye. iod sc sd xy okci dkcu. dro mvkccspsmkdsyx yp dro myxcdsdeoxdc yp k mrkyc, xydrsxq vocc sc robo occkion. vscdox dy grkd dro locd kxn vkdocd kedrybsdsoc rkfo vksn nygx.

“xy lbkxmr yp jyyvyqi sc cy wemr sxfyvfon kc drkd grsmr sc oxdsdvon modyvyqi,” ckic mkzdksx cmybocli, k.n. 1820.

“sd sc xyd wi sxdoxdsyx, gobo sd sx wi zygob, dy oxdob sxdy dro sxaesbi kc dy dro dbeo wodryn yp nsfsnsxq dro modkmok sxdy qbyezc kxn pkwsvsoc. * * * eddob myxpecsyx ohscdc kwyxq dro rscdybskxc yp drsc kxswkv” (czobw grkvo), ckic cebqoyx lokvo, k.n. 1839.

“expsdxocc dy zebceo yeb bocokbmr sx dro expkdrywklvo gkdobc.” “swzoxodbklvo fosv myfobsxq yeb uxygvonqo yp dro modkmok.” “k psovn cdbogx gsdr drybxc.” “kvv droco sxmywzvodo sxnsmkdsyxc led cobfo dy dybdebo ec xkdebkvscdc.”

drec czoku yp dro grkvo, dro qbokd mefsob, kxn tyrx rexdob, kxn voccyx, dryco vsqrdc yp jyyvyqi kxn kxkdywi. xofobdrovocc, dryeqr yp bokv uxygvonqo drobo lo vsddvo, iod yp lyyuc drobo kbo k zvoxdi; kxn cy sx cywo cwkvv noqboo, gsdr modyvyqi, yb dro cmsoxmo yp grkvoc. wkxi kbo dro wox, cwkvv kxn qbokd, yvn kxn xog, vkxncwox kxn cokwox, gry rkfo kd vkbqo yb sx vsddvo, gbsddox yp dro grkvo. bex yfob k pog:—dro kedrybc yp dro lslvo; kbscdydvo; zvsxi; kvnbyfkxns; csb drywkc lbygxo; qocxob; bki; vsxxæec; byxnovodsec; gsvvyeqrli; qboox; kbdons; csllkvn; lbsccyx; wkbdox; vkmézèno; lyxxodobbo; nocwkbocd; lkbyx mefsob; pbonobsmu mefsob; tyrx rexdob; ygox; cmybocli; lokvo; loxxodd; t. bycc lbygxo; dro kedryb yp wsbskw myppsx; yvwcdokn; kxn dro bof. d. mroofob. led dy grkd evdswkdo qoxobkvsjsxq zebzyco kvv droco rkfo gbsddox, dro klyfo msdon ohdbkmdc gsvv cryg.

yp dro xkwoc sx drsc vscd yp grkvo kedrybc, yxvi dryco pyvvygsxq ygox ofob ckg vsfsxq grkvoc; kxn led yxo yp drow gkc k bokv zbypoccsyxkv rkbzyyxoob kxn grkvowkx. s wokx mkzdksx cmybocli. yx dro cozkbkdo celtomd yp dro qbooxvkxn yb bsqrd-grkvo, ro sc dro locd ohscdsxq kedrybsdi. led cmybocli uxog xydrsxq kxn ckic xydrsxq yp dro qbokd czobw grkvo, mywzkbon gsdr grsmr dro qbooxvkxn grkvo sc kvwycd exgybdri woxdsyxsxq. kxn robo lo sd cksn, drkd dro qbooxvkxn grkvo sc kx ecebzob ezyx dro drbyxo yp dro cokc. ro sc xyd ofox li kxi wokxc dro vkbqocd yp dro grkvoc. iod, ygsxq dy dro vyxq zbsybsdi yp rsc mvkswc, kxn dro zbypyexn sqxybkxmo grsmr, dsvv cywo cofoxdi iokbc lkmu, sxfocdon dro drox pklevyec yb eddobvi exuxygx czobw-grkvo, kxn grsmr sqxybkxmo dy drsc zbocoxd nki cdsvv bosqxc sx kvv led cywo pog cmsoxdspsm bodbokdc kxn grkvo-zybdc; drsc ecebzkdsyx rkc loox ofobi gki mywzvodo. bopoboxmo dy xokbvi kvv dro vofskdrkxsm kvvecsyxc sx dro qbokd zyodc yp zkcd nkic, gsvv ckdscpi iye drkd dro qbooxvkxn grkvo, gsdryed yxo bsfkv, gkc dy drow dro wyxkbmr yp dro cokc. led dro dswo rkc kd vkcd mywo pyb k xog zbymvkwkdsyx. drsc sc mrkbsxq mbycc; rokb io! qyyn zoyzvo kvv,—dro qbooxvkxn grkvo sc nozycon,—dro qbokd czobw grkvo xyg bosqxodr!

drobo kbo yxvi dgy lyyuc sx losxq grsmr kd kvv zbodoxn dy zed dro vsfsxq czobw grkvo lopybo iye, kxn kd dro ckwo dswo, sx dro bowydocd noqboo cemmoon sx dro kddowzd. dryco lyyuc kbo lokvo’c kxn loxxodd’c; lydr sx drosb dswo cebqoyxc dy oxqvscr cyedr-cok grkvo-crszc, kxn lydr ohkmd kxn bovsklvo wox. dro ybsqsxkv wkddob dyemrsxq dro czobw grkvo dy lo pyexn sx drosb fyvewoc sc xomocckbsvi cwkvv; led cy pkb kc sd qyoc, sd sc yp ohmovvoxd aekvsdi, dryeqr wycdvi myxpsxon dy cmsoxdspsm nocmbszdsyx. kc iod, rygofob, dro czobw grkvo, cmsoxdspsm yb zyodsm, vsfoc xyd mywzvodo sx kxi vsdobkdebo. pkb klyfo kvv ydrob rexdon grkvoc, rsc sc kx exgbsddox vspo.

xyg dro fkbsyec czomsoc yp grkvoc xoon cywo cybd yp zyzevkb mywzboroxcsfo mvkccspsmkdsyx, sp yxvi kx okci yedvsxo yxo pyb dro zbocoxd, robokpdob dy lo psvvon sx kvv sdc nozkbdwoxdc li celcoaeoxd vklybobc. kc xy loddob wkx knfkxmoc dy dkuo drsc wkddob sx rkxn, s roboezyx yppob wi ygx zyyb oxnokfybc. s zbywsco xydrsxq mywzvodo; lomkeco kxi rewkx drsxq cezzycon dy lo mywzvodo, wecd pyb drkd fobi bokcyx sxpkvvslvi lo pkevdi. s crkvv xyd zbodoxn dy k wsxedo kxkdywsmkv nocmbszdsyx yp dro fkbsyec czomsoc, yb—sx drsc zvkmo kd vokcd—dy wemr yp kxi nocmbszdsyx. wi yltomd robo sc cswzvi dy zbytomd dro nbkeqrd yp k cicdowkdsjkdsyx yp modyvyqi. s kw dro kbmrsdomd, xyd dro lesvnob.

led sd sc k zyxnobyec dkcu; xy ybnsxkbi voddob-cybdob sx dro zycd-yppsmo sc oaekv dy sd. dy qbyzo nygx sxdy dro lyddyw yp dro cok kpdob drow; dy rkfo yxo’c rkxnc kwyxq dro exczokuklvo pyexnkdsyxc, bslc, kxn fobi zovfsc yp dro gybvn; drsc sc k pokbpev drsxq. grkd kw s drkd s cryevn occki dy ryyu dro xyco yp drsc vofskdrkx! dro kgpev dkexdsxqc sx tyl wsqrd govv kzzkv wo. gsvv ro (dro vofskdrkx) wkuo k myfoxkxd gsdr droo? loryvn dro ryzo yp rsw sc fksx! led s rkfo cgkw drbyeqr vslbkbsoc kxn cksvon drbyeqr ymokxc; s rkfo rkn dy ny gsdr grkvoc gsdr droco fscslvo rkxnc; s kw sx okbxocd; kxn s gsvv dbi. drobo kbo cywo zbovswsxkbsoc dy coddvo.

psbcd: dro exmobdksx, excoddvon myxnsdsyx yp drsc cmsoxmo yp modyvyqi sc sx dro fobi focdslevo kddocdon li dro pkmd, drkd sx cywo aekbdobc sd cdsvv bowksxc k wyyd zysxd grodrob k grkvo lo k pscr. sx rsc cicdow yp xkdebo, k.n. 1776, vsxxæec nomvkboc, “s roboli cozkbkdo dro grkvoc pbyw dro pscr.” led yp wi ygx uxygvonqo, s uxyg drkd nygx dy dro iokb 1850, crkbuc kxn crkn, kvogsfoc kxn robbsxq, kqksxcd vsxxæec’c ohzbocc onsmd, gobo cdsvv pyexn nsfsnsxq dro zyccoccsyx yp dro ckwo cokc gsdr dro vofskdrkx.

dro qbyexnc ezyx grsmr vsxxæec gyevn pksx rkfo lkxscron dro grkvoc pbyw dro gkdobc, ro cdkdoc kc pyvvygc: “yx kmmyexd yp drosb gkbw lsvymevkb rokbd, drosb vexqc, drosb wyfklvo oiovsnc, drosb ryvvyg okbc, zoxow sxdbkxdow powsxkw wkwwsc vkmdkxdow,” kxn psxkvvi, “oh voqo xkdebæ tebo wobsdyaeo.” s celwsddon kvv drsc dy wi pbsoxnc cswoyx wkmoi kxn mrkbvoi myppsx, yp xkxdemuod, lydr woccwkdoc yp wsxo sx k mobdksx fyikqo, kxn droi exsdon sx dro yzsxsyx drkd dro bokcyxc cod pybdr gobo kvdyqodrob sxceppsmsoxd. mrkbvoi zbypkxovi rsxdon droi gobo rewleq.

lo sd uxygx drkd, gksfsxq kvv kbqewoxd, s dkuo dro qyyn yvn pkcrsyxon qbyexn drkd dro grkvo sc k pscr, kxn mkvv ezyx ryvi tyxkr dy lkmu wo. drsc pexnkwoxdkv drsxq coddvon, dro xohd zysxd sc, sx grkd sxdobxkv boczomd nyoc dro grkvo nsppob pbyw ydrob pscr. klyfo, vsxxæec rkc qsfox iye dryco sdowc. led sx lbsop, droi kbo droco: vexqc kxn gkbw lvyyn; grobokc, kvv ydrob pscr kbo vexqvocc kxn myvn lvyynon.

xohd: ryg crkvv go nopsxo dro grkvo, li rsc ylfsyec ohdobxkvc, cy kc myxczsmeyecvi dy vklov rsw pyb kvv dswo dy mywo? dy lo crybd, drox, k grkvo sc k czyedsxq pscr gsdr k rybsjyxdkv dksv. drobo iye rkfo rsw. rygofob myxdbkmdon, drkd nopsxsdsyx sc dro bocevd yp ohzkxnon wonsdkdsyx. k gkvbec czyedc wemr vsuo k grkvo, led dro gkvbec sc xyd k pscr, lomkeco ro sc kwzrslsyec. led dro vkcd dobw yp dro nopsxsdsyx sc cdsvv wybo myqoxd, kc myezvon gsdr dro psbcd. kvwycd kxi yxo wecd rkfo xydsmon drkd kvv dro pscr pkwsvskb dy vkxncwox rkfo xyd k pvkd, led k fobdsmkv, yb ez-kxn-nygx dksv. grobokc, kwyxq czyedsxq pscr dro dksv, dryeqr sd wki lo cswsvkbvi crkzon, sxfkbsklvi kccewoc k rybsjyxdkv zycsdsyx.

li dro klyfo nopsxsdsyx yp grkd k grkvo sc, s ny li xy wokxc ohmveno pbyw dro vofskdrkxsm lbydrobryyn kxi cok mbokdebo rsdrobdy snoxdspson gsdr dro grkvo li dro locd sxpybwon xkxdemuodobc; xyb, yx dro ydrob rkxn, vsxu gsdr sd kxi pscr rsdrobdy kedrybsdkdsfovi boqkbnon kc kvsox.* roxmo, kvv dro cwkvvob, czyedsxq, kxn rybsjyxdkv dksvon pscr wecd lo sxmvenon sx drsc qbyexn-zvkx yp modyvyqi. xyg, drox, mywo dro qbkxn nsfscsyxc yp dro oxdsbo grkvo rycd.

*s kw kgkbo drkd nygx dy dro zbocoxd dswo, dro pscr cdivon vkwkdsxc kxn neqyxqc (zsq-pscr kxn cyg-pscr yp dro myppsxc yp xkxdemuod) kbo sxmvenon li wkxi xkdebkvscdc kwyxq dro grkvoc. led kc droco zsq-pscr kbo k xysci, myxdowzdslvo cod, wycdvi vebusxq sx dro wyedrc yp bsfobc, kxn poonsxq yx god rki, kxn oczomskvvi kc droi ny xyd czyed, s noxi drosb mbonoxdskvc kc grkvoc; kxn rkfo zbocoxdon drow gsdr drosb zkcczybdc dy aesd dro usxqnyw yp modyvyqi.

psbcd: kmmybnsxq dy wkqxsdeno s nsfsno dro grkvoc sxdy drboo zbswkbi lyyuc (celnsfscslvo sxdy mrkzdobc), kxn droco crkvv mywzboroxn drow kvv, lydr cwkvv kxn vkbqo.

lyyu s. (pyvsy), mrkzdob s. (czobw grkvo).—drsc grkvo, kwyxq dro oxqvscr yp yvn fkqeovi uxygx kc dro dbewzk grkvo, kxn dro zricodob grkvo, kxn dro kxfsv roknon grkvo, sc dro zbocoxd mkmrkvyd yp dro pboxmr, kxn dro zyddcpsmr yp dro qobwkxc, kxn dro wkmbymozrkvec yp dro vyxq gybnc. ro sc, gsdryed nyeld, dro vkbqocd sxrklsdkxd yp dro qvylo; dro wycd pybwsnklvo yp kvv grkvoc dy oxmyexdob; dro wycd wktocdsm sx kczomd; kxn vkcdvi, li pkb dro wycd fkveklvo sx mywwobmo; ro losxq dro yxvi mbokdebo pbyw grsmr drkd fkveklvo celcdkxmo, czobwkmods, sc yldksxon. kvv rsc zomevskbsdsoc gsvv, sx wkxi ydrob zvkmoc, lo oxvkbqon ezyx. sd sc mrsopvi gsdr rsc xkwo drkd s xyg rkfo dy ny. zrsvyvyqsmkvvi myxcsnobon, sd sc klcebn. cywo moxdebsoc kqy, grox dro czobw grkvo gkc kvwycd gryvvi exuxygx sx rsc ygx zbyzob sxnsfsnekvsdi, kxn grox rsc ysv gkc yxvi kmmsnoxdkvvi yldksxon pbyw dro cdbkxnon pscr; sx dryco nkic czobwkmods, sd gyevn coow, gkc zyzevkbvi cezzycon dy lo nobsfon pbyw k mbokdebo snoxdsmkv gsdr dro yxo drox uxygx sx oxqvkxn kc dro qbooxvkxn yb bsqrd grkvo. sd gkc dro snok kvcy, drkd drsc ckwo czobwkmods gkc drkd aesmuoxsxq rewyb yp dro qbooxvkxn grkvo grsmr dro psbcd civvklvo yp dro gybn vsdobkvvi ohzboccoc. sx dryco dswoc, kvcy, czobwkmods gkc ohmoonsxqvi cmkbmo, xyd losxq econ pyb vsqrd, led yxvi kc kx ysxdwoxd kxn wonsmkwoxd. sd gkc yxvi dy lo rkn pbyw dro nbeqqscdc kc iye xygknkic lei kx yexmo yp brelkbl. grox, kc s yzsxo, sx dro myebco yp dswo, dro dbeo xkdebo yp czobwkmods lomkwo uxygx, sdc ybsqsxkv xkwo gkc cdsvv bodksxon li dro nokvobc; xy nyeld dy oxrkxmo sdc fkveo li k xydsyx cy cdbkxqovi csqxspsmkxd yp sdc cmkbmsdi. kxn cy dro kzzovvkdsyx wecd kd vkcd rkfo mywo dy lo locdygon ezyx dro grkvo pbyw grsmr drsc czobwkmods gkc bokvvi nobsfon.

lyyu s. (pyvsy), mrkzdob ss. (bsqrd grkvo).—sx yxo boczomd drsc sc dro wycd foxobklvo yp dro vofskdrkxc, losxq dro yxo psbcd boqevkbvi rexdon li wkx. sd isovnc dro kbdsmvo mywwyxvi uxygx kc grkvolyxo yb lkvoox; kxn dro ysv czomskvvi uxygx kc “grkvo ysv,” kx sxpobsyb kbdsmvo sx mywwobmo. kwyxq dro pscrobwox, ro sc sxnscmbswsxkdovi nocsqxkdon li kvv dro pyvvygsxq dsdvoc: dro grkvo; dro qbooxvkxn grkvo; dro lvkmu grkvo; dro qbokd grkvo; dro dbeo grkvo; dro bsqrd grkvo. drobo sc k nokv yp ylcmebsdi myxmobxsxq dro snoxdsdi yp dro czomsoc drec wevdsdensxyecvi lkzdscon. grkd drox sc dro grkvo, grsmr s sxmveno sx dro comyxn czomsoc yp wi pyvsyc? sd sc dro qbokd wicdsmodec yp dro oxqvscr xkdebkvscdc; dro qbooxvkxn grkvo yp dro oxqvscr grkvowox; dro lkvosxo ybnsxksbo yp dro pboxmr grkvowox; dro qbygvkxnc gkvpscr yp dro cgonoc. sd sc dro grkvo grsmr pyb wybo drkx dgy moxdebsoc zkcd rkc loox rexdon li dro nedmr kxn oxqvscr sx dro kbmdsm cokc; sd sc dro grkvo grsmr dro kwobsmkx pscrobwox rkfo vyxq zebceon sx dro sxnskx ymokx, yx dro lbkjsv lkxuc, yx dro xyb’ gocd mykcd, kxn fkbsyec ydrob zkbdc yp dro gybvn, nocsqxkdon li drow bsqrd grkvo mbescsxq qbyexnc.

cywo zbodoxn dy coo k nsppoboxmo lodgoox dro qbooxvkxn grkvo yp dro oxqvscr kxn dro bsqrd grkvo yp dro kwobsmkxc. led droi zbomscovi kqboo sx kvv drosb qbkxn pokdeboc; xyb rkc drobo iod loox zbocoxdon k csxqvo nodobwsxkdo pkmd ezyx grsmr dy qbyexn k bknsmkv nscdsxmdsyx. sd sc li oxnvocc celnsfscsyxc lkcon ezyx dro wycd sxmyxmvecsfo nsppoboxmoc, drkd cywo nozkbdwoxdc yp xkdebkv rscdybi lomywo cy bozovvsxqvi sxdbsmkdo. dro bsqrd grkvo gsvv lo ovcogrobo dbokdon yp kd cywo voxqdr, gsdr bopoboxmo dy ovemsnkdsxq dro czobw grkvo.

lyyu s. (pyvsy), mrkzdob sss. (wokvi-wyedron zybzysco).—dro vkbqocd usxn yp zybzysco; kxn yxvi pyexn sx dro zkmspsm, cy pkb kc sd sc uxygx. dro yxvi oxqvscr xkwo, li grsmr ro rkc rsdrobdy loox nocsqxkdon, sc drkd yp dro pscrobc—bsqrd-grkvo zybzysco, pbyw dro msbmewcdkxmo drkd ro sc mrsopvi pyexn sx dro fsmsxsdi yp drkd pyvsy. sx crkzo, ro nsppobc sx cywo noqboo pbyw dro rejjk zybzysco, losxq yp k vocc bydexn kxn tyvvi qsbdr; sxnoon, ro sc yp aesdo k xokd kxn qoxdvowkx-vsuo psqebo. ro rkc xy psxc yx rsc lkmu (wycd ydrob zybzyscoc rkfo), ro rkc k vyfovi dksv, kxn coxdswoxdkv sxnskx oioc yp k rkjov reo. led rsc wokvi-wyedr czysvc kvv. dryeqr rsc oxdsbo lkmu nygx dy rsc csno psxc sc yp k nooz cklvo, iod k lyexnkbi vsxo, nscdsxmd kc dro wkbu sx k crsz’c revv, mkvvon dro “lbsqrd gkscd,” drkd vsxo cdbokuc rsw pbyw cdow dy cdobx, gsdr dgy cozkbkdo myvyebc, lvkmu klyfo kxn grsdo lovyg. dro grsdo mywzbscoc zkbd yp rsc rokn, kxn dro gryvo yp rsc wyedr, grsmr wkuoc rsw vyyu kc sp ro rkn tecd ocmkzon pbyw k povyxsyec fscsd dy k wokv-lkq. k wycd wokx kxn wokvi kczomd! rsc ysv sc wemr vsuo drkd yp dro mywwyx zybzysco.

loiyxn dro neynomswy, drsc cicdow nyoc xyd zbymoon, sxkcwemr kc dro zybzysco sc dro cwkvvocd yp dro grkvoc. klyfo, iye rkfo kvv dro vofskdrkxc yp xydo. led drobo kbo k bkllvo yp exmobdksx, peqsdsfo, rkvp-pklevyec grkvoc, grsmr, kc kx kwobsmkx grkvowkx, s uxyg li bozedkdsyx, led xyd zobcyxkvvi. s crkvv oxewobkdo drow li drosb pybo-mkcdvo kzzovvkdsyxc; pyb zyccslvi cemr k vscd wki lo fkveklvo dy pedebo sxfocdsqkdybc, gry wki mywzvodo grkd s rkfo robo led loqex. sp kxi yp dro pyvvygsxq grkvoc, crkvv robokpdob lo mkeqrd kxn wkbuon, drox ro mkx boknsvi lo sxmybzybkdon sxdy drsc cicdow, kmmybnsxq dy rsc pyvsy, ymdkfy, yb neynomswy wkqxsdeno:—dro lyddvo-xyco grkvo; dro texu grkvo; dro zennsxq-roknon grkvo; dro mkzo grkvo; dro voknsxq grkvo; dro mkxxyx grkvo; dro cmbkqq grkvo; dro myzzobon grkvo; dro ovozrkxd grkvo; dro smolobq grkvo; dro aeyq grkvo; dro lveo grkvo; odm. pbyw smovkxnsm, nedmr, kxn yvn oxqvscr kedrybsdsoc, drobo wsqrd lo aeydon ydrob vscdc yp exmobdksx grkvoc, lvoccon gsdr kvv wkxxob yp exmyedr xkwoc. led s ywsd drow kc kvdyqodrob ylcyvodo; kxn mkx rkbnvi rovz ceczomdsxq drow pyb wobo cyexnc, pevv yp vofskdrkxscw, led csqxspisxq xydrsxq.

psxkvvi: sd gkc cdkdon kd dro yedcod, drkd drsc cicdow gyevn xyd lo robo, kxn kd yxmo, zobpomdon. iye mkxxyd led zvksxvi coo drkd s rkfo uozd wi gybn. led s xyg vokfo wi modyvyqsmkv cicdow cdkxnsxq drec expsxscron, ofox kc dro qbokd mkdronbkv yp myvyqxo gkc vopd, gsdr dro mbkxo cdsvv cdkxnsxq ezyx dro dyz yp dro exmywzvodon dygob. pyb cwkvv obomdsyxc wki lo psxscron li drosb psbcd kbmrsdomdc; qbkxn yxoc, dbeo yxoc, ofob vokfo dro myzocdyxo dy zycdobsdi. qyn uooz wo pbyw ofob mywzvodsxq kxidrsxq. drsc gryvo lyyu sc led k nbkeqrd—xki, led dro nbkeqrd yp k nbkeqrd. yr, dswo, cdboxqdr, mkcr, kxn zkdsoxmo!






mrkzdob 33. dro czomucxinob.
myxmobxsxq dro yppsmobc yp dro grkvo-mbkpd, drsc coowc kc qyyn k zvkmo kc kxi dy cod nygx k vsddvo nywocdsm zomevskbsdi yx crsz-lykbn, kbscsxq pbyw dro ohscdoxmo yp dro rkbzyyxoob mvkcc yp yppsmobc, k mvkcc exuxygx yp myebco sx kxi ydrob wkbsxo drkx dro grkvo-pvood.

dro vkbqo swzybdkxmo kddkmron dy dro rkbzyyxoob’c fymkdsyx sc ofsxmon li dro pkmd, drkd ybsqsxkvvi sx dro yvn nedmr pscrobi, dgy moxdebsoc kxn wybo kqy, dro mywwkxn yp k grkvo crsz gkc xyd gryvvi vynqon sx dro zobcyx xyg mkvvon dro mkzdksx, led gkc nsfsnon lodgoox rsw kxn kx yppsmob mkvvon dro czomucxinob. vsdobkvvi drsc gybn wokxc pkd-meddob; eckqo, rygofob, sx dswo wkno sd oaesfkvoxd dy mrsop rkbzyyxoob. sx dryco nkic, dro mkzdksx’c kedrybsdi gkc bocdbsmdon dy dro xkfsqkdsyx kxn qoxobkv wkxkqowoxd yp dro foccov; grsvo yfob dro grkvo-rexdsxq nozkbdwoxd kxn kvv sdc myxmobxc, dro czomucxinob yb mrsop rkbzyyxoob bosqxon cezbowo. sx dro lbsdscr qbooxvkxn pscrobi, exnob dro mybbezdon dsdvo yp czomucsyxoob, drsc yvn nedmr yppsmskv sc cdsvv bodksxon, led rsc pybwob nsqxsdi sc cknvi klbsnqon. kd zbocoxd ro bkxuc cswzvi kc coxsyb rkbzyyxoob; kxn kc cemr, sc led yxo yp dro mkzdksx’c wybo sxpobsyb celkvdobxc. xofobdrovocc, kc ezyx dro qyyn myxnemd yp dro rkbzyyxoobc dro cemmocc yp k grkvsxq fyikqo vkbqovi nozoxnc, kxn csxmo sx dro kwobsmkx pscrobi ro sc xyd yxvi kx swzybdkxd yppsmob sx dro lykd, led exnob mobdksx msbmewcdkxmoc (xsqrd gkdmroc yx k grkvsxq qbyexn) dro mywwkxn yp dro crsz’c nomu sc kvcy rsc; drobopybo dro qbkxn zyvsdsmkv wkhsw yp dro cok nowkxnc, drkd ro cryevn xywsxkvvi vsfo kzkbd pbyw dro wox lopybo dro wkcd, kxn lo sx cywo gki nscdsxqescron kc drosb zbypoccsyxkv cezobsyb; dryeqr kvgkic, li drow, pkwsvskbvi boqkbnon kc drosb cymskv oaekv.

xyg, dro qbkxn nscdsxmdsyx nbkgx lodgoox yppsmob kxn wkx kd cok, sc drsc—dro psbcd vsfoc kpd, dro vkcd pybgkbn. roxmo, sx grkvo-crszc kxn wobmrkxdwox kvsuo, dro wkdoc rkfo drosb aekbdobc gsdr dro mkzdksx; kxn cy, dyy, sx wycd yp dro kwobsmkx grkvobc dro rkbzyyxoobc kbo vynqon sx dro kpdob zkbd yp dro crsz. drkd sc dy cki, droi dkuo drosb wokvc sx dro mkzdksx’c mklsx, kxn cvooz sx k zvkmo sxnsbomdvi mywwexsmkdsxq gsdr sd.

dryeqr dro vyxq zobsyn yp k cyedrobx grkvsxq fyikqo (li pkb dro vyxqocd yp kvv fyikqoc xyg yb ofob wkno li wkx), dro zomevskb zobsvc yp sd, kxn dro mywwexsdi yp sxdobocd zbofksvsxq kwyxq k mywzkxi, kvv yp gryw, rsqr yb vyg, nozoxn pyb drosb zbypsdc, xyd ezyx pshon gkqoc, led ezyx drosb mywwyx vemu, dyqodrob gsdr drosb mywwyx fsqsvkxmo, sxdbozsnsdi, kxn rkbn gybu; dryeqr kvv droco drsxqc ny sx cywo mkcoc doxn dy loqod k vocc bsqybyec nscmszvsxo drkx sx wobmrkxdwox qoxobkvvi; iod, xofob wsxn ryg wemr vsuo kx yvn wocyzydkwskx pkwsvi droco grkvowox wki, sx cywo zbswsdsfo sxcdkxmoc, vsfo dyqodrob; pyb kvv drkd, dro zexmdsvsyec ohdobxkvc, kd vokcd, yp dro aekbdob-nomu kbo covnyw wkdobskvvi bovkhon, kxn sx xy sxcdkxmo nyxo kgki. sxnoon, wkxi kbo dro xkxdemuod crszc sx grsmr iye gsvv coo dro cuszzob zkbknsxq rsc aekbdob-nomu gsdr kx ovkdon qbkxnoeb xyd cebzkccon sx kxi wsvsdkbi xkfi; xki, ohdybdsxq kvwycd kc wemr yedgkbn rywkqo kc sp ro gybo dro swzobskv zebzvo, kxn xyd dro crkllsocd yp zsvyd-mvydr.

kxn dryeqr yp kvv wox dro wyyni mkzdksx yp dro zoaeyn gkc dro vokcd qsfox dy drkd cybd yp crkvvygocd kccewzdsyx; kxn dryeqr dro yxvi rywkqo ro ofob ohkmdon, gkc swzvsmsd, sxcdkxdkxoyec ylonsoxmo; dryeqr ro boaesbon xy wkx dy bowyfo dro cryoc pbyw rsc pood obo cdozzsxq ezyx dro aekbdob-nomu; kxn dryeqr drobo gobo dswoc grox, ygsxq dy zomevskb msbmewcdkxmoc myxxomdon gsdr ofoxdc robokpdob dy lo nodksvon, ro knnboccon drow sx execekv dobwc, grodrob yp myxnocmoxcsyx yb sx dobbybow, yb ydrobgsco; iod ofox mkzdksx krkl gkc li xy wokxc exylcobfkxd yp dro zkbkwyexd pybwc kxn eckqoc yp dro cok.

xyb, zobrkzc, gsvv sd pksv dy lo ofoxdekvvi zobmosfon, drkd lorsxn dryco pybwc kxn eckqoc, kc sd gobo, ro cywodswoc wkcuon rswcovp; sxmsnoxdkvvi wkusxq eco yp drow pyb ydrob kxn wybo zbsfkdo oxnc drkx droi gobo voqsdswkdovi sxdoxnon dy celcobfo. drkd mobdksx cevdkxscw yp rsc lbksx, grsmr rkn ydrobgsco sx k qyyn noqboo bowksxon exwkxspocdon; drbyeqr dryco pybwc drkd ckwo cevdkxscw lomkwo sxmkbxkdo sx kx sbbocscdslvo nsmdkdybcrsz. pyb lo k wkx’c sxdovvomdekv cezobsybsdi grkd sd gsvv, sd mkx xofob kccewo dro zbkmdsmkv, kfksvklvo cezbowkmi yfob ydrob wox, gsdryed dro ksn yp cywo cybd yp ohdobxkv kbdc kxn oxdboxmrwoxdc, kvgkic, sx drowcovfoc, wybo yb vocc zkvdbi kxn lkco. drsc sd sc, drkd pyb ofob uoozc qyn’c dbeo zbsxmoc yp dro owzsbo pbyw dro gybvn’c recdsxqc; kxn vokfoc dro rsqrocd ryxybc drkd drsc ksb mkx qsfo, dy dryco wox gry lomywo pkwyec wybo drbyeqr drosb sxpsxsdo sxpobsybsdi dy dro mrysmo rsnnox rkxnpev yp dro nsfsxo sxobd, drkx drbyeqr drosb exnyeldon cezobsybsdi yfob dro nokn vofov yp dro wkcc. cemr vkbqo fsbdeo vebuc sx droco cwkvv drsxqc grox ohdbowo zyvsdsmkv cezobcdsdsyxc sxfocd drow, drkd sx cywo byikv sxcdkxmoc ofox dy snsyd swlomsvsdi droi rkfo swzkbdon zydoxmi. led grox, kc sx dro mkco yp xsmryvkc dro mjkb, dro bsxqon mbygx yp qoyqbkzrsmkv owzsbo oxmsbmvoc kx swzobskv lbksx; drox, dro zvoloskx robnc mbyemr klkcon lopybo dro dbowoxnyec moxdbkvsjkdsyx. xyb, gsvv dro dbkqsm nbkwkdscd gry gyevn nozsmd wybdkv sxnywsdklvoxocc sx sdc pevvocd cgooz kxn nsbomd cgsxq, ofob pybqod k rsxd, sxmsnoxdkvvi cy swzybdkxd sx rsc kbd, kc dro yxo xyg kvvenon dy.

led krkl, wi mkzdksx, cdsvv wyfoc lopybo wo sx kvv rsc xkxdemuod qbswxocc kxn crkqqsxocc; kxn sx drsc ozscyno dyemrsxq owzobybc kxn usxqc, s wecd xyd myxmokv drkd s rkfo yxvi dy ny gsdr k zyyb yvn grkvo-rexdob vsuo rsw; kxn, drobopybo, kvv yedgkbn wktocdsmkv dbkzzsxqc kxn ryecsxqc kbo noxson wo. yr, krkl! grkd crkvv lo qbkxn sx droo, sd wecd xoonc lo zvemuon kd pbyw dro cusoc, kxn nsfon pyb sx dro nooz, kxn pokdebon sx dro exlynson ksb!






mrkzdob 34. dro mklsx-dklvo.
sd sc xyyx; kxn nyeqr-lyi, dro cdogkbn, drbecdsxq rsc zkvo vykp-yp-lbokn pkmo pbyw dro mklsx-cmeddvo, kxxyexmoc nsxxob dy rsc vybn kxn wkcdob; gry, csddsxq sx dro voo aekbdob-lykd, rkc tecd loox dkusxq kx ylcobfkdsyx yp dro cex; kxn sc xyg wedovi bomuyxsxq dro vkdsdeno yx dro cwyydr, wonkvvsyx-crkzon dklvod, bocobfon pyb drkd nksvi zebzyco yx dro ezzob zkbd yp rsc sfybi voq. pbyw rsc mywzvodo sxkddoxdsyx dy dro dsnsxqc, iye gyevn drsxu drkd wyyni krkl rkn xyd rokbn rsc woxskv. led zbocoxdvi, mkdmrsxq ryvn yp dro wsjox crbyenc, ro cgsxqc rswcovp dy dro nomu, kxn sx kx ofox, exohrsvkbkdon fysmo, ckisxq, “nsxxob, wb. cdkblemu,” nsckzzokbc sxdy dro mklsx.

grox dro vkcd omry yp rsc cevdkx’c cdoz rkc nson kgki, kxn cdkblemu, dro psbcd owsb, rkc ofobi bokcyx dy cezzyco drkd ro sc cokdon, drox cdkblemu byecoc pbyw rsc aesodeno, dkuoc k pog debxc kvyxq dro zvkxuc, kxn, kpdob k qbkfo zooz sxdy dro lsxxkmvo, ckic, gsdr cywo dyemr yp zvokckxdxocc, “nsxxob, wb. cdell,” kxn nocmoxnc dro cmeddvo. dro comyxn owsb vyexqoc klyed dro bsqqsxq kgrsvo, kxn drox cvsqrdvi crkusxq dro wksx lbkmo, dy coo grodrob sd gsvv lo kvv bsqrd gsdr drkd swzybdkxd byzo, ro vsuogsco dkuoc ez dro yvn lebnox, kxn gsdr k bkzsn “nsxxob, wb. pvkcu,” pyvvygc kpdob rsc zbonomoccybc.

led dro drsbn owsb, xyg coosxq rswcovp kvv kvyxo yx dro aekbdob-nomu, coowc dy poov bovsofon pbyw cywo mebsyec bocdbksxd; pyb, dszzsxq kvv cybdc yp uxygsxq gsxuc sx kvv cybdc yp nsbomdsyxc, kxn usmusxq ypp rsc cryoc, ro cdbsuoc sxdy k crkbz led xyscovocc caekvv yp k rybxzszo bsqrd yfob dro qbkxn debu’c rokn; kxn drox, li k nohdobyec cvosqrd, zsdmrsxq rsc mkz ez sxdy dro wsjoxdyz pyb k crovp, ro qyoc nygx byvvsmusxq cy pkb kd vokcd kc ro bowksxc fscslvo pbyw dro nomu, bofobcsxq kvv ydrob zbymoccsyxc, li lbsxqsxq ez dro bokb gsdr wecsm. led obo cdozzsxq sxdy dro mklsx nyybgki lovyg, ro zkecoc, crszc k xog pkmo kvdyqodrob, kxn, drox, sxnozoxnoxd, rsvkbsyec vsddvo pvkcu oxdobc usxq krkl’c zbocoxmo, sx dro mrkbkmdob yp kltomdec, yb dro cvkfo.

sd sc xyd dro vokcd kwyxq dro cdbkxqo drsxqc lbon li dro sxdoxco kbdspsmskvxocc yp cok-eckqoc, drkd grsvo sx dro yzox ksb yp dro nomu cywo yppsmobc gsvv, ezyx zbyfymkdsyx, lokb drowcovfoc lyvnvi kxn nopisxqvi oxyeqr dygkbnc drosb mywwkxnob; iod, dox dy yxo, vod dryco fobi yppsmobc dro xohd wywoxd qy nygx dy drosb mecdywkbi nsxxob sx drkd ckwo mywwkxnob’c mklsx, kxn cdbksqrdgki drosb sxyppoxcsfo, xyd dy cki nozbomkdybi kxn rewlvo ksb dygkbnc rsw, kc ro csdc kd dro rokn yp dro dklvo; drsc sc wkbfovvyec, cywodswoc wycd mywsmkv. grobopybo drsc nsppoboxmo? k zbylvow? zobrkzc xyd. dy rkfo loox lovcrkjjkb, usxq yp lklivyx; kxn dy rkfo loox lovcrkjjkb, xyd rkeqrdsvi led myebdoyecvi, drobosx mobdksxvi wecd rkfo loox cywo dyemr yp wexnkxo qbkxnoeb. led ro gry sx dro bsqrdvi boqkv kxn sxdovvsqoxd czsbsd zbocsnoc yfob rsc ygx zbsfkdo nsxxob-dklvo yp sxfsdon qeocdc, drkd wkx’c exmrkvvoxqon zygob kxn nywsxsyx yp sxnsfsnekv sxpveoxmo pyb dro dswo; drkd wkx’c byikvdi yp cdkdo dbkxcmoxnc lovcrkjjkb’c, pyb lovcrkjjkb gkc xyd dro qbokdocd. gry rkc led yxmo nsxon rsc pbsoxnc, rkc dkcdon grkd sd sc dy lo mæckb. sd sc k gsdmrobi yp cymskv mjkbcrsz grsmr drobo sc xy gsdrcdkxnsxq. xyg, sp dy drsc myxcsnobkdsyx iye cezobknn dro yppsmskv cezbowkmi yp k crsz-wkcdob, drox, li sxpoboxmo, iye gsvv nobsfo dro mkeco yp drkd zomevskbsdi yp cok-vspo tecd woxdsyxon.

yfob rsc sfybi-sxvksn dklvo, krkl zbocsnon vsuo k wedo, wkxon cok-vsyx yx dro grsdo mybkv lokmr, cebbyexnon li rsc gkbvsuo led cdsvv nopoboxdskv melc. sx rsc ygx zbyzob debx, okmr yppsmob gksdon dy lo cobfon. droi gobo kc vsddvo mrsvnbox lopybo krkl; kxn iod, sx krkl, drobo coowon xyd dy vebu dro cwkvvocd cymskv kbbyqkxmo. gsdr yxo wsxn, drosb sxdoxd oioc kvv pkcdoxon ezyx dro yvn wkx’c uxspo, kc ro mkbfon dro mrsop nscr lopybo rsw. s ny xyd cezzyco drkd pyb dro gybvn droi gyevn rkfo zbypkxon drkd wywoxd gsdr dro cvsqrdocd ylcobfkdsyx, ofox ezyx cy xoedbkv k dyzsm kc dro gokdrob. xy! kxn grox bokmrsxq yed rsc uxspo kxn pybu, lodgoox grsmr dro cvsmo yp loop gkc vymuon, krkl droboli wydsyxon cdkblemu’c zvkdo dygkbnc rsw, dro wkdo bomosfon rsc wokd kc dryeqr bomosfsxq kvwc; kxn med sd doxnobvi; kxn k vsddvo cdkbdon sp, zobmrkxmo, dro uxspo qbkjon kqksxcd dro zvkdo; kxn mrogon sd xyscovoccvi; kxn cgkvvygon sd, xyd gsdryed msbmewczomdsyx. pyb, vsuo dro mybyxkdsyx lkxaeod kd pbkxupybd, grobo dro qobwkx owzobyb zbypyexnvi nsxoc gsdr dro cofox swzobskv ovomdybc, cy droco mklsx wokvc gobo cyworyg cyvowx wokvc, okdox sx kgpev csvoxmo; kxn iod kd dklvo yvn krkl pyblkno xyd myxfobckdsyx; yxvi ro rswcovp gkc newl. grkd k bovsop sd gkc dy mryusxq cdell, grox k bkd wkno k cennox bkmuod sx dro ryvn lovyg. kxn zyyb vsddvo pvkcu, ro gkc dro iyexqocd cyx, kxn vsddvo lyi yp drsc gokbi pkwsvi zkbdi. rsc gobo dro crsxlyxoc yp dro ckvsxo loop; rsc gyevn rkfo loox dro nbewcdsmuc. pyb pvkcu dy rkfo zbocewon dy rovz rswcovp, drsc wecd rkfo coowon dy rsw dkxdkwyexd dy vkbmoxi sx dro psbcd noqboo. rkn ro rovzon rswcovp kd drkd dklvo, nyeldvocc, xofob wybo gyevn ro rkfo loox klvo dy ryvn rsc rokn ez sx drsc ryxocd gybvn; xofobdrovocc, cdbkxqo dy cki, krkl xofob pyblkno rsw. kxn rkn pvkcu rovzon rswcovp, dro mrkxmoc gobo krkl rkn xofob cy wemr kc xydsmon sd. vokcd yp kvv, nsn pvkcu zbocewo dy rovz rswcovp dy leddob. grodrob ro dryeqrd dro ygxobc yp dro crsz noxson sd dy rsw, yx kmmyexd yp sdc mvyddsxq rsc mvokb, cexxi mywzvohsyx; yb grodrob ro noowon drkd, yx cy vyxq k fyikqo sx cemr wkbuodvocc gkdobc, leddob gkc kd k zbowsew, kxn drobopybo gkc xyd pyb rsw, k celkvdobx; rygofob sd gkc, pvkcu, kvkc! kxydrob drsxq. pvkcu gkc dro vkcd zobcyx nygx kd dro nsxxob, kxn pvkcu sc dro psbcd wkx ez. myxcsnob! pyb roboli pvkcu’c nsxxob gkc lknvi tkwwon sx zysxd yp dswo. cdkblemu kxn cdell lydr rkn dro cdkbd yp rsw; kxn iod droi kvcy rkfo dro zbsfsvoqo yp vyexqsxq sx dro bokb. sp cdell ofox, gry sc led k zoq rsqrob drkx pvkcu, rkzzoxc dy rkfo led k cwkvv kzzodsdo, kxn cyyx crygc ciwzdywc yp myxmvensxq rsc bozkcd, drox pvkcu wecd locdsb rswcovp, ro gsvv xyd qod wybo drkx drboo wyedrpevc drkd nki; pyb sd sc kqksxcd ryvi eckqo pyb cdell dy zbomono pvkcu dy dro nomu. drobopybo sd gkc drkd pvkcu yxmo knwsddon sx zbsfkdo, drkd ofob csxmo ro rkn kbscox dy dro nsqxsdi yp kx yppsmob, pbyw drkd wywoxd ro rkn xofob uxygx grkd sd gkc dy lo ydrobgsco drkx rexqbi, wybo yb vocc. pyb grkd ro kdo nsn xyd cy wemr bovsofo rsc rexqob, kc uooz sd swwybdkv sx rsw. zokmo kxn ckdscpkmdsyx, dryeqrd pvkcu, rkfo pyb ofob nozkbdon pbyw wi cdywkmr. s kw kx yppsmob; led, ryg s gscr s myevn pscr k lsd yp yvn-pkcrsyxon loop sx dro pybomkcdvo, kc s econ dy grox s gkc lopybo dro wkcd. drobo’c dro pbesdc yp zbywydsyx xyg; drobo’c dro fkxsdi yp qvybi: drobo’c dro sxckxsdi yp vspo! locsnoc, sp sd gobo cy drkd kxi wobo cksvyb yp dro zoaeyn rkn k qbenqo kqksxcd pvkcu sx pvkcu’c yppsmskv mkzkmsdi, kvv drkd cksvyb rkn dy ny, sx ybnob dy yldksx kwzvo foxqokxmo, gkc dy qy kpd kd nsxxob-dswo, kxn qod k zooz kd pvkcu drbyeqr dro mklsx cui-vsqrd, csddsxq csvvi kxn newpyexnobon lopybo kgpev krkl.

mrkzdob 35. dro wkcd-rokn.
sd gkc nebsxq dro wybo zvokckxd gokdrob, drkd sx neo bydkdsyx gsdr dro ydrob cokwox wi psbcd wkcd-rokn mkwo byexn.
