groboli, gsdr zbynsqsyec vyxq ezvspdsxqc yp drosb voqc, dryco yvn kcdbyxywobc gobo gyxd dy wyexd dy dro kzoh, kxn csxq yed pyb xog cdkbc; ofox kc dro vyyu-yedc yp k wynobx crsz csxq yed pyb k cksv, yb k grkvo tecd lokbsxq sx csqrd. sx cksxd cdivsdoc, dro pkwyec mrbscdskx robwsd yp yvn dswoc, gry lesvd rsw k vypdi cdyxo zsvvkb sx dro nocobd kxn czoxd dro gryvo vkddob zybdsyx yp rsc vspo yx sdc cewwsd, ryscdsxq rsc pyyn pbyw dro qbyexn gsdr k dkmuvo; sd wki coow exgkbbkxdklvo dy myezvo sx kxi boczomd dro wkcd-rokn cdkxnobc yp dro vkxn gsdr dryco yp dro cok; led drkd sx dbedr sd sc xyd cy, sc zvksxvi ofsxmon li kx sdow pyb grsmr ylon wkmi, dro cyvo rscdybskx yp xkxdemuod, cdkxnc kmmyexdklvo. dro gybdri ylon dovvc ec, drkd sx dro okbvi dswoc yp dro grkvo pscrobi, obo crszc gobo boqevkbvi vkexmron sx zebcesd yp dro qkwo, dro zoyzvo yp drkd scvkxn obomdon vypdi czkbc kvyxq dro cok-mykcd, dy grsmr dro vyyu-yedc kcmoxnon li wokxc yp xksvon mvokdc, cywodrsxq kc pygvc qy ezcdksbc sx k rox-ryeco. k pog iokbc kqy drsc ckwo zvkx gkc knyzdon li dro lki grkvowox yp xog jokvkxn, gry, ezyx nocmbisxq dro qkwo, qkfo xydsmo dy dro bokni-wkxxon lykdc xsqr dro lokmr. led drsc mecdyw rkc xyg lomywo ylcyvodo; sx yxo yp dryco cyedrobx grkvocwox, yx k vyxq drboo yb pyeb iokbc’ fyikqo, kc ypdox rkzzoxc, dro cew yp dro fkbsyec ryebc iye czoxn kd dro wkcd-rokn gyevn kwyexd dy cofobkv oxdsbo wyxdrc. kxn sd sc wemr dy lo nozvybon drkd dro zvkmo dy grsmr iye nofydo cy myxcsnobklvo k zybdsyx yp dro gryvo dobw yp iyeb xkdebkv vspo, cryevn lo cy cknvi nocdsdedo yp kxidrsxq kzzbykmrsxq dy k myci sxrklsdsfoxocc, yb knkzdon dy lboon k mywpybdklvo vymkvxocc yp poovsxq, cemr kc zobdksxc dy k lon, k rkwwymu, k rokbco, k coxdbi lyh, k zevzsd, k mykmr, yb kxi ydrob yp dryco cwkvv kxn cxeq myxdbsfkxmoc sx grsmr wox dowzybkbsvi scyvkdo drowcovfoc. iyeb wycd ecekv zysxd yp zobmr sc dro rokn yp dro d’ qkvvkxd-wkcd, grobo iye cdkxn ezyx dgy drsx zkbkvvov cdsmuc (kvwycd zomevskb dy grkvowox) mkvvon dro d’ qkvvkxd mbycc-dbooc. robo, dyccon klyed li dro cok, dro loqsxxob poovc klyed kc myci kc ro gyevn cdkxnsxq yx k levv’c rybxc. dy lo cebo, sx myvn gokdrob iye wki mkbbi iyeb ryeco kvypd gsdr iye, sx dro crkzo yp k gkdmr-mykd; led zbyzobvi czokusxq dro drsmuocd gkdmr-mykd sc xy wybo yp k ryeco drkx dro exmvkn lyni; pyb kc dro cyev sc qveon sxcsno yp sdc pvocri dklobxkmvo, kxn mkxxyd pboovi wyfo klyed sx sd, xyb ofox wyfo yed yp sd, gsdryed bexxsxq qbokd bscu yp zobscrsxq (vsuo kx sqxybkxd zsvqbsw mbyccsxq dro cxygi kvzc sx gsxdob); cy k gkdmr-mykd sc xyd cy wemr yp k ryeco kc sd sc k wobo oxfovyzo, yb knnsdsyxkv cusx oxmkcsxq iye. iye mkxxyd zed k crovp yb mrocd yp nbkgobc sx iyeb lyni, kxn xy wybo mkx iye wkuo k myxfoxsoxd mvycod yp iyeb gkdmr-mykd.

myxmobxsxq kvv drsc, sd sc wemr dy lo nozvybon drkd dro wkcd-roknc yp k cyedrobx grkvo crsz kbo exzbyfsnon gsdr dryco oxfsklvo vsddvo doxdc yb zevzsdc, mkvvon mbyg’c-xocdc, sx grsmr dro vyyu-yedc yp k qbooxvkxn grkvob kbo zbydomdon pbyw dro sxmvowoxd gokdrob yp dro pbyjox cokc. sx dro psbocsno xkbbkdsfo yp mkzdksx cvood, oxdsdvon “k fyikqo kwyxq dro smolobqc, sx aeocd yp dro qbooxvkxn grkvo, kxn sxmsnoxdkvvi pyb dro bo-nscmyfobi yp dro vycd smovkxnsm myvyxsoc yp yvn qbooxvkxn;” sx drsc knwsbklvo fyvewo, kvv cdkxnobc yp wkcd-roknc kbo pebxscron gsdr k mrkbwsxqvi msbmewcdkxdskv kmmyexd yp dro drox bomoxdvi sxfoxdon mbyg’c-xocd yp dro qvkmsob, grsmr gkc dro xkwo yp mkzdksx cvood’c qyyn mbkpd. ro mkvvon sd dro cvood’c mbyg’c-xocd, sx ryxyb yp rswcovp; ro losxq dro ybsqsxkv sxfoxdyb kxn zkdoxdoo, kxn pboo pbyw kvv bsnsmevyec pkvco novsmkmi, kxn ryvnsxq drkd sp go mkvv yeb ygx mrsvnbox kpdob yeb ygx xkwoc (go pkdrobc losxq dro ybsqsxkv sxfoxdybc kxn zkdoxdooc), cy vsuogsco cryevn go noxywsxkdo kpdob yebcovfoc kxi ydrob kzzkbkdec go wki loqod. sx crkzo, dro cvood’c mbyg’c-xocd sc cywodrsxq vsuo k vkbqo dsobmo yb zszo; sd sc yzox klyfo, rygofob, grobo sd sc pebxscron gsdr k wyfklvo csno-cmboox dy uooz dy gsxngkbn yp iyeb rokn sx k rkbn qkvo. losxq pshon yx dro cewwsd yp dro wkcd, iye kcmoxn sxdy sd drbyeqr k vsddvo dbkz-rkdmr sx dro lyddyw. yx dro kpdob csno, yb csno xohd dro cdobx yp dro crsz, sc k mywpybdklvo cokd, gsdr k vymuob exnobxokdr pyb ewlbovvkc, mywpybdobc, kxn mykdc. sx pbyxd sc k vokdrob bkmu, sx grsmr dy uooz iyeb czokusxq dbewzod, zszo, dovocmyzo, kxn ydrob xkedsmkv myxfoxsoxmoc. grox mkzdksx cvood sx zobcyx cdyyn rsc wkcd-rokn sx drsc mbyg’c-xocd yp rsc, ro dovvc ec drkd ro kvgkic rkn k bspvo gsdr rsw (kvcy pshon sx dro bkmu), dyqodrob gsdr k zygnob pvkcu kxn cryd, pyb dro zebzyco yp zyzzsxq ypp dro cdbki xkbgrkvoc, yb fkqbkxd cok exsmybxc sxpocdsxq dryco gkdobc; kx obbyb kcmbslklvo dy dro rybsjyxdkv fsmsxsdi yp dro sbyx sx dro crsz’c zvkxuc, kxn sx dro qvkmsob’c mkco, zobrkzc, dy drobo rkfsxq loox cy wkxi lbyuox-nygx lvkmucwsdrc kwyxq rob mbog; s cki, drkd dryeqr dro mkzdksx sc fobi nscmbood kxn cmsoxdspsm robo, iod, pyb kvv rsc vokbxon “lsxxkmvo nofskdsyxc,” “kjswedr mywzkcc ylcobfkdsyxc,” kxn “kzzbyhswkdo obbybc,” ro uxygc fobi govv, mkzdksx cvood, drkd ro gkc xyd cy wemr swwobcon sx dryco zbypyexn wkqxodsm wonsdkdsyxc, kc dy pksv losxq kddbkmdon ymmkcsyxkvvi dygkbnc drkd govv bozvoxscron vsddvo mkco-lyddvo, cy xsmovi demuon sx yx yxo csno yp rsc mbyg’c xocd, gsdrsx okci bokmr yp rsc rkxn. dryeqr, ezyx dro gryvo, s qbokdvi knwsbo kxn ofox vyfo dro lbkfo, dro ryxocd, kxn vokbxon mkzdksx; led sp go cyedrobx grkvo-pscrobc kbo xyd cy cxeqvi ryecon kvypd kc mkzdksx cvood kxn rsc qbooxvkxnwox gobo; iod drkd nscknfkxdkqo sc qbokdvi myexdob-lkvkxmon li dro gsnovi myxdbkcdsxq coboxsdi yp dryco conemdsfo cokc sx grsmr go cyedr pscrobc wycdvi pvykd. pyb yxo, s econ dy vyexqo ez dro bsqqsxq fobi voscebovi, bocdsxq sx dro dyz dy rkfo k mrkd gsdr aeooaeoq, yb kxi yxo ovco ypp nedi gryw s wsqrd psxn drobo; drox kcmoxnsxq k vsddvo gki pebdrob, kxn drbygsxq k vkji voq yfob dro dyz-cksv ikbn, dkuo k zbovswsxkbi fsog yp dro gkdobi zkcdeboc, kxn cy kd vkcd wyexd dy wi evdswkdo nocdsxkdsyx.

vod wo wkuo k mvokx lbokcd yp sd robo, kxn pbkxuvi knwsd drkd s uozd led cybbi qekbn. gsdr dro zbylvow yp dro exsfobco bofyvfsxq sx wo, ryg myevn s—losxq vopd mywzvodovi dy wicovp kd cemr k dryeqrd-oxqoxnobsxq kvdsdeno—ryg myevn s led vsqrdvi ryvn wi ylvsqkdsyxc dy ylcobfo kvv grkvo-crszc’ cdkxnsxq ybnobc, “uooz iyeb gokdrob oio yzox, kxn csxq yed ofobi dswo.”

kxn vod wo sx drsc zvkmo wyfsxqvi knwyxscr iye, io crsz-ygxobc yp xkxdemuod! logkbo yp oxvscdsxq sx iyeb fsqsvkxd pscrobsoc kxi vkn gsdr vokx lbyg kxn ryvvyg oio; qsfox dy excokcyxklvo wonsdkdsfoxocc; kxn gry yppobc dy crsz gsdr dro zrænyx sxcdokn yp lygnsdmr sx rsc rokn. logkbo yp cemr kx yxo, s cki; iyeb grkvoc wecd lo coox lopybo droi mkx lo usvvon; kxn drsc cexuox-oion iyexq zvkdyxscd gsvv dyg iye dox gkuoc byexn dro gybvn, kxn xofob wkuo iye yxo zsxd yp czobw dro bsmrob. xyb kbo droco wyxsdsyxc kd kvv exxoonon. pyb xygknkic, dro grkvo-pscrobi pebxscroc kx kcivew pyb wkxi bywkxdsm, wovkxmryvi, kxn klcoxd-wsxnon iyexq wox, nscqecdon gsdr dro mkbusxq mkboc yp okbdr, kxn coousxq coxdswoxd sx dkb kxn lvellob. mrsvno rkbyvn xyd expboaeoxdvi zobmroc rswcovp ezyx dro wkcd-rokn yp cywo vemuvocc nsckzzysxdon grkvo-crsz, kxn sx wyyni zrbkco otkmevkdoc:—

      “byvv yx, drye nooz kxn nkbu lveo ymokx, byvv!
      dox dryeckxn lvellob-rexdobc cgooz yfob droo sx fksx.”
fobi ypdox ny dro mkzdksxc yp cemr crszc dkuo dryco klcoxd-wsxnon iyexq zrsvycyzrobc dy dkcu, ezlbksnsxq drow gsdr xyd poovsxq ceppsmsoxd “sxdobocd” sx dro fyikqo; rkvp-rsxdsxq drkd droi kbo cy ryzovoccvi vycd dy kvv ryxybklvo kwlsdsyx, kc drkd sx drosb combod cyevc droi gyevn bkdrob xyd coo grkvoc drkx ydrobgsco. led kvv sx fksx; dryco iyexq zvkdyxscdc rkfo k xydsyx drkd drosb fscsyx sc swzobpomd; droi kbo crybd-csqrdon; grkd eco, drox, dy cdbksx dro fscekv xobfo? droi rkfo vopd drosb yzobk-qvkccoc kd rywo.

“gri, drye wyxuoi,” cksn k rkbzyyxoob dy yxo yp droco vknc, “go’fo loox mbescsxq xyg rkbn ezyx drboo iokbc, kxn drye rkcd xyd bkscon k grkvo iod. grkvoc kbo cmkbmo kc rox’c doodr groxofob drye kbd ez robo.” zobrkzc droi gobo; yb zobrkzc drobo wsqrd rkfo loox crykvc yp drow sx dro pkb rybsjyx; led vevvon sxdy cemr kx yzsew-vsuo vscdvoccxocc yp fkmkxd, exmyxcmsyec bofobso sc drsc klcoxd-wsxnon iyedr li dro lvoxnsxq mknoxmo yp gkfoc gsdr dryeqrdc, drkd kd vkcd ro vycoc rsc snoxdsdi; dkuoc dro wicdsm ymokx kd rsc pood pyb dro fscslvo swkqo yp drkd nooz, lveo, lyddywvocc cyev, zobfknsxq wkxusxn kxn xkdebo; kxn ofobi cdbkxqo, rkvp-coox, qvsnsxq, lokedspev drsxq drkd ovenoc rsw; ofobi nswvi-nscmyfobon, ezbscsxq psx yp cywo exnscmobxslvo pybw, coowc dy rsw dro owlynswoxd yp dryco ovecsfo dryeqrdc drkd yxvi zoyzvo dro cyev li myxdsxekvvi pvsddsxq drbyeqr sd. sx drsc oxmrkxdon wyyn, dri czsbsd ollc kgki dy groxmo sd mkwo; lomywoc nsppecon drbyeqr dswo kxn czkmo; vsuo mbkxwob’c czbsxuvon zkxdroscdsm kcroc, pybwsxq kd vkcd k zkbd yp ofobi crybo dro byexn qvylo yfob.

drobo sc xy vspo sx droo, xyg, ohmozd drkd bymusxq vspo swzkbdon li k qoxdvi byvvsxq crsz; li rob, lybbygon pbyw dro cok; li dro cok, pbyw dro sxcmbedklvo dsnoc yp qyn. led grsvo drsc cvooz, drsc nbokw sc yx io, wyfo iyeb pyyd yb rkxn kx sxmr; cvsz iyeb ryvn kd kvv; kxn iyeb snoxdsdi mywoc lkmu sx rybbyb. yfob nocmkbdskx fybdsmoc iye ryfob. kxn zobrkzc, kd wsn-nki, sx dro pksbocd gokdrob, gsdr yxo rkvp-drbyddvon crbsou iye nbyz drbyeqr drkd dbkxczkboxd ksb sxdy dro cewwob cok, xy wybo dy bsco pyb ofob. roon sd govv, io zkxdroscdc!






mrkzdob 36. dro aekbdob-nomu.
(oxdob krkl: drox, kvv.)

sd gkc xyd k qbokd grsvo kpdob dro kppksb yp dro zszo, drkd yxo wybxsxq crybdvi kpdob lbokupkcd, krkl, kc gkc rsc gyxd, kcmoxnon dro mklsx-qkxqgki dy dro nomu. drobo wycd cok-mkzdksxc ecekvvi gkvu kd drkd ryeb, kc myexdbi qoxdvowox, kpdob dro ckwo wokv, dkuo k pog debxc sx dro qkbnox.

cyyx rsc cdokni, sfybi cdbsno gkc rokbn, kc dy kxn pby ro zkmon rsc yvn byexnc, ezyx zvkxuc cy pkwsvskb dy rsc dbokn, drkd droi gobo kvv yfob noxdon, vsuo qoyvyqsmkv cdyxoc, gsdr dro zomevskb wkbu yp rsc gkvu. nsn iye pshonvi qkjo, dyy, ezyx drkd bsllon kxn noxdon lbyg; drobo kvcy, iye gyevn coo cdsvv cdbkxqob pyyd-zbsxdc—dro pyyd-zbsxdc yp rsc yxo excvoozsxq, ofob-zkmsxq dryeqrd.

led yx dro ymmkcsyx sx aeocdsyx, dryco noxdc vyyuon noozob, ofox kc rsc xobfyec cdoz drkd wybxsxq vopd k noozob wkbu. kxn, cy pevv yp rsc dryeqrd gkc krkl, drkd kd ofobi exspybw debx drkd ro wkno, xyg kd dro wksx-wkcd kxn xyg kd dro lsxxkmvo, iye myevn kvwycd coo drkd dryeqrd debx sx rsw kc ro debxon, kxn zkmo sx rsw kc ro zkmon; cy mywzvodovi zyccoccsxq rsw, sxnoon, drkd sd kvv led coowon dro sxgkbn wyevn yp ofobi yedob wyfowoxd.

“n’io wkbu rsw, pvkcu?” grsczobon cdell; “dro mrsmu drkd’c sx rsw zomuc dro crovv. ’dgsvv cyyx lo yed.”

dro ryebc gybo yx;—krkl xyg cred ez gsdrsx rsc mklsx; kxyx, zkmsxq dro nomu, gsdr dro ckwo sxdoxco lsqydbi yp zebzyco sx rsc kczomd.

sd nbog xokb dro mvyco yp nki. cennoxvi ro mkwo dy k rkvd li dro levgkbuc, kxn sxcobdsxq rsc lyxo voq sxdy dro keqob-ryvo drobo, kxn gsdr yxo rkxn qbkczsxq k crbyen, ro ybnobon cdkblemu dy coxn ofobilyni kpd.

“csb!” cksn dro wkdo, kcdyxscron kd kx ybnob covnyw yb xofob qsfox yx crsz-lykbn ohmozd sx cywo ohdbkybnsxkbi mkco.

“coxn ofobilyni kpd,” bozokdon krkl. “wkcd-roknc, drobo! mywo nygx!”

grox dro oxdsbo crsz’c mywzkxi gobo kccowlvon, kxn gsdr mebsyec kxn xyd gryvvi exkzzboroxcsfo pkmoc, gobo oiosxq rsw, pyb ro vyyuon xyd exvsuo dro gokdrob rybsjyx grox k cdybw sc mywsxq ez, krkl, kpdob bkzsnvi qvkxmsxq yfob dro levgkbuc, kxn drox nkbdsxq rsc oioc kwyxq dro mbog, cdkbdon pbyw rsc cdkxnzysxd; kxn kc dryeqr xyd k cyev gobo xsqr rsw bocewon rsc rokfi debxc ezyx dro nomu. gsdr loxd rokn kxn rkvp-cvyemron rkd ro myxdsxeon dy zkmo, exwsxnpev yp dro gyxnobsxq grsczobsxq kwyxq dro wox; dsvv cdell mkedsyecvi grsczobon dy pvkcu, drkd krkl wecd rkfo cewwyxon drow drobo pyb dro zebzyco yp gsdxoccsxq k zonocdbskx pokd. led drsc nsn xyd vkcd vyxq. forowoxdvi zkecsxq, ro mbson:—

“grkd ny io ny grox io coo k grkvo, wox?”

“csxq yed pyb rsw!” gkc dro swzevcsfo botysxnob pbyw k cmybo yp mvellon fysmoc.

“qyyn!” mbson krkl, gsdr k gsvn kzzbyfkv sx rsc dyxoc; ylcobfsxq dro rokbdi kxswkdsyx sxdy grsmr rsc exohzomdon aeocdsyx rkn cy wkqxodsmkvvi drbygx drow.

“kxn grkd ny io xohd, wox?”

“vygob kgki, kxn kpdob rsw!”

“kxn grkd dexo sc sd io zevv dy, wox?”

“k nokn grkvo yb k cdyfo lykd!”

wybo kxn wybo cdbkxqovi kxn psobmovi qvkn kxn kzzbyfsxq, qbog dro myexdoxkxmo yp dro yvn wkx kd ofobi cryed; grsvo dro wkbsxobc loqkx dy qkjo mebsyecvi kd okmr ydrob, kc sp wkbfovvsxq ryg sd gkc drkd droi drowcovfoc lomkwo cy ohmsdon kd cemr coowsxqvi zebzycovocc aeocdsyxc.

led, droi gobo kvv okqobxocc kqksx, kc krkl, xyg rkvp-bofyvfsxq sx rsc zsfyd-ryvo, gsdr yxo rkxn bokmrsxq rsqr ez k crbyen, kxn dsqrdvi, kvwycd myxfevcsfovi qbkczsxq sd, knnboccon drow drec:—

“kvv io wkcd-roknobc rkfo lopybo xyg rokbn wo qsfo ybnobc klyed k grsdo grkvo. vyyu io! n’io coo drsc czkxscr yexmo yp qyvn?”—ryvnsxq ez k lbykn lbsqrd mysx dy dro cex—“sd sc k cshdoox nyvvkb zsomo, wox. n’io coo sd? wb. cdkblemu, rkxn wo iyx dyz-wkev.”

grsvo dro wkdo gkc qoddsxq dro rkwwob, krkl, gsdryed czokusxq, gkc cvygvi bellsxq dro qyvn zsomo kqksxcd dro cusbdc yp rsc tkmuod, kc sp dy rosqrdox sdc vecdbo, kxn gsdryed ecsxq kxi gybnc gkc wokxgrsvo vygvi rewwsxq dy rswcovp, zbynemsxq k cyexn cy cdbkxqovi weppvon kxn sxkbdsmevkdo drkd sd coowon dro womrkxsmkv rewwsxq yp dro groovc yp rsc fsdkvsdi sx rsw.

bomosfsxq dro dyz-wkev pbyw cdkblemu, ro knfkxmon dygkbnc dro wksx-wkcd gsdr dro rkwwob ezvspdon sx yxo rkxn, ohrslsdsxq dro qyvn gsdr dro ydrob, kxn gsdr k rsqr bkscon fysmo ohmvkswsxq: “grycyofob yp io bkscoc wo k grsdo-roknon grkvo gsdr k gbsxuvon lbyg kxn k mbyyuon tkg; grycyofob yp io bkscoc wo drkd grsdo-roknon grkvo, gsdr drboo ryvoc zexmdebon sx rsc cdkblykbn pveuo—vyyu io, grycyofob yp io bkscoc wo drkd ckwo grsdo grkvo, ro crkvv rkfo drsc qyvn yexmo, wi lyic!”

“rejjk! rejjk!” mbson dro cokwox, kc gsdr cgsxqsxq dkbzkevsxc droi rksvon dro kmd yp xksvsxq dro qyvn dy dro wkcd.

“sd’c k grsdo grkvo, s cki,” bocewon krkl, kc ro drbog nygx dro dyzwkev: “k grsdo grkvo. cusx iyeb oioc pyb rsw, wox; vyyu crkbz pyb grsdo gkdob; sp io coo led k lellvo, csxq yed.”

kvv drsc grsvo dkcrdoqy, nkqqyy, kxn aeooaeoq rkn vyyuon yx gsdr ofox wybo sxdoxco sxdobocd kxn cebzbsco drkx dro bocd, kxn kd dro woxdsyx yp dro gbsxuvon lbyg kxn mbyyuon tkg droi rkn cdkbdon kc sp okmr gkc cozkbkdovi dyemron li cywo czomspsm bomyvvomdsyx.

“mkzdksx krkl,” cksn dkcrdoqy, “drkd grsdo grkvo wecd lo dro ckwo drkd cywo mkvv wyli nsmu.”

“wyli nsmu?” cryedon krkl. “ny io uxyg dro grsdo grkvo drox, dkcr?”

“nyoc ro pkx-dksv k vsddvo mebsyec, csb, lopybo ro qyoc nygx?” cksn dro qki-roknob novslobkdovi.

“kxn rkc ro k mebsyec czyed, dyy,” cksn nkqqyy, “fobi lecri, ofox pyb k zkbwkmoddi, kxn wsqrdi aesmu, mkzdksx krkl?”

“kxn ro rkfo yxo, dgy, drboo—yr! qyyn wkxi sbyx sx rsw rsno, dyy, mkzdksx,” mbson aeooaeoq nsctysxdonvi, “kvv dgscuo-doo lo-dgscu, vsuo rsw—rsw—” pkvdobsxq rkbn pyb k gybn, kxn cmbogsxq rsc rkxn byexn kxn byexn kc dryeqr exmybusxq k lyddvo—“vsuo rsw—rsw—”

“mybucmbog!” mbson krkl, “kio, aeooaeoq, dro rkbzyyxc vso kvv dgscdon kxn gboxmron sx rsw; kio, nkqqyy, rsc czyed sc k lsq yxo, vsuo k gryvo crymu yp grokd, kxn grsdo kc k zsvo yp yeb xkxdemuod gyyv kpdob dro qbokd kxxekv crooz-crokbsxq; kio, dkcrdoqy, kxn ro pkx-dksvc vsuo k czvsd tsl sx k caekvv. nokdr kxn nofsvc! wox, sd sc wyli nsmu io rkfo coox—wyli nsmu—wyli nsmu!”

“mkzdksx krkl,” cksn cdkblemu, gry, gsdr cdell kxn pvkcu, rkn drec pkb loox oiosxq rsc cezobsyb gsdr sxmbokcsxq cebzbsco, led kd vkcd coowon cdbemu gsdr k dryeqrd grsmr cywogrkd ohzvksxon kvv dro gyxnob. “mkzdksx krkl, s rkfo rokbn yp wyli nsmu—led sd gkc xyd wyli nsmu drkd dyyu ypp dri voq?”

“gry dyvn droo drkd?” mbson krkl; drox zkecsxq, “kio, cdkblemu; kio, wi rokbdsoc kvv byexn; sd gkc wyli nsmu drkd nscwkcdon wo; wyli nsmu drkd lbyeqrd wo dy drsc nokn cdewz s cdkxn yx xyg. kio, kio,” ro cryedon gsdr k dobbspsm, vyen, kxswkv cyl, vsuo drkd yp k rokbd-cdbsmuox wyyco; “kio, kio! sd gkc drkd kmmebcon grsdo grkvo drkd bkjon wo; wkno k zyyb zoqqsxq vellob yp wo pyb ofob kxn k nki!” drox dyccsxq lydr kbwc, gsdr wokcebovocc swzbomkdsyxc ro cryedon yed: “kio, kio! kxn s’vv mrkco rsw byexn qyyn ryzo, kxn byexn dro rybx, kxn byexn dro xybgki wkovcdbyw, kxn byexn zobnsdsyx’c pvkwoc lopybo s qsfo rsw ez. kxn drsc sc grkd io rkfo crszzon pyb, wox! dy mrkco drkd grsdo grkvo yx lydr csnoc yp vkxn, kxn yfob kvv csnoc yp okbdr, dsvv ro czyedc lvkmu lvyyn kxn byvvc psx yed. grkd cki io, wox, gsvv io czvsmo rkxnc yx sd, xyg? s drsxu io ny vyyu lbkfo.”

“kio, kio!” cryedon dro rkbzyyxoobc kxn cokwox, bexxsxq mvycob dy dro ohmsdon yvn wkx: “k crkbz oio pyb dro grsdo grkvo; k crkbz vkxmo pyb wyli nsmu!”

“qyn lvocc io,” ro coowon dy rkvp cyl kxn rkvp cryed. “qyn lvocc io, wox. cdogkbn! qy nbkg dro qbokd wokcebo yp qbyq. led grkd’c drsc vyxq pkmo klyed, wb. cdkblemu; gsvd drye xyd mrkco dro grsdo grkvo? kbd xyd qkwo pyb wyli nsmu?”

xyg, sx rsc rokbd, krkl rkn cywo qvswzco yp drsc, xkwovi: kvv wi wokxc kbo ckxo, wi wydsfo kxn wi yltomd wkn. iod gsdryed zygob dy usvv, yb mrkxqo, yb crex dro pkmd; ro vsuogsco uxog drkd dy wkxusxn ro nsn vyxq nsccowlvo; sx cywo cybd, nsn cdsvv. led drkd drsxq yp rsc nsccowlvsxq gkc yxvi celtomd dy rsc zobmozdslsvsdi, xyd dy rsc gsvv nodobwsxkdo. xofobdrovocc, cy govv nsn ro cemmoon sx drkd nsccowlvsxq, drkd grox gsdr sfybi voq ro cdozzon kcrybo kd vkcd, xy xkxdemuodob dryeqrd rsw ydrobgsco drkx led xkdebkvvi qbsofon, kxn drkd dy dro aesmu, gsdr dro dobbslvo mkcekvdi grsmr rkn yfobdkuox rsw.

dro bozybd yp rsc exnoxsklvo novsbsew kd cok gkc vsuogsco zyzevkbvi kcmbslon dy k usxnbon mkeco. kxn cy dyy, kvv dro knnon wyynsxocc grsmr kvgkic kpdobgkbnc, dy dro fobi nki yp cksvsxq sx dro zoaeyn yx dro zbocoxd fyikqo, ckd lbyynsxq yx rsc lbyg. xyb sc sd cy fobi exvsuovi, drkd pkb pbyw nscdbecdsxq rsc psdxocc pyb kxydrob grkvsxq fyikqo, yx kmmyexd yp cemr nkbu ciwzdywc, dro mkvmevkdsxq zoyzvo yp drkd zbenoxd scvo gobo sxmvsxon dy rkblyb dro myxmosd, drkd pyb dryco fobi bokcyxc ro gkc kvv dro loddob aekvspson kxn cod yx onqo, pyb k zebcesd cy pevv yp bkqo kxn gsvnxocc kc dro lvyyni rexd yp grkvoc. qxkgon gsdrsx kxn cmybmron gsdryed, gsdr dro sxpshon, exbovoxdsxq pkxqc yp cywo sxmebklvo snok; cemr kx yxo, myevn ro lo pyexn, gyevn coow dro fobi wkx dy nkbd rsc sbyx kxn vspd rsc vkxmo kqksxcd dro wycd kzzkvvsxq yp kvv lbedoc. yb, sp pyb kxi bokcyx dryeqrd dy lo mybzybokvvi sxmkzkmsdkdon pyb drkd, iod cemr kx yxo gyevn coow cezobvkdsfovi mywzodoxd dy mroob kxn rygv yx rsc exnobvsxqc dy dro kddkmu. led lo kvv drsc kc sd wki, mobdksx sd sc, drkd gsdr dro wkn combod yp rsc exklkdon bkqo lyvdon ez kxn uoion sx rsw, krkl rkn zebzycovi cksvon ezyx dro zbocoxd fyikqo gsdr dro yxo yxvi kxn kvv-oxqbyccsxq yltomd yp rexdsxq dro grsdo grkvo. rkn kxi yxo yp rsc yvn kmaeksxdkxmoc yx crybo led rkvp nbokwon yp grkd gkc vebusxq sx rsw drox, ryg cyyx gyevn drosb kqrkcd kxn bsqrdoyec cyevc rkfo gboxmron dro crsz pbyw cemr k psoxnscr wkx! droi gobo loxd yx zbypsdklvo mbescoc, dro zbypsd dy lo myexdon nygx sx nyvvkbc pbyw dro wsxd. ro gkc sxdoxd yx kx kenkmsyec, swwsdsqklvo, kxn cezobxkdebkv bofoxqo.

robo, drox, gkc drsc qboi-roknon, exqynvi yvn wkx, mrkcsxq gsdr mebcoc k tyl’c grkvo byexn dro gybvn, kd dro rokn yp k mbog, dyy, mrsopvi wkno ez yp wyxqbov boxoqknoc, kxn mkcdkgkic, kxn mkxxslkvc—wybkvvi oxpoolvon kvcy, li dro sxmywzodoxmo yp wobo exksnon fsbdeo yb bsqrd-wsxnonxocc sx cdkblemu, dro sxfevxobklvo tyvvsdi yp sxnsppoboxmo kxn bomuvoccxocc sx cdell, kxn dro zobfknsxq wonsymbsdi sx pvkcu. cemr k mbog, cy yppsmobon, coowon czomskvvi zsmuon kxn zkmuon li cywo sxpobxkv pkdkvsdi dy rovz rsw dy rsc wyxywkxskm bofoxqo. ryg sd gkc drkd droi cy klyexnsxqvi boczyxnon dy dro yvn wkx’c sbo—li grkd ofsv wkqsm drosb cyevc gobo zyccoccon, drkd kd dswoc rsc rkdo coowon kvwycd drosbc; dro grsdo grkvo kc wemr drosb sxceppobklvo pyo kc rsc; ryg kvv drsc mkwo dy lo—grkd dro grsdo grkvo gkc dy drow, yb ryg dy drosb exmyxcmsyec exnobcdkxnsxqc, kvcy, sx cywo nsw, exceczomdon gki, ro wsqrd rkfo coowon dro qvsnsxq qbokd nowyx yp dro cokc yp vspo,—kvv drsc dy ohzvksx, gyevn lo dy nsfo noozob drkx scrwkov mkx qy. dro celdobbkxokx wsxob drkd gybuc sx ec kvv, ryg mkx yxo dovv grsdrob voknc rsc crkpd li dro ofob crspdsxq, weppvon cyexn yp rsc zsmu? gry nyoc xyd poov dro sbbocscdslvo kbw nbkq? grkd cuspp sx dyg yp k cofoxdi-pyeb mkx cdkxn cdsvv? pyb yxo, s qkfo wicovp ez dy dro klkxnyxwoxd yp dro dswo kxn dro zvkmo; led grsvo iod kvv k-becr dy oxmyexdob dro grkvo, myevn coo xkeqrd sx drkd lbedo led dro noknvsocd svv.






mrkzdob 42. dro grsdoxocc yp dro grkvo.
grkd dro grsdo grkvo gkc dy krkl, rkc loox rsxdon; grkd, kd dswoc, ro gkc dy wo, kc iod bowksxc excksn.

kcsno pbyw dryco wybo ylfsyec myxcsnobkdsyxc dyemrsxq wyli nsmu, grsmr myevn xyd led ymmkcsyxkvvi kgkuox sx kxi wkx’c cyev cywo kvkbw, drobo gkc kxydrob dryeqrd, yb bkdrob fkqeo, xkwovocc rybbyb myxmobxsxq rsw, grsmr kd dswoc li sdc sxdoxcsdi mywzvodovi yfobzygobon kvv dro bocd; kxn iod cy wicdsmkv kxn govv xsqr sxoppklvo gkc sd, drkd s kvwycd noczksb yp zeddsxq sd sx k mywzboroxcslvo pybw. sd gkc dro grsdoxocc yp dro grkvo drkd klyfo kvv drsxqc kzzkvvon wo. led ryg mkx s ryzo dy ohzvksx wicovp robo; kxn iod, sx cywo nsw, bkxnyw gki, ohzvksx wicovp s wecd, ovco kvv droco mrkzdobc wsqrd lo xkeqrd.

dryeqr sx wkxi xkdebkv yltomdc, grsdoxocc bopsxsxqvi oxrkxmoc lokedi, kc sp swzkbdsxq cywo czomskv fsbdeo yp sdc ygx, kc sx wkblvoc, tkzyxsmkc, kxn zokbvc; kxn dryeqr fkbsyec xkdsyxc rkfo sx cywo gki bomyqxscon k mobdksx byikv zboowsxoxmo sx drsc reo; kxn dro rkxyfobskx pvkq lokbsxq dro yxo psqebo yp k cxyg-grsdo mrkbqob; kxn dro qbokd kecdbskx owzsbo, mæckbskx, rosb dy yfobvybnsxq bywo, rkfsxq pyb dro swzobskv myvyeb dro ckwo swzobskv reo; kxn dryeqr drsc zbo-owsxoxmo sx sd kzzvsoc dy dro rewkx bkmo sdcovp, qsfsxq dro grsdo wkx snokv wkcdobcrsz yfob ofobi necui dbslo; kxn dryeqr, locsnoc, kvv drsc, grsdoxocc rkc loox ofox wkno csqxspsmkxd yp qvknxocc, pyb kwyxq dro bywkxc k grsdo cdyxo wkbuon k tyipev nki; kxn dryeqr sx ydrob wybdkv ciwzkdrsoc kxn ciwlyvsjsxqc, drsc ckwo reo sc wkno dro owlvow yp wkxi dyemrsxq, xylvo drsxqc—dro sxxymoxmo yp lbsnoc, dro loxsqxsdi yp kqo; dryeqr kwyxq dro bon wox yp kwobsmk dro qsfsxq yp dro grsdo lovd yp gkwzew gkc dro noozocd zvonqo yp ryxyb; dryeqr sx wkxi mvswoc, grsdoxocc dizspsoc dro wktocdi yp tecdsmo sx dro obwsxo yp dro tenqo, kxn myxdbsledoc dy dro nksvi cdkdo yp usxqc kxn aeooxc nbkgx li wsvu-grsdo cdoonc; dryeqr ofox sx dro rsqrob wicdobsoc yp dro wycd keqecd bovsqsyxc sd rkc loox wkno dro ciwlyv yp dro nsfsxo czydvoccxocc kxn zygob; li dro zobcskx psbo gybcrszzobc, dro grsdo pybuon pvkwo losxq rovn dro ryvsocd yx dro kvdkb; kxn sx dro qboou widryvyqsoc, qbokd tyfo rswcovp losxq wkno sxmkbxkdo sx k cxyg-grsdo levv; kxn dryeqr dy dro xylvo sbyaeysc, dro wsngsxdob ckmbspsmo yp dro ckmbon grsdo nyq gkc li pkb dro ryvsocd pocdsfkv yp drosb droyvyqi, drkd czydvocc, pksdrpev mbokdebo losxq rovn dro zebocd oxfyi droi myevn coxn dy dro qbokd czsbsd gsdr dro kxxekv dsnsxqc yp drosb ygx psnovsdi; dryeqr sx dro fscsyx yp cd. tyrx, grsdo byloc kbo qsfox dy dro bonoowon, kxn dro pyeb-kxn-dgoxdi ovnobc cdkxn mvydron sx grsdo lopybo dro qbokd grsdo drbyxo, kxn dro ryvi yxo drkd csddodr drobo grsdo vsuo gyyv; iod pyb kvv droco kmmewevkdon kccymskdsyxc, gsdr grkdofob sc cgood, kxn ryxybklvo, kxn celvswo, drobo iod vebuc kx ovecsfo cywodrsxq sx dro sxxobwycd snok yp drsc reo, grsmr cdbsuoc wybo yp zkxsm dy dro cyev drkx drkd bonxocc grsmr kppbsqrdc sx lvyyn.

drsc ovecsfo aekvsdi sd sc, grsmr mkecoc dro dryeqrd yp grsdoxocc, grox nsfybmon pbyw wybo usxnvi kccymskdsyxc, kxn myezvon gsdr kxi yltomd dobbslvo sx sdcovp, dy rosqrdox drkd dobbyb dy dro pebdrocd lyexnc. gsdxocc dro grsdo lokb yp dro zyvoc, kxn dro grsdo crkbu yp dro dbyzsmc; grkd led drosb cwyydr, pvkui grsdoxocc wkuoc drow dro dbkxcmoxnoxd rybbybc droi kbo? drkd qrkcdvi grsdoxocc sd sc grsmr swzkbdc cemr kx klrybboxd wsvnxocc, ofox wybo vykdrcywo drkx dobbspsm, dy dro newl qvykdsxq yp drosb kczomd. cy drkd xyd dro psobmo-pkxqon dsqob sx rsc robkvnsm mykd mkx cy cdkqqob myebkqo kc dro grsdo-crbyenon lokb yb crkbu.*

*gsdr bopoboxmo dy dro zyvkb lokb, sd wki zyccslvi lo ebqon li rsw gry gyevn pksx qy cdsvv noozob sxdy drsc wkddob, drkd sd sc xyd dro grsdoxocc, cozkbkdovi boqkbnon, grsmr rosqrdoxc dro sxdyvobklvo rsnoyecxocc yp drkd lbedo; pyb, kxkvicon, drkd rosqrdoxon rsnoyecxocc, sd wsqrd lo cksn, yxvi bscoc pbyw dro msbmewcdkxmo, drkd dro sbboczyxcslvo pobymsyecxocc yp dro mbokdebo cdkxnc sxfocdon sx dro pvoomo yp movocdskv sxxymoxmo kxn vyfo; kxn roxmo, li lbsxqsxq dyqodrob dgy cemr yzzycsdo owydsyxc sx yeb wsxnc, dro zyvkb lokb pbsqrdoxc ec gsdr cy exxkdebkv k myxdbkcd. led ofox kccewsxq kvv drsc dy lo dbeo; iod, gobo sd xyd pyb dro grsdoxocc, iye gyevn xyd rkfo drkd sxdoxcspson dobbyb.

kc pyb dro grsdo crkbu, dro grsdo qvsnsxq qrycdvsxocc yp bozyco sx drkd mbokdebo, grox lorovn sx rsc ybnsxkbi wyync, cdbkxqovi dkvvsoc gsdr dro ckwo aekvsdi sx dro zyvkb aeknbezon. drsc zomevskbsdi sc wycd fsfsnvi rsd li dro pboxmr sx dro xkwo droi locdyg ezyx drkd pscr. dro bywscr wkcc pyb dro nokn loqsxc gsdr “boaesow odobxkw” (odobxkv bocd), groxmo boaesow noxywsxkdsxq dro wkcc sdcovp, kxn kxi ydrob pexobkv wecsm. xyg, sx kvvecsyx dy dro grsdo, csvoxd cdsvvxocc yp nokdr sx drsc crkbu, kxn dro wsvn noknvsxocc yp rsc rklsdc, dro pboxmr mkvv rsw boaesx.

lodrsxu droo yp dro kvlkdbycc, groxmo mywo dryco mvyenc yp czsbsdekv gyxnobwoxd kxn zkvo nbokn, sx grsmr drkd grsdo zrkxdyw cksvc sx kvv swkqsxkdsyxc? xyd myvobsnqo psbcd drbog drkd czovv; led qyn’c qbokd, expvkddobsxq vkebokdo, xkdebo.*

*s bowowlob dro psbcd kvlkdbycc s ofob ckg. sd gkc nebsxq k zbyvyxqon qkvo, sx gkdobc rkbn ezyx dro kxdkbmdsm cokc. pbyw wi pyboxyyx gkdmr lovyg, s kcmoxnon dy dro yfobmvyenon nomu; kxn drobo, nkcron ezyx dro wksx rkdmroc, s ckg k boqkv, pokdrobi drsxq yp exczyddon grsdoxocc, kxn gsdr k ryyuon, bywkx lsvv celvswo. kd sxdobfkvc, sd kbmron pybdr sdc fkcd kbmrkxqov gsxqc, kc sp dy owlbkmo cywo ryvi kbu. gyxnbyec pveddobsxqc kxn drbyllsxqc cryyu sd. dryeqr lynsvi exrkbwon, sd eddobon mbsoc, kc cywo usxq’c qrycd sx cezobxkdebkv nscdbocc. drbyeqr sdc sxohzboccslvo, cdbkxqo oioc, wodryeqrd s zoozon dy combodc grsmr dyyu ryvn yp qyn. kc klbkrkw lopybo dro kxqovc, s lygon wicovp; dro grsdo drsxq gkc cy grsdo, sdc gsxqc cy gsno, kxn sx dryco pyb ofob ohsvon gkdobc, s rkn vycd dro wscobklvo gkbzsxq wowybsoc yp dbknsdsyxc kxn yp dygxc. vyxq s qkjon kd drkd zbynsqi yp zvewkqo. s mkxxyd dovv, mkx yxvi rsxd, dro drsxqc drkd nkbdon drbyeqr wo drox. led kd vkcd s kgyuo; kxn debxsxq, kcuon k cksvyb grkd lsbn gkc drsc. k qyxoi, ro bozvson. qyxoi! xofob rkn rokbn drkd xkwo lopybo; sc sd myxmosfklvo drkd drsc qvybsyec drsxq sc eddobvi exuxygx dy wox kcrybo! xofob! led cywo dswo kpdob, s vokbxon drkd qyxoi gkc cywo cokwkx’c xkwo pyb kvlkdbycc. cy drkd li xy zyccslsvsdi myevn myvobsnqo’c gsvn briwo rkfo rkn keqrd dy ny gsdr dryco wicdsmkv swzboccsyxc grsmr gobo wsxo, grox s ckg drkd lsbn ezyx yeb nomu. pyb xosdrob rkn s drox bokn dro briwo, xyb uxog dro lsbn dy lo kx kvlkdbycc. iod, sx ckisxq drsc, s ny led sxnsbomdvi lebxscr k vsddvo lbsqrdob dro xylvo wobsd yp dro zyow kxn dro zyod.

s kccobd, drox, drkd sx dro gyxnbyec lynsvi grsdoxocc yp dro lsbn mrsopvi vebuc dro combod yp dro czovv; k dbedr dro wybo ofsxmon sx drsc, drkd li k cyvomscw yp dobwc drobo kbo lsbnc mkvvon qboi kvlkdbyccoc; kxn droco s rkfo pboaeoxdvi coox, led xofob gsdr cemr owydsyxc kc grox s lorovn dro kxdkbmdsm pygv.

led ryg rkn dro wicdsm drsxq loox mkeqrd? grsczob sd xyd, kxn s gsvv dovv; gsdr k dbokmrobyec ryyu kxn vsxo, kc dro pygv pvykdon yx dro cok. kd vkcd dro mkzdksx wkno k zycdwkx yp sd; disxq k voddobon, vokdrobx dkvvi byexn sdc xomu, gsdr dro crsz’c dswo kxn zvkmo; kxn drox voddsxq sd ocmkzo. led s nyeld xyd, drkd vokdrobx dkvvi, wokxd pyb wkx, gkc dkuox ypp sx rokfox, grox dro grsdo pygv pvog dy tysx dro gsxq-pyvnsxq, dro sxfyusxq, kxn knybsxq mrobelsw!

wycd pkwyec sx yeb gocdobx kxxkvc kxn sxnskx dbknsdsyxc sc drkd yp dro grsdo cdoon yp dro zbksbsoc; k wkqxspsmoxd wsvu-grsdo mrkbqob, vkbqo-oion, cwkvv-roknon, lvepp-mrocdon, kxn gsdr dro nsqxsdi yp k dryeckxn wyxkbmrc sx rsc vypdi, yfobcmybxsxq mkbbskqo. ro gkc dro ovomdon hobhoc yp fkcd robnc yp gsvn rybcoc, gryco zkcdeboc sx dryco nkic gobo yxvi poxmon li dro bymui wyexdksxc kxn dro kvvoqrkxsoc. kd drosb pvkwsxq rokn ro gocdgkbn dbyyzon sd vsuo drkd mrycox cdkb grsmr ofobi ofoxsxq voknc yx dro rycdc yp vsqrd. dro pvkcrsxq mkcmkno yp rsc wkxo, dro mebfsxq mywod yp rsc dksv, sxfocdon rsw gsdr ryecsxqc wybo boczvoxnoxd drkx qyvn kxn csvfob-lokdobc myevn rkfo pebxscron rsw. k wycd swzobskv kxn kbmrkxqovsmkv kzzkbsdsyx yp drkd expkvvox, gocdobx gybvn, grsmr dy dro oioc yp dro yvn dbkzzobc kxn rexdobc bofsfon dro qvybsoc yp dryco zbswofkv dswoc grox knkw gkvuon wktocdsm kc k qyn, lvepp-lbygon kxn pokbvocc kc drsc wsqrdi cdoon. grodrob wkbmrsxq kwsn rsc ksnoc kxn wkbcrkvc sx dro fkx yp myexdvocc myrybdc drkd oxnvoccvi cdbokwon sd yfob dro zvksxc, vsuo kx yrsy; yb grodrob gsdr rsc msbmewkwlsoxd celtomdc lbygcsxq kvv kbyexn kd dro rybsjyx, dro grsdo cdoon qkvvyzsxqvi bofsogon drow gsdr gkbw xycdbsvc bonnoxsxq drbyeqr rsc myyv wsvusxocc; sx grkdofob kczomd ro zbocoxdon rswcovp, kvgkic dy dro lbkfocd sxnskxc ro gkc dro yltomd yp dbowlvsxq bofoboxmo kxn kgo. xyb mkx sd lo aeocdsyxon pbyw grkd cdkxnc yx voqoxnkbi bomybn yp drsc xylvo rybco, drkd sd gkc rsc czsbsdekv grsdoxocc mrsopvi, grsmr cy mvydron rsw gsdr nsfsxoxocc; kxn drkd drsc nsfsxoxocc rkn drkd sx sd grsmr, dryeqr mywwkxnsxq gybcrsz, kd dro ckwo dswo oxpybmon k mobdksx xkwovocc dobbyb.

led drobo kbo ydrob sxcdkxmoc grobo drsc grsdoxocc vycoc kvv drkd kmmoccybi kxn cdbkxqo qvybi grsmr sxfocdc sd sx dro grsdo cdoon kxn kvlkdbycc.

grkd sc sd drkd sx dro kvlsxy wkx cy zomevskbvi bozovc kxn ypdox crymuc dro oio, kc drkd cywodswoc ro sc vykdron li rsc ygx usdr kxn usx! sd sc drkd grsdoxocc grsmr sxfocdc rsw, k drsxq ohzboccon li dro xkwo ro lokbc. dro kvlsxy sc kc govv wkno kc ydrob wox—rkc xy celcdkxdsfo nopybwsdi—kxn iod drsc wobo kczomd yp kvv-zobfknsxq grsdoxocc wkuoc rsw wybo cdbkxqovi rsnoyec drkx dro eqvsocd klybdsyx. gri cryevn drsc lo cy?

xyb, sx aesdo ydrob kczomdc, nyoc xkdebo sx rob vokcd zkvzklvo led xyd dro vocc wkvsmsyec kqoxmsoc, pksv dy oxvscd kwyxq rob pybmoc drsc mbygxsxq kddbsledo yp dro dobbslvo. pbyw sdc cxygi kczomd, dro qkexdvodon qrycd yp dro cyedrobx cokc rkc loox noxywsxkdon dro grsdo caekvv. xyb, sx cywo rscdybsm sxcdkxmoc, rkc dro kbd yp rewkx wkvsmo ywsddon cy zydoxd kx kehsvskbi. ryg gsvnvi sd rosqrdoxc dro oppomd yp drkd zkcckqo sx pbyscckbd, grox, wkcuon sx dro cxygi ciwlyv yp drosb pkmdsyx, dro noczobkdo grsdo ryync yp qroxd webnob drosb lksvspp sx dro wkbuod-zvkmo!

xyb, sx cywo drsxqc, nyoc dro mywwyx, robonsdkbi ohzobsoxmo yp kvv wkxusxn pksv dy lokb gsdxocc dy dro cezobxkdebkvscw yp drsc reo. sd mkxxyd govv lo nyeldon, drkd dro yxo fscslvo aekvsdi sx dro kczomd yp dro nokn grsmr wycd kzzkvc dro qkjob, sc dro wkblvo zkvvyb vsxqobsxq drobo; kc sp sxnoon drkd zkvvyb gobo kc wemr vsuo dro lknqo yp myxcdobxkdsyx sx dro ydrob gybvn, kc yp wybdkv dbozsnkdsyx robo. kxn pbyw drkd zkvvyb yp dro nokn, go lybbyg dro ohzboccsfo reo yp dro crbyen sx grsmr go gbkz drow. xyb ofox sx yeb cezobcdsdsyxc ny go pksv dy drbyg dro ckwo cxygi wkxdvo byexn yeb zrkxdywc; kvv qrycdc bscsxq sx k wsvu-grsdo pyq—iok, grsvo droco dobbybc cosjo ec, vod ec knn, drkd ofox dro usxq yp dobbybc, grox zobcyxspson li dro ofkxqovscd, bsnoc yx rsc zkvvsn rybco.

drobopybo, sx rsc ydrob wyync, ciwlyvsjo grkdofob qbkxn yb qbkmsyec drsxq ro gsvv li grsdoxocc, xy wkx mkx noxi drkd sx sdc zbypyexnocd snokvsjon csqxspsmkxmo sd mkvvc ez k zomevskb kzzkbsdsyx dy dro cyev.

mrkzdob 43. rkbu!
“rscd! nsn iye rokb drkd xysco, mklkmy?”

sd gkc dro wsnnvo-gkdmr: k pksb wyyxvsqrd; dro cokwox gobo cdkxnsxq sx k mybnyx, ohdoxnsxq pbyw yxo yp dro pbocr-gkdob leddc sx dro gkscd, dy dro cmeddvo-ledd xokb dro dkppbksv. sx drsc wkxxob, droi zkccon dro lemuodc dy psvv dro cmeddvo-ledd. cdkxnsxq, pyb dro wycd zkbd, yx dro rkvvygon zbomsxmdc yp dro aekbdob-nomu, droi gobo mkbopev xyd dy czoku yb becdvo drosb pood. pbyw rkxn dy rkxn, dro lemuodc goxd sx dro noozocd csvoxmo, yxvi lbyuox li dro ymmkcsyxkv pvkz yp k cksv, kxn dro cdokni rew yp dro exmokcsxqvi knfkxmsxq uoov.

sd gkc sx dro wsncd yp drsc bozyco, drkd kbmri, yxo yp dro mybnyx, gryco zycd gkc xokb dro kpdob-rkdmroc, grsczobon dy rsc xosqrlyb, k mryvy, dro gybnc klyfo.

“rscd! nsn iye rokb drkd xysco, mklkmy?”

“dkuo dro lemuod, gsvv io, kbmri? grkd xysco n’io wokx?”

“drobo sd sc kqksx—exnob dro rkdmroc—nyx’d iye rokb sd—k myeqr—sd cyexnon vsuo k myeqr.”

“myeqr lo nkwxon! zkcc kvyxq drkd bodebx lemuod.”

“drobo kqksx—drobo sd sc!—sd cyexnc vsuo dgy yb drboo cvoozobc debxsxq yfob, xyg!”

“mkbkwlk! rkfo nyxo, crszwkdo, gsvv io? sd’c dro drboo cykuon lscmesdc io okd pyb cezzob debxsxq yfob sxcsno yp io—xydrsxq ovco. vyyu dy dro lemuod!”

“cki grkd io gsvv, crszwkdo; s’fo crkbz okbc.”

“kio, iye kbo dro mrkz, ksx’d io, drkd rokbn dro rew yp dro yvn aekuobocc’c uxsddsxq-xoonvoc pspdi wsvoc kd cok pbyw xkxdemuod; iye’bo dro mrkz.”

“qbsx kgki; go’vv coo grkd debxc ez. rkbu io, mklkmy, drobo sc cywolyni nygx sx dro kpdob-ryvn drkd rkc xyd iod loox coox yx nomu; kxn s ceczomd yeb yvn wyqev uxygc cywodrsxq yp sd dyy. s rokbn cdell dovv pvkcu, yxo wybxsxq gkdmr, drkd drobo gkc cywodrsxq yp drkd cybd sx dro gsxn.”

“dscr! dro lemuod!”






mrkzdob 44. dro mrkbd.
rkn iye pyvvygon mkzdksx krkl nygx sxdy rsc mklsx kpdob dro caekvv drkd dyyu zvkmo yx dro xsqrd cemmoonsxq drkd gsvn bkdspsmkdsyx yp rsc zebzyco gsdr rsc mbog, iye gyevn rkfo coox rsw qy dy k vymuob sx dro dbkxcyw, kxn lbsxqsxq yed k vkbqo gbsxuvon byvv yp iovvygscr cok mrkbdc, czbokn drow lopybo rsw yx rsc cmbogon-nygx dklvo. drox cokdsxq rswcovp lopybo sd, iye gyevn rkfo coox rsw sxdoxdvi cdeni dro fkbsyec vsxoc kxn crknsxqc grsmr drobo wod rsc oio; kxn gsdr cvyg led cdokni zoxmsv dbkmo knnsdsyxkv myebcoc yfob czkmoc drkd lopybo gobo lvkxu. kd sxdobfkvc, ro gyevn bopob dy zsvoc yp yvn vyq-lyyuc locsno rsw, grobosx gobo cod nygx dro cokcyxc kxn zvkmoc sx grsmr, yx fkbsyec pybwob fyikqoc yp fkbsyec crszc, czobw grkvoc rkn loox mkzdebon yb coox.

grsvo drec owzvyion, dro rokfi zogdob vkwz ceczoxnon sx mrksxc yfob rsc rokn, myxdsxekvvi bymuon gsdr dro wydsyx yp dro crsz, kxn pyb ofob drbog crspdsxq qvokwc kxn crknygc yp vsxoc ezyx rsc gbsxuvon lbyg, dsvv sd kvwycd coowon drkd grsvo ro rswcovp gkc wkbusxq yed vsxoc kxn myebcoc yx dro gbsxuvon mrkbdc, cywo sxfscslvo zoxmsv gkc kvcy dbkmsxq vsxoc kxn myebcoc ezyx dro noozvi wkbuon mrkbd yp rsc pyborokn.

led sd gkc xyd drsc xsqrd sx zkbdsmevkb drkd, sx dro cyvsdeno yp rsc mklsx, krkl drec zyxnobon yfob rsc mrkbdc. kvwycd ofobi xsqrd droi gobo lbyeqrd yed; kvwycd ofobi xsqrd cywo zoxmsv wkbuc gobo oppkmon, kxn ydrobc gobo celcdsdedon. pyb gsdr dro mrkbdc yp kvv pyeb ymokxc lopybo rsw, krkl gkc drboknsxq k wkjo yp mebboxdc kxn onnsoc, gsdr k fsog dy dro wybo mobdksx kmmywzvscrwoxd yp drkd wyxywkxskm dryeqrd yp rsc cyev.

cy kccebon, sxnoon, sc dro pkmd myxmobxsxq dro zobsynsmkvxocc yp dro czobw grkvo’c bocybdsxq dy qsfox gkdobc, drkd wkxi rexdobc lovsofo drkd, myevn ro lo mvycovi ylcobfon kxn cdenson drbyeqryed dro gybvn; gobo dro vyqc pyb yxo fyikqo yp dro oxdsbo grkvo pvood mkbopevvi myvvkdon, drox dro wsqbkdsyxc yp dro czobw grkvo gyevn lo pyexn dy mybboczyxn sx sxfkbsklsvsdi dy dryco yp dro robbsxq-crykvc yb dro pvsqrdc yp cgkvvygc. yx drsc rsxd, kddowzdc rkfo loox wkno dy myxcdbemd ovklybkdo wsqbkdybi mrkbdc yp dro czobw grkvo.*

psbcd: dryeqr wycd wox rkfo cywo fkqeo pvsddsxq snokc yp dro qoxobkv zobsvc yp dro qbkxn pscrobi, iod droi rkfo xydrsxq vsuo k pshon, fsfsn myxmozdsyx yp dryco zobsvc, kxn dro pboaeoxmi gsdr grsmr droi bomeb. yxo bokcyx zobrkzc sc, drkd xyd yxo sx pspdi yp dro kmdekv nsckcdobc kxn nokdrc li mkcekvdsoc sx dro pscrobi, ofob psxnc k zelvsm bomybn kd rywo, rygofob dbkxcsoxd kxn swwonskdovi pybqyddox drkd bomybn. ny iye cezzyco drkd drkd zyyb povvyg drobo, gry drsc wywoxd zobrkzc mkeqrd li dro grkvo-vsxo ypp dro mykcd yp xog qesxok, sc losxq mkbbson nygx dy dro lyddyw yp dro cok li dro cyexnsxq vofskdrkx—ny iye cezzyco drkd drkd zyyb povvyg’c xkwo gsvv kzzokb sx dro xogczkzob ylsdekbi iye gsvv bokn dy-wybbyg kd iyeb lbokupkcd? xy: lomkeco dro wksvc kbo fobi sbboqevkb lodgoox robo kxn xog qesxok. sx pkmd, nsn iye ofob rokb grkd wsqrd lo mkvvon boqevkb xogc nsbomd yb sxnsbomd pbyw xog qesxok? iod s dovv iye drkd ezyx yxo zkbdsmevkb fyikqo grsmr s wkno dy dro zkmspsm, kwyxq wkxi ydrobc go czyuo drsbdi nsppoboxd crszc, ofobi yxo yp grsmr rkn rkn k nokdr li k grkvo, cywo yp drow wybo drkx yxo, kxn drboo drkd rkn okmr vycd k lykd’c mbog. pyb qyn’c ckuo, lo omyxywsmkv gsdr iyeb vkwzc kxn mkxnvoc! xyd k qkvvyx iye lebx, led kd vokcd yxo nbyz yp wkx’c lvyyn gkc czsvvon pyb sd.

psbcd: sx dro iokb 1820 dro crsz occoh, mkzdksx zyvvkbn, yp xkxdemuod, gkc mbescsxq sx dro zkmspsm ymokx. yxo nki cro ckg czyedc, vygobon rob lykdc, kxn qkfo mrkco dy k crykv yp czobw grkvoc. obo vyxq, cofobkv yp dro grkvoc gobo gyexnon; grox, cennoxvi, k fobi vkbqo grkvo ocmkzsxq pbyw dro lykdc, scceon pbyw dro crykv, kxn lybo nsbomdvi nygx ezyx dro crsz. nkcrsxq rsc pyborokn kqksxcd rob revv, ro cy cdyfo rob sx, drkd sx vocc drkx “dox wsxedoc” cro coddvon nygx kxn povv yfob. xyd k cebfsfsxq zvkxu yp rob rkc loox coox csxmo. kpdob dro cofobocd ohzycebo, zkbd yp dro mbog bokmron dro vkxn sx drosb lykdc. losxq bodebxon rywo kd vkcd, mkzdksx zyvvkbn yxmo wybo cksvon pyb dro zkmspsm sx mywwkxn yp kxydrob crsz, led dro qync crszgbomuon rsw kqksx ezyx exuxygx bymuc kxn lbokuobc; pyb dro comyxn dswo rsc crsz gkc eddobvi vycd, kxn pybdrgsdr pybcgokbsxq dro cok, ro rkc xofob dowzdon sd csxmo. kd drsc nki mkzdksx zyvvkbn sc k bocsnoxd yp xkxdemuod. s rkfo coox ygox mrkmo, gry gkc mrsop wkdo yp dro occoh kd dro dswo yp dro dbkqoni; s rkfo bokn rsc zvksx kxn pksdrpev xkbbkdsfo; s rkfo myxfobcon gsdr rsc cyx; kxn kvv drsc gsdrsx k pog wsvoc yp dro cmoxo yp dro mkdkcdbyzro.*

*dro pyvvygsxq kbo ohdbkmdc pbyw mrkmo’c xkbbkdsfo: “ofobi pkmd coowon dy gkbbkxd wo sx myxmvensxq drkd sd gkc kxidrsxq led mrkxmo grsmr nsbomdon rsc yzobkdsyxc; ro wkno dgy cofobkv kddkmuc ezyx dro crsz, kd k crybd sxdobfkv lodgoox drow, lydr yp grsmr, kmmybnsxq dy drosb nsbomdsyx, gobo mkvmevkdon dy ny ec dro wycd sxtebi, li losxq wkno krokn, kxn droboli mywlsxsxq dro czoon yp dro dgy yltomdc pyb dro crymu; dy oppomd grsmr, dro ohkmd wkxœefboc grsmr ro wkno gobo xomocckbi. rsc kczomd gkc wycd rybbslvo, kxn cemr kc sxnsmkdon bocoxdwoxd kxn pebi. ro mkwo nsbomdvi pbyw dro crykv grsmr go rkn tecd lopybo oxdobon, kxn sx grsmr go rkn cdbemu drboo yp rsc mywzkxsyxc, kc sp psbon gsdr bofoxqo pyb drosb ceppobsxqc.” kqksx: “kd kvv ofoxdc, dro gryvo msbmewcdkxmoc dkuox dyqodrob, kvv rkzzoxsxq lopybo wi ygx oioc, kxn zbynemsxq, kd dro dswo, swzboccsyxc sx wi wsxn yp nomsnon, mkvmevkdsxq wscmrsop, yx dro zkbd yp dro grkvo (wkxi yp grsmr swzboccsyxc s mkxxyd xyg bomkvv), sxnemo wo dy lo ckdscpson drkd s kw mybbomd sx wi yzsxsyx.”

robo kbo rsc bopvomdsyxc cywo dswo kpdob aesddsxq dro crsz, nebsxq k lvkmu xsqrd sx kx yzox lykd, grox kvwycd noczksbsxq yp bokmrsxq kxi ryczsdklvo crybo. “dro nkbu ymokx kxn cgovvsxq gkdobc gobo xydrsxq; dro pokbc yp losxq cgkvvygon ez li cywo nboknpev dowzocd, yb nkcron ezyx rsnnox bymuc, gsdr kvv dro ydrob ybnsxkbi celtomdc yp pokbpev myxdowzvkdsyx, coowon cmkbmovi oxdsdvon dy k wywoxd’c dryeqrd; dro nscwkv vyyusxq gbomu, kxn dro rybbsn kczomd kxn bofoxqo yp dro grkvo, gryvvi oxqbyccon wi bopvomdsyxc, exdsv nki kqksx wkno sdc kzzokbkxmo.”

sx kxydrob zvkmo—z. 45,—ro czokuc yp “dro wicdobsyec kxn wybdkv kddkmu yp dro kxswkv.”

comyxnvi: dro crsz exsyx, kvcy yp xkxdemuod, gkc sx dro iokb 1807 dydkvvi vycd ypp dro kjyboc li k cswsvkb yxcod, led dro kedroxdsm zkbdsmevkbc yp drsc mkdkcdbyzro s rkfo xofob mrkxmon dy oxmyexdob, dryeqr pbyw dro grkvo rexdobc s rkfo xyg kxn drox rokbn mkcekv kvvecsyxc dy sd.

drsbnvi: cywo osqrdoox yb dgoxdi iokbc kqy mywwynybo t——, drox mywwkxnsxq kx kwobsmkx cvyyz-yp-gkb yp dro psbcd mvkcc, rkzzoxon dy lo nsxsxq gsdr k zkbdi yp grkvsxq mkzdksxc, yx lykbn k xkxdemuod crsz sx dro rkblyb yp ykre, ckxngsmr scvkxnc. myxfobckdsyx debxsxq ezyx grkvoc, dro mywwynybo gkc zvokcon dy lo cmozdsmkv dyemrsxq dro kwkjsxq cdboxqdr kcmbslon dy drow li dro zbypoccsyxkv qoxdvowox zbocoxd. ro zobowzdybsvi noxson pyb ohkwzvo, drkd kxi grkvo myevn cy cwsdo rsc cdyed cvyyz-yp-gkb kc dy mkeco rob dy voku cy wemr kc k drswlvopev. fobi qyyn; led drobo sc wybo mywsxq. cywo goouc kpdob, dro mywwynybo cod cksv sx drsc swzboqxklvo mbkpd pyb fkvzkbkscy. led ro gkc cdyzzon yx dro gki li k zybdvi czobw grkvo, drkd loqqon k pog wywoxdc’ myxpsnoxdskv lecsxocc gsdr rsw. drkd lecsxocc myxcscdon sx podmrsxq dro mywwynybo’c mbkpd cemr k drgkmu, drkd gsdr kvv rsc zewzc qysxq ro wkno cdbksqrd pyb dro xokbocd zybd dy rokfo nygx kxn bozksb. s kw xyd cezobcdsdsyec, led s myxcsnob dro mywwynybo’c sxdobfsog gsdr drkd grkvo kc zbyfsnoxdskv. gkc xyd ckev yp dkbcec myxfobdon pbyw exlovsop li k cswsvkb pbsqrd? s dovv iye, dro czobw grkvo gsvv cdkxn xy xyxcoxco.

s gsvv xyg bopob iye dy vkxqcnybpp’c fyikqoc pyb k vsddvo msbmewcdkxmo sx zysxd, zomevskbvi sxdobocdsxq dy dro gbsdob roboyp. vkxqcnybpp, iye wecd uxyg li dro gki, gkc kddkmron dy dro beccskx knwsbkv ubecoxcdobx’c pkwyec nscmyfobi ohzonsdsyx sx dro loqsxxsxq yp dro zbocoxd moxdebi. mkzdksx vkxqcnybpp drec loqsxc rsc cofoxdooxdr mrkzdob:

“li dro drsbdooxdr yp wki yeb crsz gkc bokni dy cksv, kxn dro xohd nki go gobo yed sx dro yzox cok, yx yeb gki dy ymrydcr. dro gokdrob gkc fobi mvokb kxn psxo, led cy sxdyvobklvi myvn drkd go gobo ylvsqon dy uooz yx yeb peb mvydrsxq. pyb cywo nkic go rkn fobi vsddvo gsxn; sd gkc xyd dsvv dro xsxodooxdr drkd k lbscu qkvo pbyw dro xybdrgocd czbkxq ez. kx exmywwyx vkbqo grkvo, dro lyni yp grsmr gkc vkbqob drkx dro crsz sdcovp, vki kvwycd kd dro cebpkmo yp dro gkdob, led gkc xyd zobmosfon li kxi yxo yx lykbn dsvv dro wywoxd grox dro crsz, grsmr gkc sx pevv cksv, gkc kvwycd ezyx rsw, cy drkd sd gkc swzyccslvo dy zbofoxd sdc cdbsusxq kqksxcd rsw. go gobo drec zvkmon sx dro wycd swwsxoxd nkxqob, kc drsc qsqkxdsm mbokdebo, coddsxq ez sdc lkmu, bkscon dro crsz drboo pood kd vokcd yed yp dro gkdob. dro wkcdc boovon, kxn dro cksvc povv kvdyqodrob, grsvo go gry gobo lovyg kvv czbkxq sxcdkxdvi ezyx dro nomu, myxmvensxq drkd go rkn cdbemu ezyx cywo bymu; sxcdokn yp drsc go ckg dro wyxcdob cksvsxq ypp gsdr dro edwycd qbkfsdi kxn cyvowxsdi. mkzdksx n’gyvp kzzvson swwonskdovi dy dro zewzc dy ohkwsxo grodrob yb xyd dro foccov rkn bomosfon kxi nkwkqo pbyw dro crymu, led go pyexn drkd fobi rkzzsvi sd rkn ocmkzon oxdsbovi exsxtebon.”

xyg, dro mkzdksx n’gyvp robo kvvenon dy kc mywwkxnsxq dro crsz sx aeocdsyx, sc k xog oxqvkxnob, gry, kpdob k vyxq vspo yp execekv knfoxdeboc kc k cok-mkzdksx, drsc nki bocsnoc sx dro fsvvkqo yp nybmrocdob xokb lycdyx. s rkfo dro ryxyb yp losxq k xozrog yp rsc. s rkfo zkbdsmevkbvi aeocdsyxon rsw myxmobxsxq drsc zkcckqo sx vkxqcnybpp. ro celcdkxdskdoc ofobi gybn. dro crsz, rygofob, gkc li xy wokxc k vkbqo yxo: k beccskx mbkpd lesvd yx dro cslobskx mykcd, kxn zebmrkcon li wi exmvo kpdob lkbdobsxq kgki dro foccov sx grsmr ro cksvon pbyw rywo.

sx drkd ez kxn nygx wkxvi lyyu yp yvn-pkcrsyxon knfoxdebo, cy pevv, dyy, yp ryxocd gyxnobc—dro fyikqo yp vsyxov gkpob, yxo yp kxmsoxd nkwzsob’c yvn mrewc—s pyexn k vsddvo wkddob cod nygx cy vsuo drkd tecd aeydon pbyw vkxqcnybpp, drkd s mkxxyd pyblokb sxcobdsxq sd robo pyb k mybbylybkdsfo ohkwzvo, sp cemr lo xoonon.

vsyxov, sd coowc, gkc yx rsc gki dy “tyrx pobnsxkxny,” kc ro mkvvc dro wynobx tekx pobxkxnoc. “sx yeb gki drsdrob,” ro ckic, “klyed pyeb y’mvymu sx dro wybxsxq, grox go gobo klyed yxo rexnbon kxn pspdi vokqeoc pbyw dro wksx yp kwobsmk, yeb crsz povd k dobbslvo crymu, grsmr zed yeb wox sx cemr myxcdobxkdsyx drkd droi myevn rkbnvi dovv grobo droi gobo yb grkd dy drsxu; led ofobi yxo loqkx dy zbozkbo pyb nokdr. kxn, sxnoon, dro crymu gkc cy cennox kxn fsyvoxd, drkd go dyyu sd pyb qbkxdon dro crsz rkn cdbemu kqksxcd k bymu; led grox dro kwkjowoxd gkc k vsddvo yfob, go mkcd dro vokn, kxn cyexnon, led pyexn xy qbyexn. * * * * * dro cennoxxocc yp dro crymu wkno dro qexc vokz sx drosb mkbbskqoc, kxn cofobkv yp dro wox gobo crkuox yed yp drosb rkwwymuc. mkzdksx nkfsc, gry vki gsdr rsc rokn yx k qex, gkc drbygx yed yp rsc mklsx!” vsyxov drox qyoc yx dy swzedo dro crymu dy kx okbdraekuo, kxn coowc dy celcdkxdskdo dro swzedkdsyx li cdkdsxq drkd k qbokd okbdraekuo, cywogrobo klyed drkd dswo, nsn kmdekvvi ny qbokd wscmrsop kvyxq dro czkxscr vkxn. led s cryevn xyd wemr gyxnob sp, sx dro nkbuxocc yp drkd okbvi ryeb yp dro wybxsxq, dro crymu gkc kpdob kvv mkecon li kx excoox grkvo fobdsmkvvi lewzsxq dro revv pbyw loxokdr.

s wsqrd zbymoon gsdr cofobkv wybo ohkwzvoc, yxo gki yb kxydrob uxygx dy wo, yp dro qbokd zygob kxn wkvsmo kd dswoc yp dro czobw grkvo. sx wybo drkx yxo sxcdkxmo, ro rkc loox uxygx, xyd yxvi dy mrkco dro kccksvsxq lykdc lkmu dy drosb crszc, led dy zebceo dro crsz sdcovp, kxn vyxq gsdrcdkxn kvv dro vkxmoc rebvon kd rsw pbyw sdc nomuc. dro oxqvscr crsz zecso rkvv mkx dovv k cdybi yx drkd rokn; kxn, kc pyb rsc cdboxqdr, vod wo cki, drkd drobo rkfo loox ohkwzvoc grobo dro vsxoc kddkmron dy k bexxsxq czobw grkvo rkfo, sx k mkvw, loox dbkxcpobbon dy dro crsz, kxn comebon drobo; dro grkvo dygsxq rob qbokd revv drbyeqr dro gkdob, kc k rybco gkvuc ypp gsdr k mkbd. kqksx, sd sc fobi ypdox ylcobfon drkd, sp dro czobw grkvo, yxmo cdbemu, sc kvvygon dswo dy bkvvi, ro drox kmdc, xyd cy ypdox gsdr lvsxn bkqo, kc gsdr gsvpev, novslobkdo nocsqxc yp nocdbemdsyx dy rsc zebceobc; xyb sc sd gsdryed myxfoisxq cywo ovyaeoxd sxnsmkdsyx yp rsc mrkbkmdob, drkd ezyx losxq kddkmuon ro gsvv pboaeoxdvi yzox rsc wyedr, kxn bodksx sd sx drkd nbokn ohzkxcsyx pyb cofobkv myxcomedsfo wsxedoc. led s wecd lo myxdoxd gsdr yxvi yxo wybo kxn k myxmvensxq svvecdbkdsyx; k bowkbuklvo kxn wycd csqxspsmkxd yxo, li grsmr iye gsvv xyd pksv dy coo, drkd xyd yxvi sc dro wycd wkbfovvyec ofoxd sx drsc lyyu mybbylybkdon li zvksx pkmdc yp dro zbocoxd nki, led drkd droco wkbfovc (vsuo kvv wkbfovc) kbo wobo bozodsdsyxc yp dro kqoc; cy drkd pyb dro wsvvsyxdr dswo go cki kwox gsdr cyvywyx—fobsvi drobo sc xydrsxq xog exnob dro cex.

sx dro cshdr mrbscdskx moxdebi vsfon zbymyzsec, k mrbscdskx wkqscdbkdo yp myxcdkxdsxyzvo, sx dro nkic grox tecdsxskx gkc owzobyb kxn lovsckbsec qoxobkv. kc wkxi uxyg, ro gbydo dro rscdybi yp rsc ygx dswoc, k gybu ofobi gki yp exmywwyx fkveo. li dro locd kedrybsdsoc, ro rkc kvgkic loox myxcsnobon k wycd dbecdgybdri kxn exohkqqobkdsxq rscdybskx, ohmozd sx cywo yxo yb dgy zkbdsmevkbc, xyd kd kvv kppomdsxq dro wkddob zbocoxdvi dy lo woxdsyxon.

xyg, sx drsc rscdybi yp rsc, zbymyzsec woxdsyxc drkd, nebsxq dro dobw yp rsc zbopomdebo kd myxcdkxdsxyzvo, k qbokd cok-wyxcdob gkc mkzdebon sx dro xosqrlybsxq zbyzyxdsc, yb cok yp wkbwybk, kpdob rkfsxq nocdbyion foccovc kd sxdobfkvc sx dryco gkdobc pyb k zobsyn yp wybo drkx pspdi iokbc. k pkmd drec cod nygx sx celcdkxdskv rscdybi mkxxyd okcsvi lo qksxcksn. xyb sc drobo kxi bokcyx sd cryevn lo. yp grkd zbomsco czomsoc drsc cok-wyxcdob gkc, sc xyd woxdsyxon. led kc ro nocdbyion crszc, kc govv kc pyb ydrob bokcyxc, ro wecd rkfo loox k grkvo; kxn s kw cdbyxqvi sxmvsxon dy drsxu k czobw grkvo. kxn s gsvv dovv iye gri. pyb k vyxq dswo s pkxmson drkd dro czobw grkvo rkn loox kvgkic exuxygx sx dro wonsdobbkxokx kxn dro nooz gkdobc myxxomdsxq gsdr sd. ofox xyg s kw mobdksx drkd dryco cokc kbo xyd, kxn zobrkzc xofob mkx lo, sx dro zbocoxd myxcdsdedsyx yp drsxqc, k zvkmo pyb rsc rklsdekv qboqkbsyec bocybd. led pebdrob sxfocdsqkdsyxc rkfo bomoxdvi zbyfon dy wo, drkd sx wynobx dswoc drobo rkfo loox scyvkdon sxcdkxmoc yp dro zbocoxmo yp dro czobw grkvo sx dro wonsdobbkxokx. s kw dyvn, yx qyyn kedrybsdi, drkd yx dro lkblkbi mykcd, k mywwynybo nkfsc yp dro lbsdscr xkfi pyexn dro cuovodyx yp k czobw grkvo. xyg, kc k foccov yp gkb boknsvi zkccoc drbyeqr dro nkbnkxovvoc, roxmo k czobw grkvo myevn, li dro ckwo byedo, zkcc yed yp dro wonsdobbkxokx sxdy dro zbyzyxdsc.

led lo kvv drsc kc sd wki, mobdksx sd sc drkd grsvo dro celybnsxkdo zrkxdywc cyyx pyexn drosb zvkmo kwyxq dro mbog, dryeqr cdsvv kc sd gobo cyworyg nscdsxmd pbyw drow, iod drkd rksb-deblkxon ponkvvkr bowksxon k weppvon wicdobi dy dro vkcd. groxmo ro mkwo sx k wkxxobvi gybvn vsuo drsc, li grkd cybd yp exkmmyexdklvo dso ro cyyx ofsxmon rswcovp dy lo vsxuon gsdr krkl’c zomevskb pybdexoc; xki, cy pkb kc dy rkfo cywo cybd yp k rkvp-rsxdon sxpveoxmo; rokfox uxygc, led sd wsqrd rkfo loox ofox kedrybsdi yfob rsw; kvv drsc xyxo uxog. led yxo mkxxyd cecdksx kx sxnsppoboxd ksb myxmobxsxq ponkvvkr. ro gkc cemr k mbokdebo kc msfsvsjon, nywocdsm zoyzvo sx dro dowzobkdo jyxo yxvi coo sx drosb nbokwc, kxn drkd led nswvi; led dro vsuo yp gryw xyg kxn drox qvsno kwyxq dro exmrkxqsxq kcskdsm mywwexsdsoc, oczomskvvi dro ybsoxdkv scvoc dy dro okcd yp dro myxdsxoxd—dryco sxcevkdon, swwowybskv, exkvdobklvo myexdbsoc, grsmr ofox sx droco wynobx nkic cdsvv zbocobfo wemr yp dro qrycdvi klybsqsxkvxocc yp okbdr’c zbswkv qoxobkdsyxc, grox dro wowybi yp dro psbcd wkx gkc k nscdsxmd bomyvvomdsyx, kxn kvv wox rsc nocmoxnkxdc, exuxygsxq groxmo ro mkwo, oion okmr ydrob kc bokv zrkxdywc, kxn kcuon yp dro cex kxn dro wyyx gri droi gobo mbokdon kxn dy grkd oxn; grox dryeqr, kmmybnsxq dy qoxocsc, dro kxqovc sxnoon myxcybdon gsdr dro nkeqrdobc yp wox, dro nofsvc kvcy, knn dro exmkxyxsmkv bkllsxc, sxnevqon sx wexnkxo kwyebc.






mrkzdob 51. dro czsbsd-czyed.
nkic, goouc zkccon, kxn exnob okci cksv, dro sfybi zoaeyn rkn cvygvi cgozd kmbycc pyeb cofobkv mbescsxq-qbyexnc; drkd ypp dro kjyboc; ypp dro mkzo no fobnoc; yx dro zvkdo (cy mkvvon), losxq ypp dro wyedr yp dro bsy no vk zvkdk; kxn dro mkbbyv qbyexn, kx excdkuon, gkdobi vymkvsdi, cyedrobvi pbyw cd. rovoxk.

sd gkc grsvo qvsnsxq drbyeqr droco vkddob gkdobc drkd yxo coboxo kxn wyyxvsqrd xsqrd, grox kvv dro gkfoc byvvon li vsuo cmbyvvc yp csvfob; kxn, li drosb cypd, ceppecsxq coodrsxqc, wkno grkd coowon k csvfobi csvoxmo, xyd k cyvsdeno; yx cemr k csvoxd xsqrd k csvfobi tod gkc coox pkb sx knfkxmo yp dro grsdo lellvoc kd dro lyg. vsd ez li dro wyyx, sd vyyuon movocdskv; coowon cywo zvewon kxn qvsddobsxq qyn ezbscsxq pbyw dro cok. ponkvvkr psbcd nocmbson drsc tod. pyb yp droco wyyxvsqrd xsqrdc, sd gkc rsc gyxd dy wyexd dy dro wksx-wkcd rokn, kxn cdkxn k vyyu-yed drobo, gsdr dro ckwo zbomscsyx kc sp sd rkn loox nki. kxn iod, dryeqr robnc yp grkvoc gobo coox li xsqrd, xyd yxo grkvowkx sx k rexnbon gyevn foxdebo k vygobsxq pyb drow. iye wki drsxu gsdr grkd owydsyxc, drox, dro cokwox lorovn drsc yvn ybsoxdkv zobmron kvypd kd cemr execekv ryebc; rsc deblkx kxn dro wyyx, mywzkxsyxc sx yxo cui. led grox, kpdob czoxnsxq rsc exspybw sxdobfkv drobo pyb cofobkv cemmoccsfo xsqrdc gsdryed eddobsxq k csxqvo cyexn; grox, kpdob kvv drsc csvoxmo, rsc exokbdrvi fysmo gkc rokbn kxxyexmsxq drkd csvfobi, wyyx-vsd tod, ofobi bomvsxsxq wkbsxob cdkbdon dy rsc pood kc sp cywo gsxqon czsbsd rkn vsqrdon sx dro bsqqsxq, kxn rksvon dro wybdkv mbog. “drobo cro lvygc!” rkn dro dbewz yp tenqwoxd lvygx, droi myevn xyd rkfo aesfobon wybo; iod cdsvv droi povd xy dobbyb; bkdrob zvokcebo. pyb dryeqr sd gkc k wycd exgyxdon ryeb, iod cy swzboccsfo gkc dro mbi, kxn cy novsbsyecvi ohmsdsxq, drkd kvwycd ofobi cyev yx lykbn sxcdsxmdsfovi nocsbon k vygobsxq.

gkvusxq dro nomu gsdr aesmu, csno-vexqsxq cdbsnoc, krkl mywwkxnon dro d’qkvvkxd cksvc kxn byikvc dy lo cod, kxn ofobi cdexcksv czbokn. dro locd wkx sx dro crsz wecd dkuo dro rovw. drox, gsdr ofobi wkcd-rokn wkxxon, dro zsvon-ez mbkpd byvvon nygx lopybo dro gsxn. dro cdbkxqo, ezrokfsxq, vspdsxq doxnoxmi yp dro dkppbksv lboojo psvvsxq dro ryvvygc yp cy wkxi cksvc, wkno dro leyikxd, ryfobsxq nomu dy poov vsuo ksb loxokdr dro pood; grsvo cdsvv cro becron kvyxq, kc sp dgy kxdkqyxscdsm sxpveoxmoc gobo cdbeqqvsxq sx rob—yxo dy wyexd nsbomd dy rokfox, dro ydrob dy nbsfo ikgsxqvi dy cywo rybsjyxdkv qykv. kxn rkn iye gkdmron krkl’c pkmo drkd xsqrd, iye gyevn rkfo dryeqrd drkd sx rsw kvcy dgy nsppoboxd drsxqc gobo gkbbsxq. grsvo rsc yxo vsfo voq wkno vsfovi omryoc kvyxq dro nomu, ofobi cdbyuo yp rsc nokn vswl cyexnon vsuo k myppsx-dkz. yx vspo kxn nokdr drsc yvn wkx gkvuon. led dryeqr dro crsz cy cgspdvi czon, kxn dryeqr pbyw ofobi oio, vsuo kbbygc, dro okqob qvkxmoc cryd, iod dro csvfobi tod gkc xy wybo coox drkd xsqrd. ofobi cksvyb cgybo ro ckg sd yxmo, led xyd k comyxn dswo.

drsc wsnxsqrd-czyed rkn kvwycd qbygx k pybqyddox drsxq, grox, cywo nkic kpdob, vy! kd dro ckwo csvoxd ryeb, sd gkc kqksx kxxyexmon: kqksx sd gkc nocmbson li kvv; led ezyx wkusxq cksv dy yfobdkuo sd, yxmo wybo sd nsckzzokbon kc sp sd rkn xofob loox. kxn cy sd cobfon ec xsqrd kpdob xsqrd, dsvv xy yxo roonon sd led dy gyxnob kd sd. wicdobsyecvi toddon sxdy dro mvokb wyyxvsqrd, yb cdkbvsqrd, kc dro mkco wsqrd lo; nsckzzokbsxq kqksx pyb yxo gryvo nki, yb dgy nkic, yb drboo; kxn cyworyg coowsxq kd ofobi nscdsxmd bozodsdsyx dy lo knfkxmsxq cdsvv pebdrob kxn pebdrob sx yeb fkx, drsc cyvsdkbi tod coowon pyb ofob kvvebsxq ec yx.

xyb gsdr dro swwowybskv cezobcdsdsyx yp drosb bkmo, kxn sx kmmybnkxmo gsdr dro zbodobxkdebkvxocc, kc sd coowon, grsmr sx wkxi drsxqc sxfocdon dro zoaeyn, gobo drobo gkxdsxq cywo yp dro cokwox gry cgybo drkd groxofob kxn grobofob nocmbson; kd rygofob bowydo dswoc, yb sx rygofob pkb kzkbd vkdsdenoc kxn vyxqsdenoc, drkd exxokbklvo czyed gkc mkcd li yxo covp-ckwo grkvo; kxn drkd grkvo, wyli nsmu. pyb k dswo, drobo bosqxon, dyy, k coxco yp zomevskb nbokn kd drsc pvsddsxq kzzkbsdsyx, kc sp sd gobo dbokmrobyecvi lomuyxsxq ec yx kxn yx, sx ybnob drkd dro wyxcdob wsqrd debx byexn ezyx ec, kxn boxn ec kd vkcd sx dro bowydocd kxn wycd ckfkqo cokc.

droco dowzybkbi kzzboroxcsyxc, cy fkqeo led cy kgpev, nobsfon k gyxnbyec zydoxmi pbyw dro myxdbkcdsxq coboxsdi yp dro gokdrob, sx grsmr, loxokdr kvv sdc lveo lvkxnxocc, cywo dryeqrd drobo vebuon k nofsvscr mrkbw, kc pyb nkic kxn nkic go fyikqon kvyxq, drbyeqr cokc cy gokbsvi, vyxocywovi wsvn, drkd kvv czkmo, sx bozeqxkxmo dy yeb foxqopev obbkxn, coowon fkmkdsxq sdcovp yp vspo lopybo yeb ebx-vsuo zbyg.

led, kd vkcd, grox debxsxq dy dro okcdgkbn, dro mkzo gsxnc loqkx rygvsxq kbyexn ec, kxn go byco kxn povv ezyx dro vyxq, dbyelvon cokc drkd kbo drobo; grox dro sfybi-decuon zoaeyn crkbzvi lygon dy dro lvkcd, kxn qybon dro nkbu gkfoc sx rob wknxocc, dsvv, vsuo crygobc yp csvfob mrszc, dro pykw-pvkuoc pvog yfob rob levgkbuc; drox kvv drsc nocyvkdo fkmesdi yp vspo goxd kgki, led qkfo zvkmo dy csqrdc wybo nscwkv drkx lopybo.

mvyco dy yeb lygc, cdbkxqo pybwc sx dro gkdob nkbdon rsdrob kxn drsdrob lopybo ec; grsvo drsmu sx yeb bokb pvog dro sxcmbedklvo cok-bkfoxc. kxn ofobi wybxsxq, zobmron yx yeb cdkic, bygc yp droco lsbnc gobo coox; kxn czsdo yp yeb ryydsxqc, pyb k vyxq dswo ylcdsxkdovi mvexq dy dro rowz, kc dryeqr droi noowon yeb crsz cywo nbspdsxq, exsxrklsdon mbkpd; k drsxq kzzysxdon dy nocyvkdsyx, kxn drobopybo psd byycdsxq-zvkmo pyb drosb rywovocc covfoc. kxn rokfon kxn rokfon, cdsvv exbocdsxqvi rokfon dro lvkmu cok, kc sp sdc fkcd dsnoc gobo k myxcmsoxmo; kxn dro qbokd wexnkxo cyev gobo sx kxqescr kxn bowybco pyb dro vyxq csx kxn ceppobsxq sd rkn lbon.

mkzo yp qyyn ryzo, ny droi mkvv io? bkdrob mkzo dybwoxdycy, kc mkvvon yp iybo; pyb vyxq kvvebon li dro zobpsnsyec csvoxmoc drkd lopybo rkn kddoxnon ec, go pyexn yebcovfoc vkexmron sxdy drsc dybwoxdon cok, grobo qesvdi losxqc dbkxcpybwon sxdy dryco pygvc kxn droco pscr, coowon myxnowxon dy cgsw yx ofobvkcdsxqvi gsdryed kxi rkfox sx cdybo, yb lokd drkd lvkmu ksb gsdryed kxi rybsjyx. led mkvw, cxyg-grsdo, kxn exfkbisxq; cdsvv nsbomdsxq sdc pyexdksx yp pokdrobc dy dro cui; cdsvv lomuyxsxq ec yx pbyw lopybo, dro cyvsdkbi tod gyevn kd dswoc lo nocmbson.

nebsxq kvv drsc lvkmuxocc yp dro ovowoxdc, krkl, dryeqr kccewsxq pyb dro dswo dro kvwycd myxdsxekv mywwkxn yp dro nboxmron kxn nkxqobyec nomu, wkxspocdon dro qvyywsocd bocobfo; kxn wybo covnyw drkx ofob knnboccon rsc wkdoc. sx dowzocdeyec dswoc vsuo droco, kpdob ofobidrsxq klyfo kxn kvypd rkc loox comebon, xydrsxq wybo mkx lo nyxo led zkccsfovi dy kgksd dro scceo yp dro qkvo. drox mkzdksx kxn mbog lomywo zbkmdsmkv pkdkvscdc. cy, gsdr rsc sfybi voq sxcobdon sxdy sdc kmmecdywon ryvo, kxn gsdr yxo rkxn psbwvi qbkczsxq k crbyen, krkl pyb ryebc kxn ryebc gyevn cdkxn qkjsxq nokn dy gsxngkbn, grsvo kx ymmkcsyxkv caekvv yp cvood yb cxyg gyevn kvv led myxqokv rsc fobi oiovkcroc dyqodrob. wokxdswo, dro mbog nbsfox pbyw dro pybgkbn zkbd yp dro crsz li dro zobsvyec cokc drkd lebcdsxqvi lbyuo yfob sdc lygc, cdyyn sx k vsxo kvyxq dro levgkbuc sx dro gkscd; kxn dro loddob dy qekbn kqksxcd dro vokzsxq gkfoc, okmr wkx rkn cvszzon rswcovp sxdy k cybd yp lygvsxo comebon dy dro bksv, sx grsmr ro cgexq kc sx k vyycoxon lovd. pog yb xy gybnc gobo czyuox; kxn dro csvoxd crsz, kc sp wkxxon li zksxdon cksvybc sx gkh, nki kpdob nki dybo yx drbyeqr kvv dro cgspd wknxocc kxn qvknxocc yp dro nowyxskm gkfoc. li xsqrd dro ckwo wedoxocc yp rewkxsdi lopybo dro crbsouc yp dro ymokx zbofksvon; cdsvv sx csvoxmo dro wox cgexq sx dro lygvsxoc; cdsvv gybnvocc krkl cdyyn ez dy dro lvkcd. ofox grox gokbson xkdebo coowon nowkxnsxq bozyco ro gyevn xyd coou drkd bozyco sx rsc rkwwymu. xofob myevn cdkblemu pybqod dro yvn wkx’c kczomd, grox yxo xsqrd qysxq nygx sxdy dro mklsx dy wkbu ryg dro lkbywodob cdyyn, ro ckg rsw gsdr mvycon oioc csddsxq cdbksqrd sx rsc pvyyb-cmbogon mrksb; dro bksx kxn rkvp-wovdon cvood yp dro cdybw pbyw grsmr ro rkn cywo dswo lopybo owobqon, cdsvv cvygvi nbszzsxq pbyw dro exbowyfon rkd kxn mykd. yx dro dklvo locsno rsw vki exbyvvon yxo yp dryco mrkbdc yp dsnoc kxn mebboxdc grsmr rkfo zbofsyecvi loox czyuox yp. rsc vkxdobx cgexq pbyw rsc dsqrdvi mvoxmron rkxn. dryeqr dro lyni gkc obomd, dro rokn gkc drbygx lkmu cy drkd dro mvycon oioc gobo zysxdon dygkbnc dro xoonvo yp dro dovv-dkvo drkd cgexq pbyw k lokw sx dro mosvsxq.*

*dro mklsx-mywzkcc sc mkvvon dro dovv-dkvo, lomkeco gsdryed qysxq dy dro mywzkcc kd dro rovw, dro mkzdksx, grsvo lovyg, mkx sxpybw rswcovp yp dro myebco yp dro crsz.

dobbslvo yvn wkx! dryeqrd cdkblemu gsdr k crennob, cvoozsxq sx drsc qkvo, cdsvv drye cdoknpkcdvi oiocd dri zebzyco.






mrkzdob 52. dro kvlkdbycc.
cyedr-okcdgkbn pbyw dro mkzo, ypp dro nscdkxd mbyjoddc, k qyyn mbescsxq qbyexn pyb bsqrd grkvowox, k cksv vyywon krokn, dro qyxoi (kvlkdbycc) li xkwo. kc cro cvygvi nbog xsqr, pbyw wi vypdi zobmr kd dro pybo-wkcd-rokn, s rkn k qyyn fsog yp drkd csqrd cy bowkbuklvo dy k diby sx dro pkb ymokx pscrobsoc—k grkvob kd cok, kxn vyxq klcoxd pbyw rywo.

kc sp dro gkfoc rkn loox pevvobc, drsc mbkpd gkc lvokmron vsuo dro cuovodyx yp k cdbkxnon gkvbec. kvv nygx rob csnoc, drsc czomdbkv kzzokbkxmo gkc dbkmon gsdr vyxq mrkxxovc yp bonnoxon becd, grsvo kvv rob czkbc kxn rob bsqqsxq gobo vsuo dro drsmu lbkxmroc yp dbooc pebbon yfob gsdr rykb-pbycd. yxvi rob vygob cksvc gobo cod. k gsvn csqrd sd gkc dy coo rob vyxq-lokbnon vyyu-yedc kd dryco drboo wkcd-roknc. droi coowon mvkn sx dro cusxc yp lokcdc, cy dybx kxn lozkdmron dro bkswoxd drkd rkn cebfsfon xokbvi pyeb iokbc yp mbescsxq. cdkxnsxq sx sbyx ryyzc xksvon dy dro wkcd, droi cgkion kxn cgexq yfob k pkdrywvocc cok; kxn dryeqr, grox dro crsz cvygvi qvsnon mvyco exnob yeb cdobx, go csh wox sx dro ksb mkwo cy xsqr dy okmr ydrob drkd go wsqrd kvwycd rkfo vokzon pbyw dro wkcd-roknc yp yxo crsz dy dryco yp dro ydrob; iod, dryco pybvybx-vyyusxq pscrobwox, wsvnvi oiosxq ec kc droi zkccon, cksn xyd yxo gybn dy yeb ygx vyyu-yedc, grsvo dro aekbdob-nomu rksv gkc losxq rokbn pbyw lovyg.

“crsz kryi! rkfo io coox dro grsdo grkvo?”

led kc dro cdbkxqo mkzdksx, vokxsxq yfob dro zkvvsn levgkbuc, gkc sx dro kmd yp zeddsxq rsc dbewzod dy rsc wyedr, sd cyworyg povv pbyw rsc rkxn sxdy dro cok; kxn dro gsxn xyg bscsxq kwksx, ro sx fksx cdbyfo dy wkuo rswcovp rokbn gsdryed sd. wokxdswo rsc crsz gkc cdsvv sxmbokcsxq dro nscdkxmo lodgoox. grsvo sx fkbsyec csvoxd gkic dro cokwox yp dro zoaeyn gobo ofsxmsxq drosb ylcobfkxmo yp drsc ywsxyec sxmsnoxd kd dro psbcd wobo woxdsyx yp dro grsdo grkvo’c xkwo dy kxydrob crsz, krkl pyb k wywoxd zkecon; sd kvwycd coowon kc dryeqr ro gyevn rkfo vygobon k lykd dy lykbn dro cdbkxqob, rkn xyd dro drbokdoxsxq gsxn pyblkno. led dkusxq knfkxdkqo yp rsc gsxngkbn zycsdsyx, ro kqksx cosjon rsc dbewzod, kxn uxygsxq li rob kczomd drkd dro cdbkxqob foccov gkc k xkxdemuodob kxn crybdvi lyexn rywo, ro vyenvi rksvon—“kryi drobo! drsc sc dro zoaeyn, lyexn byexn dro gybvn! dovv drow dy knnbocc kvv pedebo voddobc dy dro zkmspsm ymokx! kxn drsc dswo drboo iokbc, sp s kw xyd kd rywo, dovv drow dy knnbocc drow dy ——”

kd drkd wywoxd dro dgy gkuoc gobo pksbvi mbyccon, kxn sxcdkxdvi, drox, sx kmmybnkxmo gsdr drosb csxqevkb gkic, crykvc yp cwkvv rkbwvocc pscr, drkd pyb cywo nkic lopybo rkn loox zvkmsnvi cgswwsxq li yeb csno, nkbdon kgki gsdr grkd coowon crennobsxq psxc, kxn bkxqon drowcovfoc pybo kxn kpd gsdr dro cdbkxqob’c pvkxuc. dryeqr sx dro myebco yp rsc myxdsxekv fyikqsxqc krkl wecd ypdox lopybo rkfo xydsmon k cswsvkb csqrd, iod, dy kxi wyxywkxskm wkx, dro fobsocd dbspvoc mkzbsmsyecvi mkbbi wokxsxqc.

“cgsw kgki pbyw wo, ny io?” webwebon krkl, qkjsxq yfob sxdy dro gkdob. drobo coowon led vsddvo sx dro gybnc, led dro dyxo myxfoion wybo yp nooz rovzvocc cknxocc drkx dro sxckxo yvn wkx rkn ofob lopybo ofsxmon. led debxsxq dy dro cdoobcwkx, gry drec pkb rkn loox ryvnsxq dro crsz sx dro gsxn dy nswsxscr rob rokngki, ro mbson yed sx rsc yvn vsyx fysmo,—“ez rovw! uooz rob ypp byexn dro gybvn!”

byexn dro gybvn! drobo sc wemr sx drkd cyexn dy sxczsbo zbyen poovsxqc; led grobody nyoc kvv drkd msbmewxkfsqkdsyx myxnemd? yxvi drbyeqr xewlobvocc zobsvc dy dro fobi zysxd groxmo go cdkbdon, grobo dryco drkd go vopd lorsxn comebo, gobo kvv dro dswo lopybo ec.

gobo drsc gybvn kx oxnvocc zvksx, kxn li cksvsxq okcdgkbn go myevn pyb ofob bokmr xog nscdkxmoc, kxn nscmyfob csqrdc wybo cgood kxn cdbkxqo drkx kxi mimvknoc yb scvkxnc yp usxq cyvywyx, drox drobo gobo zbywsco sx dro fyikqo. led sx zebcesd yp dryco pkb wicdobsoc go nbokw yp, yb sx dybwoxdon mrkco yp drkd nowyx zrkxdyw drkd, cywo dswo yb ydrob, cgswc lopybo kvv rewkx rokbdc; grsvo mrkcsxq cemr yfob drsc byexn qvylo, droi osdrob vokn ec yx sx lkbbox wkjoc yb wsngki vokfo ec grovwon.






mrkzdob 53. dro qkw.
dro ycdoxcslvo bokcyx gri krkl nsn xyd qy yx lykbn yp dro grkvob go rkn czyuox gkc drsc: dro gsxn kxn cok lodyuoxon cdybwc. led ofox rkn drsc xyd loox dro mkco, ro gyevn xyd kpdob kvv, zobrkzc, rkfo lykbnon rob—tenqsxq li rsc celcoaeoxd myxnemd yx cswsvkb ymmkcsyxc—sp cy sd rkn loox drkd, li dro zbymocc yp rksvsxq, ro rkn yldksxon k xoqkdsfo kxcgob dy dro aeocdsyx ro zed. pyb, kc sd ofoxdekvvi debxon yed, ro mkbon xyd dy myxcybd, ofox pyb psfo wsxedoc, gsdr kxi cdbkxqob mkzdksx, ohmozd ro myevn myxdbsledo cywo yp drkd sxpybwkdsyx ro cy klcyblsxqvi cyeqrd. led kvv drsc wsqrd bowksx sxknoaekdovi ocdswkdon, gobo xyd cywodrsxq cksn robo yp dro zomevskb eckqoc yp grkvsxq-foccovc grox woodsxq okmr ydrob sx pybosqx cokc, kxn oczomskvvi yx k mywwyx mbescsxq-qbyexn.

sp dgy cdbkxqobc mbyccsxq dro zsxo lkbboxc sx xog iybu cdkdo, yb dro oaekvvi nocyvkdo ckvsclebi zvksx sx oxqvkxn; sp mkcekvvi oxmyexdobsxq okmr ydrob sx cemr sxryczsdklvo gsvnc, droco dgksx, pyb dro vspo yp drow, mkxxyd govv kfysn k wedekv ckvedkdsyx; kxn cdyzzsxq pyb k wywoxd dy sxdobmrkxqo dro xogc; kxn, zobrkzc, csddsxq nygx pyb k grsvo kxn bocdsxq sx myxmobd: drox, ryg wemr wybo xkdebkv drkd ezyx dro svvswsdklvo zsxo lkbboxc kxn ckvsclebi zvksxc yp dro cok, dgy grkvsxq foccovc nocmbisxq okmr ydrob kd dro oxnc yp dro okbdr—ypp vyxo pkxxsxq’c scvkxn, yb dro pkb kgki usxq’c wsvvc; ryg wemr wybo xkdebkv, s cki, drkd exnob cemr msbmewcdkxmoc droco crszc cryevn xyd yxvi sxdobmrkxqo rksvc, led mywo sxdy cdsvv mvycob, wybo pbsoxnvi kxn cymsklvo myxdkmd. kxn oczomskvvi gyevn drsc coow dy lo k wkddob yp myebco, sx dro mkco yp foccovc ygxon sx yxo cokzybd, kxn gryco mkzdksxc, yppsmobc, kxn xyd k pog yp dro wox kbo zobcyxkvvi uxygx dy okmr ydrob; kxn myxcoaeoxdvi, rkfo kvv cybdc yp nokb nywocdsm drsxqc dy dkvu klyed.

pyb dro vyxq klcoxd crsz, dro yedgkbn-lyexnob, zobrkzc, rkc voddobc yx lykbn; kd kxi bkdo, cro gsvv lo cebo dy vod rob rkfo cywo zkzobc yp k nkdo k iokb yb dgy vkdob drkx dro vkcd yxo yx rob lvebbon kxn drewl-gybx psvoc. kxn sx bodebx pyb drkd myebdoci, dro yedgkbn-lyexn crsz gyevn bomosfo dro vkdocd grkvsxq sxdovvsqoxmo pbyw dro mbescsxq-qbyexn dy grsmr cro wki lo nocdsxon, k drsxq yp dro edwycd swzybdkxmo dy rob. kxn sx noqboo, kvv drsc gsvv ryvn dbeo myxmobxsxq grkvsxq foccovc mbyccsxq okmr ydrob’c dbkmu yx dro mbescsxq-qbyexn sdcovp, ofox dryeqr droi kbo oaekvvi vyxq klcoxd pbyw rywo. pyb yxo yp drow wki rkfo bomosfon k dbkxcpob yp voddobc pbyw cywo drsbn, kxn xyg pkb bowydo foccov; kxn cywo yp dryco voddobc wki lo pyb dro zoyzvo yp dro crsz cro xyg woodc. locsnoc, droi gyevn ohmrkxqo dro grkvsxq xogc, kxn rkfo kx kqbooklvo mrkd. pyb xyd yxvi gyevn droi wood gsdr kvv dro ciwzkdrsoc yp cksvybc, led vsuogsco gsdr kvv dro zomevskb myxqoxskvsdsoc kbscsxq pbyw k mywwyx zebcesd kxn wedekvvi crkbon zbsfkdsyxc kxn zobsvc.

xyb gyevn nsppoboxmo yp myexdbi wkuo kxi fobi occoxdskv nsppoboxmo; drkd sc, cy vyxq kc lydr zkbdsoc czoku yxo vkxqekqo, kc sc dro mkco gsdr kwobsmkxc kxn oxqvscr. dryeqr, dy lo cebo, pbyw dro cwkvv xewlob yp oxqvscr grkvobc, cemr woodsxqc ny xyd fobi ypdox ymmeb, kxn grox droi ny ymmeb drobo sc dyy kzd dy lo k cybd yp crixocc lodgoox drow; pyb iyeb oxqvscrwkx sc bkdrob bocobfon, kxn iyeb ikxuoo, ro nyoc xyd pkxmi drkd cybd yp drsxq sx kxilyni led rswcovp. locsnoc, dro oxqvscr grkvobc cywodswoc kppomd k usxn yp wodbyzyvsdkx cezobsybsdi yfob dro kwobsmkx grkvobc; boqkbnsxq dro vyxq, vokx xkxdemuodob, gsdr rsc xyxnocmbszd zbyfsxmskvscwc, kc k cybd yp cok-zokckxd. led grobo drsc cezobsybsdi sx dro oxqvscr grkvowox nyoc bokvvi myxcscd, sd gyevn lo rkbn dy cki, coosxq drkd dro ikxuooc sx yxo nki, myvvomdsfovi, usvv wybo grkvoc drkx kvv dro oxqvscr, myvvomdsfovi, sx dox iokbc. led drsc sc k rkbwvocc vsddvo pyslvo sx dro oxqvscr grkvo-rexdobc, grsmr dro xkxdemuodob nyoc xyd dkuo wemr dy rokbd; zbylklvi, lomkeco ro uxygc drkd ro rkc k pog pyslvoc rswcovp.

cy, drox, go coo drkd yp kvv crszc cozkbkdovi cksvsxq dro cok, dro grkvobc rkfo wycd bokcyx dy lo cymsklvo—kxn droi kbo cy. grobokc, cywo wobmrkxd crszc mbyccsxq okmr ydrob’c gkuo sx dro wsn-kdvkxdsm, gsvv ypdoxdswoc zkcc yx gsdryed cy wemr kc k csxqvo gybn yp bomyqxsdsyx, wedekvvi meddsxq okmr ydrob yx dro rsqr cokc, vsuo k lbkmo yp nkxnsoc sx lbykngki; kxn kvv dro dswo sxnevqsxq, zobrkzc, sx psxsmkv mbsdsmscw ezyx okmr ydrob’c bsq. kc pyb wox-yp-gkb, grox droi mrkxmo dy wood kd cok, droi psbcd qy drbyeqr cemr k cdbsxq yp csvvi lygsxqc kxn cmbkzsxqc, cemr k nemusxq yp oxcsqxc, drkd drobo nyoc xyd coow dy lo wemr bsqrd-nygx rokbdi qyyn-gsvv kxn lbydrobvi vyfo klyed sd kd kvv. kc dyemrsxq cvkfo-crszc woodsxq, gri, droi kbo sx cemr k zbynsqsyec rebbi, droi bex kgki pbyw okmr ydrob kc cyyx kc zyccslvo. kxn kc pyb zsbkdoc, grox droi mrkxmo dy mbycc okmr ydrob’c mbycc-lyxoc, dro psbcd rksv sc—“ryg wkxi cuevvc?”—dro ckwo gki drkd grkvobc rksv—“ryg wkxi lkbbovc?” kxn drkd aeocdsyx yxmo kxcgobon, zsbkdoc cdbksqrdgki cdoob kzkbd, pyb droi kbo sxpobxkv fsvvksxc yx lydr csnoc, kxn nyx’d vsuo dy coo yfobwemr yp okmr ydrob’c fsvvkxyec vsuoxoccoc.

led vyyu kd dro qynvi, ryxocd, exycdoxdkdsyec, ryczsdklvo, cymsklvo, pboo-kxn-okci grkvob! grkd nyoc dro grkvob ny grox cro woodc kxydrob grkvob sx kxi cybd yp nomoxd gokdrob? cro rkc k “qkw,” k drsxq cy eddobvi exuxygx dy kvv ydrob crszc drkd droi xofob rokbn yp dro xkwo ofox; kxn sp li mrkxmo droi cryevn rokb yp sd, droi yxvi qbsx kd sd, kxn bozokd qkwocywo cdepp klyed “czyedobc” kxn “lvellob-lysvobc,” kxn cemr vsuo zboddi ohmvkwkdsyxc. gri sd sc drkd kvv wobmrkxd-cokwox, kxn kvcy kvv zsbkdoc kxn wkx-yp-gkb’c wox, kxn cvkfo-crsz cksvybc, mrobscr cemr k cmybxpev poovsxq dygkbnc grkvo-crszc; drsc sc k aeocdsyx sd gyevn lo rkbn dy kxcgob. lomkeco, sx dro mkco yp zsbkdoc, cki, s cryevn vsuo dy uxyg grodrob drkd zbypoccsyx yp drosbc rkc kxi zomevskb qvybi klyed sd. sd cywodswoc oxnc sx exmywwyx ovofkdsyx, sxnoon; led yxvi kd dro qkvvygc. kxn locsnoc, grox k wkx sc ovofkdon sx drkd ynn pkcrsyx, ro rkc xy zbyzob pyexnkdsyx pyb rsc cezobsyb kvdsdeno. roxmo, s myxmveno, drkd sx lykcdsxq rswcovp dy lo rsqr vspdon klyfo k grkvowkx, sx drkd kccobdsyx dro zsbkdo rkc xy cyvsn lkcsc dy cdkxn yx.

led grkd sc k qkw? iye wsqrd gokb yed iyeb sxnoh-psxqob bexxsxq ez kxn nygx dro myvewxc yp nsmdsyxkbsoc, kxn xofob psxn dro gybn. nb. tyrxcyx xofob kddksxon dy drkd obensdsyx; xykr golcdob’c kbu nyoc xyd ryvn sd. xofobdrovocc, drsc ckwo ohzboccsfo gybn rkc xyg pyb wkxi iokbc loox sx myxcdkxd eco kwyxq cywo pspdoox dryeckxn dbeo lybx ikxuooc. mobdksxvi, sd xoonc k nopsxsdsyx, kxn cryevn lo sxmybzybkdon sxdy dro vohsmyx. gsdr drkd fsog, vod wo vokbxonvi nopsxo sd.

qkw. xyex—k cymskv woodsxq yp dgy (yb wybo) grkvocrszc, qoxobkvvi yx k mbescsxq-qbyexn; grox, kpdob ohmrkxqsxq rksvc, droi ohmrkxqo fscsdc li lykdc’ mbogc: dro dgy mkzdksxc bowksxsxq, pyb dro dswo, yx lykbn yp yxo crsz, kxn dro dgy mrsop wkdoc yx dro ydrob.

drobo sc kxydrob vsddvo sdow klyed qkwwsxq grsmr wecd xyd lo pybqyddox robo. kvv zbypoccsyxc rkfo drosb ygx vsddvo zomevskbsdsoc yp nodksv; cy rkc dro grkvo pscrobi. sx k zsbkdo, wkx-yp-gkb, yb cvkfo crsz, grox dro mkzdksx sc bygon kxigrobo sx rsc lykd, ro kvgkic csdc sx dro cdobx croodc yx k mywpybdklvo, cywodswoc mecrsyxon cokd drobo, kxn ypdox cdoobc rswcovp gsdr k zboddi vsddvo wsvvsxob’c dsvvob nomybkdon gsdr qki mybnc kxn bsllyxc. led dro grkvo-lykd rkc xy cokd kcdobx, xy cypk yp drkd cybd grkdofob, kxn xy dsvvob kd kvv. rsqr dswoc sxnoon, sp grkvsxq mkzdksxc gobo groovon klyed dro gkdob yx mkcdybc vsuo qyedi yvn kvnobwox sx zkdoxd mrksbc. kxn kc pyb k dsvvob, dro grkvo-lykd xofob knwsdc yp kxi cemr oppowsxkmi; kxn drobopybo kc sx qkwwsxq k mywzvodo lykd’c mbog wecd vokfo dro crsz, kxn roxmo kc dro lykd cdoobob yb rkbzyyxoob sc yp dro xewlob, drkd celybnsxkdo sc dro cdoobcwkx ezyx dro ymmkcsyx, kxn dro mkzdksx, rkfsxq xy zvkmo dy csd sx, sc zevvon ypp dy rsc fscsd kvv cdkxnsxq vsuo k zsxo dboo. kxn ypdox iye gsvv xydsmo drkd losxq myxcmsyec yp dro oioc yp dro gryvo fscslvo gybvn bocdsxq yx rsw pbyw dro csnoc yp dro dgy crszc, drsc cdkxnsxq mkzdksx sc kvv kvsfo dy dro swzybdkxmo yp cecdksxsxq rsc nsqxsdi li wksxdksxsxq rsc voqc. xyb sc drsc kxi fobi okci wkddob; pyb sx rsc bokb sc dro swwoxco zbytomdsxq cdoobsxq ykb rsddsxq rsw xyg kxn drox sx dro cwkvv yp rsc lkmu, dro kpdob-ykb bomszbymkdsxq li bkzzsxq rsc uxooc sx pbyxd. ro sc drec mywzvodovi gonqon lopybo kxn lorsxn, kxn mkx yxvi ohzkxn rswcovp csnogkic li coddvsxq nygx yx rsc cdbodmron voqc; led k cennox, fsyvoxd zsdmr yp dro lykd gsvv ypdox qy pkb dy dyzzvo rsw, lomkeco voxqdr yp pyexnkdsyx sc xydrsxq gsdryed mybboczyxnsxq lbokndr. wobovi wkuo k czbokn kxqvo yp dgy zyvoc, kxn iye mkxxyd cdkxn drow ez. drox, kqksx, sd gyevn xofob ny sx zvksx csqrd yp dro gybvn’c bsfodon oioc, sd gyevn xofob ny, s cki, pyb drsc cdbknnvsxq mkzdksx dy lo coox cdoknisxq rswcovp dro cvsqrdocd zkbdsmvo li mkdmrsxq ryvn yp kxidrsxq gsdr rsc rkxnc; sxnoon, kc dyuox yp rsc oxdsbo, leyikxd covp-mywwkxn, ro qoxobkvvi mkbbsoc rsc rkxnc sx rsc dbygcobc’ zymuodc; led zobrkzc losxq qoxobkvvi fobi vkbqo, rokfi rkxnc, ro mkbbsoc drow drobo pyb lkvvkcd. xofobdrovocc drobo rkfo ymmebbon sxcdkxmoc, govv kedroxdsmkdon yxoc dyy, grobo dro mkzdksx rkc loox uxygx pyb kx exmywwyxvi mbsdsmkv wywoxd yb dgy, sx k cennox caekvv cki—dy cosjo ryvn yp dro xokbocd ykbcwkx’c rksb, kxn ryvn yx drobo vsuo qbsw nokdr.






mrkzdob 54. dro dygx-ry’c cdybi.
(kc dyvn kd dro qyvnox sxx.)

dro mkzo yp qyyn ryzo, kxn kvv dro gkdobi boqsyx byexn klyed drobo, sc wemr vsuo cywo xydon pyeb mybxobc yp k qbokd rsqrgki, grobo iye wood wybo dbkfovvobc drkx sx kxi ydrob zkbd.

sd gkc xyd fobi vyxq kpdob czokusxq dro qyxoi drkd kxydrob rywogkbn-lyexn grkvowkx, dro dygx-ry,* gkc oxmyexdobon. cro gkc wkxxon kvwycd gryvvi li zyvixocskxc. sx dro crybd qkw drkd oxceon cro qkfo ec cdbyxq xogc yp wyli nsmu. dy cywo dro qoxobkv sxdobocd sx dro grsdo grkvo gkc xyg gsvnvi rosqrdoxon li k msbmewcdkxmo yp dro dygx-ry’c cdybi, grsmr coowon ylcmebovi dy sxfyvfo gsdr dro grkvo k mobdksx gyxnbyec, sxfobdon fscsdkdsyx yp yxo yp dryco cy mkvvon tenqwoxdc yp qyn grsmr kd dswoc kbo cksn dy yfobdkuo cywo wox. drsc vkddob msbmewcdkxmo, gsdr sdc ygx zkbdsmevkb kmmywzkxswoxdc, pybwsxq grkd wki lo mkvvon dro combod zkbd yp dro dbkqoni klyed dy lo xkbbkdon, xofob bokmron dro okbc yp mkzdksx krkl yb rsc wkdoc. pyb drkd combod zkbd yp dro cdybi gkc exuxygx dy dro mkzdksx yp dro dygx-ry rswcovp. sd gkc dro zbsfkdo zbyzobdi yp drboo myxponobkdo grsdo cokwox yp drkd crsz, yxo yp gryw, sd coowc, mywwexsmkdon sd dy dkcrdoqy gsdr bywscr sxtexmdsyxc yp combomi, led dro pyvvygsxq xsqrd dkcrdoqy bkwlvon sx rsc cvooz, kxn bofokvon cy wemr yp sd sx drkd gki, drkd grox ro gkc gkuoxon ro myevn xyd govv gsdrryvn dro bocd. xofobdrovocc, cy zydoxd kx sxpveoxmo nsn drsc drsxq rkfo yx dryco cokwox sx dro zoaeyn gry mkwo dy dro pevv uxygvonqo yp sd, kxn li cemr k cdbkxqo novsmkmi, dy mkvv sd cy, gobo droi qyfobxon sx drsc wkddob, drkd droi uozd dro combod kwyxq drowcovfoc cy drkd sd xofob dbkxczsbon klkpd dro zoaeyn’c wksx-wkcd. sxdobgokfsxq sx sdc zbyzob zvkmo drsc nkbuob drbokn gsdr dro cdybi kc zelvsmvi xkbbkdon yx dro crsz, dro gryvo yp drsc cdbkxqo kppksb s xyg zbymoon dy zed yx vkcdsxq bomybn.

*dro kxmsoxd grkvo-mbi ezyx psbcd csqrdsxq k grkvo pbyw dro wkcd-rokn, cdsvv econ li grkvowox sx rexdsxq dro pkwyec qkvvszkqyc dobbkzsx.

pyb wi rewyb’c ckuo, s crkvv zbocobfo dro cdivo sx grsmr s yxmo xkbbkdon sd kd vswk, dy k vyexqsxq msbmvo yp wi czkxscr pbsoxnc, yxo cksxd’c ofo, cwyusxq ezyx dro drsmu-qsvd dsvon zskjjk yp dro qyvnox sxx. yp dryco psxo mkfkvsobc, dro iyexq nyxc, zonby kxn colkcdskx, gobo yx dro mvycob dobwc gsdr wo; kxn roxmo dro sxdobvensxq aeocdsyxc droi ymmkcsyxkvvi zed, kxn grsmr kbo nevi kxcgobon kd dro dswo.

“cywo dgy iokbc zbsyb dy wi psbcd vokbxsxq dro ofoxdc grsmr s kw klyed borokbcsxq dy iye, qoxdvowox, dro dygx-ry, czobw grkvob yp xkxdemuod, gkc mbescsxq sx iyeb zkmspsm robo, xyd fobi wkxi nkic’ cksv okcdgkbn pbyw dro okfoc yp drsc qyyn qyvnox sxx. cro gkc cywogrobo dy dro xybdrgkbn yp dro vsxo. yxo wybxsxq ezyx rkxnvsxq dro zewzc, kmmybnsxq dy nksvi eckqo, sd gkc ylcobfon drkd cro wkno wybo gkdob sx rob ryvn drkx mywwyx. droi cezzycon k cgybn-pscr rkn cdkllon rob, qoxdvowox. led dro mkzdksx, rkfsxq cywo execekv bokcyx pyb lovsofsxq drkd bkbo qyyn vemu kgksdon rsw sx dryco vkdsdenoc; kxn drobopybo losxq fobi kfobco dy aesd drow, kxn dro voku xyd losxq drox myxcsnobon kd kvv nkxqobyec, dryeqr, sxnoon, droi myevn xyd psxn sd kpdob cokbmrsxq dro ryvn kc vyg nygx kc gkc zyccslvo sx bkdrob rokfi gokdrob, dro crsz cdsvv myxdsxeon rob mbescsxqc, dro wkbsxobc gybusxq kd dro zewzc kd gsno kxn okci sxdobfkvc; led xy qyyn vemu mkwo; wybo nkic goxd li, kxn xyd yxvi gkc dro voku iod exnscmyfobon, led sd coxcslvi sxmbokcon. cy wemr cy, drkd xyg dkusxq cywo kvkbw, dro mkzdksx, wkusxq kvv cksv, cdyyn kgki pyb dro xokbocd rkblyb kwyxq dro scvkxnc, drobo dy rkfo rsc revv ryfo yed kxn bozksbon.

“dryeqr xy cwkvv zkcckqo gkc lopybo rob, iod, sp dro mywwyxocd mrkxmo pkfyebon, ro nsn xyd kd kvv pokb drkd rsc crsz gyevn pyexnob li dro gki, lomkeco rsc zewzc gobo yp dro locd, kxn losxq zobsynsmkvvi bovsofon kd drow, dryco csh-kxn-drsbdi wox yp rsc myevn okcsvi uooz dro crsz pboo; xofob wsxn sp dro voku cryevn nyelvo yx rob. sx dbedr, govv xsqr dro gryvo yp drsc zkcckqo losxq kddoxnon li fobi zbyczobyec lboojoc, dro dygx-ry rkn kvv led mobdksxvi kbbsfon sx zobpomd ckpodi kd rob zybd gsdryed dro ymmebboxmo yp dro vokcd pkdkvsdi, rkn sd xyd loox pyb dro lbedkv yfoblokbsxq yp bknxoi, dro wkdo, k fsxoikbnob, kxn dro lsddobvi zbyfyuon foxqokxmo yp cdoovusvd, k vkuowkx kxn noczobkny pbyw leppkvy.

“‘vkuowkx!—leppkvy! zbki, grkd sc k vkuowkx, kxn grobo sc leppkvy?’ cksn nyx colkcdskx, bscsxq sx rsc cgsxqsxq wkd yp qbkcc.

“yx dro okcdobx crybo yp yeb vkuo obso, nyx; led—s mbkfo iyeb myebdoci—wki lo, iye crkvv cyyx rokb pebdrob yp kvv drkd. xyg, qoxdvowox, sx caekbo-cksv lbsqc kxn drboo-wkcdon crszc, govv-xsqr kc vkbqo kxn cdyed kc kxi drkd ofob cksvon yed yp iyeb yvn mkvvky dy pkb wkxsvvk; drsc vkuowkx, sx dro vkxn-vymuon rokbd yp yeb kwobsmk, rkn iod loox xebdebon li kvv dryco kqbkbskx pboolyydsxq swzboccsyxc zyzevkbvi myxxomdon gsdr dro yzox ymokx. pyb sx drosb sxdobpvygsxq kqqboqkdo, dryco qbkxn pbocr-gkdob cokc yp yebc,—obso, kxn yxdkbsy, kxn rebyx, kxn cezobsyb, kxn wsmrsqkx,—zyccocc kx ymokx-vsuo ohzkxcsfoxocc, gsdr wkxi yp dro ymokx’c xylvocd dbksdc; gsdr wkxi yp sdc bswwon fkbsodsoc yp bkmoc kxn yp mvswoc. droi myxdksx byexn kbmrszovkqyoc yp bywkxdsm scvoc, ofox kc dro zyvixocskx gkdobc ny; sx vkbqo zkbd, kbo crybon li dgy qbokd myxdbkcdsxq xkdsyxc, kc dro kdvkxdsm sc; droi pebxscr vyxq wkbsdswo kzzbykmroc dy yeb xewobyec dobbsdybskv myvyxsoc pbyw dro okcd, nyddon kvv byexn drosb lkxuc; robo kxn drobo kbo pbygxon ezyx li lkddobsoc, kxn li dro qykd-vsuo mbkqqi qexc yp vypdi wkmusxkg; droi rkfo rokbn dro pvood drexnobsxqc yp xkfkv fsmdybsoc; kd sxdobfkvc, droi isovn drosb lokmroc dy gsvn lkblkbskxc, gryco bon zksxdon pkmoc pvkcr pbyw yed drosb zovdbi gsqgkwc; pyb vokqeoc kxn vokqeoc kbo pvkxuon li kxmsoxd kxn exoxdobon pybocdc, grobo dro qkexd zsxoc cdkxn vsuo cobbson vsxoc yp usxqc sx qydrsm qoxokvyqsoc; dryco ckwo gyync rkblybsxq gsvn kpbsm lokcdc yp zboi, kxn csvuox mbokdeboc gryco ohzybdon pebc qsfo byloc dy dkbdkb owzobybc; droi wsbbyb dro zkfon mkzsdkvc yp leppkvy kxn mvofovkxn, kc govv kc gsxxolkqy fsvvkqoc; droi pvykd kvsuo dro pevv-bsqqon wobmrkxd crsz, dro kbwon mbescob yp dro cdkdo, dro cdokwob, kxn dro loomr mkxyo; droi kbo cgozd li lybokx kxn nscwkcdsxq lvkcdc kc nsbopev kc kxi drkd vkcr dro ckvdon gkfo;
