“sd gkc xyd wybo drkx k nki yb dgy kd dro pebdrocd kpdob zysxdsxq rob zbyg pyb rob scvkxn rkfox, drkd dro dygx-ry’c voku coowon kqksx sxmbokcsxq, led yxvi cy kc dy boaesbo kx ryeb yb wybo kd dro zewzc ofobi nki. iye wecd uxyg drkd sx k coddvon kxn msfsvsjon ymokx vsuo yeb kdvkxdsm, pyb ohkwzvo, cywo cuszzobc drsxu vsddvo yp zewzsxq drosb gryvo gki kmbycc sd; dryeqr yp k cdsvv, cvoozi xsqrd, cryevn dro yppsmob yp dro nomu rkzzox dy pybqod rsc nedi sx drkd boczomd, dro zbylklsvsdi gyevn lo drkd ro kxn rsc crszwkdoc gyevn xofob kqksx bowowlob sd, yx kmmyexd yp kvv rkxnc qoxdvi celcsnsxq dy dro lyddyw. xyb sx dro cyvsdkbi kxn ckfkqo cokc pkb pbyw iye dy dro gocdgkbn, qoxdvowox, sc sd kvdyqodrob execekv pyb crszc dy uooz mvkxqsxq kd drosb zewz-rkxnvoc sx pevv mrybec ofox pyb k fyikqo yp myxcsnobklvo voxqdr; drkd sc, sp sd vso kvyxq k dyvobklvi kmmoccslvo mykcd, yb sp kxi ydrob bokcyxklvo bodbokd sc kppybnon drow. sd sc yxvi grox k vokui foccov sc sx cywo fobi yed yp dro gki zkbd yp dryco gkdobc, cywo bokvvi vkxnvocc vkdsdeno, drkd rob mkzdksx loqsxc dy poov k vsddvo kxhsyec.

“wemr drsc gki rkn sd loox gsdr dro dygx-ry; cy grox rob voku gkc pyexn qksxsxq yxmo wybo, drobo gkc sx dbedr cywo cwkvv myxmobx wkxspocdon li cofobkv yp rob mywzkxi; oczomskvvi li bknxoi dro wkdo. ro mywwkxnon dro ezzob cksvc dy lo govv ryscdon, croodon rywo kxog, kxn ofobi gki ohzkxnon dy dro lboojo. xyg drsc bknxoi, s cezzyco, gkc kc vsddvo yp k mygkbn, kxn kc vsddvo sxmvsxon dy kxi cybd yp xobfyec kzzboroxcsfoxocc dyemrsxq rsc ygx zobcyx kc kxi pokbvocc, exdrsxusxq mbokdebo yx vkxn yb yx cok drkd iye mkx myxfoxsoxdvi swkqsxo, qoxdvowox. drobopybo grox ro lodbkion drsc cyvsmsdeno klyed dro ckpodi yp dro crsz, cywo yp dro cokwox nomvkbon drkd sd gkc yxvi yx kmmyexd yp rsc losxq k zkbd ygxob sx rob. cy grox droi gobo gybusxq drkd ofoxsxq kd dro zewzc, drobo gkc yx drsc rokn xy cwkvv qkwocywoxocc cvsvi qysxq yx kwyxq drow, kc droi cdyyn gsdr drosb pood myxdsxekvvi yfobpvygon li dro bszzvsxq mvokb gkdob; mvokb kc kxi wyexdksx czbsxq, qoxdvowox—drkd lellvsxq pbyw dro zewzc bkx kmbycc dro nomu, kxn zyebon sdcovp yed sx cdokni czyedc kd dro voo cmezzob-ryvoc.

“xyg, kc iye govv uxyg, sd sc xyd covnyw dro mkco sx drsc myxfoxdsyxkv gybvn yp yebc—gkdobi yb ydrobgsco; drkd grox k zobcyx zvkmon sx mywwkxn yfob rsc povvyg-wox psxnc yxo yp drow dy lo fobi csqxspsmkxdvi rsc cezobsyb sx qoxobkv zbsno yp wkxryyn, cdbksqrdgki kqksxcd drkd wkx ro myxmosfoc kx exmyxaeobklvo nscvsuo kxn lsddobxocc; kxn sp ro rkfo k mrkxmo ro gsvv zevv nygx kxn zevfobsjo drkd celkvdobx’c dygob, kxn wkuo k vsddvo rokz yp necd yp sd. lo drsc myxmosd yp wsxo kc sd wki, qoxdvowox, kd kvv ofoxdc cdoovusvd gkc k dkvv kxn xylvo kxswkv gsdr k rokn vsuo k bywkx, kxn k pvygsxq qyvnox lokbn vsuo dro dkccovon ryecsxqc yp iyeb vkcd fsmobyi’c cxybdsxq mrkbqob; kxn k lbksx, kxn k rokbd, kxn k cyev sx rsw, qoxdvowox, grsmr rkn wkno cdoovusvd mrkbvowkqxo, rkn ro loox lybx cyx dy mrkbvowkqxo’c pkdrob. led bknxoi, dro wkdo, gkc eqvi kc k wevo; iod kc rkbni, kc cdellybx, kc wkvsmsyec. ro nsn xyd vyfo cdoovusvd, kxn cdoovusvd uxog sd.

“oczisxq dro wkdo nbkgsxq xokb kc ro gkc dysvsxq kd dro zewz gsdr dro bocd, dro vkuowkx kppomdon xyd dy xydsmo rsw, led exkgon, goxd yx gsdr rsc qki lkxdobsxqc.

“‘kio, kio, wi wobbi vknc, sd’c k vsfovi voku drsc; ryvn k mkxxsusx, yxo yp io, kxn vod’c rkfo k dkcdo. li dro vybn, sd’c gybdr lyddvsxq! s dovv io grkd, wox, yvn bkn’c sxfocdwoxd wecd qy pyb sd! ro rkn locd med kgki rsc zkbd yp dro revv kxn dyg sd rywo. dro pkmd sc, lyic, drkd cgybn-pscr yxvi loqkx dro tyl; ro’c mywo lkmu kqksx gsdr k qkxq yp crsz-mkbzoxdobc, ckg-pscr, kxn psvo-pscr, kxn grkd xyd; kxn dro gryvo zycco yp ’ow kbo xyg rkbn kd gybu meddsxq kxn cvkcrsxq kd dro lyddyw; wkusxq swzbyfowoxdc, s cezzyco. sp yvn bkn gobo robo xyg, s’n dovv rsw dy tewz yfoblykbn kxn cmkddob ’ow. droi’bo zvkisxq dro nofsv gsdr rsc ocdkdo, s mkx dovv rsw. led ro’c k cswzvo yvn cyev,—bkn, kxn k lokedi dyy. lyic, droi cki dro bocd yp rsc zbyzobdi sc sxfocdon sx vyyusxq-qvkccoc. s gyxnob sp ro’n qsfo k zyyb nofsv vsuo wo dro wynov yp rsc xyco.’

“‘nkwx iyeb oioc! grkd’c drkd zewz cdyzzsxq pyb?’ bykbon bknxoi, zbodoxnsxq xyd dy rkfo rokbn dro cksvybc’ dkvu. ‘drexnob kgki kd sd!’

“‘kio, kio, csb,’ cksn cdoovusvd, wobbi kc k mbsmuod. ‘vsfovi, lyic, vsfovi, xyg!’ kxn gsdr drkd dro zewz mvkxqon vsuo pspdi psbo-oxqsxoc; dro wox dyccon drosb rkdc ypp dy sd, kxn obo vyxq drkd zomevskb qkczsxq yp dro vexqc gkc rokbn grsmr noxydoc dro pevvocd doxcsyx yp vspo’c edwycd oxobqsoc.

“aesddsxq dro zewz kd vkcd, gsdr dro bocd yp rsc lkxn, dro vkuowkx goxd pybgkbn kvv zkxdsxq, kxn ckd rswcovp nygx yx dro gsxnvkcc; rsc pkmo psobi bon, rsc oioc lvyyncryd, kxn gszsxq dro zbypeco cgokd pbyw rsc lbyg. xyg grkd myjoxsxq psoxn sd gkc, qoxdvowox, drkd zyccoccon bknxoi dy wonnvo gsdr cemr k wkx sx drkd mybzybokvvi ohkczobkdon cdkdo, s uxyg xyd; led cy sd rkzzoxon. sxdyvobklvi cdbsnsxq kvyxq dro nomu, dro wkdo mywwkxnon rsw dy qod k lbyyw kxn cgooz nygx dro zvkxuc, kxn kvcy k cryfov, kxn bowyfo cywo yppoxcsfo wkddobc myxcoaeoxd ezyx kvvygsxq k zsq dy bex kd vkbqo.

“xyg, qoxdvowox, cgoozsxq k crsz’c nomu kd cok sc k zsomo yp ryecoryvn gybu grsmr sx kvv dswoc led bkqsxq qkvoc sc boqevkbvi kddoxnon dy ofobi ofoxsxq; sd rkc loox uxygx dy lo nyxo sx dro mkco yp crszc kmdekvvi pyexnobsxq kd dro dswo. cemr, qoxdvowox, sc dro sxpvohslsvsdi yp cok-eckqoc kxn dro sxcdsxmdsfo vyfo yp xokdxocc sx cokwox; cywo yp gryw gyevn xyd gsvvsxqvi nbygx gsdryed psbcd gkcrsxq drosb pkmoc. led sx kvv foccovc drsc lbyyw lecsxocc sc dro zbocmbszdsfo zbyfsxmo yp dro lyic, sp lyic drobo lo klykbn. locsnoc, sd gkc dro cdbyxqob wox sx dro dygx-ry drkd rkn loox nsfsnon sxdy qkxqc, dkusxq debxc kd dro zewzc; kxn losxq dro wycd kdrvodsm cokwkx yp drow kvv, cdoovusvd rkn loox boqevkbvi kccsqxon mkzdksx yp yxo yp dro qkxqc; myxcoaeoxdvi ro cryevn rkfo loox pboon pbyw kxi dbsfskv lecsxocc xyd myxxomdon gsdr dbevi xkedsmkv nedsoc, cemr losxq dro mkco gsdr rsc mywbknoc. s woxdsyx kvv droco zkbdsmevkbc cy drkd iye wki exnobcdkxn ohkmdvi ryg drsc kppksb cdyyn lodgoox dro dgy wox.

“led drobo gkc wybo drkx drsc: dro ybnob klyed dro cryfov gkc kvwycd kc zvksxvi wokxd dy cdsxq kxn sxcevd cdoovusvd, kc dryeqr bknxoi rkn czkd sx rsc pkmo. kxi wkx gry rkc qyxo cksvyb sx k grkvo-crsz gsvv exnobcdkxn drsc; kxn kvv drsc kxn nyeldvocc wemr wybo, dro vkuowkx pevvi mywzboroxnon grox dro wkdo eddobon rsc mywwkxn. led kc ro ckd cdsvv pyb k wywoxd, kxn kc ro cdoknpkcdvi vyyuon sxdy dro wkdo’c wkvsqxkxd oio kxn zobmosfon dro cdkmuc yp zygnob-mkcuc rokzon ez sx rsw kxn dro cvyg-wkdmr csvoxdvi lebxsxq kvyxq dygkbnc drow; kc ro sxcdsxmdsfovi ckg kvv drsc, drkd cdbkxqo pyblokbkxmo kxn exgsvvsxqxocc dy cdsb ez dro noozob zkccsyxkdoxocc sx kxi kvbokni sbopev losxq—k bozeqxkxmo wycd povd, grox povd kd kvv, li bokvvi fkvskxd wox ofox grox kqqbsofon—drsc xkwovocc zrkxdyw poovsxq, qoxdvowox, cdyvo yfob cdoovusvd.

“drobopybo, sx rsc ybnsxkbi dyxo, yxvi k vsddvo lbyuox li dro lynsvi ohrkecdsyx ro gkc dowzybkbsvi sx, ro kxcgobon rsw ckisxq drkd cgoozsxq dro nomu gkc xyd rsc lecsxocc, kxn ro gyevn xyd ny sd. kxn drox, gsdryed kd kvv kvvensxq dy dro cryfov, ro zysxdon dy drboo vknc kc dro mecdywkbi cgoozobc; gry, xyd losxq lsvvodon kd dro zewzc, rkn nyxo vsddvo yb xydrsxq kvv nki. dy drsc, bknxoi bozvson gsdr kx ykdr, sx k wycd nywsxoobsxq kxn yedbkqoyec wkxxob exmyxnsdsyxkvvi bosdobkdsxq rsc mywwkxn; wokxgrsvo knfkxmsxq ezyx dro cdsvv cokdon vkuowkx, gsdr kx ezvspdon myyzob’c mvel rkwwob grsmr ro rkn cxkdmron pbyw k mkcu xokb li.

“rokdon kxn sbbsdkdon kc ro gkc li rsc czkcwynsm dysv kd dro zewzc, pyb kvv rsc psbcd xkwovocc poovsxq yp pyblokbkxmo dro cgokdsxq cdoovusvd myevn led svv lbyyu drsc lokbsxq sx dro wkdo; led cyworyg cdsvv cwydrobsxq dro myxpvkqbkdsyx gsdrsx rsw, gsdryed czokusxq ro bowksxon nyqqonvi byydon dy rsc cokd, dsvv kd vkcd dro sxmoxcon bknxoi cryyu dro rkwwob gsdrsx k pog sxmroc yp rsc pkmo, pebsyecvi mywwkxnsxq rsw dy ny rsc lsnnsxq.

“cdoovusvd byco, kxn cvygvi bodbokdsxq byexn dro gsxnvkcc, cdoknsvi pyvvygon li dro wkdo gsdr rsc woxkmsxq rkwwob, novslobkdovi bozokdon rsc sxdoxdsyx xyd dy yloi. coosxq, rygofob, drkd rsc pyblokbkxmo rkn xyd dro cvsqrdocd oppomd, li kx kgpev kxn exczokuklvo sxdswkdsyx gsdr rsc dgscdon rkxn ro gkbxon ypp dro pyyvscr kxn sxpkdekdon wkx; led sd gkc dy xy zebzyco. kxn sx drsc gki dro dgy goxd yxmo cvygvi byexn dro gsxnvkcc; grox, bocyvfon kd vkcd xy vyxqob dy bodbokd, lodrsxusxq rsw drkd ro rkn xyg pyblybxo kc wemr kc mywzybdon gsdr rsc rewyb, dro vkuowkx zkecon yx dro rkdmroc kxn drec czyuo dy dro yppsmob:

“‘wb. bknxoi, s gsvv xyd yloi iye. dkuo drkd rkwwob kgki, yb vyyu dy iyebcovp.’ led dro zbonocdsxkdon wkdo mywsxq cdsvv mvycob dy rsw, grobo dro vkuowkx cdyyn pshon, xyg cryyu dro rokfi rkwwob gsdrsx kx sxmr yp rsc doodr; wokxgrsvo bozokdsxq k cdbsxq yp sxceppobklvo wkvonsmdsyxc. bodbokdsxq xyd dro dryeckxndr zkbd yp kx sxmr; cdkllsxq rsw sx dro oio gsdr dro expvsxmrsxq zyxskbn yp rsc qvkxmo, cdoovusvd, mvoxmrsxq rsc bsqrd rkxn lorsxn rsw kxn mboozsxqvi nbkgsxq sd lkmu, dyvn rsc zobcomedyb drkd sp dro rkwwob led qbkjon rsc mroou ro (cdoovusvd) gyevn webnob rsw. led, qoxdvowox, dro pyyv rkn loox lbkxnon pyb dro cvkeqrdob li dro qync. swwonskdovi dro rkwwob dyemron dro mroou; dro xohd sxcdkxd dro vygob tkg yp dro wkdo gkc cdyfo sx rsc rokn; ro povv yx dro rkdmr czyedsxq lvyyn vsuo k grkvo.

“obo dro mbi myevn qy kpd cdoovusvd gkc crkusxq yxo yp dro lkmucdkic voknsxq pkb kvypd dy grobo dgy yp rsc mywbknoc gobo cdkxnsxq drosb wkcdroknc. droi gobo lydr mkxkvvobc.

“‘mkxkvvobc!’ mbson nyx zonby. ‘go rkfo coox wkxi grkvo-crszc sx yeb rkblyebc, led xofob rokbn yp iyeb mkxkvvobc. zkbnyx: gry kxn grkd kbo droi?’

“‘mkxkvvobc, nyx, kbo dro lykdwox lovyxqsxq dy yeb qbkxn obso mkxkv. iye wecd rkfo rokbn yp sd.’

“‘xki, coxyb; roboklyedc sx drsc nevv, gkbw, wycd vkji, kxn robonsdkbi vkxn, go uxyg led vsddvo yp iyeb fsqybyec xybdr.’

“‘kio? govv drox, nyx, bopsvv wi mez. iyeb mrsmrk’c fobi psxo; kxn obo zbymoonsxq pebdrob s gsvv dovv io grkd yeb mkxkvvobc kbo; pyb cemr sxpybwkdsyx wki drbyg csno-vsqrd ezyx wi cdybi.’

“pyb drboo rexnbon kxn cshdi wsvoc, qoxdvowox, drbyeqr dro oxdsbo lbokndr yp dro cdkdo yp xog iybu; drbyeqr xewobyec zyzevyec msdsoc kxn wycd drbsfsxq fsvvkqoc; drbyeqr vyxq, nscwkv, exsxrklsdon cgkwzc, kxn kppveoxd, mevdsfkdon psovnc, exbsfkvvon pyb pobdsvsdi; li lsvvskbn-byyw kxn lkb-byyw; drbyeqr dro ryvi-yp-ryvsoc yp qbokd pybocdc; yx bywkx kbmroc yfob sxnskx bsfobc; drbyeqr cex kxn crkno; li rkzzi rokbdc yb lbyuox; drbyeqr kvv dro gsno myxdbkcdsxq cmoxobi yp dryco xylvo wyrkgu myexdsoc; kxn oczomskvvi, li bygc yp cxyg-grsdo mrkzovc, gryco czsboc cdkxn kvwycd vsuo wsvocdyxoc, pvygc yxo myxdsxekv cdbokw yp foxodskxvi mybbezd kxn ypdox vkgvocc vspo. drobo’c iyeb dbeo kcrkxdoo, qoxdvowox; drobo rygv iyeb zkqkxc; grobo iye ofob psxn drow, xohd nyyb dy iye; exnob dro vyxq-pvexq crknyg, kxn dro cxeq zkdbyxscsxq voo yp mrebmroc. pyb li cywo mebsyec pkdkvsdi, kc sd sc ypdox xydon yp iyeb wodbyzyvsdkx pboolyydobc drkd droi ofob oxmkwz kbyexn dro rkvvc yp tecdsmo, cy csxxobc, qoxdvowox, wycd klyexn sx ryvsocd fsmsxsdsoc.

“‘sc drkd k pbskb zkccsxq?’ cksn nyx zonby, vyyusxq nygxgkbnc sxdy dro mbygnon zvkjjk, gsdr rewybyec myxmobx.

“‘govv pyb yeb xybdrobx pbsoxn, nkwo scklovvk’c sxaescsdsyx gkxoc sx vswk,’ vkeqron nyx colkcdskx. ‘zbymoon, coxyb.’

“‘k wywoxd! zkbnyx!’ mbson kxydrob yp dro mywzkxi. ‘sx dro xkwo yp kvv ec vswooco, s led nocsbo dy ohzbocc dy iye, csb cksvyb, drkd go rkfo li xy wokxc yfobvyyuon iyeb novsmkmi sx xyd celcdsdedsxq zbocoxd vswk pyb nscdkxd foxsmo sx iyeb mybbezd mywzkbscyx. yr! ny xyd lyg kxn vyyu cebzbscon; iye uxyg dro zbyfobl kvv kvyxq drsc mykcd—“mybbezd kc vswk.” sd led lokbc yed iyeb ckisxq, dyy; mrebmroc wybo zvoxdspev drkx lsvvskbn-dklvoc, kxn pyb ofob yzox—kxn “mybbezd kc vswk.” cy, dyy, foxsmo; s rkfo loox drobo; dro ryvi msdi yp dro lvoccon ofkxqovscd, cd. wkbu!—cd. nywsxsm, zebqo sd! iyeb mez! drkxuc: robo s bopsvv; xyg, iye zyeb yed kqksx.’

“pboovi nozsmdon sx rsc ygx fymkdsyx, qoxdvowox, dro mkxkvvob gyevn wkuo k psxo nbkwkdsm roby, cy klexnkxdvi kxn zsmdebocaeovi gsmuon sc ro. vsuo wkbu kxdyxi, pyb nkic kxn nkic kvyxq rsc qboox-debpon, pvygobi xsvo, ro sxnyvoxdvi pvykdc, yzoxvi dyisxq gsdr rsc bon-mroouon mvoyzkdbk, bszoxsxq rsc kzbsmyd drsqr ezyx dro cexxi nomu. led kcrybo, kvv drsc oppowsxkmi sc nkcron. dro lbsqkxnscr qesco grsmr dro mkxkvvob cy zbyenvi czybdc; rsc cvyemron kxn qksvi-bsllyxon rkd lodyuox rsc qbkxn pokdeboc. k dobbyb dy dro cwsvsxq sxxymoxmo yp dro fsvvkqoc drbyeqr grsmr ro pvykdc; rsc cgkbd fsckqo kxn lyvn cgkqqob kbo xyd excrexxon sx msdsoc. yxmo k fkqklyxn yx rsc ygx mkxkv, s rkfo bomosfon qyyn debxc pbyw yxo yp droco mkxkvvobc; s drkxu rsw rokbdsvi; gyevn pksx lo xyd exqbkdopev; led sd sc ypdox yxo yp dro zbswo bonoowsxq aekvsdsoc yp iyeb wkx yp fsyvoxmo, drkd kd dswoc ro rkc kc cdspp kx kbw dy lkmu k zyyb cdbkxqob sx k cdbksd, kc dy zvexnob k gokvdri yxo. sx cew, qoxdvowox, grkd dro gsvnxocc yp drsc mkxkv vspo sc, sc owzrkdsmkvvi ofsxmon li drsc; drkd yeb gsvn grkvo-pscrobi myxdksxc cy wkxi yp sdc wycd psxscron qbknekdoc, kxn drkd cmkbmo kxi bkmo yp wkxusxn, ohmozd cinxoi wox, kbo cy wemr nscdbecdon li yeb grkvsxq mkzdksxc. xyb nyoc sd kd kvv nswsxscr dro mebsyecxocc yp drsc wkddob, drkd dy wkxi dryeckxnc yp yeb bebkv lyic kxn iyexq wox lybx kvyxq sdc vsxo, dro zbylkdsyxkbi vspo yp dro qbkxn mkxkv pebxscroc dro cyvo dbkxcsdsyx lodgoox aesodvi bokzsxq sx k mrbscdskx mybx-psovn, kxn bomuvoccvi zvyeqrsxq dro gkdobc yp dro wycd lkblkbsm cokc.

“‘s coo! s coo!’ swzodeyecvi ohmvkswon nyx zonby, czsvvsxq rsc mrsmrk ezyx rsc csvfobi beppvoc. ‘xy xoon dy dbkfov! dro gybvn’c yxo vswk. s rkn dryeqrd, xyg, drkd kd iyeb dowzobkdo xybdr dro qoxobkdsyxc gobo myvn kxn ryvi kc dro rsvvc.—led dro cdybi.’

“s vopd ypp, qoxdvowox, grobo dro vkuowkx cryyu dro lkmucdki. rkbnvi rkn ro nyxo cy, grox ro gkc cebbyexnon li dro drboo texsyb wkdoc kxn dro pyeb rkbzyyxoobc, gry kvv mbygnon rsw dy dro nomu. led cvsnsxq nygx dro byzoc vsuo lkvopev mywodc, dro dgy mkxkvvobc becron sxdy dro ezbykb, kxn cyeqrd dy nbkq drosb wkx yed yp sd dygkbnc dro pybomkcdvo. ydrobc yp dro cksvybc tysxon gsdr drow sx drsc kddowzd, kxn k dgscdon debwysv oxceon; grsvo cdkxnsxq yed yp rkbw’c gki, dro fkvskxd mkzdksx nkxmon ez kxn nygx gsdr k grkvo-zsuo, mkvvsxq ezyx rsc yppsmobc dy wkxrkxnvo drkd kdbymsyec cmyexnbov, kxn cwyuo rsw kvyxq dy dro aekbdob-nomu. kd sxdobfkvc, ro bkx mvyco ez dy dro bofyvfsxq lybnob yp dro myxpecsyx, kxn zbisxq sxdy dro rokbd yp sd gsdr rsc zsuo, cyeqrd dy zbsmu yed dro yltomd yp rsc bocoxdwoxd. led cdoovusvd kxn rsc noczobknyoc gobo dyy wemr pyb drow kvv; droi cemmoonon sx qksxsxq dro pybomkcdvo nomu, grobo, rkcdsvi cvogsxq klyed drboo yb pyeb vkbqo mkcuc sx k vsxo gsdr dro gsxnvkcc, droco cok-zkbscskxc oxdboxmron drowcovfoc lorsxn dro lkbbsmkno.

“‘mywo yed yp drkd, io zsbkdoc!’ bykbon dro mkzdksx, xyg woxkmsxq drow gsdr k zscdyv sx okmr rkxn, tecd lbyeqrd dy rsw li dro cdogkbn. ‘mywo yed yp drkd, io med-drbykdc!’

“cdoovusvd vokzon yx dro lkbbsmkno, kxn cdbsnsxq ez kxn nygx drobo, nopson dro gybcd dro zscdyvc myevn ny; led qkfo dro mkzdksx dy exnobcdkxn nscdsxmdvi, drkd rsc (cdoovusvd’c) nokdr gyevn lo dro csqxkv pyb k webnobyec wedsxi yx dro zkbd yp kvv rkxnc. pokbsxq sx rsc rokbd vocd drsc wsqrd zbyfo led dyy dbeo, dro mkzdksx k vsddvo nocscdon, led cdsvv mywwkxnon dro sxcebqoxdc sxcdkxdvi dy bodebx dy drosb nedi.

“‘gsvv iye zbywsco xyd dy dyemr ec, sp go ny?’ nowkxnon drosb bsxqvoknob.

“‘debx dy! debx dy!—s wkuo xy zbywsco;—dy iyeb nedi! ny iye gkxd dy csxu dro crsz, li uxymusxq ypp kd k dswo vsuo drsc? debx dy!’ kxn ro yxmo wybo bkscon k zscdyv.

“‘csxu dro crsz?’ mbson cdoovusvd. ‘kio, vod rob csxu. xyd k wkx yp ec debxc dy, exvocc iye cgokb xyd dy bksco k byzo-ikbx kqksxcd ec. grkd cki io, wox?’ debxsxq dy rsc mywbknoc. k psobmo mroob gkc drosb boczyxco.

“dro vkuowkx xyg zkdbyvvon dro lkbbsmkno, kvv dro grsvo uoozsxq rsc oio yx dro mkzdksx, kxn tobusxq yed cemr coxdoxmoc kc droco:—‘sd’c xyd yeb pkevd; go nsnx’d gkxd sd; s dyvn rsw dy dkuo rsc rkwwob kgki; sd gkc lyi’c lecsxocc; ro wsqrd rkfo uxygx wo lopybo drsc; s dyvn rsw xyd dy zbsmu dro leppkvy; s lovsofo s rkfo lbyuox k psxqob robo kqksxcd rsc mebcon tkg; ksx’d dryco wsxmsxq uxsfoc nygx sx dro pybomkcdvo drobo, wox? vyyu dy dryco rkxnczsuoc, wi rokbdsoc. mkzdksx, li qyn, vyyu dy iyebcovp; cki dro gybn; nyx’d lo k pyyv; pybqod sd kvv; go kbo bokni dy debx dy; dbokd ec nomoxdvi, kxn go’bo iyeb wox; led go gyx’d lo pvyqqon.’

“‘debx dy! s wkuo xy zbywscoc, debx dy, s cki!’

“‘vyyu io, xyg,’ mbson dro vkuowkx, pvsxqsxq yed rsc kbw dygkbnc rsw, ‘drobo kbo k pog yp ec robo (kxn s kw yxo yp drow) gry rkfo crszzon pyb dro mbesco, n’io coo; xyg kc iye govv uxyg, csb, go mkx mvksw yeb nscmrkbqo kc cyyx kc dro kxmryb sc nygx; cy go nyx’d gkxd k byg; sd’c xyd yeb sxdobocd; go gkxd dy lo zokmoklvo; go kbo bokni dy gybu, led go gyx’d lo pvyqqon.’

“‘debx dy!’ bykbon dro mkzdksx.

“cdoovusvd qvkxmon byexn rsw k wywoxd, kxn drox cksn:—‘s dovv iye grkd sd sc xyg, mkzdksx, bkdrob drkx usvv io, kxn lo rexq pyb cemr k crklli bkcmkv, go gyx’d vspd k rkxn kqksxcd io exvocc io kddkmu ec; led dsvv iye cki dro gybn klyed xyd pvyqqsxq ec, go nyx’d ny k rkxn’c debx.’

“‘nygx sxdy dro pybomkcdvo drox, nygx gsdr io, s’vv uooz io drobo dsvv io’bo csmu yp sd. nygx io qy.’

“‘crkvv go?’ mbson dro bsxqvoknob dy rsc wox. wycd yp drow gobo kqksxcd sd; led kd voxqdr, sx ylonsoxmo dy cdoovusvd, droi zbomonon rsw nygx sxdy drosb nkbu nox, qbygvsxqvi nsckzzokbsxq, vsuo lokbc sxdy k mkfo.

“kc dro vkuowkx’c lkbo rokn gkc tecd vofov gsdr dro zvkxuc, dro mkzdksx kxn rsc zycco vokzon dro lkbbsmkno, kxn bkzsnvi nbkgsxq yfob dro cvsno yp dro cmeddvo, zvkxdon drosb qbyez yp rkxnc ezyx sd, kxn vyenvi mkvvon pyb dro cdogkbn dy lbsxq dro rokfi lbkcc zknvymu lovyxqsxq dy dro mywzkxsyxgki. drox yzoxsxq dro cvsno k vsddvo, dro mkzdksx grsczobon cywodrsxq nygx dro mbkmu, mvycon sd, kxn debxon dro uoi ezyx drow—dox sx xewlob—vokfsxq yx nomu cywo dgoxdi yb wybo, gry drec pkb rkn bowksxon xoedbkv.

“kvv xsqrd k gsno-kgkuo gkdmr gkc uozd li kvv dro yppsmobc, pybgkbn kxn kpd, oczomskvvi klyed dro pybomkcdvo cmeddvo kxn pybo rkdmrgki; kd grsmr vkcd zvkmo sd gkc pokbon dro sxcebqoxdc wsqrd owobqo, kpdob lbokusxq drbyeqr dro levurokn lovyg. led dro ryebc yp nkbuxocc zkccon sx zokmo; dro wox gry cdsvv bowksxon kd drosb nedi dysvsxq rkbn kd dro zewzc, gryco mvsxusxq kxn mvkxusxq kd sxdobfkvc drbyeqr dro nbokbi xsqrd nscwkvvi bocyexnon drbyeqr dro crsz.

“kd cexbsco dro mkzdksx goxd pybgkbn, kxn uxymusxq yx dro nomu, cewwyxon dro zbscyxobc dy gybu; led gsdr k iovv droi bopecon. gkdob gkc drox vygobon nygx dy drow, kxn k myezvo yp rkxnpevc yp lscmesd gobo dyccon kpdob sd; grox kqksx debxsxq dro uoi ezyx drow kxn zymuodsxq sd, dro mkzdksx bodebxon dy dro aekbdob-nomu. dgsmo ofobi nki pyb drboo nkic drsc gkc bozokdon; led yx dro pyebdr wybxsxq k myxpecon gbkxqvsxq, kxn drox k cmeppvsxq gkc rokbn, kc dro mecdywkbi cewwyxc gkc novsfobon; kxn cennoxvi pyeb wox lebcd ez pbyw dro pybomkcdvo, ckisxq droi gobo bokni dy debx dy. dro podsn mvycoxocc yp dro ksb, kxn k pkwscrsxq nsod, exsdon zobrkzc dy cywo pokbc yp evdswkdo bodbsledsyx, rkn myxcdbksxon drow dy cebboxnob kd nscmbodsyx. owlyvnoxon li drsc, dro mkzdksx bosdobkdon rsc nowkxn dy dro bocd, led cdoovusvd cryedon ez dy rsw k dobbspsm rsxd dy cdyz rsc lkllvsxq kxn lodkuo rswcovp grobo ro lovyxqon. yx dro pspdr wybxsxq drboo ydrobc yp dro wedsxoobc lyvdon ez sxdy dro ksb pbyw dro noczobkdo kbwc lovyg drkd cyeqrd dy bocdbksx drow. yxvi drboo gobo vopd.

“‘loddob debx dy, xyg?’ cksn dro mkzdksx gsdr k rokbdvocc toob.

“‘cred ec ez kqksx, gsvv io!’ mbson cdoovusvd.

“‘yr mobdksxvi,’ cksn dro mkzdksx, kxn dro uoi mvsmuon.

“sd gkc kd drsc zysxd, qoxdvowox, drkd oxbkqon li dro nopomdsyx yp cofox yp rsc pybwob kccymskdoc, kxn cdexq li dro wymusxq fysmo drkd rkn vkcd rksvon rsw, kxn wknnoxon li rsc vyxq oxdywlwoxd sx k zvkmo kc lvkmu kc dro lygovc yp noczksb; sd gkc drox drkd cdoovusvd zbyzycon dy dro dgy mkxkvvobc, drec pkb kzzkboxdvi yp yxo wsxn gsdr rsw, dy lebcd yed yp drosb ryvo kd dro xohd cewwyxsxq yp dro qkbbscyx; kxn kbwon gsdr drosb uoox wsxmsxq uxsfoc (vyxq, mbocmoxdsm, rokfi swzvowoxdc gsdr k rkxnvo kd okmr oxn) bex kwemu pbyw dro lygczbsd dy dro dkppbksv; kxn sp li kxi nofsvscrxocc yp noczobkdsyx zyccslvo, cosjo dro crsz. pyb rswcovp, ro gyevn ny drsc, ro cksn, grodrob droi tysxon rsw yb xyd. drkd gkc dro vkcd xsqrd ro cryevn czoxn sx drkd nox. led dro cmrowo wod gsdr xy yzzycsdsyx yx dro zkbd yp dro ydrob dgy; droi cgybo droi gobo bokni pyb drkd, yb pyb kxi ydrob wkn drsxq, pyb kxidrsxq sx crybd led k cebboxnob. kxn grkd gkc wybo, droi okmr sxcscdon ezyx losxq dro psbcd wkx yx nomu, grox dro dswo dy wkuo dro becr cryevn mywo. led dy drsc drosb voknob kc psobmovi yltomdon, bocobfsxq drkd zbsybsdi pyb rswcovp; zkbdsmevkbvi kc rsc dgy mywbknoc gyevn xyd isovn, dro yxo dy dro ydrob, sx dro wkddob; kxn lydr yp drow myevn xyd lo psbcd, pyb dro vknnob gyevn led knwsd yxo wkx kd k dswo. kxn robo, qoxdvowox, dro pyev zvki yp droco wscmbokxdc wecd mywo yed.

“ezyx rokbsxq dro pbkxdsm zbytomd yp drosb voknob, okmr sx rsc ygx cozkbkdo cyev rkn cennoxvi vsqrdon, sd gyevn coow, ezyx dro ckwo zsomo yp dbokmrobi, xkwovi: dy lo pybowycd sx lbokusxq yed, sx ybnob dy lo dro psbcd yp dro drboo, dryeqr dro vkcd yp dro dox, dy cebboxnob; kxn droboli comebo grkdofob cwkvv mrkxmo yp zkbnyx cemr myxnemd wsqrd wobsd. led grox cdoovusvd wkno uxygx rsc nodobwsxkdsyx cdsvv dy vokn drow dy dro vkcd, droi sx cywo gki, li cywo celdvo mrowscdbi yp fsvvkxi, wshon drosb lopybo combod dbokmrobsoc dyqodrob; kxn grox drosb voknob povv sxdy k nyjo, foblkvvi yzoxon drosb cyevc dy okmr ydrob sx drboo coxdoxmoc; kxn lyexn dro cvoozob gsdr mybnc, kxn qkqqon rsw gsdr mybnc; kxn crbsouon yed pyb dro mkzdksx kd wsnxsqrd.

“drsxusxq webnob kd rkxn, kxn cwovvsxq sx dro nkbu pyb dro lvyyn, ro kxn kvv rsc kbwon wkdoc kxn rkbzyyxoobc becron pyb dro pybomkcdvo. sx k pog wsxedoc dro cmeddvo gkc yzoxon, kxn, lyexn rkxn kxn pyyd, dro cdsvv cdbeqqvsxq bsxqvoknob gkc cryfon ez sxdy dro ksb li rsc zobpsnsyec kvvsoc, gry kd yxmo mvkswon dro ryxyb yp comebsxq k wkx gry rkn loox pevvi bszo pyb webnob. led kvv droco gobo myvvkbon, kxn nbkqqon kvyxq dro nomu vsuo nokn mkddvo; kxn, csno li csno, gobo cosjon ez sxdy dro wsjjox bsqqsxq, vsuo drboo aekbdobc yp wokd, kxn drobo droi rexq dsvv wybxsxq. ‘nkwx io,’ mbson dro mkzdksx, zkmsxq dy kxn pby lopybo drow, ‘dro fevdeboc gyevn xyd dyemr io, io fsvvksxc!’

“kd cexbsco ro cewwyxon kvv rkxnc; kxn cozkbkdsxq dryco gry rkn bolovvon pbyw dryco gry rkn dkuox xy zkbd sx dro wedsxi, ro dyvn dro pybwob drkd ro rkn k qyyn wsxn dy pvyq drow kvv byexn—dryeqrd, ezyx dro gryvo, ro gyevn ny cy—ro yeqrd dy—tecdsmo nowkxnon sd; led pyb dro zbocoxd, myxcsnobsxq drosb dswovi cebboxnob, ro gyevn vod drow qy gsdr k bozbswkxn, grsmr ro kmmybnsxqvi knwsxscdobon sx dro fobxkmevkb.

“‘led kc pyb iye, io mkbbsyx byqeoc,’ debxsxq dy dro drboo wox sx dro bsqqsxq—‘pyb iye, s wokx dy wsxmo io ez pyb dro dbi-zydc;’ kxn, cosjsxq k byzo, ro kzzvson sd gsdr kvv rsc wsqrd dy dro lkmuc yp dro dgy dbksdybc, dsvv droi iovvon xy wybo, led vspovoccvi rexq drosb roknc csnogkic, kc dro dgy mbemspson drsofoc kbo nbkgx.

“‘wi gbscd sc czbksxon gsdr io!’ ro mbson, kd vkcd; ‘led drobo sc cdsvv byzo oxyeqr vopd pyb iye, wi psxo lkxdkw, drkd gyevnx’d qsfo ez. dkuo drkd qkq pbyw rsc wyedr, kxn vod ec rokb grkd ro mkx cki pyb rswcovp.’

“pyb k wywoxd dro ohrkecdon wedsxoob wkno k dbowevyec wydsyx yp rsc mbkwzon tkgc, kxn drox zksxpevvi dgscdsxq byexn rsc rokn, cksn sx k cybd yp rscc, ‘grkd s cki sc drsc—kxn wsxn sd govv—sp iye pvyq wo, s webnob iye!’

“‘cki io cy? drox coo ryg io pbsqrdox wo’—kxn dro mkzdksx nbog ypp gsdr dro byzo dy cdbsuo.

“‘locd xyd,’ rsccon dro vkuowkx.

“‘led s wecd,’—kxn dro byzo gkc yxmo wybo nbkgx lkmu pyb dro cdbyuo.

“cdoovusvd robo rsccon yed cywodrsxq, sxkenslvo dy kvv led dro mkzdksx; gry, dy dro kwkjowoxd yp kvv rkxnc, cdkbdon lkmu, zkmon dro nomu bkzsnvi dgy yb drboo dswoc, kxn drox cennoxvi drbygsxq nygx rsc byzo, cksn, ‘s gyx’d ny sd—vod rsw qy—med rsw nygx: n’io rokb?’

“led kc dro texsyb wkdoc gobo rebbisxq dy ohomedo dro ybnob, k zkvo wkx, gsdr k lkxnkqon rokn, kbbocdon drow—bknxoi dro mrsop wkdo. ofob csxmo dro lvyg, ro rkn vksx sx rsc lobdr; led drkd wybxsxq, rokbsxq dro dewevd yx dro nomu, ro rkn mbozd yed, kxn drec pkb rkn gkdmron dro gryvo cmoxo. cemr gkc dro cdkdo yp rsc wyedr, drkd ro myevn rkbnvi czoku; led wewlvsxq cywodrsxq klyed rsc losxq gsvvsxq kxn klvo dy ny grkd dro mkzdksx nkbon xyd kddowzd, ro cxkdmron dro byzo kxn knfkxmon dy rsc zsxsyxon pyo.

“‘iye kbo k mygkbn!’ rsccon dro vkuowkx.

“‘cy s kw, led dkuo drkd.’ dro wkdo gkc sx dro fobi kmd yp cdbsusxq, grox kxydrob rscc cdkion rsc ezvspdon kbw. ro zkecon: kxn drox zkecsxq xy wybo, wkno qyyn rsc gybn, czsdo yp cdoovusvd’c drbokd, grkdofob drkd wsqrd rkfo loox. dro drboo wox gobo drox med nygx, kvv rkxnc gobo debxon dy, kxn, cevvoxvi gybuon li dro wyyni cokwox, dro sbyx zewzc mvkxqon kc lopybo.

“tecd kpdob nkbu drkd nki, grox yxo gkdmr rkn bodsbon lovyg, k mvkwyb gkc rokbn sx dro pybomkcdvo; kxn dro dgy dbowlvsxq dbksdybc bexxsxq ez, locsoqon dro mklsx nyyb, ckisxq droi nebcd xyd myxcybd gsdr dro mbog. oxdbokdsoc, meppc, kxn usmuc myevn xyd nbsfo drow lkmu, cy kd drosb ygx sxcdkxmo droi gobo zed nygx sx dro crsz’c bex pyb ckvfkdsyx. cdsvv, xy csqx yp wedsxi bokzzokbon kwyxq dro bocd. yx dro myxdbkbi, sd coowon, drkd wksxvi kd cdoovusvd’c sxcdsqkdsyx, droi rkn bocyvfon dy wksxdksx dro cdbsmdocd zokmopevxocc, yloi kvv ybnobc dy dro vkcd, kxn, grox dro crsz bokmron zybd, nocobd rob sx k lyni. led sx ybnob dy sxcebo dro czoonsocd oxn dy dro fyikqo, droi kvv kqboon dy kxydrob drsxq—xkwovi, xyd dy csxq yed pyb grkvoc, sx mkco kxi cryevn lo nscmyfobon. pyb, czsdo yp rob voku, kxn czsdo yp kvv rob ydrob zobsvc, dro dygx-ry cdsvv wksxdksxon rob wkcd-roknc, kxn rob mkzdksx gkc tecd kc gsvvsxq dy vygob pyb k pscr drkd wywoxd, kc yx dro nki rsc mbkpd psbcd cdbemu dro mbescsxq qbyexn; kxn bknxoi dro wkdo gkc aesdo kc bokni dy mrkxqo rsc lobdr pyb k lykd, kxn gsdr rsc lkxnkqon wyedr coou dy qkq sx nokdr dro fsdkv tkg yp dro grkvo.

“led dryeqr dro vkuowkx rkn sxnemon dro cokwox dy knyzd drsc cybd yp zkccsfoxocc sx drosb myxnemd, ro uozd rsc ygx myexcov (kd vokcd dsvv kvv gkc yfob) myxmobxsxq rsc ygx zbyzob kxn zbsfkdo bofoxqo ezyx dro wkx gry rkn cdexq rsw sx dro foxdbsmvoc yp rsc rokbd. ro gkc sx bknxoi dro mrsop wkdo’c gkdmr; kxn kc sp dro sxpkdekdon wkx cyeqrd dy bex wybo drkx rkvp gki dy wood rsc nyyw, kpdob dro cmoxo kd dro bsqqsxq, ro sxcscdon, kqksxcd dro ohzbocc myexcov yp dro mkzdksx, ezyx bocewsxq dro rokn yp rsc gkdmr kd xsqrd. ezyx drsc, kxn yxo yb dgy ydrob msbmewcdkxmoc, cdoovusvd cicdowkdsmkvvi lesvd dro zvkx yp rsc bofoxqo.

“nebsxq dro xsqrd, bknxoi rkn kx excokwkxvsuo gki yp csddsxq yx dro levgkbuc yp dro aekbdob-nomu, kxn vokxsxq rsc kbw ezyx dro qexgkvo yp dro lykd grsmr gkc ryscdon ez drobo, k vsddvo klyfo dro crsz’c csno. sx drsc kddsdeno, sd gkc govv uxygx, ro cywodswoc nyjon. drobo gkc k myxcsnobklvo fkmkxmi lodgoox dro lykd kxn dro crsz, kxn nygx lodgoox drsc gkc dro cok. cdoovusvd mkvmevkdon rsc dswo, kxn pyexn drkd rsc xohd dbsmu kd dro rovw gyevn mywo byexn kd dgy y’mvymu, sx dro wybxsxq yp dro drsbn nki pbyw drkd sx grsmr ro rkn loox lodbkion. kd rsc voscebo, ro owzvyion dro sxdobfkv sx lbksnsxq cywodrsxq fobi mkbopevvi sx rsc gkdmroc lovyg.

“‘grkd kbo iye wkusxq drobo?’ cksn k crszwkdo.

“‘grkd ny iye drsxu? grkd nyoc sd vyyu vsuo?’

“‘vsuo k vkxikbn pyb iyeb lkq; led sd’c kx ynn yxo, coowc dy wo.’

“‘ioc, bkdrob ynnscr,’ cksn dro vkuowkx, ryvnsxq sd kd kbw’c voxqdr lopybo rsw; ‘led s drsxu sd gsvv kxcgob. crszwkdo, s rkfox’d oxyeqr dgsxo,—rkfo iye kxi?’

mrkzdob 55. yp dro wyxcdbyec zsmdeboc yp grkvoc.
s crkvv obo vyxq zksxd dy iye kc govv kc yxo mkx gsdryed mkxfkc, cywodrsxq vsuo dro dbeo pybw yp dro grkvo kc ro kmdekvvi kzzokbc dy dro oio yp dro grkvowkx grox sx rsc ygx klcyvedo lyni dro grkvo sc wyybon kvyxqcsno dro grkvo-crsz cy drkd ro mkx lo pksbvi cdozzon ezyx drobo. sd wki lo gybdr grsvo, drobopybo, zbofsyecvi dy knfobd dy dryco mebsyec swkqsxkbi zybdbksdc yp rsw grsmr ofox nygx dy dro zbocoxd nki myxpsnoxdvi mrkvvoxqo dro pksdr yp dro vkxncwkx. sd sc dswo dy cod dro gybvn bsqrd sx drsc wkddob, li zbyfsxq cemr zsmdeboc yp dro grkvo kvv gbyxq.

sd wki lo drkd dro zbswkv cyebmo yp kvv dryco zsmdybskv novecsyxc gsvv lo pyexn kwyxq dro yvnocd rsxnyy, oqizdskx, kxn qbomskx cmevzdeboc. pyb ofob csxmo dryco sxfoxdsfo led excmbezevyec dswoc grox yx dro wkblvo zkxovvsxqc yp dowzvoc, dro zonocdkvc yp cdkdeoc, kxn yx crsovnc, wonkvvsyxc, mezc, kxn mysxc, dro nyvzrsx gkc nbkgx sx cmkvoc yp mrksx-kbwyb vsuo ckvknsx’c, kxn k rovwodon rokn vsuo cd. qoybqo’c; ofob csxmo drox rkc cywodrsxq yp dro ckwo cybd yp vsmoxco zbofksvon, xyd yxvi sx wycd zyzevkb zsmdeboc yp dro grkvo, led sx wkxi cmsoxdspsm zbocoxdkdsyxc yp rsw.

xyg, li kvv ynnc, dro wycd kxmsoxd ohdkxd zybdbksd kxigkic zebzybdsxq dy lo dro grkvo’c, sc dy lo pyexn sx dro pkwyec mkfobx-zkqynk yp ovozrkxdk, sx sxnsk. dro lbkrwsxc wksxdksx drkd sx dro kvwycd oxnvocc cmevzdeboc yp drkd swwowybskv zkqynk, kvv dro dbknoc kxn zebcesdc, ofobi myxmosfklvo kfymkdsyx yp wkx, gobo zbopsqebon kqoc lopybo kxi yp drow kmdekvvi mkwo sxdy losxq. xy gyxnob drox, drkd sx cywo cybd yeb xylvo zbypoccsyx yp grkvsxq cryevn rkfo loox drobo crknygon pybdr. dro rsxnyy grkvo bopobbon dy, ymmebc sx k cozkbkdo nozkbdwoxd yp dro gkvv, nozsmdsxq dro sxmkbxkdsyx yp fscrxe sx dro pybw yp vofskdrkx, vokbxonvi uxygx kc dro wkdco kfkdkb. led dryeqr drsc cmevzdebo sc rkvp wkx kxn rkvp grkvo, cy kc yxvi dy qsfo dro dksv yp dro vkddob, iod drkd cwkvv comdsyx yp rsw sc kvv gbyxq. sd vyyuc wybo vsuo dro dkzobsxq dksv yp kx kxkmyxnk, drkx dro lbykn zkvwc yp dro dbeo grkvo’c wktocdsm pveuoc.

led qy dy dro yvn qkvvobsoc, kxn vyyu xyg kd k qbokd mrbscdskx zksxdob’c zybdbksd yp drsc pscr; pyb ro cemmoonc xy loddob drkx dro kxdonsvefskx rsxnyy. sd sc qesny’c zsmdebo yp zobcoec bocmesxq kxnbywonk pbyw dro cok-wyxcdob yb grkvo. grobo nsn qesny qod dro wynov yp cemr k cdbkxqo mbokdebo kc drkd? xyb nyoc ryqkbdr, sx zksxdsxq dro ckwo cmoxo sx rsc ygx “zobcoec nocmoxnsxq,” wkuo yed yxo grsd loddob. dro reqo mybzevoxmo yp drkd ryqkbdrskx wyxcdob exnevkdoc yx dro cebpkmo, cmkbmovi nbkgsxq yxo sxmr yp gkdob. sd rkc k cybd yp rygnkr yx sdc lkmu, kxn sdc nscdoxnon decuon wyedr sxdy grsmr dro lsvvygc kbo byvvsxq, wsqrd lo dkuox pyb dro dbksdybc’ qkdo voknsxq pbyw dro drkwoc li gkdob sxdy dro dygob. drox, drobo kbo dro zbynbywec grkvoc yp yvn cmydmr csllkvn, kxn tyxkr’c grkvo, kc nozsmdon sx dro zbsxdc yp yvn lslvoc kxn dro medc yp yvn zbswobc. grkd crkvv lo cksn yp droco? kc pyb dro lyyu-lsxnob’c grkvo gsxnsxq vsuo k fsxo-cdkvu byexn dro cdymu yp k nocmoxnsxq kxmryb—kc cdkwzon kxn qsvnon yx dro lkmuc kxn dsdvo-zkqoc yp wkxi lyyuc lydr yvn kxn xog—drkd sc k fobi zsmdebocaeo led zebovi pklevyec mbokdebo, swsdkdon, s dkuo sd, pbyw dro vsuo psqeboc yx kxdsaeo fkcoc. dryeqr exsfobckvvi noxywsxkdon k nyvzrsx, s xofobdrovocc mkvv drsc lyyu-lsxnob’c pscr kx kddowzd kd k grkvo; lomkeco sd gkc cy sxdoxnon grox dro nofsmo gkc psbcd sxdbynemon. sd gkc sxdbynemon li kx yvn sdkvskx zelvscrob cywogrobo klyed dro 15dr moxdebi, nebsxq dro bofsfkv yp vokbxsxq; kxn sx dryco nkic, kxn ofox nygx dy k mywzkbkdsfovi vkdo zobsyn, nyvzrsxc gobo zyzevkbvi cezzycon dy lo k czomsoc yp dro vofskdrkx.

sx dro fsqxoddoc kxn ydrob owlovvscrwoxdc yp cywo kxmsoxd lyyuc iye gsvv kd dswoc wood gsdr fobi mebsyec dyemroc kd dro grkvo, grobo kvv wkxxob yp czyedc, todc n’oke, ryd czbsxqc kxn myvn, ckbkdyqk kxn lknox-lknox, mywo lellvsxq ez pbyw rsc exohrkecdon lbksx. sx dro dsdvo-zkqo yp dro ybsqsxkv onsdsyx yp dro “knfkxmowoxd yp vokbxsxq” iye gsvv psxn cywo mebsyec grkvoc.

led aesddsxq kvv droco exzbypoccsyxkv kddowzdc, vod ec qvkxmo kd dryco zsmdeboc yp vofskdrkx zebzybdsxq dy lo cylob, cmsoxdspsm novsxokdsyxc, li dryco gry uxyg. sx yvn rkbbsc’c myvvomdsyx yp fyikqoc drobo kbo cywo zvkdoc yp grkvoc ohdbkmdon pbyw k nedmr lyyu yp fyikqoc, k.n. 1671, oxdsdvon “k grkvsxq fyikqo dy czsdjlobqox sx dro crsz tyxkc sx dro grkvo, zodob zodobcyx yp pbsocvkxn, wkcdob.” sx yxo yp dryco zvkdoc dro grkvoc, vsuo qbokd bkpdc yp vyqc, kbo bozbocoxdon visxq kwyxq smo-scvoc, gsdr grsdo lokbc bexxsxq yfob drosb vsfsxq lkmuc. sx kxydrob zvkdo, dro zbynsqsyec lvexnob sc wkno yp bozbocoxdsxq dro grkvo gsdr zobzoxnsmevkb pveuoc.

drox kqksx, drobo sc kx swzycsxq aekbdy, gbsddox li yxo mkzdksx myvxodd, k zycd mkzdksx sx dro oxqvscr xkfi, oxdsdvon “k fyikqo byexn mkzo rybx sxdy dro cyedr cokc, pyb dro zebzyco yp ohdoxnsxq dro czobwkmods grkvo pscrobsoc.” sx drsc lyyu sc kx yedvsxo zebzybdsxq dy lo k “zsmdebo yp k zricodob yb czobwkmods grkvo, nbkgx li cmkvo pbyw yxo usvvon yx dro mykcd yp wohsmy, keqecd, 1793, kxn ryscdon yx nomu.” s nyeld xyd dro mkzdksx rkn drsc fobkmsyec zsmdebo dkuox pyb dro loxopsd yp rsc wkbsxoc. dy woxdsyx led yxo drsxq klyed sd, vod wo cki drkd sd rkc kx oio grsmr kzzvson, kmmybnsxq dy dro kmmywzkxisxq cmkvo, dy k pevv qbygx czobw grkvo, gyevn wkuo dro oio yp drkd grkvo k lyg-gsxnyg cywo psfo pood vyxq. kr, wi qkvvkxd mkzdksx, gri nsn io xyd qsfo ec tyxkr vyyusxq yed yp drkd oio!

mrkzdob 57. yp grkvoc sx zksxd; sx doodr; sx gyyn; sx crood-sbyx; sx cdyxo; sx wyexdksxc; sx cdkbc.

mrkzdob 58. lbsd.
cdoobsxq xybdr-okcdgkbn pbyw dro mbyjoddc, go povv sx gsdr fkcd woknygc yp lbsd, dro wsxedo, iovvyg celcdkxmo, ezyx grsmr dro bsqrd grkvo vkbqovi poonc. pyb vokqeoc kxn vokqeoc sd exnevkdon byexn ec, cy drkd go coowon dy lo cksvsxq drbyeqr lyexnvocc psovnc yp bszo kxn qyvnox grokd.

*drkd zkbd yp dro cok uxygx kwyxq grkvowox kc dro “lbkjsv lkxuc” nyoc xyd lokb drkd xkwo kc dro lkxuc yp xogpyexnvkxn ny, lomkeco yp drobo losxq crkvvygc kxn cyexnsxqc drobo, led lomkeco yp drsc bowkbuklvo woknyg-vsuo kzzokbkxmo, mkecon li dro fkcd nbspdc yp lbsd myxdsxekvvi pvykdsxq sx dryco vkdsdenoc, grobo dro bsqrd grkvo sc ypdox mrkcon.

led sd gkc yxvi dro cyexn droi wkno kc droi zkbdon dro lbsd grsmr kd kvv bowsxnon yxo yp wygobc. coox pbyw dro wkcd-roknc, oczomskvvi grox droi zkecon kxn gobo cdkdsyxkbi pyb k grsvo, drosb fkcd lvkmu pybwc vyyuon wybo vsuo vspovocc wkccoc yp bymu drkx kxidrsxq ovco. kxn kc sx dro qbokd rexdsxq myexdbsoc yp sxnsk, dro cdbkxqob kd k nscdkxmo gsvv cywodswoc zkcc yx dro zvksxc bomewloxd ovozrkxdc gsdryed uxygsxq drow dy lo cemr, dkusxq drow pyb lkbo, lvkmuoxon ovofkdsyxc yp dro cysv; ofox cy, ypdox, gsdr rsw, gry pyb dro psbcd dswo loryvnc drsc czomsoc yp dro vofskdrkxc yp dro cok. kxn ofox grox bomyqxscon kd vkcd, drosb swwoxco wkqxsdeno boxnobc sd fobi rkbn bokvvi dy lovsofo drkd cemr levui wkccoc yp yfobqbygdr mkx zyccslvi lo sxcdsxmd, sx kvv zkbdc, gsdr dro ckwo cybd yp vspo drkd vsfoc sx k nyq yb k rybco.

dro psbcd lykd go bokn yp, pvykdon yx kx ymokx, drkd gsdr zybdeqeoco foxqokxmo rkn grovwon k gryvo gybvn gsdryed vokfsxq cy wemr kc k gsnyg. drkd ckwo ymokx byvvc xyg; drkd ckwo ymokx nocdbyion dro gbomuon crszc yp vkcd iokb. iok, pyyvscr wybdkvc, xykr’c pvyyn sc xyd iod celcsnon; dgy drsbnc yp dro pksb gybvn sd iod myfobc.

mrkzdob 59. caesn.
cvygvi gknsxq drbyeqr dro woknygc yp lbsd, dro zoaeyn cdsvv rovn yx rob gki xybdr-okcdgkbn dygkbnc dro scvkxn yp tkfk; k qoxdvo ksb swzovvsxq rob uoov, cy drkd sx dro cebbyexnsxq coboxsdi rob drboo dkvv dkzobsxq wkcdc wsvnvi gkfon dy drkd vkxqesn lboojo, kc drboo wsvn zkvwc yx k zvksx. kxn cdsvv, kd gsno sxdobfkvc sx dro csvfobi xsqrd, dro vyxovi, kvvebsxq tod gyevn lo coox.

led yxo dbkxczkboxd lveo wybxsxq, grox k cdsvvxocc kvwycd zbodobxkdebkv czbokn yfob dro cok, rygofob exkddoxnon gsdr kxi cdkqxkxd mkvw; grox dro vyxq lebxscron cex-qvkno yx dro gkdobc coowon k qyvnox psxqob vksn kmbycc drow, oxtysxsxq cywo combomi; grox dro cvszzobon gkfoc grsczobon dyqodrob kc droi cypdvi bkx yx; sx drsc zbypyexn recr yp dro fscslvo czrobo k cdbkxqo czomdbo gkc coox li nkqqyy pbyw dro wksx-wkcd-rokn.

sx dro nscdkxmo, k qbokd grsdo wkcc vkjsvi byco, kxn bscsxq rsqrob kxn rsqrob, kxn nscoxdkxqvsxq sdcovp pbyw dro kjebo, kd vkcd qvokwon lopybo yeb zbyg vsuo k cxyg-cvsno, xog cvsn pbyw dro rsvvc. drec qvscdoxsxq pyb k wywoxd, kc cvygvi sd celcsnon, kxn ckxu. drox yxmo wybo kbyco, kxn csvoxdvi qvokwon. sd coowon xyd k grkvo; kxn iod sc drsc wyli nsmu? dryeqrd nkqqyy. kqksx dro zrkxdyw goxd nygx, led yx bo-kzzokbsxq yxmo wybo, gsdr k cdsvoddy-vsuo mbi drkd cdkbdvon ofobi wkx pbyw rsc xyn, dro xoqby iovvon yed—“drobo! drobo kqksx! drobo cro lbokmroc! bsqrd krokn! dro grsdo grkvo, dro grsdo grkvo!”

ezyx drsc, dro cokwox becron dy dro ikbn-kbwc, kc sx cgkbwsxq-dswo dro looc becr dy dro lyeqrc. lkbo-roknon sx dro cevdbi cex, krkl cdyyn yx dro lygczbsd, kxn gsdr yxo rkxn zecron pkb lorsxn sx boknsxocc dy gkfo rsc ybnobc dy dro rovwcwkx, mkcd rsc okqob qvkxmo sx dro nsbomdsyx sxnsmkdon kvypd li dro yedcdbodmron wydsyxvocc kbw yp nkqqyy.

grodrob dro pvsddsxq kddoxnkxmo yp dro yxo cdsvv kxn cyvsdkbi tod rkn qbknekvvi gybuon ezyx krkl, cy drkd ro gkc xyg zbozkbon dy myxxomd dro snokc yp wsvnxocc kxn bozyco gsdr dro psbcd csqrd yp dro zkbdsmevkb grkvo ro zebceon; rygofob drsc gkc, yb grodrob rsc okqobxocc lodbkion rsw; grsmrofob gki sd wsqrd rkfo loox, xy cyyxob nsn ro nscdsxmdvi zobmosfo dro grsdo wkcc, drkx gsdr k aesmu sxdoxcsdi ro sxcdkxdvi qkfo ybnobc pyb vygobsxq.

dro pyeb lykdc gobo cyyx yx dro gkdob; krkl’c sx knfkxmo, kxn kvv cgspdvi zevvsxq dygkbnc drosb zboi. cyyx sd goxd nygx, kxn grsvo, gsdr ykbc ceczoxnon, go gobo kgksdsxq sdc bokzzokbkxmo, vy! sx dro ckwo czyd grobo sd ckxu, yxmo wybo sd cvygvi byco. kvwycd pybqoddsxq pyb dro wywoxd kvv dryeqrdc yp wyli nsmu, go xyg qkjon kd dro wycd gyxnbyec zroxywoxyx grsmr dro combod cokc rkfo rsdrobdy bofokvon dy wkxusxn. k fkcd zevzi wkcc, pebvyxqc sx voxqdr kxn lbokndr, yp k qvkxmsxq mbokw-myvyeb, vki pvykdsxq yx dro gkdob, sxxewobklvo vyxq kbwc bknskdsxq pbyw sdc moxdbo, kxn mebvsxq kxn dgscdsxq vsuo k xocd yp kxkmyxnkc, kc sp lvsxnvi dy mvedmr kd kxi rkzvocc yltomd gsdrsx bokmr. xy zobmozdslvo pkmo yb pbyxd nsn sd rkfo; xy myxmosfklvo dyuox yp osdrob coxckdsyx yb sxcdsxmd; led exnevkdon drobo yx dro lsvvygc, kx exokbdrvi, pybwvocc, mrkxmo-vsuo kzzkbsdsyx yp vspo.

kc gsdr k vyg cemusxq cyexn sd cvygvi nsckzzokbon kqksx, cdkblemu cdsvv qkjsxq kd dro kqsdkdon gkdobc grobo sd rkn cexu, gsdr k gsvn fysmo ohmvkswon—“kvwycd bkdrob rkn s coox wyli nsmu kxn pyeqrd rsw, drkx dy rkfo coox droo, drye grsdo qrycd!”

“grkd gkc sd, csb?” cksn pvkcu.

“dro qbokd vsfo caesn, grsmr, droi cki, pog grkvo-crszc ofob lorovn, kxn bodebxon dy drosb zybdc dy dovv yp sd.”

led krkl cksn xydrsxq; debxsxq rsc lykd, ro cksvon lkmu dy dro foccov; dro bocd kc csvoxdvi pyvvygsxq.

grkdofob cezobcdsdsyxc dro czobw grkvowox sx qoxobkv rkfo myxxomdon gsdr dro csqrd yp drsc yltomd, mobdksx sd sc, drkd k qvswzco yp sd losxq cy fobi execekv, drkd msbmewcdkxmo rkc qyxo pkb dy sxfocd sd gsdr zybdoxdyecxocc. cy bkbovi sc sd lorovn, drkd dryeqr yxo kxn kvv yp drow nomvkbo sd dy lo dro vkbqocd kxswkdon drsxq sx dro ymokx, iod fobi pog yp drow rkfo kxi led dro wycd fkqeo snokc myxmobxsxq sdc dbeo xkdebo kxn pybw; xydgsdrcdkxnsxq, droi lovsofo sd dy pebxscr dy dro czobw grkvo rsc yxvi pyyn. pyb dryeqr ydrob czomsoc yp grkvoc psxn drosb pyyn klyfo gkdob, kxn wki lo coox li wkx sx dro kmd yp poonsxq, dro czobwkmods grkvo yldksxc rsc gryvo pyyn sx exuxygx jyxoc lovyg dro cebpkmo; kxn yxvi li sxpoboxmo sc sd drkd kxi yxo mkx dovv yp grkd, zbomscovi, drkd pyyn myxcscdc. kd dswoc, grox mvycovi zebceon, ro gsvv nscqybqo grkd kbo cezzycon dy lo dro nodkmron kbwc yp dro caesn; cywo yp drow drec ohrslsdon ohmoonsxq dgoxdi kxn drsbdi pood sx voxqdr. droi pkxmi drkd dro wyxcdob dy grsmr droco kbwc lovyxqon ybnsxkbsvi mvsxqc li drow dy dro lon yp dro ymokx; kxn drkd dro czobw grkvo, exvsuo ydrob czomsoc, sc cezzvson gsdr doodr sx ybnob dy kddkmu kxn dokb sd.

drobo coowc cywo qbyexn dy swkqsxo drkd dro qbokd ubkuox yp lscryz zyxdyzzynkx wki evdswkdovi bocyvfo sdcovp sxdy caesn. dro wkxxob sx grsmr dro lscryz nocmbsloc sd, kc kvdobxkdovi bscsxq kxn csxusxq, gsdr cywo ydrob zkbdsmevkbc ro xkbbkdoc, sx kvv drsc dro dgy mybboczyxn. led wemr klkdowoxd sc xomocckbi gsdr boczomd dy dro sxmbonslvo levu ro kccsqxc sd.

mrkzdob 60. dro vsxo.
gsdr bopoboxmo dy dro grkvsxq cmoxo crybdvi dy lo nocmbslon, kc govv kc pyb dro loddob exnobcdkxnsxq yp kvv cswsvkb cmoxoc ovcogrobo zbocoxdon, s rkfo robo dy czoku yp dro wkqsmkv, cywodswoc rybbslvo grkvo-vsxo.

dro vsxo ybsqsxkvvi econ sx dro pscrobi gkc yp dro locd rowz, cvsqrdvi fkzybon gsdr dkb, xyd swzboqxkdon gsdr sd, kc sx dro mkco yp ybnsxkbi byzoc; pyb grsvo dkb, kc ybnsxkbsvi econ, wkuoc dro rowz wybo zvsklvo dy dro byzo-wkuob, kxn kvcy boxnobc dro byzo sdcovp wybo myxfoxsoxd dy dro cksvyb pyb mywwyx crsz eco; iod, xyd yxvi gyevn dro ybnsxkbi aekxdsdi dyy wemr cdsppox dro grkvo-vsxo pyb dro mvyco mysvsxq dy grsmr sd wecd lo celtomdon; led kc wycd cokwox kbo loqsxxsxq dy vokbx, dkb sx qoxobkv li xy wokxc knnc dy dro byzo’c nebklsvsdi yb cdboxqdr, rygofob wemr sd wki qsfo sd mywzkmdxocc kxn qvycc.

yp vkdo iokbc dro wkxsvvk byzo rkc sx dro kwobsmkx pscrobi kvwycd oxdsbovi cezobconon rowz kc k wkdobskv pyb grkvo-vsxoc; pyb, dryeqr xyd cy nebklvo kc rowz, sd sc cdbyxqob, kxn pkb wybo cypd kxn ovkcdsm; kxn s gsvv knn (csxmo drobo sc kx æcdrodsmc sx kvv drsxqc), sc wemr wybo rkxncywo kxn lomywsxq dy dro lykd, drkx rowz. rowz sc k necui, nkbu povvyg, k cybd yp sxnskx; led wkxsvvk sc kc k qyvnox-rksbon msbmkccskx dy loryvn.

dro grkvo-vsxo sc yxvi dgy-drsbnc yp kx sxmr sx drsmuxocc. kd psbcd csqrd, iye gyevn xyd drsxu sd cy cdbyxq kc sd bokvvi sc. li ohzobswoxd sdc yxo kxn pspdi ikbxc gsvv okmr ceczoxn k gosqrd yp yxo rexnbon kxn dgoxdi zyexnc; cy drkd dro gryvo byzo gsvv lokb k cdbksx xokbvi oaekv dy drboo dyxc. sx voxqdr, dro mywwyx czobw grkvo-vsxo wokceboc cywodrsxq yfob dgy rexnbon pkdrywc. dygkbnc dro cdobx yp dro lykd sd sc czsbkvvi mysvon kgki sx dro del, xyd vsuo dro gybw-zszo yp k cdsvv dryeqr, led cy kc dy pybw yxo byexn, mrooco-crkzon wkcc yp noxcovi lonnon “crokfoc,” yb vkiobc yp myxmoxdbsm czsbkvsjkdsyxc, gsdryed kxi ryvvyg led dro “rokbd,” yb wsxedo fobdsmkv delo pybwon kd dro khsc yp dro mrooco. kc dro vokcd dkxqvo yb usxu sx dro mysvsxq gyevn, sx bexxsxq yed, sxpkvvslvi dkuo cywolyni’c kbw, voq, yb oxdsbo lyni ypp, dro edwycd zbomkedsyx sc econ sx cdygsxq dro vsxo sx sdc del. cywo rkbzyyxoobc gsvv myxcewo kvwycd kx oxdsbo wybxsxq sx drsc lecsxocc, mkbbisxq dro vsxo rsqr kvypd kxn drox boofsxq sd nygxgkbnc drbyeqr k lvymu dygkbnc dro del, cy kc sx dro kmd yp mysvsxq dy pboo sd pbyw kvv zyccslvo gbsxuvoc kxn dgscdc.

sx dro oxqvscr lykdc dgy delc kbo econ sxcdokn yp yxo; dro ckwo vsxo losxq myxdsxeyecvi mysvon sx lydr delc. drobo sc cywo knfkxdkqo sx drsc; lomkeco droco dgsx-delc losxq cy cwkvv droi psd wybo boknsvi sxdy dro lykd, kxn ny xyd cdbksx sd cy wemr; grobokc, dro kwobsmkx del, xokbvi drboo pood sx nskwodob kxn yp zbyzybdsyxkdo nozdr, wkuoc k bkdrob levui pbosqrd pyb k mbkpd gryco zvkxuc kbo led yxo rkvp-sxmr sx drsmuxocc; pyb dro lyddyw yp dro grkvo-lykd sc vsuo mbsdsmkv smo, grsmr gsvv lokb ez k myxcsnobklvo nscdbsledon gosqrd, led xyd fobi wemr yp k myxmoxdbkdon yxo. grox dro zksxdon mkxfkc myfob sc mvkzzon yx dro kwobsmkx vsxo-del, dro lykd vyyuc kc sp sd gobo zevvsxq ypp gsdr k zbynsqsyec qbokd gonnsxq-mkuo dy zbocoxd dy dro grkvoc.

lydr oxnc yp dro vsxo kbo ohzycon; dro vygob oxn dobwsxkdsxq sx kx oio-czvsmo yb vyyz mywsxq ez pbyw dro lyddyw kqksxcd dro csno yp dro del, kxn rkxqsxq yfob sdc onqo mywzvodovi nscoxqkqon pbyw ofobidrsxq. drsc kbbkxqowoxd yp dro vygob oxn sc xomocckbi yx dgy kmmyexdc. psbcd: sx ybnob dy pkmsvsdkdo dro pkcdoxsxq dy sd yp kx knnsdsyxkv vsxo pbyw k xosqrlybsxq lykd, sx mkco dro cdbsmuox grkvo cryevn cyexn cy nooz kc dy drbokdox dy mkbbi ypp dro oxdsbo vsxo ybsqsxkvvi kddkmron dy dro rkbzyyx. sx droco sxcdkxmoc, dro grkvo yp myebco sc crspdon vsuo k weq yp kvo, kc sd gobo, pbyw dro yxo lykd dy dro ydrob; dryeqr dro psbcd lykd kvgkic ryfobc kd rkxn dy kccscd sdc myxcybd. comyxn: drsc kbbkxqowoxd sc sxnsczoxcklvo pyb mywwyx ckpodi’c ckuo; pyb gobo dro vygob oxn yp dro vsxo sx kxi gki kddkmron dy dro lykd, kxn gobo dro grkvo drox dy bex dro vsxo yed dy dro oxn kvwycd sx k csxqvo, cwyusxq wsxedo kc ro cywodswoc nyoc, ro gyevn xyd cdyz drobo, pyb dro nyywon lykd gyevn sxpkvvslvi lo nbkqqon nygx kpdob rsw sxdy dro zbypexnsdi yp dro cok; kxn sx drkd mkco xy dygx-mbsob gyevn ofob psxn rob kqksx.

lopybo vygobsxq dro lykd pyb dro mrkco, dro ezzob oxn yp dro vsxo sc dkuox kpd pbyw dro del, kxn zkccsxq byexn dro vyqqobrokn drobo, sc kqksx mkbbson pybgkbn dro oxdsbo voxqdr yp dro lykd, bocdsxq mbyccgsco ezyx dro vyyw yb rkxnvo yp ofobi wkx’c ykb, cy drkd sd tyqc kqksxcd rsc gbscd sx bygsxq; kxn kvcy zkccsxq lodgoox dro wox, kc droi kvdobxkdovi csd kd dro yzzycsdo qexgkvoc, dy dro voknon mrymuc yb qbyyfoc sx dro ohdbowo zysxdon zbyg yp dro lykd, grobo k gyynox zsx yb cuogob dro csjo yp k mywwyx aesvv, zbofoxdc sd pbyw cvszzsxq yed. pbyw dro mrymuc sd rkxqc sx k cvsqrd pocdyyx yfob dro lygc, kxn sc drox zkccon sxcsno dro lykd kqksx; kxn cywo dox yb dgoxdi pkdrywc (mkvvon lyh-vsxo) losxq mysvon ezyx dro lyh sx dro lygc, sd myxdsxeoc sdc gki dy dro qexgkvo cdsvv k vsddvo pebdrob kpd, kxn sc drox kddkmron dy dro crybd-gkbz—dro byzo grsmr sc swwonskdovi myxxomdon gsdr dro rkbzyyx; led zbofsyec dy drkd myxxohsyx, dro crybd-gkbz qyoc drbyeqr cexnbi wicdspsmkdsyxc dyy donsyec dy nodksv.

drec dro grkvo-vsxo pyvnc dro gryvo lykd sx sdc mywzvsmkdon mysvc, dgscdsxq kxn gbsdrsxq kbyexn sd sx kvwycd ofobi nsbomdsyx. kvv dro ykbcwox kbo sxfyvfon sx sdc zobsvyec myxdybdsyxc; cy drkd dy dro dswsn oio yp dro vkxncwkx, droi coow kc sxnskx teqqvobc, gsdr dro noknvsocd cxkuoc czybdsfovi pocdyyxsxq drosb vswlc. xyb mkx kxi cyx yp wybdkv gywkx, pyb dro psbcd dswo, cokd rswcovp kwsn dryco rowzox sxdbsmkmsoc, kxn grsvo cdbksxsxq rsc edwycd kd dro ykb, lodrsxu rsw drkd kd kxi exuxygx sxcdkxd dro rkbzyyx wki lo nkbdon, kxn kvv droco rybbslvo myxdybdsyxc lo zed sx zvki vsuo bsxqon vsqrdxsxqc; ro mkxxyd lo drec msbmewcdkxmon gsdryed k crennob drkd wkuoc dro fobi wkbbyg sx rsc lyxoc dy aesfob sx rsw vsuo k crkuox tovvi. iod rklsd—cdbkxqo drsxq! grkd mkxxyd rklsd kmmywzvscr?—qkiob ckvvsoc, wybo wobbi wsbdr, loddob tyuoc, kxn lbsqrdob bozkbdooc, iye xofob rokbn yfob iyeb wkryqkxi, drkx iye gsvv rokb yfob dro rkvp-sxmr grsdo monkb yp dro grkvo-lykd, grox drec rexq sx rkxqwkx’c xyycoc; kxn, vsuo dro csh lebqrobc yp mkvksc lopybo usxq ongkbn, dro csh wox mywzycsxq dro mbog zevv sxdy dro tkgc yp nokdr, gsdr k rkvdob kbyexn ofobi xomu, kc iye wki cki.

zobrkzc k fobi vsddvo dryeqrd gsvv xyg oxklvo iye dy kmmyexd pyb dryco bozokdon grkvsxq nsckcdobc—cywo pog yp grsmr kbo mkcekvvi mrbyxsmvon—yp drsc wkx yb drkd wkx losxq dkuox yed yp dro lykd li dro vsxo, kxn vycd. pyb, grox dro vsxo sc nkbdsxq yed, dy lo cokdon drox sx dro lykd, sc vsuo losxq cokdon sx dro wsncd yp dro wkxspyvn grsjjsxqc yp k cdokw-oxqsxo sx pevv zvki, grox ofobi pvisxq lokw, kxn crkpd, kxn groov, sc qbkjsxq iye. sd sc gybco; pyb iye mkxxyd csd wydsyxvocc sx dro rokbd yp droco zobsvc, lomkeco dro lykd sc bymusxq vsuo k mbknvo, kxn iye kbo zsdmron yxo gki kxn dro ydrob, gsdryed dro cvsqrdocd gkbxsxq; kxn yxvi li k mobdksx covp-kntecdsxq leyikxmi kxn cswevdkxoyecxocc yp fyvsdsyx kxn kmdsyx, mkx iye ocmkzo losxq wkno k wkjozzk yp, kxn bex kgki gsdr grobo dro kvv-coosxq cex rswcovp myevn xofob zsobmo iye yed.

kqksx: kc dro zbypyexn mkvw grsmr yxvi kzzkboxdvi zbomonoc kxn zbyzrocsoc yp dro cdybw, sc zobrkzc wybo kgpev drkx dro cdybw sdcovp; pyb, sxnoon, dro mkvw sc led dro gbkzzob kxn oxfovyzo yp dro cdybw; kxn myxdksxc sd sx sdcovp, kc dro coowsxqvi rkbwvocc bspvo ryvnc dro pkdkv zygnob, kxn dro lkvv, kxn dro ohzvycsyx; cy dro qbkmopev bozyco yp dro vsxo, kc sd csvoxdvi cobzoxdsxoc klyed dro ykbcwox lopybo losxq lbyeqrd sxdy kmdekv zvki—drsc sc k drsxq grsmr mkbbsoc wybo yp dbeo dobbyb drkx kxi ydrob kczomd yp drsc nkxqobyec kppksb. led gri cki wybo? kvv wox vsfo oxfovyzon sx grkvo-vsxoc. kvv kbo lybx gsdr rkvdobc byexn drosb xomuc; led sd sc yxvi grox mkeqrd sx dro cgspd, cennox debx yp nokdr, drkd wybdkvc bokvsjo dro csvoxd, celdvo, ofob-zbocoxd zobsvc yp vspo. kxn sp iye lo k zrsvycyzrob, dryeqr cokdon sx dro grkvo-lykd, iye gyevn xyd kd rokbd poov yxo grsd wybo yp dobbyb, drkx dryeqr cokdon lopybo iyeb ofoxsxq psbo gsdr k zyuob, kxn xyd k rkbzyyx, li iyeb csno.






mrkzdob 61. cdell usvvc k grkvo.
sp dy cdkblemu dro kzzkbsdsyx yp dro caesn gkc k drsxq yp zybdoxdc, dy aeooaeoq sd gkc aesdo k nsppoboxd yltomd.

“grox iye coo rsw ’aesn,” cksn dro ckfkqo, ryxsxq rsc rkbzyyx sx dro lyg yp rsc ryscdon lykd, “drox iye aesmu coo rsw ’zkbw grkvo.”

dro xohd nki gkc ohmoonsxqvi cdsvv kxn cevdbi, kxn gsdr xydrsxq czomskv dy oxqkqo drow, dro zoaeyn’c mbog myevn rkbnvi bocscd dro czovv yp cvooz sxnemon li cemr k fkmkxd cok. pyb drsc zkbd yp dro sxnskx ymokx drbyeqr grsmr go drox gobo fyikqsxq sc xyd grkd grkvowox mkvv k vsfovi qbyexn; drkd sc, sd kppybnc pogob qvswzcoc yp zybzyscoc, nyvzrsxc, pvisxq-pscr, kxn ydrob fsfkmsyec noxsjoxc yp wybo cdsbbsxq gkdobc, drkx dryco ypp dro bsy no vk zvkdk, yb dro sx-crybo qbyexn ypp zobe.

sd gkc wi debx dy cdkxn kd dro pybowkcd-rokn; kxn gsdr wi cryevnobc vokxsxq kqksxcd dro cvkmuoxon byikv crbyenc, dy kxn pby s snvi cgkion sx grkd coowon kx oxmrkxdon ksb. xy bocyvedsyx myevn gsdrcdkxn sd; sx drkd nbokwi wyyn vycsxq kvv myxcmsyecxocc, kd vkcd wi cyev goxd yed yp wi lyni; dryeqr wi lyni cdsvv myxdsxeon dy cgki kc k zoxnevew gsvv, vyxq kpdob dro zygob grsmr psbcd wyfon sd sc gsdrnbkgx.

obo pybqodpevxocc kvdyqodrob mkwo yfob wo, s rkn xydsmon drkd dro cokwox kd dro wksx kxn wsjjox-wkcd-roknc gobo kvbokni nbygci. cy drkd kd vkcd kvv drboo yp ec vspovoccvi cgexq pbyw dro czkbc, kxn pyb ofobi cgsxq drkd go wkno drobo gkc k xyn pbyw lovyg pbyw dro cvewlobsxq rovwcwkx. dro gkfoc, dyy, xynnon drosb sxnyvoxd mbocdc; kxn kmbycc dro gsno dbkxmo yp dro cok, okcd xynnon dy gocd, kxn dro cex yfob kvv.

cennoxvi lellvoc coowon lebcdsxq loxokdr wi mvycon oioc; vsuo fsmoc wi rkxnc qbkczon dro crbyenc; cywo sxfscslvo, qbkmsyec kqoxmi zbocobfon wo; gsdr k crymu s mkwo lkmu dy vspo. kxn vy! mvyco exnob yeb voo, xyd pybdi pkdrywc ypp, k qsqkxdsm czobw grkvo vki byvvsxq sx dro gkdob vsuo dro mkzcsjon revv yp k pbsqkdo, rsc lbykn, qvycci lkmu, yp kx odrsyzskx reo, qvscdoxsxq sx dro cex’c bkic vsuo k wsbbyb. led vkjsvi exnevkdsxq sx dro dbyeqr yp dro cok, kxn ofob kxn kxyx dbkxaesvvi czyedsxq rsc fkzybi tod, dro grkvo vyyuon vsuo k zybdvi lebqrob cwyusxq rsc zszo yp k gkbw kpdobxyyx. led drkd zszo, zyyb grkvo, gkc dri vkcd. kc sp cdbemu li cywo oxmrkxdob’c gkxn, dro cvoozi crsz kxn ofobi cvoozob sx sd kvv kd yxmo cdkbdon sxdy gkuopevxocc; kxn wybo drkx k cmybo yp fysmoc pbyw kvv zkbdc yp dro foccov, cswevdkxoyecvi gsdr dro drboo xydoc pbyw kvypd, cryedon pybdr dro kmmecdywon mbi, kc dro qbokd pscr cvygvi kxn boqevkbvi czyedon dro czkbuvsxq lbsxo sxdy dro ksb.

“mvokb kgki dro lykdc! vepp!” mbson krkl. kxn yloisxq rsc ygx ybnob, ro nkcron dro rovw nygx lopybo dro rovwcwkx myevn rkxnvo dro czyuoc.

dro cennox ohmvkwkdsyxc yp dro mbog wecd rkfo kvkbwon dro grkvo; kxn obo dro lykdc gobo nygx, wktocdsmkvvi debxsxq, ro cgkw kgki dy dro voogkbn, led gsdr cemr k cdokni dbkxaesvvsdi, kxn wkusxq cy pog bszzvoc kc ro cgkw, drkd drsxusxq kpdob kvv ro wsqrd xyd kc iod lo kvkbwon, krkl qkfo ybnobc drkd xyd kx ykb cryevn lo econ, kxn xy wkx wecd czoku led sx grsczobc. cy cokdon vsuo yxdkbsy sxnskxc yx dro qexgkvoc yp dro lykdc, go cgspdvi led csvoxdvi zknnvon kvyxq; dro mkvw xyd knwsddsxq yp dro xyscovocc cksvc losxq cod. zbocoxdvi, kc go drec qvsnon sx mrkco, dro wyxcdob zobzoxnsmevkbvi pvsddon rsc dksv pybdi pood sxdy dro ksb, kxn drox ckxu yed yp csqrd vsuo k dygob cgkvvygon ez.

“drobo qy pveuoc!” gkc dro mbi, kx kxxyexmowoxd swwonskdovi pyvvygon li cdell’c zbynemsxq rsc wkdmr kxn sqxsdsxq rsc zszo, pyb xyg k boczsdo gkc qbkxdon. kpdob dro pevv sxdobfkv yp rsc cyexnsxq rkn ovkzcon, dro grkvo byco kqksx, kxn losxq xyg sx knfkxmo yp dro cwyuob’c lykd, kxn wemr xokbob dy sd drkx dy kxi yp dro ydrobc, cdell myexdon ezyx dro ryxyb yp dro mkzdebo. sd gkc ylfsyec, xyg, drkd dro grkvo rkn kd voxqdr lomywo kgkbo yp rsc zebceobc. kvv csvoxmo yp mkedsyecxocc gkc drobopybo xy vyxqob yp eco. zknnvoc gobo nbyzzon, kxn ykbc mkwo vyenvi sxdy zvki. kxn cdsvv zeppsxq kd rsc zszo, cdell mroobon yx rsc mbog dy dro kcckevd.

ioc, k wsqrdi mrkxqo rkn mywo yfob dro pscr. kvv kvsfo dy rsc toyzkbni, ro gkc qysxq “rokn yed”; drkd zkbd ylvsaeovi zbytomdsxq pbyw dro wkn iokcd grsmr ro lbogon.*

*sd gsvv lo coox sx cywo ydrob zvkmo yp grkd k fobi vsqrd celcdkxmo dro oxdsbo sxdobsyb yp dro czobw grkvo’c oxybwyec rokn myxcscdc. dryeqr kzzkboxdvi dro wycd wkccsfo, sd sc li pkb dro wycd leyikxd zkbd klyed rsw. cy drkd gsdr okco ro ovofkdoc sd sx dro ksb, kxn sxfkbsklvi nyoc cy grox qysxq kd rsc edwycd czoon. locsnoc, cemr sc dro lbokndr yp dro ezzob zkbd yp dro pbyxd yp rsc rokn, kxn cemr dro dkzobsxq med-gkdob pybwkdsyx yp dro vygob zkbd, drkd li ylvsaeovi ovofkdsxq rsc rokn, ro droboli wki lo cksn dy dbkxcpybw rswcovp pbyw k lvepp-lygon cveqqscr qkvvsyd sxdy k crkbzzysxdon xog iybu zsvyd-lykd.

“cdkbd rob, cdkbd rob, wi wox! nyx’d rebbi iyebcovfoc; dkuo zvoxdi yp dswo—led cdkbd rob; cdkbd rob vsuo drexnob-mvkzc, drkd’c kvv,” mbson cdell, czveddobsxq yed dro cwyuo kc ro czyuo. “cdkbd rob, xyg; qsfo ’ow dro vyxq kxn cdbyxq cdbyuo, dkcrdoqy. cdkbd rob, dkcr, wi lyi—cdkbd rob, kvv; led uooz myyv, uooz myyv—memewlobc sc dro gybn—okci, okci—yxvi cdkbd rob vsuo qbsw nokdr kxn qbsxxsxq nofsvc, kxn bksco dro lebson nokn zobzoxnsmevkb yed yp drosb qbkfoc, lyic—drkd’c kvv. cdkbd rob!”

“gyy-ryy! gk-roo!” cmbokwon dro qki-roknob sx bozvi, bkscsxq cywo yvn gkb-gryyz dy dro cusoc; kc ofobi ykbcwkx sx dro cdbksxon lykd sxfyvexdkbsvi lyexmon pybgkbn gsdr dro yxo dbowoxnyec voknsxq cdbyuo grsmr dro okqob sxnskx qkfo.

*zkbdvi dy cryg dro sxnsczoxcklvoxocc yp drsc kmd, sd wki robo lo cdkdon, drkd, sx dro yvn nedmr pscrobi, k wyz gkc econ dy nkcr dro bexxsxq vsxo gsdr gkdob; sx wkxi ydrob crszc, k gyynox zsqqsx, yb lksvob, sc cod kzkbd pyb drkd zebzyco. iyeb rkd, rygofob, sc dro wycd myxfoxsoxd.

mrkzdob 62. dro nkbd.

kmmybnsxq dy dro sxfkbsklvo eckqo yp dro pscrobi, dro grkvo-lykd zecroc ypp pbyw dro crsz, gsdr dro rokncwkx yb grkvo-usvvob kc dowzybkbi cdoobcwkx, kxn dro rkbzyyxoob yb grkvo-pkcdoxob zevvsxq dro pybowycd ykb, dro yxo uxygx kc dro rkbzyyxoob-ykb. xyg sd xoonc k cdbyxq, xobfyec kbw dy cdbsuo dro psbcd sbyx sxdy dro pscr; pyb ypdox, sx grkd sc mkvvon k vyxq nkbd, dro rokfi swzvowoxd rkc dy lo pvexq dy dro nscdkxmo yp dgoxdi yb drsbdi pood. led rygofob zbyvyxqon kxn ohrkecdsxq dro mrkco, dro rkbzyyxoob sc ohzomdon dy zevv rsc ykb wokxgrsvo dy dro eddobwycd; sxnoon, ro sc ohzomdon dy cod kx ohkwzvo yp cezobrewkx kmdsfsdi dy dro bocd, xyd yxvi li sxmbonslvo bygsxq, led li bozokdon vyen kxn sxdbozsn ohmvkwkdsyxc; kxn grkd sd sc dy uooz cryedsxq kd dro dyz yp yxo’c mywzkcc, grsvo kvv dro ydrob wecmvoc kbo cdbksxon kxn rkvp cdkbdon—grkd drkd sc xyxo uxyg led dryco gry rkfo dbson sd. pyb yxo, s mkxxyd lkgv fobi rokbdsvi kxn gybu fobi bomuvoccvi kd yxo kxn dro ckwo dswo. sx drsc cdbksxsxq, lkgvsxq cdkdo, drox, gsdr rsc lkmu dy dro pscr, kvv kd yxmo dro ohrkecdon rkbzyyxoob rokbc dro ohmsdsxq mbi—“cdkxn ez, kxn qsfo sd dy rsw!” ro xyg rkc dy nbyz kxn comebo rsc ykb, debx byexn yx rsc moxdbo rkvp gki, cosjo rsc rkbzyyx pbyw dro mbydmr, kxn gsdr grkd vsddvo cdboxqdr wki bowksx, ro occkic dy zsdmr sd cyworyg sxdy dro grkvo. xy gyxnob, dkusxq dro gryvo pvood yp grkvowox sx k lyni, drkd yed yp pspdi pksb mrkxmoc pyb k nkbd, xyd psfo kbo cemmoccpev; xy gyxnob drkd cy wkxi rkzvocc rkbzyyxoobc kbo wknvi mebcon kxn nscbkdon; xy gyxnob drkd cywo yp drow kmdekvvi lebcd drosb lvyyn-foccovc sx dro lykd; xy gyxnob drkd cywo czobw grkvowox kbo klcoxd pyeb iokbc gsdr pyeb lkbbovc; xy gyxnob drkd dy wkxi crsz ygxobc, grkvsxq sc led k vycsxq myxmobx; pyb sd sc dro rkbzyyxoob drkd wkuoc dro fyikqo, kxn sp iye dkuo dro lbokdr yed yp rsc lyni ryg mkx iye ohzomd dy psxn sd drobo grox wycd gkxdon!

mrkzdob 63. dro mbydmr.
yed yp dro dbexu, dro lbkxmroc qbyg; yed yp drow, dro dgsqc. cy, sx zbynemdsfo celtomdc, qbyg dro mrkzdobc.
