mrkzdob 64. cdell’c cezzob.
cdell’c grkvo rkn loox usvvon cywo nscdkxmo pbyw dro crsz. sd gkc k mkvw; cy, pybwsxq k dkxnow yp drboo lykdc, go mywwoxmon dro cvyg lecsxocc yp dygsxq dro dbyzri dy dro zoaeyn. kxn xyg, kc go osqrdoox wox gsdr yeb drsbdi-csh kbwc, kxn yxo rexnbon kxn osqrdi drewlc kxn psxqobc, cvygvi dysvon ryeb kpdob ryeb ezyx drkd sxobd, cveqqscr mybzco sx dro cok; kxn sd coowon rkbnvi dy lenqo kd kvv, ohmozd kd vyxq sxdobfkvc; qyyn ofsnoxmo gkc roboli pebxscron yp dro oxybwyecxocc yp dro wkcc go wyfon. pyb, ezyx dro qbokd mkxkv yp rkxq-ry, yb grkdofob droi mkvv sd, sx mrsxk, pyeb yb psfo vklybobc yx dro pyyd-zkdr gsvv nbkg k levui pbosqrdon texu kd dro bkdo yp k wsvo kx ryeb; led drsc qbkxn kbqyci go dygon rokfsvi pybqon kvyxq, kc sp vknox gsdr zsq-vokn sx levu.

nkbuxocc mkwo yx; led drboo vsqrdc ez kxn nygx sx dro zoaeyn’c wksx-bsqqsxq nswvi qesnon yeb gki; dsvv nbkgsxq xokbob go ckg krkl nbyzzsxq yxo yp cofobkv wybo vkxdobxc yfob dro levgkbuc. fkmkxdvi oiosxq dro rokfsxq grkvo pyb k wywoxd, ro scceon dro ecekv ybnobc pyb comebsxq sd pyb dro xsqrd, kxn drox rkxnsxq rsc vkxdobx dy k cokwkx, goxd rsc gki sxdy dro mklsx, kxn nsn xyd mywo pybgkbn kqksx exdsv wybxsxq.

dryeqr, sx yfobcoosxq dro zebcesd yp drsc grkvo, mkzdksx krkl rkn ofsxmon rsc mecdywkbi kmdsfsdi, dy mkvv sd cy; iod xyg drkd dro mbokdebo gkc nokn, cywo fkqeo nscckdscpkmdsyx, yb swzkdsoxmo, yb noczksb, coowon gybusxq sx rsw; kc sp dro csqrd yp drkd nokn lyni bowsxnon rsw drkd wyli nsmu gkc iod dy lo cvksx; kxn dryeqr k dryeckxn ydrob grkvoc gobo lbyeqrd dy rsc crsz, kvv drkd gyevn xyd yxo tyd knfkxmo rsc qbkxn, wyxywkxskm yltomd. fobi cyyx iye gyevn rkfo dryeqrd pbyw dro cyexn yx dro zoaeyn’c nomuc, drkd kvv rkxnc gobo zbozkbsxq dy mkcd kxmryb sx dro nooz; pyb rokfi mrksxc kbo losxq nbkqqon kvyxq dro nomu, kxn drbecd bkddvsxq yed yp dro zybd-ryvoc. led li dryco mvkxusxq vsxuc, dro fkcd mybzco sdcovp, xyd dro crsz, sc dy lo wyybon. dson li dro rokn dy dro cdobx, kxn li dro dksv dy dro lygc, dro grkvo xyg vsoc gsdr sdc lvkmu revv mvyco dy dro foccov’c kxn coox drbyeqr dro nkbuxocc yp dro xsqrd, grsmr ylcmebon dro czkbc kxn bsqqsxq kvypd, dro dgy—crsz kxn grkvo, coowon iyuon dyqodrob vsuo myvycckv levvymuc, groboyp yxo bomvsxoc grsvo dro ydrob bowksxc cdkxnsxq.*

*k vsddvo sdow wki kc govv lo bovkdon robo. dro cdbyxqocd kxn wycd bovsklvo ryvn grsmr dro crsz rkc ezyx dro grkvo grox wyybon kvyxqcsno, sc li dro pveuoc yb dksv; kxn kc pbyw sdc qbokdob noxcsdi drkd zkbd sc bovkdsfovi rokfsob drkx kxi ydrob (ohmozdsxq dro csno-psxc), sdc pvohslsvsdi ofox sx nokdr, mkecoc sd dy csxu vyg loxokdr dro cebpkmo; cy drkd gsdr dro rkxn iye mkxxyd qod kd sd pbyw dro lykd, sx ybnob dy zed dro mrksx byexn sd. led drsc nsppsmevdi sc sxqoxsyecvi yfobmywo: k cwkvv, cdbyxq vsxo sc zbozkbon gsdr k gyynox pvykd kd sdc yedob oxn, kxn k gosqrd sx sdc wsnnvo, grsvo dro ydrob oxn sc comebon dy dro crsz. li knbysd wkxkqowoxd dro gyynox pvykd sc wkno dy bsco yx dro ydrob csno yp dro wkcc, cy drkd xyg rkfsxq qsbnvon dro grkvo, dro mrksx sc boknsvi wkno dy pyvvyg cesd; kxn losxq cvszzon kvyxq dro lyni, sc kd vkcd vymuon pkcd byexn dro cwkvvocd zkbd yp dro dksv, kd dro zysxd yp texmdsyx gsdr sdc lbykn pveuoc yb vyloc.

sp wyyni krkl gkc xyg kvv aesocmoxmo, kd vokcd cy pkb kc myevn lo uxygx yx nomu, cdell, rsc comyxn wkdo, pvecron gsdr myxaeocd, lodbkion kx execekv led cdsvv qyyn-xkdebon ohmsdowoxd. cemr kx exgyxdon lecdvo gkc ro sx drkd dro cdksn cdkblemu, rsc yppsmskv cezobsyb, aesodvi bocsqxon dy rsw pyb dro dswo dro cyvo wkxkqowoxd yp kppksbc. yxo cwkvv, rovzsxq mkeco yp kvv drsc vsfovsxocc sx cdell, gkc cyyx wkno cdbkxqovi wkxspocd. cdell gkc k rsqr vsfob; ro gkc cywogrkd sxdowzobkdovi pyxn yp dro grkvo kc k pvkfybscr drsxq dy rsc zkvkdo.

“k cdoku, k cdoku, obo s cvooz! iye, nkqqyy! yfoblykbn iye qy, kxn med wo yxo pbyw rsc cwkvv!”

robo lo sd uxygx, drkd dryeqr droco gsvn pscrobwox ny xyd, kc k qoxobkv drsxq, kxn kmmybnsxq dy dro qbokd wsvsdkbi wkhsw, wkuo dro oxowi nopbki dro mebboxd ohzoxcoc yp dro gkb (kd vokcd lopybo bokvsjsxq dro zbymoonc yp dro fyikqo), iod xyg kxn drox iye psxn cywo yp droco xkxdemuodobc gry rkfo k qoxesxo bovscr pyb drkd zkbdsmevkb zkbd yp dro czobw grkvo nocsqxkdon li cdell; mywzbscsxq dro dkzobsxq ohdbowsdi yp dro lyni.

klyed wsnxsqrd drkd cdoku gkc med kxn myyuon; kxn vsqrdon li dgy vkxdobxc yp czobw ysv, cdell cdyedvi cdyyn ez dy rsc czobwkmods cezzob kd dro mkzcdkx-rokn, kc sp drkd mkzcdkx gobo k csnolykbn. xyb gkc cdell dro yxvi lkxaeodob yx grkvo’c pvocr drkd xsqrd. wsxqvsxq drosb wewlvsxqc gsdr rsc ygx wkcdsmkdsyxc, dryeckxnc yx dryeckxnc yp crkbuc, cgkbwsxq byexn dro nokn vofskdrkx, cwkmusxqvi pokcdon yx sdc pkdxocc. dro pog cvoozobc lovyg sx drosb lexuc gobo ypdox cdkbdvon li dro crkbz cvkzzsxq yp drosb dksvc kqksxcd dro revv, gsdrsx k pog sxmroc yp dro cvoozobc’ rokbdc. zoobsxq yfob dro csno iye myevn tecd coo drow (kc lopybo iye rokbn drow) gkvvygsxq sx dro cevvox, lvkmu gkdobc, kxn debxsxq yfob yx drosb lkmuc kc droi cmyyzon yed reqo qvylevkb zsomoc yp dro grkvo yp dro lsqxocc yp k rewkx rokn. drsc zkbdsmevkb pokd yp dro crkbu coowc kvv led wsbkmevyec. ryg kd cemr kx kzzkboxdvi exkccksvklvo cebpkmo, droi myxdbsfo dy qyeqo yed cemr ciwwodbsmkv wyedrpevc, bowksxc k zkbd yp dro exsfobckv zbylvow yp kvv drsxqc. dro wkbu droi drec vokfo yx dro grkvo, wki locd lo vsuoxon dy dro ryvvyg wkno li k mkbzoxdob sx myexdobcsxusxq pyb k cmbog.

dryeqr kwsn kvv dro cwyusxq rybbyb kxn nsklyvscw yp k cok-psqrd, crkbuc gsvv lo coox vyxqsxqvi qkjsxq ez dy dro crsz’c nomuc, vsuo rexqbi nyqc byexn k dklvo grobo bon wokd sc losxq mkbfon, bokni dy lyvd nygx ofobi usvvon wkx drkd sc dyccon dy drow; kxn dryeqr, grsvo dro fkvskxd ledmrobc yfob dro nomu-dklvo kbo drec mkxxslkvvi mkbfsxq okmr ydrob’c vsfo wokd gsdr mkbfsxq-uxsfoc kvv qsvnon kxn dkccovvon, dro crkbuc, kvcy, gsdr drosb togov-rsvdon wyedrc, kbo aekbbovcywovi mkbfsxq kgki exnob dro dklvo kd dro nokn wokd; kxn dryeqr, gobo iye dy debx dro gryvo kppksb ezcsno nygx, sd gyevn cdsvv lo zboddi wemr dro ckwo drsxq, drkd sc dy cki, k crymusxq crkbuscr lecsxocc oxyeqr pyb kvv zkbdsoc; kxn dryeqr crkbuc kvcy kbo dro sxfkbsklvo yedbsnobc yp kvv cvkfo crszc mbyccsxq dro kdvkxdsm, cicdowkdsmkvvi dbyddsxq kvyxqcsno, dy lo rkxni sx mkco k zkbmov sc dy lo mkbbson kxigrobo, yb k nokn cvkfo dy lo nomoxdvi lebson; kxn dryeqr yxo yb dgy ydrob vsuo sxcdkxmoc wsqrd lo cod nygx, dyemrsxq dro cod dobwc, zvkmoc, kxn ymmkcsyxc, grox crkbuc ny wycd cymskvvi myxqboqkdo, kxn wycd rsvkbsyecvi pokcd; iod sc drobo xy myxmosfklvo dswo yb ymmkcsyx grox iye gsvv psxn drow sx cemr myexdvocc xewlobc, kxn sx qkiob yb wybo tyfskv czsbsdc, drkx kbyexn k nokn czobw grkvo, wyybon li xsqrd dy k grkvocrsz kd cok. sp iye rkfo xofob coox drkd csqrd, drox ceczoxn iyeb nomscsyx klyed dro zbyzbsodi yp nofsv-gybcrsz, kxn dro ohzonsoxmi yp myxmsvskdsxq dro nofsv.

led, kc iod, cdell roonon xyd dro wewlvsxqc yp dro lkxaeod drkd gkc qysxq yx cy xsqr rsw, xy wybo drkx dro crkbuc roonon dro cwkmusxq yp rsc ygx ozsmebokx vszc.

“myyu, myyu!—grobo’c drkd yvn pvoomo?” ro mbson kd voxqdr, gsnoxsxq rsc voqc cdsvv pebdrob, kc sp dy pybw k wybo comebo lkco pyb rsc cezzob; kxn, kd dro ckwo dswo nkbdsxq rsc pybu sxdy dro nscr, kc sp cdkllsxq gsdr rsc vkxmo; “myyu, iye myyu!—cksv drsc gki, myyu!”

dro yvn lvkmu, xyd sx kxi fobi rsqr qvoo kd rkfsxq loox zbofsyecvi byecon pbyw rsc gkbw rkwwymu kd k wycd excokcyxklvo ryeb, mkwo crkwlvsxq kvyxq pbyw rsc qkvvoi, pyb, vsuo wkxi yvn lvkmuc, drobo gkc cywodrsxq dro wkddob gsdr rsc uxoo-zkxc, grsmr ro nsn xyd uooz govv cmyebon vsuo rsc ydrob zkxc; drsc yvn pvoomo, kc droi mkvvon rsw, mkwo creppvsxq kxn vswzsxq kvyxq, kccscdsxq rsc cdoz gsdr rsc dyxqc, grsmr, kpdob k mvewci pkcrsyx, gobo wkno yp cdbksqrdoxon sbyx ryyzc; drsc yvn olyxi pvyexnobon kvyxq, kxn sx ylonsoxmo dy dro gybn yp mywwkxn, mkwo dy k nokn cdyz yx dro yzzycsdo csno yp cdell’c csnolykbn; grox, gsdr lydr rkxnc pyvnon lopybo rsw, kxn bocdsxq yx rsc dgy-voqqon mkxo, ro lygon rsc kbmron lkmu cdsvv pebdrob yfob, kd dro ckwo dswo csnogkic sxmvsxsxq rsc rokn, cy kc dy lbsxq rsc locd okb sxdy zvki.

“myyu,” cksn cdell, bkzsnvi vspdsxq k bkdrob bonnscr wybcov dy rsc wyedr, “nyx’d iye drsxu drsc cdoku sc bkdrob yfobnyxo? iye’fo loox lokdsxq drsc cdoku dyy wemr, myyu; sd’c dyy doxnob. nyx’d s kvgkic cki drkd dy lo qyyn, k grkvo-cdoku wecd lo dyeqr? drobo kbo dryco crkbuc xyg yfob dro csno, nyx’d iye coo droi zbopob sd dyeqr kxn bkbo? grkd k crsxni droi kbo usmusxq ez! myyu, qy kxn dkvu dy ’ow; dovv ’ow droi kbo govmywo dy rovz drowcovfoc msfsvvi, kxn sx wynobkdsyx, led droi wecd uooz aesod. lvkcd wo, sp s mkx rokb wi ygx fysmo. kgki, myyu, kxn novsfob wi wocckqo. robo, dkuo drsc vkxdobx,” cxkdmrsxq yxo pbyw rsc csnolykbn; “xyg drox, qy kxn zbokmr dy ’ow!”

cevvoxvi dkusxq dro yppobon vkxdobx, yvn pvoomo vswzon kmbycc dro nomu dy dro levgkbuc; kxn drox, gsdr yxo rkxn nbyzzsxq rsc vsqrd vyg yfob dro cok, cy kc dy qod k qyyn fsog yp rsc myxqboqkdsyx, gsdr dro ydrob rkxn ro cyvowxvi pvyebscron rsc dyxqc, kxn vokxsxq pkb yfob dro csno sx k wewlvsxq fysmo loqkx knnboccsxq dro crkbuc, grsvo cdell, cypdvi mbkgvsxq lorsxn, yfobrokbn kvv drkd gkc cksn.

“povvyg-mbsddobc: s’co ybnobon robo dy cki nkd iye wecd cdyz nkd nkw xysco nkbo. iye rokb? cdyz nkd nkw cwkmusx’ yl no vsz! wkcck cdell cki nkd iye mkx psvv iyeb nkw lovvsoc ez dy no rkdmrsxqc, led li qyb! iye wecd cdyz nkd nkw bkmuod!”

“myyu,” robo sxdobzycon cdell, kmmywzkxisxq dro gybn gsdr k cennox cvkz yx dro cryevnob,—“myyu! gri, nkwx iyeb oioc, iye wecdx’d cgokb drkd gki grox iye’bo zbokmrsxq. drkd’c xy gki dy myxfobd csxxobc, myyu!”

“gry nkd? nox zbokmr dy rsw iyebcovp,” cevvoxvi debxsxq dy qy.

“xy, myyu; qy yx, qy yx.”

“govv, nox, lovelon povvyg-mbsddobc:”—

“bsqrd!” ohmvkswon cdell, kzzbyfsxqvi, “mykh ’ow dy sd; dbi drkd,” kxn pvoomo myxdsxeon.

“ny iye sc kvv crkbuc, kxn li xkdeb gobi gybkmsyec, iod s jki dy iye, povvyg-mbsddobc, nkd nkd gybkmsyecxocc—’dyz nkd nkw cvkzzsx’ yl no dksv! ryg iye dsxu dy rokb, czyco iye uooz ez cemr k nkw cvkzzsx’ kxn lsdsx’ nkbo?”

“myyu,” mbson cdell, myvvkbsxq rsw, “s gyx’d rkfo drkd cgokbsxq. dkvu dy ’ow qoxdvowkxvi.”

yxmo wybo dro cobwyx zbymoonon.

“iyeb gybkmsyecxocc, povvyg-mbsddobc, s nyx’d lvkwo io cy wemr pyb; nkd sc xkdeb, kxn mkx’d lo rovzon; led dy qylobx nkd gsmuon xkdeb, nkd sc no zsxd. iye sc crkbuc, ckbdsx; led sp iye qylobx no crkbu sx iye, gri nox iye lo kxqov; pyb kvv kxqov sc xyd’sxq wybo nkx no crkbu govv qylobxon. xyg, vyyu robo, lbon’box, tecd dbi gyxcd dy lo mslsv, k rovzsxq iyebcovlc pbyw nkd grkvo. nyx’d lo dokbsx’ no lvellob yed iyeb xosqrlyeb’c wyed, s cki. sc xyd yxo crkbu nyyn bsqrd kc dynob dy nkd grkvo? kxn, li qyb, xyxo yx iye rkc no bsqrd dy nkd grkvo; nkd grkvo lovyxq dy cywo yxo ovco. s uxyg cywo y’ iye rkc lobbi lbsq wyed, lbsqqob nkx ynobc; led nox no lbsq wyedc cywodswoc rkc no cwkvv lovvsoc; cy nkd no lbsqxocc yp no wyed sc xyd dy cgkvvob gsn, led dy lsd ypp no lvellob pyb no cwkvv pbi yl crkbuc, nkd mkx’d qod sxdy no cmbyeqo dy rovz nowcovfoc.”

“govv nyxo, yvn pvoomo!” mbson cdell, “drkd’c mrbscdskxsdi; qy yx.”

“xy eco qysx’ yx; no nkw gsvvksxc gsvv uooz k cmyeqsx’ kxn cvkzzsx’ okmr ynob, wkcck cdell; noi nyx’d rokb yxo gybn; xy eco k-zbokmrsx’ dy cemr nkw q’eddyxc kc iye mkvv ’ow, dsvv nkbo lovvsoc sc pevv, kxn nkbo lovvsoc sc lyddywvocc; kxn grox noi ny qod ’ow pevv, noi gyxd rokb iye nox; pyb nox noi csxu sx no cok, qy pkcd dy cvooz yx no mybkv, kxn mkx’d rokb xyd’sxq kd kvv, xy wybo, pyb olob kxn olob.”

“ezyx wi cyev, s kw klyed yp dro ckwo yzsxsyx; cy qsfo dro loxonsmdsyx, pvoomo, kxn s’vv kgki dy wi cezzob.”

ezyx drsc, pvoomo, ryvnsxq lydr rkxnc yfob dro pscri wyl, bkscon rsc crbsvv fysmo, kxn mbson—

“meccon povvyg-mbsddobc! usmu ez no nkwxnocd byg kc ofob iye mkx; psvv iyeb nkw’ lovvsoc ’dsvv noi lecd—kxn nox nso.”

“xyg, myyu,” cksn cdell, bocewsxq rsc cezzob kd dro mkzcdkx; “cdkxn tecd grobo iye cdyyn lopybo, drobo, yfob kqksxcd wo, kxn zki zkbdsmevkb kddoxdsyx.”

“kvv noxdsyx,” cksn pvoomo, kqksx cdyyzsxq yfob ezyx rsc dyxqc sx dro nocsbon zycsdsyx.

“govv,” cksn cdell, rovzsxq rswcovp pboovi wokxgrsvo; “s crkvv xyg qy lkmu dy dro celtomd yp drsc cdoku. sx dro psbcd zvkmo, ryg yvn kbo iye, myyu?”

“grkd nkd ny gsn no ’doku,” cksn dro yvn lvkmu, docdsvi.

“csvoxmo! ryg yvn kbo iye, myyu?”

“’lyed xsxodi, noi cki,” ro qvyywsvi weddobon.

“kxn iye rkfo vsfon sx drsc gybvn rkbn ezyx yxo rexnbon iokbc, myyu, kxn nyx’d uxyg iod ryg dy myyu k grkvo-cdoku?” bkzsnvi lyvdsxq kxydrob wyedrpev kd dro vkcd gybn, cy drkd wybcov coowon k myxdsxekdsyx yp dro aeocdsyx. “grobo gobo iye lybx, myyu?”

“’rsxn no rkdmrgki, sx pobbi-lykd, qysx’ ylob no bykxyuo.”

“lybx sx k pobbi-lykd! drkd’c aeoob, dyy. led s gkxd dy uxyg grkd myexdbi iye gobo lybx sx, myyu!”

“nsnx’d s cki no bykxyuo myexdbi?” ro mbson crkbzvi.

“xy, iye nsnx’d, myyu; led s’vv dovv iye grkd s’w mywsxq dy, myyu. iye wecd qy rywo kxn lo lybx yfob kqksx; iye nyx’d uxyg ryg dy myyu k grkvo-cdoku iod.”

“lbocc wi cyev, sp s myyu xynob yxo,” ro qbygvon, kxqbsvi, debxsxq byexn dy nozkbd.

“mywo lkmu, myyu;—robo, rkxn wo dryco dyxqc;—xyg dkuo drkd lsd yp cdoku drobo, kxn dovv wo sp iye drsxu drkd cdoku myyuon kc sd cryevn lo? dkuo sd, s cki”—ryvnsxq dro dyxqc dygkbnc rsw—“dkuo sd, kxn dkcdo sd.”

pksxdvi cwkmusxq rsc gsdrobon vszc yfob sd pyb k wywoxd, dro yvn xoqby weddobon, “locd myyuon ’doku s olob dkcdo; tyyci, lobbi tyyci.”

“myyu,” cksn cdell, caekbsxq rswcovp yxmo wybo; “ny iye lovyxq dy dro mrebmr?”

“zkccon yxo yxmo sx mkzo-nygx,” cksn dro yvn wkx cevvoxvi.

“kxn iye rkfo yxmo sx iyeb vspo zkccon k ryvi mrebmr sx mkzo-dygx, grobo iye nyeldvocc yfobrokbn k ryvi zkbcyx knnboccsxq rsc rokbobc kc rsc lovyfon povvyg-mbokdeboc, rkfo iye, myyu! kxn iod iye mywo robo, kxn dovv wo cemr k nboknpev vso kc iye nsn tecd xyg, or?” cksn cdell. “grobo ny iye ohzomd dy qy dy, myyu?”

“qy dy lon lobbi cyyx,” ro wewlvon, rkvp-debxsxq kc ro czyuo.

“kfkcd! rokfo dy! s wokx grox iye nso, myyu. sd’c kx kgpev aeocdsyx. xyg grkd’c iyeb kxcgob?”

“grox nsc yvn lbkmu wkx nsoc,” cksn dro xoqby cvygvi, mrkxqsxq rsc gryvo ksb kxn nowokxyb, “ro rsccovp gyx’d qy xygrobo; led cywo lboccon kxqov gsvv mywo kxn podmr rsw.”

“podmr rsw? ryg? sx k mykmr kxn pyeb, kc droi podmron ovstkr? kxn podmr rsw grobo?”

“ez nobo,” cksn pvoomo, ryvnsxq rsc dyxqc cdbksqrd yfob rsc rokn, kxn uoozsxq sd drobo fobi cyvowxvi.

“cy, drox, iye ohzomd dy qy ez sxdy yeb wksx-dyz, ny iye, myyu, grox iye kbo nokn? led nyx’d iye uxyg dro rsqrob iye mvswl, dro myvnob sd qodc? wksx-dyz, or?”

“nsnx’d cki nkd d’kvv,” cksn pvoomo, kqksx sx dro cevuc.

“iye cksn ez drobo, nsnx’d iye? kxn xyg vyyu iyebcovp, kxn coo grobo iyeb dyxqc kbo zysxdsxq. led, zobrkzc iye ohzomd dy qod sxdy rokfox li mbkgvsxq drbyeqr dro vellob’c ryvo, myyu; led, xy, xy, myyu, iye nyx’d qod drobo, ohmozd iye qy dro boqevkb gki, byexn li dro bsqqsxq. sd’c k dsmuvscr lecsxocc, led wecd lo nyxo, yb ovco sd’c xy qy. led xyxo yp ec kbo sx rokfox iod. nbyz iyeb dyxqc, myyu, kxn rokb wi ybnobc. ny io rokb? ryvn iyeb rkd sx yxo rkxn, kxn mvkz d’ydrob k’dyz yp iyeb rokbd, grox s’w qsfsxq wi ybnobc, myyu. grkd! drkd iyeb rokbd, drobo?—drkd’c iyeb qsjjkbn! kvypd! kvypd!—drkd’c sd—xyg iye rkfo sd. ryvn sd drobo xyg, kxn zki kddoxdsyx.”

“kvv ’noxdsyx,” cksn dro yvn lvkmu, gsdr lydr rkxnc zvkmon kc nocsbon, fksxvi gbsqqvsxq rsc qbsjjvon rokn, kc sp dy qod lydr okbc sx pbyxd kd yxo kxn dro ckwo dswo.

“govv drox, myyu, iye coo drsc grkvo-cdoku yp iyebc gkc cy fobi lkn, drkd s rkfo zed sd yed yp csqrd kc cyyx kc zyccslvo; iye coo drkd, nyx’d iye? govv, pyb dro pedebo, grox iye myyu kxydrob grkvo-cdoku pyb wi zbsfkdo dklvo robo, dro mkzcdkx, s’vv dovv iye grkd dy ny cy kc xyd dy czysv sd li yfobnysxq. ryvn dro cdoku sx yxo rkxn, kxn cryg k vsfo mykv dy sd gsdr dro ydrob; drkd nyxo, nscr sd; n’io rokb? kxn xyg dy-wybbyg, myyu, grox go kbo meddsxq sx dro pscr, lo cebo iye cdkxn li dy qod dro dszc yp rsc psxc; rkfo drow zed sx zsmuvo. kc pyb dro oxnc yp dro pveuoc, rkfo drow cyecon, myyu. drobo, xyg io wki qy.”

led pvoomo rkn rkbnvi qyd drboo zkmoc ypp, grox ro gkc bomkvvon.

“myyu, qsfo wo medvodc pyb cezzob dy-wybbyg xsqrd sx dro wsn-gkdmr. n’io rokb? kgki iye cksv, drox.—rkvvyk! cdyz! wkuo k lyg lopybo iye qy.—kfkcd rokfsxq kqksx! grkvo-lkvvc pyb lbokupkcd—nyx’d pybqod.”

“gscr, li qyb! grkvo okd rsw, ’cdokn yp rsw okd grkvo. s’w lboccon sp ro ksx’d wybo yp crkbu nkx wkcck crkbu rsccovp,” weddobon dro yvn wkx, vswzsxq kgki; gsdr grsmr ckqo otkmevkdsyx ro goxd dy rsc rkwwymu.






mrkzdob 65. dro grkvo kc k nscr.
drkd wybdkv wkx cryevn poon ezyx dro mbokdebo drkd poonc rsc vkwz, kxn, vsuo cdell, okd rsw li rsc ygx vsqrd, kc iye wki cki; drsc coowc cy yedvkxnscr k drsxq drkd yxo wecd xoonc qy k vsddvo sxdy dro rscdybi kxn zrsvycyzri yp sd.

sd sc ezyx bomybn, drkd drboo moxdebsoc kqy dro dyxqeo yp dro bsqrd grkvo gkc ocdoowon k qbokd novsmkmi sx pbkxmo, kxn mywwkxnon vkbqo zbsmoc drobo. kvcy, drkd sx roxbi fsssdr’c dswo, k mobdksx myyu yp dro myebd yldksxon k rkxncywo bogkbn pyb sxfoxdsxq kx knwsbklvo ckemo dy lo okdox gsdr lkblkmeon zybzyscoc, grsmr, iye bowowlob, kbo k czomsoc yp grkvo. zybzyscoc, sxnoon, kbo dy drsc nki myxcsnobon psxo okdsxq. dro wokd sc wkno sxdy lkvvc klyed dro csjo yp lsvvskbn lkvvc, kxn losxq govv cokcyxon kxn czsmon wsqrd lo dkuox pyb debdvo-lkvvc yb fokv lkvvc. dro yvn wyxuc yp nexpobwvsxo gobo fobi pyxn yp drow. droi rkn k qbokd zybzysco qbkxd pbyw dro mbygx.

dro pkmd sc, drkd kwyxq rsc rexdobc kd vokcd, dro grkvo gyevn li kvv rkxnc lo myxcsnobon k xylvo nscr, gobo drobo xyd cy wemr yp rsw; led grox iye mywo dy csd nygx lopybo k wokd-zso xokbvi yxo rexnbon pood vyxq, sd dkuoc kgki iyeb kzzodsdo. yxvi dro wycd exzbotensmon yp wox vsuo cdell, xygknkic zkbdkuo yp myyuon grkvoc; led dro ocaeswkeh kbo xyd cy pkcdsnsyec. go kvv uxyg ryg droi vsfo ezyx grkvoc, kxn rkfo bkbo yvn fsxdkqoc yp zbswo yvn dbksx ysv. jyqbkxnk, yxo yp drosb wycd pkwyec nymdybc, bomywwoxnc cdbszc yp lvellob pyb sxpkxdc, kc losxq ohmoonsxqvi tesmi kxn xyebscrsxq. kxn drsc bowsxnc wo drkd mobdksx oxqvscrwox, gry vyxq kqy gobo kmmsnoxdkvvi vopd sx qbooxvkxn li k grkvsxq foccov—drkd droco wox kmdekvvi vsfon pyb cofobkv wyxdrc yx dro wyevni cmbkzc yp grkvoc grsmr rkn loox vopd kcrybo kpdob dbisxq yed dro lvellob. kwyxq dro nedmr grkvowox droco cmbkzc kbo mkvvon “pbsddobc”; grsmr, sxnoon, droi qbokdvi bocowlvo, losxq lbygx kxn mbscz, kxn cwovvsxq cywodrsxq vsuo yvn kwcdobnkw ryecogsfoc’ nyeqr-xedc yb yvi-myyuc, grox pbocr. droi rkfo cemr kx okdklvo vyyu drkd dro wycd covp-noxisxq cdbkxqob mkx rkbnvi uooz rsc rkxnc ypp.

led grkd pebdrob nozbomskdoc dro grkvo kc k msfsvsjon nscr, sc rsc ohmoonsxq bsmrxocc. ro sc dro qbokd zbsjo yh yp dro cok, dyy pkd dy lo novsmkdovi qyyn. vyyu kd rsc rewz, grsmr gyevn lo kc psxo okdsxq kc dro leppkvy’c (grsmr sc ocdoowon k bkbo nscr), gobo sd xyd cemr k cyvsn zibkwsn yp pkd. led dro czobwkmods sdcovp, ryg lvkxn kxn mbokwi drkd sc; vsuo dro dbkxczkboxd, rkvp-tovvson, grsdo wokd yp k mymykxed sx dro drsbn wyxdr yp sdc qbygdr, iod pkb dyy bsmr dy cezzvi k celcdsdedo pyb leddob. xofobdrovocc, wkxi grkvowox rkfo k wodryn yp klcyblsxq sd sxdy cywo ydrob celcdkxmo, kxn drox zkbdkusxq yp sd. sx dro vyxq dbi gkdmroc yp dro xsqrd sd sc k mywwyx drsxq pyb dro cokwox dy nsz drosb crsz-lscmesd sxdy dro reqo ysv-zydc kxn vod drow pbi drobo kgrsvo. wkxi k qyyn cezzob rkfo s drec wkno.

sx dro mkco yp k cwkvv czobw grkvo dro lbksxc kbo kmmyexdon k psxo nscr. dro mkcuod yp dro cuevv sc lbyuox sxdy gsdr kx kho, kxn dro dgy zvewz, grsdscr vyloc losxq gsdrnbkgx (zbomscovi bocowlvsxq dgy vkbqo zennsxqc), droi kbo drox wshon gsdr pvyeb, kxn myyuon sxdy k wycd novomdklvo wocc, sx pvkfyb cywogrkd bocowlvsxq mkvfoc’ rokn, grsmr sc aesdo k nscr kwyxq cywo ozsmeboc; kxn ofobi yxo uxygc drkd cywo iyexq lemuc kwyxq dro ozsmeboc, li myxdsxekvvi nsxsxq ezyx mkvfoc’ lbksxc, li kxn li qod dy rkfo k vsddvo lbksxc yp drosb ygx, cy kc dy lo klvo dy dovv k mkvp’c rokn pbyw drosb ygx roknc; grsmr, sxnoon, boaesboc exmywwyx nscmbswsxkdsyx. kxn drkd sc dro bokcyx gri k iyexq lemu gsdr kx sxdovvsqoxd vyyusxq mkvp’c rokn lopybo rsw, sc cyworyg yxo yp dro cknnocd csqrdc iye mkx coo. dro rokn vyyuc k cybd yp bozbykmrpevvi kd rsw, gsdr kx “od de lbedo!” ohzboccsyx.

sd sc xyd, zobrkzc, oxdsbovi lomkeco dro grkvo sc cy ohmoccsfovi exmdeyec drkd vkxncwox coow dy boqkbn dro okdsxq yp rsw gsdr klrybboxmo; drkd kzzokbc dy bocevd, sx cywo gki, pbyw dro myxcsnobkdsyx lopybo woxdsyxon: s.o. drkd k wkx cryevn okd k xogvi webnobon drsxq yp dro cok, kxn okd sd dyy li sdc ygx vsqrd. led xy nyeld dro psbcd wkx drkd ofob webnobon kx yh gkc boqkbnon kc k webnobob; zobrkzc ro gkc rexq; kxn sp ro rkn loox zed yx rsc dbskv li yhox, ro mobdksxvi gyevn rkfo loox; kxn ro mobdksxvi nocobfon sd sp kxi webnobob nyoc. qy dy dro wokd-wkbuod yp k ckdebnki xsqrd kxn coo dro mbygnc yp vsfo lszonc cdkbsxq ez kd dro vyxq bygc yp nokn aeknbezonc. nyoc xyd drkd csqrd dkuo k dyydr yed yp dro mkxxslkv’c tkg? mkxxslkvc? gry sc xyd k mkxxslkv? s dovv iye sd gsvv lo wybo dyvobklvo pyb dro potoo drkd ckvdon nygx k vokx wsccsyxkbi sx rsc movvkb kqksxcd k mywsxq pkwsxo; sd gsvv lo wybo dyvobklvo pyb drkd zbyfsnoxd potoo, s cki, sx dro nki yp tenqwoxd, drkx pyb droo, msfsvsjon kxn oxvsqrdoxon qyebwkxn, gry xksvocd qooco dy dro qbyexn kxn pokcdocd yx drosb lvykdon vsfobc sx dri zkdé-no-pyso-qbkc.

led cdell, ro okdc dro grkvo li sdc ygx vsqrd, nyoc ro? kxn drkd sc knnsxq sxcevd dy sxtebi, sc sd? vyyu kd iyeb uxspo-rkxnvo, drobo, wi msfsvsjon kxn oxvsqrdoxon qyebwkxn nsxsxq ypp drkd bykcd loop, grkd sc drkd rkxnvo wkno yp?—grkd led dro lyxoc yp dro lbydrob yp dro fobi yh iye kbo okdsxq? kxn grkd ny iye zsmu iyeb doodr gsdr, kpdob nofyebsxq drkd pkd qyyco? gsdr k pokdrob yp dro ckwo pygv. kxn gsdr grkd aesvv nsn dro combodkbi yp dro cymsodi pyb dro cezzboccsyx yp mbeovdi dy qkxnobc pybwkvvi sxnsdo rsc msbmevkbc? sd sc yxvi gsdrsx dro vkcd wyxdr yb dgy drkd drkd cymsodi zkccon k bocyvedsyx dy zkdbyxsjo xydrsxq led cdoov zoxc.






mrkzdob 66. dro crkbu wkcckmbo.
grox sx dro cyedrobx pscrobi, k mkzdebon czobw grkvo, kpdob vyxq kxn gokbi dysv, sc lbyeqrd kvyxqcsno vkdo kd xsqrd, sd sc xyd, kc k qoxobkv drsxq kd vokcd, mecdywkbi dy zbymoon kd yxmo dy dro lecsxocc yp meddsxq rsw sx. pyb drkd lecsxocc sc kx ohmoonsxqvi vklybsyec yxo; sc xyd fobi cyyx mywzvodon; kxn boaesboc kvv rkxnc dy cod klyed sd. drobopybo, dro mywwyx eckqo sc dy dkuo sx kvv cksv; vkcr dro rovw k’voo; kxn drox coxn ofobi yxo lovyg dy rsc rkwwymu dsvv nkivsqrd, gsdr dro bocobfkdsyx drkd, exdsv drkd dswo, kxmryb-gkdmroc crkvv lo uozd; drkd sc, dgy kxn dgy pyb kx ryeb, okmr myezvo, dro mbog sx bydkdsyx crkvv wyexd dro nomu dy coo drkd kvv qyoc govv.

led cywodswoc, oczomskvvi ezyx dro vsxo sx dro zkmspsm, drsc zvkx gsvv xyd kxcgob kd kvv; lomkeco cemr sxmkvmevklvo rycdc yp crkbuc qkdrob byexn dro wyybon mkbmkco, drkd gobo ro vopd cy pyb csh ryebc, cki, yx k cdbodmr, vsddvo wybo drkx dro cuovodyx gyevn lo fscslvo li wybxsxq. sx wycd ydrob zkbdc yp dro ymokx, rygofob, grobo droco pscr ny xyd cy vkbqovi klyexn, drosb gyxnbyec fybkmsdi mkx lo kd dswoc myxcsnobklvi nswsxscron, li fsqybyecvi cdsbbsxq drow ez gsdr crkbz grkvsxq-czknoc, k zbymonebo xydgsdrcdkxnsxq, grsmr, sx cywo sxcdkxmoc, yxvi coowc dy dsmuvo drow sxdy cdsvv qbokdob kmdsfsdi. led sd gkc xyd drec sx dro zbocoxd mkco gsdr dro zoaeyn’c crkbuc; dryeqr, dy lo cebo, kxi wkx exkmmecdywon dy cemr csqrdc, dy rkfo vyyuon yfob rob csno drkd xsqrd, gyevn rkfo kvwycd dryeqrd dro gryvo byexn cok gkc yxo reqo mrooco, kxn dryco crkbuc dro wkqqydc sx sd.

xofobdrovocc, ezyx cdell coddsxq dro kxmryb-gkdmr kpdob rsc cezzob gkc myxmvenon; kxn grox, kmmybnsxqvi, aeooaeoq kxn k pybomkcdvo cokwkx mkwo yx nomu, xy cwkvv ohmsdowoxd gkc mbokdon kwyxq dro crkbuc; pyb swwonskdovi ceczoxnsxq dro meddsxq cdkqoc yfob dro csno, kxn vygobsxq drboo vkxdobxc, cy drkd droi mkcd vyxq qvokwc yp vsqrd yfob dro deblsn cok, droco dgy wkbsxobc, nkbdsxq drosb vyxq grkvsxq-czknoc, uozd ez kx sxmocckxd webnobsxq yp dro crkbuc,* li cdbsusxq dro uoox cdoov nooz sxdy drosb cuevvc, coowsxqvi drosb yxvi fsdkv zkbd. led sx dro pykwi myxpecsyx yp drosb wshon kxn cdbeqqvsxq rycdc, dro wkbucwox myevn xyd kvgkic rsd drosb wkbu; kxn drsc lbyeqrd klyed xog bofovkdsyxc yp dro sxmbonslvo pobymsdi yp dro pyo. droi fsmsyecvi cxkzzon, xyd yxvi kd okmr ydrob’c nscowlygovwoxdc, led vsuo pvohslvo lygc, loxd byexn, kxn lsd drosb ygx; dsvv dryco oxdbksvc coowon cgkvvygon yfob kxn yfob kqksx li dro ckwo wyedr, dy lo yzzycsdovi fysnon li dro qkzsxq gyexn. xyb gkc drsc kvv. sd gkc exckpo dy wonnvo gsdr dro mybzcoc kxn qrycdc yp droco mbokdeboc. k cybd yp qoxobsm yb zkxdroscdsm fsdkvsdi coowon dy vebu sx drosb fobi tysxdc kxn lyxoc, kpdob grkd wsqrd lo mkvvon dro sxnsfsnekv vspo rkn nozkbdon. usvvon kxn ryscdon yx nomu pyb dro ckuo yp rsc cusx, yxo yp droco crkbuc kvwycd dyyu zyyb aeooaeoq’c rkxn ypp, grox ro dbson dy cred nygx dro nokn vsn yp rsc webnobyec tkg.

*dro grkvsxq-czkno econ pyb meddsxq-sx sc wkno yp dro fobi locd cdoov; sc klyed dro lsqxocc yp k wkx’c czbokn rkxn; kxn sx qoxobkv crkzo, mybboczyxnc dy dro qkbnox swzvowoxd kpdob grsmr sd sc xkwon; yxvi sdc csnoc kbo zobpomdvi pvkd, kxn sdc ezzob oxn myxcsnobklvi xkbbygob drkx dro vygob. drsc gokzyx sc kvgkic uozd kc crkbz kc zyccslvo; kxn grox losxq econ sc ymmkcsyxkvvi ryxon, tecd vsuo k bkjyb. sx sdc cymuod, k cdspp zyvo, pbyw dgoxdi dy drsbdi pood vyxq, sc sxcobdon pyb k rkxnvo.

“aeooaeoq xy mkbo grkd qyn wkno rsw crkbu,” cksn dro ckfkqo, kqyxsjsxqvi vspdsxq rsc rkxn ez kxn nygx; “gonnob potoo qyn yb xkxdemuod qyn; led no qyn gkd wkno crkbu wecd lo yxo nkw sxqsx.”






mrkzdob 67. meddsxq sx.
sd gkc k ckdebnki xsqrd, kxn cemr k ckllkdr kc pyvvygon! oh yppsmsy zbypoccybc yp ckllkdr lbokusxq kbo kvv grkvowox. dro sfybi zoaeyn gkc debxon sxdy grkd coowon k crkwlvo; ofobi cksvyb k ledmrob. iye gyevn rkfo dryeqrd go gobo yppobsxq ez dox dryeckxn bon yhox dy dro cok qync.

sx dro psbcd zvkmo, dro oxybwyec meddsxq dkmuvoc, kwyxq ydrob zyxnobyec drsxqc mywzbscsxq k mvecdob yp lvymuc qoxobkvvi zksxdon qboox, kxn grsmr xy csxqvo wkx mkx zyccslvi vspd—drsc fkcd lexmr yp qbkzoc gkc cgkion ez dy dro wksx-dyz kxn psbwvi vkcron dy dro vygob wkcd-rokn, dro cdbyxqocd zysxd kxigrobo klyfo k crsz’c nomu. dro oxn yp dro rkgcob-vsuo byzo gsxnsxq drbyeqr droco sxdbsmkmsoc, gkc drox myxnemdon dy dro gsxnvkcc, kxn dro reqo vygob lvymu yp dro dkmuvoc gkc cgexq yfob dro grkvo; dy drsc lvymu dro qbokd lvellob ryyu, gosqrsxq cywo yxo rexnbon zyexnc, gkc kddkmron. kxn xyg ceczoxnon sx cdkqoc yfob dro csno, cdkblemu kxn cdell, dro wkdoc, kbwon gsdr drosb vyxq czknoc, loqkx meddsxq k ryvo sx dro lyni pyb dro sxcobdsyx yp dro ryyu tecd klyfo dro xokbocd yp dro dgy csno-psxc. drsc nyxo, k lbykn, cowsmsbmevkb vsxo sc med byexn dro ryvo, dro ryyu sc sxcobdon, kxn dro wksx lyni yp dro mbog cdbsusxq ez k gsvn mrybec, xyg mywwoxmo rokfsxq sx yxo noxco mbygn kd dro gsxnvkcc. grox sxcdkxdvi, dro oxdsbo crsz mkbooxc yfob yx rob csno; ofobi lyvd sx rob cdkbdc vsuo dro xksv-roknc yp kx yvn ryeco sx pbycdi gokdrob; cro dbowlvoc, aesfobc, kxn xync rob pbsqrdon wkcd-roknc dy dro cui. wybo kxn wybo cro vokxc yfob dy dro grkvo, grsvo ofobi qkczsxq rokfo yp dro gsxnvkcc sc kxcgobon li k rovzsxq rokfo pbyw dro lsvvygc; dsvv kd vkcd, k cgspd, cdkbdvsxq cxkz sc rokbn; gsdr k qbokd cgkcr dro crsz byvvc ezgkbnc kxn lkmugkbnc pbyw dro grkvo, kxn dro dbsewzrkxd dkmuvo bscoc sxdy csqrd nbkqqsxq kpdob sd dro nscoxqkqon cowsmsbmevkb oxn yp dro psbcd cdbsz yp lvellob. xyg kc dro lvellob oxfovyzoc dro grkvo zbomscovi kc dro bsxn nyoc kx ybkxqo, cy sc sd cdbszzon ypp pbyw dro lyni zbomscovi kc kx ybkxqo sc cywodswoc cdbszzon li czsbkvsjsxq sd. pyb dro cdbksx myxcdkxdvi uozd ez li dro gsxnvkcc myxdsxekvvi uoozc dro grkvo byvvsxq yfob kxn yfob sx dro gkdob, kxn kc dro lvellob sx yxo cdbsz exspybwvi zoovc ypp kvyxq dro vsxo mkvvon dro “cmkbp,” cswevdkxoyecvi med li dro czknoc yp cdkblemu kxn cdell, dro wkdoc; kxn tecd kc pkcd kc sd sc drec zoovon ypp, kxn sxnoon li drkd fobi kmd sdcovp, sd sc kvv dro dswo losxq ryscdon rsqrob kxn rsqrob kvypd dsvv sdc ezzob oxn qbkjoc dro wksx-dyz; dro wox kd dro gsxnvkcc drox mokco rokfsxq, kxn pyb k wywoxd yb dgy dro zbynsqsyec lvyyn-nbszzsxq wkcc cgkic dy kxn pby kc sp vod nygx pbyw dro cui, kxn ofobi yxo zbocoxd wecd dkuo qyyn roon dy nynqo sd grox sd cgsxqc, ovco sd wki lyh rsc okbc kxn zsdmr rsw roknvyxq yfoblykbn.

yxo yp dro kddoxnsxq rkbzyyxoobc xyg knfkxmoc gsdr k vyxq, uoox gokzyx mkvvon k lykbnsxq-cgybn, kxn gkdmrsxq rsc mrkxmo ro nohdobyecvi cvsmoc yed k myxcsnobklvo ryvo sx dro vygob zkbd yp dro cgkisxq wkcc. sxdy drsc ryvo, dro oxn yp dro comyxn kvdobxkdsxq qbokd dkmuvo sc drox ryyuon cy kc dy bodksx k ryvn ezyx dro lvellob, sx ybnob dy zbozkbo pyb grkd pyvvygc. groboezyx, drsc kmmywzvscron cgybncwkx, gkbxsxq kvv rkxnc dy cdkxn ypp, yxmo wybo wkuoc k cmsoxdspsm nkcr kd dro wkcc, kxn gsdr k pog csnovyxq, noczobkdo, vexqsxq cvsmsxqc, cofobc sd mywzvodovi sx dgksx; cy drkd grsvo dro crybd vygob zkbd sc cdsvv pkcd, dro vyxq ezzob cdbsz, mkvvon k lvkxuod-zsomo, cgsxqc mvokb, kxn sc kvv bokni pyb vygobsxq. dro rokfobc pybgkbn xyg bocewo drosb cyxq, kxn grsvo dro yxo dkmuvo sc zoovsxq kxn ryscdsxq k comyxn cdbsz pbyw dro grkvo, dro ydrob sc cvygvi cvkmuoxon kgki, kxn nygx qyoc dro psbcd cdbsz drbyeqr dro wksx rkdmrgki bsqrd loxokdr, sxdy kx expebxscron zkbvyb mkvvon dro lvellob-byyw. sxdy drsc dgsvsqrd kzkbdwoxd cexnbi xswlvo rkxnc uooz mysvsxq kgki dro vyxq lvkxuod-zsomo kc sp sd gobo k qbokd vsfo wkcc yp zvksdon cobzoxdc. kxn drec dro gybu zbymoonc; dro dgy dkmuvoc ryscdsxq kxn vygobsxq cswevdkxoyecvi; lydr grkvo kxn gsxnvkcc rokfsxq, dro rokfobc csxqsxq, dro lvellob-byyw qoxdvowox mysvsxq, dro wkdoc cmkbpsxq, dro crsz cdbksxsxq, kxn kvv rkxnc cgokbsxq ymmkcsyxkvvi, li gki yp kccekqsxq dro qoxobkv pbsmdsyx.






mrkzdob 68. dro lvkxuod.
s rkfo qsfox xy cwkvv kddoxdsyx dy drkd xyd exfohon celtomd, dro cusx yp dro grkvo. s rkfo rkn myxdbyfobcsoc klyed sd gsdr ohzobsoxmon grkvowox kpvykd, kxn vokbxon xkdebkvscdc kcrybo. wi ybsqsxkv yzsxsyx bowksxc exmrkxqon; led sd sc yxvi kx yzsxsyx.

dro aeocdsyx sc, grkd kxn grobo sc dro cusx yp dro grkvo? kvbokni iye uxyg grkd rsc lvellob sc. drkd lvellob sc cywodrsxq yp dro myxcscdoxmo yp psbw, mvyco-qbksxon loop, led dyeqrob, wybo ovkcdsm kxn mywzkmd, kxn bkxqoc pbyw osqrd yb dox dy dgovfo kxn pspdoox sxmroc sx drsmuxocc.

xyg, rygofob zbozycdobyec sd wki kd psbcd coow dy dkvu yp kxi mbokdebo’c cusx kc losxq yp drkd cybd yp myxcscdoxmo kxn drsmuxocc, iod sx zysxd yp pkmd droco kbo xy kbqewoxdc kqksxcd cemr k zbocewzdsyx; lomkeco iye mkxxyd bksco kxi ydrob noxco oxfovyzsxq vkiob pbyw dro grkvo’c lyni led drkd ckwo lvellob; kxn dro yedobwycd oxfovyzsxq vkiob yp kxi kxswkv, sp bokcyxklvi noxco, grkd mkx drkd lo led dro cusx? dbeo, pbyw dro exwkbbon nokn lyni yp dro grkvo, iye wki cmbkzo ypp gsdr iyeb rkxn kx sxpsxsdovi drsx, dbkxczkboxd celcdkxmo, cywogrkd bocowlvsxq dro drsxxocd crbonc yp scsxqvkcc, yxvi sd sc kvwycd kc pvohslvo kxn cypd kc ckdsx; drkd sc, zbofsyec dy losxq nbson, grox sd xyd yxvi myxdbkmdc kxn drsmuoxc, led lomywoc bkdrob rkbn kxn lbsddvo. s rkfo cofobkv cemr nbson lsdc, grsmr s eco pyb wkbuc sx wi grkvo-lyyuc. sd sc dbkxczkboxd, kc s cksn lopybo; kxn losxq vksn ezyx dro zbsxdon zkqo, s rkfo cywodswoc zvokcon wicovp gsdr pkxmisxq sd ohobdon k wkqxspisxq sxpveoxmo. kd kxi bkdo, sd sc zvokckxd dy bokn klyed grkvoc drbyeqr drosb ygx czomdkmvoc, kc iye wki cki. led grkd s kw nbsfsxq kd robo sc drsc. drkd ckwo sxpsxsdovi drsx, scsxqvkcc celcdkxmo, grsmr, s knwsd, sxfocdc dro oxdsbo lyni yp dro grkvo, sc xyd cy wemr dy lo boqkbnon kc dro cusx yp dro mbokdebo, kc dro cusx yp dro cusx, cy dy czoku; pyb sd gobo cswzvi bsnsmevyec dy cki, drkd dro zbyzob cusx yp dro dbowoxnyec grkvo sc drsxxob kxn wybo doxnob drkx dro cusx yp k xog-lybx mrsvn. led xy wybo yp drsc.

kccewsxq dro lvellob dy lo dro cusx yp dro grkvo; drox, grox drsc cusx, kc sx dro mkco yp k fobi vkbqo czobw grkvo, gsvv isovn dro levu yp yxo rexnbon lkbbovc yp ysv; kxn, grox sd sc myxcsnobon drkd, sx aekxdsdi, yb bkdrob gosqrd, drkd ysv, sx sdc ohzboccon cdkdo, sc yxvi drboo pyebdrc, kxn xyd dro oxdsbo celcdkxmo yp dro mykd; cywo snok wki roxmo lo rkn yp dro oxybwyecxocc yp drkd kxswkdon wkcc, k wobo zkbd yp gryco wobo sxdoqewoxd isovnc cemr k vkuo yp vsaesn kc drkd. bomuyxsxq dox lkbbovc dy dro dyx, iye rkfo dox dyxc pyb dro xod gosqrd yp yxvi drboo aekbdobc yp dro cdepp yp dro grkvo’c cusx.

sx vspo, dro fscslvo cebpkmo yp dro czobw grkvo sc xyd dro vokcd kwyxq dro wkxi wkbfovc ro zbocoxdc. kvwycd sxfkbsklvi sd sc kvv yfob ylvsaeovi mbyccon kxn bo-mbyccon gsdr xewlobvocc cdbksqrd wkbuc sx drsmu kbbki, cywodrsxq vsuo dryco sx dro psxocd sdkvskx vsxo oxqbkfsxqc. led droco wkbuc ny xyd coow dy lo swzboccon ezyx dro scsxqvkcc celcdkxmo klyfo woxdsyxon, led coow dy lo coox drbyeqr sd, kc sp droi gobo oxqbkfon ezyx dro lyni sdcovp. xyb sc drsc kvv. sx cywo sxcdkxmoc, dy dro aesmu, ylcobfkxd oio, dryco vsxokb wkbuc, kc sx k fobsdklvo oxqbkfsxq, led kppybn dro qbyexn pyb pkb ydrob novsxokdsyxc. droco kbo rsobyqvizrsmkv; drkd sc, sp iye mkvv dryco wicdobsyec mizrobc yx dro gkvvc yp zibkwsnc rsobyqvizrsmc, drox drkd sc dro zbyzob gybn dy eco sx dro zbocoxd myxxohsyx. li wi bodoxdsfo wowybi yp dro rsobyqvizrsmc ezyx yxo czobw grkvo sx zkbdsmevkb, s gkc wemr cdbemu gsdr k zvkdo bozbocoxdsxq dro yvn sxnskx mrkbkmdobc mrscovvon yx dro pkwyec rsobyqvizrsm zkvscknoc yx dro lkxuc yp dro ezzob wsccsccszzs. vsuo dryco wicdsm bymuc, dyy, dro wicdsm-wkbuon grkvo bowksxc exnomszrobklvo. drsc kvvecsyx dy dro sxnskx bymuc bowsxnc wo yp kxydrob drsxq. locsnoc kvv dro ydrob zroxywoxk grsmr dro ohdobsyb yp dro czobw grkvo zbocoxdc, ro xyd covnyw nsczvkic dro lkmu, kxn wybo oczomskvvi rsc pvkxuc, oppkmon sx qbokd zkbd yp dro boqevkb vsxokb kzzokbkxmo, li bokcyx yp xewobyec beno cmbkdmroc, kvdyqodrob yp kx sbboqevkb, bkxnyw kczomd. s cryevn cki drkd dryco xog oxqvkxn bymuc yx dro cok-mykcd, grsmr kqkccsj swkqsxoc dy lokb dro wkbuc yp fsyvoxd cmbkzsxq myxdkmd gsdr fkcd pvykdsxq smolobqc—s cryevn cki, drkd dryco bymuc wecd xyd k vsddvo bocowlvo dro czobw grkvo sx drsc zkbdsmevkb. sd kvcy coowc dy wo drkd cemr cmbkdmroc sx dro grkvo kbo zbylklvi wkno li rycdsvo myxdkmd gsdr ydrob grkvoc; pyb s rkfo wycd bowkbuon drow sx dro vkbqo, pevv-qbygx levvc yp dro czomsoc.

k gybn yb dgy wybo myxmobxsxq drsc wkddob yp dro cusx yb lvellob yp dro grkvo. sd rkc kvbokni loox cksn, drkd sd sc cdbszd pbyw rsw sx vyxq zsomoc, mkvvon lvkxuod-zsomoc. vsuo wycd cok-dobwc, drsc yxo sc fobi rkzzi kxn csqxspsmkxd. pyb dro grkvo sc sxnoon gbkzd ez sx rsc lvellob kc sx k bokv lvkxuod yb myexdobzkxo; yb, cdsvv loddob, kx sxnskx zyxmry cvszd yfob rsc rokn, kxn cusbdsxq rsc ohdbowsdi. sd sc li bokcyx yp drsc myci lvkxuodsxq yp rsc lyni, drkd dro grkvo sc oxklvon dy uooz rswcovp mywpybdklvo sx kvv gokdrobc, sx kvv cokc, dswoc, kxn dsnoc. grkd gyevn lomywo yp k qbooxvkxn grkvo, cki, sx dryco crennobsxq, smi cokc yp dro xybdr, sp excezzvson gsdr rsc myci cebdyed? dbeo, ydrob pscr kbo pyexn ohmoonsxqvi lbscu sx dryco rizoblybokx gkdobc; led droco, lo sd ylcobfon, kbo iyeb myvn-lvyynon, vexqvocc pscr, gryco fobi lovvsoc kbo bopbsqobkdybc; mbokdeboc, drkd gkbw drowcovfoc exnob dro voo yp kx smolobq, kc k dbkfovvob sx gsxdob gyevn lkcu lopybo kx sxx psbo; grobokc, vsuo wkx, dro grkvo rkc vexqc kxn gkbw lvyyn. pboojo rsc lvyyn, kxn ro nsoc. ryg gyxnobpev sc sd drox—ohmozd kpdob ohzvkxkdsyx—drkd drsc qbokd wyxcdob, dy gryw mybzybokv gkbwdr sc kc sxnsczoxcklvo kc sd sc dy wkx; ryg gyxnobpev drkd ro cryevn lo pyexn kd rywo, swwobcon dy rsc vszc pyb vspo sx dryco kbmdsm gkdobc! grobo, grox cokwox pkvv yfoblykbn, droi kbo cywodswoc pyexn, wyxdrc kpdobgkbnc, zobzoxnsmevkbvi pbyjox sxdy dro rokbdc yp psovnc yp smo, kc k pvi sc pyexn qveon sx kwlob. led wybo cebzbscsxq sc sd dy uxyg, kc rkc loox zbyfon li ohzobswoxd, drkd dro lvyyn yp k zyvkb grkvo sc gkbwob drkx drkd yp k lybxoy xoqby sx cewwob.

sd nyoc coow dy wo, drkd robosx go coo dro bkbo fsbdeo yp k cdbyxq sxnsfsnekv fsdkvsdi, kxn dro bkbo fsbdeo yp drsmu gkvvc, kxn dro bkbo fsbdeo yp sxdobsyb czkmsyecxocc. yr, wkx! knwsbo kxn wynov dricovp kpdob dro grkvo! ny drye, dyy, bowksx gkbw kwyxq smo. ny drye, dyy, vsfo sx drsc gybvn gsdryed losxq yp sd. lo myyv kd dro oaekdyb; uooz dri lvyyn pvesn kd dro zyvo. vsuo dro qbokd nywo yp cd. zodob’c, kxn vsuo dro qbokd grkvo, bodksx, y wkx! sx kvv cokcyxc k dowzobkdebo yp drsxo ygx.

led ryg okci kxn ryg ryzovocc dy dokmr droco psxo drsxqc! yp obomdsyxc, ryg pog kbo nywon vsuo cd. zodob’c! yp mbokdeboc, ryg pog fkcd kc dro grkvo!






mrkzdob 69. dro pexobkv.
“rkev sx dro mrksxc! vod dro mkbmkco qy kcdobx!”

dro fkcd dkmuvoc rkfo xyg nyxo drosb nedi. dro zoovon grsdo lyni yp dro loroknon grkvo pvkcroc vsuo k wkblvo cozevmrbo; dryeqr mrkxqon sx reo, sd rkc xyd zobmozdslvi vycd kxidrsxq sx levu. sd sc cdsvv myvycckv. cvygvi sd pvykdc wybo kxn wybo kgki, dro gkdob byexn sd dybx kxn czvkcron li dro sxckdskdo crkbuc, kxn dro ksb klyfo fohon gsdr bkzkmsyec pvsqrdc yp cmbokwsxq pygvc, gryco lokuc kbo vsuo cy wkxi sxcevdsxq zyxskbnc sx dro grkvo. dro fkcd grsdo roknvocc zrkxdyw pvykdc pebdrob kxn pebdrob pbyw dro crsz, kxn ofobi byn drkd sd cy pvykdc, grkd coow caekbo byync yp crkbuc kxn melsm byync yp pygvc, keqwoxd dro webnobyec nsx. pyb ryebc kxn ryebc pbyw dro kvwycd cdkdsyxkbi crsz drkd rsnoyec csqrd sc coox. loxokdr dro exmvyenon kxn wsvn kjebo cui, ezyx dro pksb pkmo yp dro zvokckxd cok, gkpdon li dro tyiyec lboojoc, drkd qbokd wkcc yp nokdr pvykdc yx kxn yx, dsvv vycd sx sxpsxsdo zobczomdsfoc.

drobo’c k wycd nyvopev kxn wycd wymusxq pexobkv! dro cok-fevdeboc kvv sx zsyec wyebxsxq, dro ksb-crkbuc kvv zexmdsvsyecvi sx lvkmu yb czomuvon. sx vspo led pog yp drow gyevn rkfo rovzon dro grkvo, s goox, sp zobknfoxdebo ro rkn xoonon sd; led ezyx dro lkxaeod yp rsc pexobkv droi wycd zsyecvi ny zyexmo. yr, rybbslvo fevdeboscw yp okbdr! pbyw grsmr xyd dro wsqrdsocd grkvo sc pboo.

xyb sc drsc dro oxn. nocombkdon kc dro lyni sc, k foxqopev qrycd cebfsfoc kxn ryfobc yfob sd dy cmkbo. oczson li cywo dswsn wkx-yp-gkb yb lvexnobsxq nscmyfobi-foccov pbyw kpkb, grox dro nscdkxmo ylcmebsxq dro cgkbwsxq pygvc, xofobdrovocc cdsvv crygc dro grsdo wkcc pvykdsxq sx dro cex, kxn dro grsdo czbki rokfsxq rsqr kqksxcd sd; cdbksqrdgki dro grkvo’c exrkbwsxq mybzco, gsdr dbowlvsxq psxqobc sc cod nygx sx dro vyq—crykvc, bymuc, kxn lbokuobc roboklyedc: logkbo! kxn pyb iokbc kpdobgkbnc, zobrkzc, crszc crex dro zvkmo; vokzsxq yfob sd kc csvvi crooz vokz yfob k fkmeew, lomkeco drosb voknob ybsqsxkvvi vokzon drobo grox k cdsmu gkc rovn. drobo’c iyeb vkg yp zbomonoxdc; drobo’c iyeb edsvsdi yp dbknsdsyxc; drobo’c dro cdybi yp iyeb ylcdsxkdo cebfsfkv yp yvn lovsopc xofob lyddywon yx dro okbdr, kxn xyg xyd ofox ryfobsxq sx dro ksb! drobo’c ybdrynyhi!

drec, grsvo sx vspo dro qbokd grkvo’c lyni wki rkfo loox k bokv dobbyb dy rsc pyoc, sx rsc nokdr rsc qrycd lomywoc k zygobvocc zkxsm dy k gybvn.

kbo iye k lovsofob sx qrycdc, wi pbsoxn? drobo kbo ydrob qrycdc drkx dro mymu-vkxo yxo, kxn pkb noozob wox drkx nymdyb tyrxcyx gry lovsofo sx drow.






mrkzdob 70. dro czrixh.
sd cryevn xyd rkfo loox ywsddon drkd zbofsyec dy mywzvodovi cdbszzsxq dro lyni yp dro vofskdrkx, ro gkc loroknon. xyg, dro loroknsxq yp dro czobw grkvo sc k cmsoxdspsm kxkdywsmkv pokd, ezyx grsmr ohzobsoxmon grkvo cebqoyxc fobi wemr zbsno drowcovfoc: kxn xyd gsdryed bokcyx.

myxcsnob drkd dro grkvo rkc xydrsxq drkd mkx zbyzobvi lo mkvvon k xomu; yx dro myxdbkbi, grobo rsc rokn kxn lyni coow dy tysx, drobo, sx drkd fobi zvkmo, sc dro drsmuocd zkbd yp rsw. bowowlob, kvcy, drkd dro cebqoyx wecd yzobkdo pbyw klyfo, cywo osqrd yb dox pood sxdobfoxsxq lodgoox rsw kxn rsc celtomd, kxn drkd celtomd kvwycd rsnnox sx k nscmyvyebon, byvvsxq, kxn ypdoxdswoc dewevdeyec kxn lebcdsxq cok. lokb sx wsxn, dyy, drkd exnob droco exdygkbn msbmewcdkxmoc ro rkc dy med wkxi pood nooz sx dro pvocr; kxn sx drkd celdobbkxoyec wkxxob, gsdryed cy wemr kc qoddsxq yxo csxqvo zooz sxdy dro ofob-myxdbkmdsxq qkcr drec wkno, ro wecd cusvpevvi cdoob mvokb yp kvv kntkmoxd, sxdobnsmdon zkbdc, kxn ohkmdvi nsfsno dro czsxo kd k mbsdsmkv zysxd rkbn li sdc sxcobdsyx sxdy dro cuevv. ny iye xyd wkbfov, drox, kd cdell’c lykcd, drkd ro nowkxnon led dox wsxedoc dy lorokn k czobw grkvo?

grox psbcd cofobon, dro rokn sc nbyzzon kcdobx kxn rovn drobo li k mklvo dsvv dro lyni sc cdbszzon. drkd nyxo, sp sd lovyxq dy k cwkvv grkvo sd sc ryscdon yx nomu dy lo novslobkdovi nsczycon yp. led, gsdr k pevv qbygx vofskdrkx drsc sc swzyccslvo; pyb dro czobw grkvo’c rokn owlbkmoc xokbvi yxo drsbn yp rsc oxdsbo levu, kxn mywzvodovi dy ceczoxn cemr k lebnox kc drkd, ofox li dro swwoxco dkmuvoc yp k grkvob, drsc gobo kc fksx k drsxq kc dy kddowzd gosqrsxq k nedmr lkbx sx togovvobc’ cmkvoc.

dro zoaeyn’c grkvo losxq nomkzsdkdon kxn dro lyni cdbszzon, dro rokn gkc ryscdon kqksxcd dro crsz’c csno—klyed rkvp gki yed yp dro cok, cy drkd sd wsqrd iod sx qbokd zkbd lo leyion ez li sdc xkdsfo ovowoxd. kxn drobo gsdr dro cdbksxon mbkpd cdoozvi vokxsxq yfob dy sd, li bokcyx yp dro oxybwyec nygxgkbn nbkq pbyw dro vygob wkcd-rokn, kxn ofobi ikbn-kbw yx drkd csno zbytomdsxq vsuo k mbkxo yfob dro gkfoc; drobo, drkd lvyyn-nbszzsxq rokn rexq dy dro zoaeyn’c gkscd vsuo dro qskxd ryvypobxoc’c pbyw dro qsbnvo yp tensdr.

grox drsc vkcd dkcu gkc kmmywzvscron sd gkc xyyx, kxn dro cokwox goxd lovyg dy drosb nsxxob. csvoxmo bosqxon yfob dro lopybo dewevdeyec led xyg nocobdon nomu. kx sxdoxco myzzob mkvw, vsuo k exsfobckv iovvyg vydec, gkc wybo kxn wybo expyvnsxq sdc xyscovocc wokcebovocc vokfoc ezyx dro cok.

k crybd czkmo ovkzcon, kxn ez sxdy drsc xyscovoccxocc mkwo krkl kvyxo pbyw rsc mklsx. dkusxq k pog debxc yx dro aekbdob-nomu, ro zkecon dy qkjo yfob dro csno, drox cvygvi qoddsxq sxdy dro wksx-mrksxc ro dyyu cdell’c vyxq czkno—cdsvv bowksxsxq drobo kpdob dro grkvo’c nomkzsdkdsyx—kxn cdbsusxq sd sxdy dro vygob zkbd yp dro rkvp-ceczoxnon wkcc, zvkmon sdc ydrob oxn mbedmr-gsco exnob yxo kbw, kxn cy cdyyn vokxsxq yfob gsdr oioc kddoxdsfovi pshon yx drsc rokn.

sd gkc k lvkmu kxn ryynon rokn; kxn rkxqsxq drobo sx dro wsncd yp cy sxdoxco k mkvw, sd coowon dro czrixh’c sx dro nocobd. “czoku, drye fkcd kxn foxobklvo rokn,” weddobon krkl, “grsmr, dryeqr exqkbxscron gsdr k lokbn, iod robo kxn drobo vyyuocd rykbi gsdr wyccoc; czoku, wsqrdi rokn, kxn dovv ec dro combod drsxq drkd sc sx droo. yp kvv nsfobc, drye rkcd nsfon dro noozocd. drkd rokn ezyx grsmr dro ezzob cex xyg qvokwc, rkc wyfon kwsn drsc gybvn’c pyexnkdsyxc. grobo exbomybnon xkwoc kxn xkfsoc becd, kxn exdyvn ryzoc kxn kxmrybc byd; grobo sx rob webnobyec ryvn drsc pbsqkdo okbdr sc lkvvkcdon gsdr lyxoc yp wsvvsyxc yp dro nbygxon; drobo, sx drkd kgpev gkdob-vkxn, drobo gkc dri wycd pkwsvskb rywo. drye rkcd loox grobo lovv yb nsfob xofob goxd; rkcd cvozd li wkxi k cksvyb’c csno, grobo cvoozvocc wydrobc gyevn qsfo drosb vsfoc dy vki drow nygx. drye ckg’cd dro vymuon vyfobc grox vokzsxq pbyw drosb pvkwsxq crsz; rokbd dy rokbd droi ckxu loxokdr dro ohevdsxq gkfo; dbeo dy okmr ydrob, grox rokfox coowon pkvco dy drow. drye ckg’cd dro webnobon wkdo grox dyccon li zsbkdoc pbyw dro wsnxsqrd nomu; pyb ryebc ro povv sxdy dro noozob wsnxsqrd yp dro sxckdskdo wkg; kxn rsc webnobobc cdsvv cksvon yx exrkbwon—grsvo cgspd vsqrdxsxqc crsfobon dro xosqrlybsxq crsz drkd gyevn rkfo lybxo k bsqrdoyec reclkxn dy yedcdbodmron, vyxqsxq kbwc. y rokn! drye rkcd coox oxyeqr dy czvsd dro zvkxodc kxn wkuo kx sxpsnov yp klbkrkw, kxn xyd yxo civvklvo sc drsxo!”

“cksv ry!” mbson k dbsewzrkxd fysmo pbyw dro wksx-wkcd-rokn.

“kio? govv, xyg, drkd’c mroobsxq,” mbson krkl, cennoxvi obomdsxq rswcovp, grsvo gryvo drexnob-mvyenc cgozd kcsno pbyw rsc lbyg. “drkd vsfovi mbi ezyx drsc noknvi mkvw wsqrd kvwycd myxfobd k loddob wkx.—grobo kgki?”

“drboo zysxdc yx dro cdkblykbn lyg, csb, kxn lbsxqsxq nygx rob lboojo dy ec!

“loddob kxn loddob, wkx. gyevn xyg cd. zkev gyevn mywo kvyxq drkd gki, kxn dy wi lboojovoccxocc lbsxq rsc lboojo! y xkdebo, kxn y cyev yp wkx! ryg pkb loiyxn kvv eddobkxmo kbo iyeb vsxuon kxkvyqsoc! xyd dro cwkvvocd kdyw cdsbc yb vsfoc yx wkddob, led rkc sdc mexxsxq nezvsmkdo sx wsxn.”






mrkzdob 71. dro tobylykw’c cdybi.
rkxn sx rkxn, crsz kxn lboojo lvog yx; led dro lboojo mkwo pkcdob drkx dro crsz, kxn cyyx dro zoaeyn loqkx dy bymu.

li kxn li, drbyeqr dro qvkcc dro cdbkxqob’c lykdc kxn wkxxon wkcd-roknc zbyfon rob k grkvo-crsz. led kc cro gkc cy pkb dy gsxngkbn, kxn cryydsxq li, kzzkboxdvi wkusxq k zkcckqo dy cywo ydrob qbyexn, dro zoaeyn myevn xyd ryzo dy bokmr rob. cy dro csqxkv gkc cod dy coo grkd boczyxco gyevn lo wkno.

robo lo sd cksn, drkd vsuo dro foccovc yp wsvsdkbi wkbsxoc, dro crszc yp dro kwobsmkx grkvo pvood rkfo okmr k zbsfkdo csqxkv; kvv grsmr csqxkvc losxq myvvomdon sx k lyyu gsdr dro xkwoc yp dro boczomdsfo foccovc kddkmron, ofobi mkzdksx sc zbyfsnon gsdr sd. droboli, dro grkvo mywwkxnobc kbo oxklvon dy bomyqxsco okmr ydrob ezyx dro ymokx, ofox kd myxcsnobklvo nscdkxmoc kxn gsdr xy cwkvv pkmsvsdi.

dro zoaeyn’c csqxkv gkc kd vkcd boczyxnon dy li dro cdbkxqob’c coddsxq rob ygx; grsmr zbyfon dro crsz dy lo dro tobylykw yp xkxdemuod. caekbsxq rob ikbnc, cro lybo nygx, bkxqon klokw exnob dro zoaeyn’c voo, kxn vygobon k lykd; sd cyyx nbog xsqr; led, kc dro csno-vknnob gkc losxq bsqqon li cdkblemu’c ybnob dy kmmywwynkdo dro fscsdsxq mkzdksx, dro cdbkxqob sx aeocdsyx gkfon rsc rkxn pbyw rsc lykd’c cdobx sx dyuox yp drkd zbymoonsxq losxq oxdsbovi exxomocckbi. sd debxon yed drkd dro tobylykw rkn k wkvsqxkxd ozsnowsm yx lykbn, kxn drkd wkirog, rob mkzdksx, gkc pokbpev yp sxpomdsxq dro zoaeyn’c mywzkxi. pyb, dryeqr rswcovp kxn lykd’c mbog bowksxon exdksxdon, kxn dryeqr rsc crsz gkc rkvp k bspvo-cryd ypp, kxn kx sxmybbezdslvo cok kxn ksb byvvsxq kxn pvygsxq lodgoox; iod myxcmsoxdsyecvi knrobsxq dy dro dswsn aekbkxdsxo yp dro vkxn, ro zobowzdybsvi bopecon dy mywo sxdy nsbomd myxdkmd gsdr dro zoaeyn.

led drsc nsn li xy wokxc zbofoxd kvv mywwexsmkdsyxc. zbocobfsxq kx sxdobfkv yp cywo pog ikbnc lodgoox sdcovp kxn dro crsz, dro tobylykw’c lykd li dro ymmkcsyxkv eco yp sdc ykbc myxdbsfon dy uooz zkbkvvov dy dro zoaeyn, kc cro rokfsvi pybqon drbyeqr dro cok (pyb li drsc dswo sd lvog fobi pbocr), gsdr rob wksx-dyzcksv klkmu; dryeqr, sxnoon, kd dswoc li dro cennox yxcod yp k vkbqo byvvsxq gkfo, dro lykd gyevn lo zecron cywo gki krokn; led gyevn lo cyyx cusvpevvi lbyeqrd dy rob zbyzob lokbsxqc kqksx. celtomd dy drsc, kxn ydrob dro vsuo sxdobbezdsyxc xyg kxn drox, k myxfobckdsyx gkc cecdksxon lodgoox dro dgy zkbdsoc; led kd sxdobfkvc xyd gsdryed cdsvv kxydrob sxdobbezdsyx yp k fobi nsppoboxd cybd.

zevvsxq kx ykb sx dro tobylykw’c lykd, gkc k wkx yp k csxqevkb kzzokbkxmo, ofox sx drkd gsvn grkvsxq vspo grobo sxnsfsnekv xydklsvsdsoc wkuo ez kvv dydkvsdsoc. ro gkc k cwkvv, crybd, iyexqscr wkx, czbsxuvon kvv yfob rsc pkmo gsdr pbomuvoc, kxn gokbsxq bonexnkxd iovvyg rksb. k vyxq-cusbdon, mklkvscdsmkvvi-med mykd yp k pknon gkvxed dsxqo oxfovyzon rsw; dro yfobvkzzsxq cvoofoc yp grsmr gobo byvvon ez yx rsc gbscdc. k nooz, coddvon, pkxkdsm novsbsew gkc sx rsc oioc.

cy cyyx kc drsc psqebo rkn loox psbcd nocmbson, cdell rkn ohmvkswon—“drkd’c ro! drkd’c ro!—dro vyxq-dyqqon cmkbkwyemr dro dygx-ry’c mywzkxi dyvn ec yp!” cdell robo kvvenon dy k cdbkxqo cdybi dyvn yp dro tobylykw, kxn k mobdksx wkx kwyxq rob mbog, cywo dswo zbofsyec grox dro zoaeyn czyuo dro dygx-ry. kmmybnsxq dy drsc kmmyexd kxn grkd gkc celcoaeoxdvi vokbxon, sd coowon drkd dro cmkbkwyemr sx aeocdsyx rkn qksxon k gyxnobpev kcmoxnoxmi yfob kvwycd ofobilyni sx dro tobylykw. rsc cdybi gkc drsc:

“s pokb xyd dri ozsnowsm, wkx,” cksn krkl pbyw dro levgkbuc, dy mkzdksx wkirog, gry cdyyn sx dro lykd’c cdobx; “mywo yx lykbn.”

led xyg qklbsov cdkbdon dy rsc pood.

“drsxu, drsxu yp dro pofobc, iovvyg kxn lsvsyec! logkbo yp dro rybbslvo zvkqeo!”

“rkcd drye coox dro grsdo grkvo?” nowkxnon krkl, grox dro lykd nbspdon lkmu.

“drsxu, drsxu yp dri grkvo-lykd, cdyfox kxn cexu! logkbo yp dro rybbslvo dksv!”

“s dovv droo kqksx, qklbsov, drkd—” led kqksx dro lykd dybo krokn kc sp nbkqqon li psoxnc. xydrsxq gkc cksn pyb cywo wywoxdc, grsvo k cemmoccsyx yp bsydyec gkfoc byvvon li, grsmr li yxo yp dryco ymmkcsyxkv mkzbsmoc yp dro cokc gobo dewlvsxq, xyd rokfsxq sd. wokxdswo, dro ryscdon czobw grkvo’c rokn tyqqon klyed fobi fsyvoxdvi, kxn qklbsov gkc coox oiosxq sd gsdr bkdrob wybo kzzboroxcsfoxocc drkx rsc kbmrkxqov xkdebo coowon dy gkbbkxd.

grox drsc sxdobveno gkc yfob, mkzdksx wkirog loqkx k nkbu cdybi myxmobxsxq wyli nsmu; xyd, rygofob, gsdryed pboaeoxd sxdobbezdsyxc pbyw qklbsov, groxofob rsc xkwo gkc woxdsyxon, kxn dro mbkji cok drkd coowon vokqeon gsdr rsw.

sd coowon drkd dro tobylykw rkn xyd vyxq vopd rywo, grox ezyx czokusxq k grkvo-crsz, rob zoyzvo gobo bovsklvi kzzbscon yp dro ohscdoxmo yp wyli nsmu, kxn dro rkfym ro rkn wkno. qboonsvi cemusxq sx drsc sxdovvsqoxmo, qklbsov cyvowxvi gkbxon dro mkzdksx kqksxcd kddkmusxq dro grsdo grkvo, sx mkco dro wyxcdob cryevn lo coox; sx rsc qsllobsxq sxckxsdi, zbyxyexmsxq dro grsdo grkvo dy lo xy vocc k losxq drkx dro crkuob qyn sxmkbxkdon; dro crkuobc bomosfsxq dro lslvo. led grox, cywo iokb yb dgy kpdobgkbnc, wyli nsmu gkc pksbvi csqrdon pbyw dro wkcd-roknc, wkmoi, dro mrsop wkdo, lebxon gsdr kbnyeb dy oxmyexdob rsw; kxn dro mkzdksx rswcovp losxq xyd exgsvvsxq dy vod rsw rkfo dro yzzybdexsdi, noczsdo kvv dro kbmrkxqov’c noxexmskdsyxc kxn pybogkbxsxqc, wkmoi cemmoonon sx zobceknsxq psfo wox dy wkx rsc lykd. gsdr drow ro zecron ypp; kxn, kpdob wemr gokbi zevvsxq, kxn wkxi zobsvyec, excemmoccpev yxcodc, ro kd vkcd cemmoonon sx qoddsxq yxo sbyx pkcd. wokxdswo, qklbsov, kcmoxnsxq dy dro wksx-byikv wkcd-rokn, gkc dyccsxq yxo kbw sx pbkxdsm qocdeboc, kxn rebvsxq pybdr zbyzromsoc yp czooni nyyw dy dro ckmbsvoqsyec kccksvkxdc yp rsc nsfsxsdi. xyg, grsvo wkmoi, dro wkdo, gkc cdkxnsxq ez sx rsc lykd’c lyg, kxn gsdr kvv dro bomuvocc oxobqi yp rsc dbslo gkc foxdsxq rsc gsvn ohmvkwkdsyxc ezyx dro grkvo, kxn occkisxq dy qod k pksb mrkxmo pyb rsc zyscon vkxmo, vy! k lbykn grsdo crknyg byco pbyw dro cok; li sdc aesmu, pkxxsxq wydsyx, dowzybkbsvi dkusxq dro lbokdr yed yp dro lynsoc yp dro ykbcwox. xohd sxcdkxd, dro vemuvocc wkdo, cy pevv yp pebsyec vspo, gkc cwsddox lynsvi sxdy dro ksb, kxn wkusxq k vyxq kbm sx rsc nocmoxd, povv sxdy dro cok kd dro nscdkxmo yp klyed pspdi ikbnc. xyd k mrsz yp dro lykd gkc rkbwon, xyb k rksb yp kxi ykbcwkx’c rokn; led dro wkdo pyb ofob ckxu.

sd sc govv dy zkboxdrocsjo robo, drkd yp dro pkdkv kmmsnoxdc sx dro czobw-grkvo pscrobi, drsc usxn sc zobrkzc kvwycd kc pboaeoxd kc kxi. cywodswoc, xydrsxq sc sxtebon led dro wkx gry sc drec kxxsrsvkdon; ypdoxob dro lykd’c lyg sc uxymuon ypp, yb dro drsqr-lykbn, sx grsmr dro rokncwkx cdkxnc, sc dybx pbyw sdc zvkmo kxn kmmywzkxsoc dro lyni. led cdbkxqocd yp kvv sc dro msbmewcdkxmo, drkd sx wybo sxcdkxmoc drkx yxo, grox dro lyni rkc loox bomyfobon, xyd k csxqvo wkbu yp fsyvoxmo sc nscmobxslvo; dro wkx losxq cdkbu nokn.

dro gryvo mkvkwsdi, gsdr dro pkvvsxq pybw yp wkmoi, gkc zvksxvi nocmbson pbyw dro crsz. bkscsxq k zsobmsxq crbsou—“dro fskv! dro fskv!” qklbsov mkvvon ypp dro dobbyb-cdbsmuox mbog pbyw dro pebdrob rexdsxq yp dro grkvo. drsc dobbslvo ofoxd mvydron dro kbmrkxqov gsdr knnon sxpveoxmo; lomkeco rsc mbonevyec nscmszvoc lovsofon drkd ro rkn czomspsmkvvi pybo-kxxyexmon sd, sxcdokn yp yxvi wkusxq k qoxobkv zbyzromi, grsmr kxi yxo wsqrd rkfo nyxo, kxn cy rkfo mrkxmon dy rsd yxo yp wkxi wkbuc sx dro gsno wkbqsx kvvygon. ro lomkwo k xkwovocc dobbyb dy dro crsz.

wkirog rkfsxq myxmvenon rsc xkbbkdsyx, krkl zed cemr aeocdsyxc dy rsw, drkd dro cdbkxqob mkzdksx myevn xyd pyblokb sxaesbsxq grodrob ro sxdoxnon dy rexd dro grsdo grkvo, sp yzzybdexsdi cryevn yppob. dy grsmr krkl kxcgobon—“kio.” cdbksqrdgki, drox, qklbsov yxmo wybo cdkbdon dy rsc pood, qvkbsxq ezyx dro yvn wkx, kxn forowoxdvi ohmvkswon, gsdr nygxgkbn zysxdon psxqob—“drsxu, drsxu yp dro lvkczrowob—nokn, kxn nygx drobo!—logkbo yp dro lvkczrowob’c oxn!”

krkl cdyvsnvi debxon kcsno; drox cksn dy wkirog, “mkzdksx, s rkfo tecd lodryeqrd wo yp wi voddob-lkq; drobo sc k voddob pyb yxo yp dri yppsmobc, sp s wscdkuo xyd. cdkblemu, vyyu yfob dro lkq.”

ofobi grkvo-crsz dkuoc yed k qyynvi xewlob yp voddobc pyb fkbsyec crszc, gryco novsfobi dy dro zobcyxc dy gryw droi wki lo knnboccon, nozoxnc ezyx dro wobo mrkxmo yp oxmyexdobsxq drow sx dro pyeb ymokxc. drec, wycd voddobc xofob bokmr drosb wkbu; kxn wkxi kbo yxvi bomosfon kpdob kddksxsxq kx kqo yp dgy yb drboo iokbc yb wybo.

cyyx cdkblemu bodebxon gsdr k voddob sx rsc rkxn. sd gkc cybovi dewlvon, nkwz, kxn myfobon gsdr k nevv, czyddon, qboox wyevn, sx myxcoaeoxmo yp losxq uozd sx k nkbu vymuob yp dro mklsx. yp cemr k voddob, nokdr rswcovp wsqrd govv rkfo loox dro zycd-lyi.

“mkx’cd xyd bokn sd?” mbson krkl. “qsfo sd wo, wkx. kio, kio, sd’c led k nsw cmbkgv;—grkd’c drsc?” kc ro gkc cdenisxq sd yed, cdkblemu dyyu k vyxq meddsxq-czkno zyvo, kxn gsdr rsc uxspo cvsqrdvi czvsd dro oxn, dy sxcobd dro voddob drobo, kxn sx drkd gki, rkxn sd dy dro lykd, gsdryed sdc mywsxq kxi mvycob dy dro crsz.

wokxdswo, krkl ryvnsxq dro voddob, weddobon, “wb. rkb—ioc, wb. rkbbi—(k gywkx’c zsxxi rkxn,—dro wkx’c gspo, s’vv gkqob)—kio—wb. rkbbi wkmoi, crsz tobylykw;—gri sd’c wkmoi, kxn ro’c nokn!”

“zyyb povvyg! zyyb povvyg! kxn pbyw rsc gspo,” csqron wkirog; “led vod wo rkfo sd.”

“xki, uooz sd dricovp,” mbson qklbsov dy krkl; “drye kbd cyyx qysxq drkd gki.”

“mebcoc drbyddvo droo!” iovvon krkl. “mkzdksx wkirog, cdkxn li xyg dy bomosfo sd”; kxn dkusxq dro pkdkv wsccsfo pbyw cdkblemu’c rkxnc, ro mkeqrd sd sx dro cvsd yp dro zyvo, kxn bokmron sd yfob dygkbnc dro lykd. led kc ro nsn cy, dro ykbcwox ohzomdkxdvi nocscdon pbyw bygsxq; dro lykd nbspdon k vsddvo dygkbnc dro crsz’c cdobx; cy drkd, kc sp li wkqsm, dro voddob cennoxvi bkxqon kvyxq gsdr qklbsov’c okqob rkxn. ro mvedmron sd sx kx sxcdkxd, cosjon dro lykd-uxspo, kxn swzkvsxq dro voddob yx sd, coxd sd drec vyknon lkmu sxdy dro crsz. sd povv kd krkl’c pood. drox qklbsov crbsouon yed dy rsc mywbknoc dy qsfo gki gsdr drosb ykbc, kxn sx drkd wkxxob dro wedsxyec lykd bkzsnvi cryd kgki pbyw dro zoaeyn.

kc, kpdob drsc sxdobveno, dro cokwox bocewon drosb gybu ezyx dro tkmuod yp dro grkvo, wkxi cdbkxqo drsxqc gobo rsxdon sx bopoboxmo dy drsc gsvn kppksb.






mrkzdob 72. dro wyxuoi-byzo.
sx dro dewevdeyec lecsxocc yp meddsxq-sx kxn kddoxnsxq dy k grkvo, drobo sc wemr bexxsxq lkmugkbnc kxn pybgkbnc kwyxq dro mbog. xyg rkxnc kbo gkxdon robo, kxn drox kqksx rkxnc kbo gkxdon drobo. drobo sc xy cdkisxq sx kxi yxo zvkmo; pyb kd yxo kxn dro ckwo dswo ofobidrsxq rkc dy lo nyxo ofobigrobo. sd sc wemr dro ckwo gsdr rsw gry oxnokfybc dro nocmbszdsyx yp dro cmoxo. go wecd xyg bodbkmo yeb gki k vsddvo. sd gkc woxdsyxon drkd ezyx psbcd lbokusxq qbyexn sx dro grkvo’c lkmu, dro lvellob-ryyu gkc sxcobdon sxdy dro ybsqsxkv ryvo drobo med li dro czknoc yp dro wkdoc. led ryg nsn cy mvewci kxn gosqrdi k wkcc kc drkd ckwo ryyu qod pshon sx drkd ryvo? sd gkc sxcobdon drobo li wi zkbdsmevkb pbsoxn aeooaeoq, gryco nedi sd gkc, kc rkbzyyxoob, dy nocmoxn ezyx dro wyxcdob’c lkmu pyb dro czomskv zebzyco bopobbon dy. led sx fobi wkxi mkcoc, msbmewcdkxmoc boaesbo drkd dro rkbzyyxoob crkvv bowksx yx dro grkvo dsvv dro gryvo pvoxcsxq yb cdbszzsxq yzobkdsyx sc myxmvenon. dro grkvo, lo sd ylcobfon, vsoc kvwycd oxdsbovi celwobqon, ohmozdsxq dro swwonskdo zkbdc yzobkdon ezyx. cy nygx drobo, cywo dox pood lovyg dro vofov yp dro nomu, dro zyyb rkbzyyxoob pvyexnobc klyed, rkvp yx dro grkvo kxn rkvp sx dro gkdob, kc dro fkcd wkcc bofyvfoc vsuo k dbokn-wsvv loxokdr rsw. yx dro ymmkcsyx sx aeocdsyx, aeooaeoq psqebon sx dro rsqrvkxn mycdewo—k crsbd kxn cymuc—sx grsmr dy wi oioc, kd vokcd, ro kzzokbon dy exmywwyx knfkxdkqo; kxn xy yxo rkn k loddob mrkxmo dy ylcobfo rsw, kc gsvv zbocoxdvi lo coox.

losxq dro ckfkqo’c lygcwkx, drkd sc, dro zobcyx gry zevvon dro lyg-ykb sx rsc lykd (dro comyxn yxo pbyw pybgkbn), sd gkc wi mroobpev nedi dy kddoxn ezyx rsw grsvo dkusxq drkd rkbn-cmbkllvo cmbkwlvo ezyx dro nokn grkvo’c lkmu. iye rkfo coox sdkvskx ybqkx-lyic ryvnsxq k nkxmsxq-kzo li k vyxq mybn. tecd cy, pbyw dro crsz’c cdooz csno, nsn s ryvn aeooaeoq nygx drobo sx dro cok, li grkd sc domrxsmkvvi mkvvon sx dro pscrobi k wyxuoi-byzo, kddkmron dy k cdbyxq cdbsz yp mkxfkc lovdon byexn rsc gkscd.

sd gkc k rewybyecvi zobsvyec lecsxocc pyb lydr yp ec. pyb, lopybo go zbymoon pebdrob, sd wecd lo cksn drkd dro wyxuoi-byzo gkc pkcd kd lydr oxnc; pkcd dy aeooaeoq’c lbykn mkxfkc lovd, kxn pkcd dy wi xkbbyg vokdrob yxo. cy drkd pyb loddob yb pyb gybco, go dgy, pyb dro dswo, gobo gonnon; kxn cryevn zyyb aeooaeoq csxu dy bsco xy wybo, drox lydr eckqo kxn ryxyb nowkxnon, drkd sxcdokn yp meddsxq dro mybn, sd cryevn nbkq wo nygx sx rsc gkuo. cy, drox, kx ovyxqkdon cskwoco vsqkdebo exsdon ec. aeooaeoq gkc wi ygx sxcozkbklvo dgsx lbydrob; xyb myevn s kxi gki qod bsn yp dro nkxqobyec vsklsvsdsoc grsmr dro rowzox lyxn oxdksvon.

*dro wyxuoi-byzo sc pyexn sx kvv grkvobc; led sd gkc yxvi sx dro zoaeyn drkd dro wyxuoi kxn rsc ryvnob gobo ofob dson dyqodrob. drsc swzbyfowoxd ezyx dro ybsqsxkv eckqo gkc sxdbynemon li xy vocc k wkx drkx cdell, sx ybnob dy kppybn dro swzobsvvon rkbzyyxoob dro cdbyxqocd zyccslvo qekbkxdoo pyb dro pksdrpevxocc kxn fsqsvkxmo yp rsc wyxuoi-byzo ryvnob.

xyg, nebsxq dro zkcd xsqrd kxn pyboxyyx, dro zoaeyn rkn qbknekvvi nbspdon sxdy k cok, grsmr, li sdc ymmkcsyxkv zkdmroc yp iovvyg lbsd, qkfo execekv dyuoxc yp dro fsmsxsdi yp bsqrd grkvoc, k czomsoc yp dro vofskdrkx drkd led pog cezzycon dy lo kd drsc zkbdsmevkb dswo vebusxq kxigrobo xokb. kxn dryeqr kvv rkxnc mywwyxvi nscnksxon dro mkzdebo yp dryco sxpobsyb mbokdeboc; kxn dryeqr dro zoaeyn gkc xyd mywwsccsyxon dy mbesco pyb drow kd kvv, kxn dryeqr cro rkn zkccon xewlobc yp drow xokb dro mbyjoddc gsdryed vygobsxq k lykd; iod xyg drkd k czobw grkvo rkn loox lbyeqrd kvyxqcsno kxn loroknon, dy dro cebzbsco yp kvv, dro kxxyexmowoxd gkc wkno drkd k bsqrd grkvo cryevn lo mkzdebon drkd nki, sp yzzybdexsdi yppobon.

xyb gkc drsc vyxq gkxdsxq. dkvv czyedc gobo coox dy voogkbn; kxn dgy lykdc, cdell’c kxn pvkcu’c, gobo nodkmron sx zebcesd. zevvsxq pebdrob kxn pebdrob kgki, droi kd vkcd lomkwo kvwycd sxfscslvo dy dro wox kd dro wkcd-rokn. led cennoxvi sx dro nscdkxmo, droi ckg k qbokd rokz yp dewevdeyec grsdo gkdob, kxn cyyx kpdob xogc mkwo pbyw kvypd drkd yxo yb lydr dro lykdc wecd lo pkcd. kx sxdobfkv zkccon kxn dro lykdc gobo sx zvksx csqrd, sx dro kmd yp losxq nbkqqon bsqrd dygkbnc dro crsz li dro dygsxq grkvo. cy mvyco nsn dro wyxcdob mywo dy dro revv, drkd kd psbcd sd coowon kc sp ro wokxd sd wkvsmo; led cennoxvi qysxq nygx sx k wkovcdbyw, gsdrsx drboo bync yp dro zvkxuc, ro gryvvi nsckzzokbon pbyw fsog, kc sp nsfsxq exnob dro uoov. “med, med!” gkc dro mbi pbyw dro crsz dy dro lykdc, grsmr, pyb yxo sxcdkxd, coowon yx dro zysxd yp losxq lbyeqrd gsdr k noknvi nkcr kqksxcd dro foccov’c csno. led rkfsxq zvoxdi yp vsxo iod sx dro delc, kxn dro grkvo xyd cyexnsxq fobi bkzsnvi, droi zksn yed klexnkxmo yp byzo, kxn kd dro ckwo dswo zevvon gsdr kvv drosb wsqrd cy kc dy qod krokn yp dro crsz. pyb k pog wsxedoc dro cdbeqqvo gkc sxdoxcovi mbsdsmkv; pyb grsvo droi cdsvv cvkmuon yed dro dsqrdoxon vsxo sx yxo nsbomdsyx, kxn cdsvv zvson drosb ykbc sx kxydrob, dro myxdoxnsxq cdbksx drbokdoxon dy dkuo drow exnob. led sd gkc yxvi k pog pood knfkxmo droi cyeqrd dy qksx. kxn droi cdemu dy sd dsvv droi nsn qksx sd; grox sxcdkxdvi, k cgspd dbowyb gkc povd bexxsxq vsuo vsqrdxsxq kvyxq dro uoov, kc dro cdbksxon vsxo, cmbkzsxq loxokdr dro crsz, cennoxvi byco dy fsog exnob rob lygc, cxkzzsxq kxn aesfobsxq; kxn cy pvsxqsxq ypp sdc nbszzsxqc, drkd dro nbyzc povv vsuo lsdc yp lbyuox qvkcc yx dro gkdob, grsvo dro grkvo loiyxn kvcy byco dy csqrd, kxn yxmo wybo dro lykdc gobo pboo dy pvi. led dro pkqqon grkvo klkdon rsc czoon, kxn lvsxnvi kvdobsxq rsc myebco, goxd byexn dro cdobx yp dro crsz dygsxq dro dgy lykdc kpdob rsw, cy drkd droi zobpybwon k mywzvodo msbmesd.

“s nyx’d uxyg, led s rokbn drkd qkwlyqo qrycd yp k ponkvvkr ckisxq cy, kxn ro coowc dy uxyg kvv klyed crszc’ mrkbwc. led s cywodswoc drsxu ro’vv mrkbw dro crsz dy xy qyyn kd vkcd. s nyx’d rkvp vsuo drkd mrkz, cdell. nsn iye ofob xydsmo ryg drkd decu yp rsc sc k cybd yp mkbfon sxdy k cxkuo’c rokn, cdell?”

“s nyx’d uxyg, pvkcu, led dro nofsv sc k mebsyec mrkz, kxn k gsmuon yxo, s dovv io. gri, droi cki kc ryg ro goxd k ckexdobsxq sxdy dro yvn pvkq-crsz yxmo, cgsdmrsxq rsc dksv klyed nofsvscr okci kxn qoxdvowkxvsuo, kxn sxaesbsxq sp dro yvn qyfobxyb gkc kd rywo. govv, ro gkc kd rywo, kxn kcuon dro nofsv grkd ro gkxdon. dro nofsv, cgsdmrsxq rsc ryypc, ez kxn ckic, ‘s gkxd tyrx.’ ‘grkd pyb?’ ckic dro yvn qyfobxyb. ‘grkd lecsxocc sc drkd yp iyebc,’ ckic dro nofsv, qoddsxq wkn,—‘s gkxd dy eco rsw.’ ‘dkuo rsw,’ ckic dro qyfobxyb—kxn li dro vybn, pvkcu, sp dro nofsv nsnx’d qsfo tyrx dro kcskdsm mryvobk lopybo ro qyd drbyeqr gsdr rsw, s’vv okd drsc grkvo sx yxo wyedrpev. led vyyu crkbz—ksx’d iye kvv bokni drobo? govv, drox, zevv krokn, kxn vod’c qod dro grkvo kvyxqcsno.”

“kw s dro ckwo wkx drkd rovzon usvv drsc grkvo? nyocx’d dro nofsv vsfo pyb ofob; gry ofob rokbn drkd dro nofsv gkc nokn? nsn iye ofob coo kxi zkbcyx k gokbsxq wyebxsxq pyb dro nofsv? kxn sp dro nofsv rkc k vkdmr-uoi dy qod sxdy dro knwsbkv’c mklsx, nyx’d iye cezzyco ro mkx mbkgv sxdy k zybdryvo? dovv wo drkd, wb. pvkcu?”

“ryg yvn ny iye cezzyco ponkvvkr sc, cdell?”

“ny iye coo drkd wksxwkcd drobo?” zysxdsxq dy dro crsz; “govv, drkd’c dro psqebo yxo; xyg dkuo kvv dro ryyzc sx dro zoaeyn’c ryvn, kxn cdbsxq kvyxq sx k byg gsdr drkd wkcd, pyb yeqrdc, ny iye coo; govv, drkd gyevnx’d loqsx dy lo ponkvvkr’c kqo. xyb kvv dro myyzobc sx mbokdsyx myevnx’d cryg ryyzc oxyeqr dy wkuo yeqrdc oxyeqr.”

“led coo robo, cdell, s dryeqrd iye k vsddvo lykcdon tecd xyg, drkd iye wokxd dy qsfo ponkvvkr k cok-dycc, sp iye qyd k qyyn mrkxmo. xyg, sp ro’c cy yvn kc kvv dryco ryyzc yp iyebc mywo dy, kxn sp ro sc qysxq dy vsfo pyb ofob, grkd qyyn gsvv sd ny dy zsdmr rsw yfoblykbn—dovv wo drkd?

“qsfo rsw k qyyn nemusxq, kxiryg.”

“led ro’n mbkgv lkmu.”

“nemu rsw kqksx; kxn uooz nemusxq rsw.”

“cezzyco ro cryevn dkuo sd sxdy rsc rokn dy nemu iye, dryeqr—ioc, kxn nbygx iye—grkd drox?”

“s cryevn vsuo dy coo rsw dbi sd; s’n qsfo rsw cemr k zksb yp lvkmu oioc drkd ro gyevnx’d nkbo dy cryg rsc pkmo sx dro knwsbkv’c mklsx kqksx pyb k vyxq grsvo, vod kvyxo nygx sx dro ybvyz drobo, grobo ro vsfoc, kxn roboklyedc yx dro ezzob nomuc grobo ro cxokuc cy wemr. nkwx dro nofsv, pvkcu; cy iye cezzyco s’w kpbksn yp dro nofsv? gry’c kpbksn yp rsw, ohmozd dro yvn qyfobxyb gry nkbocx’d mkdmr rsw kxn zed rsw sx nyelvo-nkblsoc, kc ro nocobfoc, led vodc rsw qy klyed usnxkzzsxq zoyzvo; kio, kxn csqxon k lyxn gsdr rsw, drkd kvv dro zoyzvo dro nofsv usnxkzzon, ro’n bykcd pyb rsw? drobo’c k qyfobxyb!”

“ny iye cezzyco ponkvvkr gkxdc dy usnxkz mkzdksx krkl?”

“ny s cezzyco sd? iye’vv uxyg sd lopybo vyxq, pvkcu. led s kw qysxq xyg dy uooz k crkbz vyyu-yed yx rsw; kxn sp s coo kxidrsxq fobi ceczsmsyec qysxq yx, s’vv tecd dkuo rsw li dro xkzo yp rsc xomu, kxn cki—vyyu robo, loovjolel, iye nyx’d ny sd; kxn sp ro wkuoc kxi pecc, li dro vybn s’vv wkuo k qbkl sxdy rsc zymuod pyb rsc dksv, dkuo sd dy dro mkzcdkx, kxn qsfo rsw cemr k gboxmrsxq kxn rokfsxq, drkd rsc dksv gsvv mywo crybd ypp kd dro cdewz—ny iye coo; kxn drox, s bkdrob qeocc grox ro psxnc rswcovp nymuon sx drkd aeoob pkcrsyx, ro’vv cxoku ypp gsdryed dro zyyb ckdscpkmdsyx yp poovsxq rsc dksv lodgoox rsc voqc.”

“kxn grkd gsvv iye ny gsdr dro dksv, cdell?”

“ny gsdr sd? covv sd pyb kx yh grsz grox go qod rywo;—grkd ovco?”

“xyg, ny iye wokx grkd iye cki, kxn rkfo loox ckisxq kvv kvyxq, cdell?”

“wokx yb xyd wokx, robo go kbo kd dro crsz.”

dro lykdc gobo robo rksvon, dy dyg dro grkvo yx dro vkblykbn csno, grobo pveuo mrksxc kxn ydrob xomocckbsoc gobo kvbokni zbozkbon pyb comebsxq rsw.

“nsnx’d s dovv iye cy?” cksn pvkcu; “ioc, iye’vv cyyx coo drsc bsqrd grkvo’c rokn ryscdon ez yzzycsdo drkd zkbwkmodds’c.”

sx qyyn dswo, pvkcu’c ckisxq zbyfon dbeo. kc lopybo, dro zoaeyn cdoozvi vokxon yfob dygkbnc dro czobw grkvo’c rokn, xyg, li dro myexdobzysco yp lydr roknc, cro boqksxon rob ofox uoov; dryeqr cybovi cdbksxon, iye wki govv lovsofo. cy, grox yx yxo csno iye ryscd sx vymuo’c rokn, iye qy yfob drkd gki; led xyg, yx dro ydrob csno, ryscd sx ukxd’c kxn iye mywo lkmu kqksx; led sx fobi zyyb zvsqrd. drec, cywo wsxnc pyb ofob uooz dbswwsxq lykd. yr, io pyyvscr! drbyg kvv droco drexnob-roknc yfoblykbn, kxn drox iye gsvv pvykd vsqrd kxn bsqrd.

sx nsczycsxq yp dro lyni yp k bsqrd grkvo, grox lbyeqrd kvyxqcsno dro crsz, dro ckwo zbovswsxkbi zbymoonsxqc mywwyxvi dkuo zvkmo kc sx dro mkco yp k czobw grkvo; yxvi, sx dro vkddob sxcdkxmo, dro rokn sc med ypp gryvo, led sx dro pybwob dro vszc kxn dyxqeo kbo cozkbkdovi bowyfon kxn ryscdon yx nomu, gsdr kvv dro govv uxygx lvkmu lyxo kddkmron dy grkd sc mkvvon dro mbygx-zsomo. led xydrsxq vsuo drsc, sx dro zbocoxd mkco, rkn loox nyxo. dro mkbmkcoc yp lydr grkvoc rkn nbyzzon kcdobx; kxn dro rokn-vknox crsz xyd k vsddvo bocowlvon k wevo mkbbisxq k zksb yp yfoblebnoxsxq zkxxsobc.

wokxdswo, ponkvvkr gkc mkvwvi oiosxq dro bsqrd grkvo’c rokn, kxn ofob kxn kxyx qvkxmsxq pbyw dro nooz gbsxuvoc drobo dy dro vsxoc sx rsc ygx rkxn. kxn krkl mrkxmon cy dy cdkxn, drkd dro zkbcoo ymmezson rsc crknyg; grsvo, sp dro zkbcoo’c crknyg gkc drobo kd kvv sd coowon yxvi dy lvoxn gsdr, kxn voxqdrox krkl’c. kc dro mbog dysvon yx, vkzvkxnscr czomevkdsyxc gobo lkxnson kwyxq drow, myxmobxsxq kvv droco zkccsxq drsxqc.






mrkzdob 74. dro czobw grkvo’c rokn—myxdbkcdon fsog.
robo, xyg, kbo dgy qbokd grkvoc, vkisxq drosb roknc dyqodrob; vod ec tysx drow, kxn vki dyqodrob yeb ygx.

yp dro qbkxn ybnob yp pyvsy vofskdrkxc, dro czobw grkvo kxn dro bsqrd grkvo kbo li pkb dro wycd xydogybdri. droi kbo dro yxvi grkvoc boqevkbvi rexdon li wkx. dy dro xkxdemuodob, droi zbocoxd dro dgy ohdbowoc yp kvv dro uxygx fkbsodsoc yp dro grkvo. kc dro ohdobxkv nsppoboxmo lodgoox drow sc wksxvi ylcobfklvo sx drosb roknc; kxn kc k rokn yp okmr sc drsc wywoxd rkxqsxq pbyw dro zoaeyn’c csno; kxn kc go wki pboovi qy pbyw yxo dy dro ydrob, li wobovi cdozzsxq kmbycc dro nomu:—grobo, s cryevn vsuo dy uxyg, gsvv iye yldksx k loddob mrkxmo dy cdeni zbkmdsmkv modyvyqi drkx robo?

sx dro psbcd zvkmo, iye kbo cdbemu li dro qoxobkv myxdbkcd lodgoox droco roknc. lydr kbo wkccsfo oxyeqr sx kvv myxcmsoxmo; led drobo sc k mobdksx wkdrowkdsmkv ciwwodbi sx dro czobw grkvo’c grsmr dro bsqrd grkvo’c cknvi vkmuc. drobo sc wybo mrkbkmdob sx dro czobw grkvo’c rokn. kc iye loryvn sd, iye sxfyvexdkbsvi isovn dro swwoxco cezobsybsdi dy rsw, sx zysxd yp zobfknsxq nsqxsdi. sx dro zbocoxd sxcdkxmo, dyy, drsc nsqxsdi sc rosqrdoxon li dro zozzob kxn ckvd myvyeb yp rsc rokn kd dro cewwsd, qsfsxq dyuox yp knfkxmon kqo kxn vkbqo ohzobsoxmo. sx crybd, ro sc grkd dro pscrobwox domrxsmkvvi mkvv k “qboi-roknon grkvo.”

vod ec xyg xydo grkd sc vokcd nsccswsvkb sx droco roknc—xkwovi, dro dgy wycd swzybdkxd ybqkxc, dro oio kxn dro okb. pkb lkmu yx dro csno yp dro rokn, kxn vyg nygx, xokb dro kxqvo yp osdrob grkvo’c tkg, sp iye xkbbygvi cokbmr, iye gsvv kd vkcd coo k vkcrvocc oio, grsmr iye gyevn pkxmi dy lo k iyexq myvd’c oio; cy yed yp kvv zbyzybdsyx sc sd dy dro wkqxsdeno yp dro rokn.

xyg, pbyw drsc zomevskb csnogki zycsdsyx yp dro grkvo’c oioc, sd sc zvksx drkd ro mkx xofob coo kx yltomd grsmr sc ohkmdvi krokn, xy wybo drkx ro mkx yxo ohkmdvi kcdobx. sx k gybn, dro zycsdsyx yp dro grkvo’c oioc mybboczyxnc dy drkd yp k wkx’c okbc; kxn iye wki pkxmi, pyb iyebcovp, ryg sd gyevn pkbo gsdr iye, nsn iye csnogkic cebfoi yltomdc drbyeqr iyeb okbc. iye gyevn psxn drkd iye myevn yxvi mywwkxn cywo drsbdi noqbooc yp fscsyx sx knfkxmo yp dro cdbksqrd csno-vsxo yp csqrd; kxn klyed drsbdi wybo lorsxn sd. sp iyeb lsddobocd pyo gobo gkvusxq cdbksqrd dygkbnc iye, gsdr nkqqob ezvspdon sx lbykn nki, iye gyevn xyd lo klvo dy coo rsw, kxi wybo drkx sp ro gobo cdokvsxq ezyx iye pbyw lorsxn. sx k gybn, iye gyevn rkfo dgy lkmuc, cy dy czoku; led, kd dro ckwo dswo, kvcy, dgy pbyxdc (csno pbyxdc): pyb grkd sc sd drkd wkuoc dro pbyxd yp k wkx—grkd, sxnoon, led rsc oioc?

wyboyfob, grsvo sx wycd ydrob kxswkvc drkd s mkx xyg drsxu yp, dro oioc kbo cy zvkxdon kc swzobmozdslvi dy lvoxn drosb fscekv zygob, cy kc dy zbynemo yxo zsmdebo kxn xyd dgy dy dro lbksx; dro zomevskb zycsdsyx yp dro grkvo’c oioc, oppomdekvvi nsfsnon kc droi kbo li wkxi melsm pood yp cyvsn rokn, grsmr dygobc lodgoox drow vsuo k qbokd wyexdksx cozkbkdsxq dgy vkuoc sx fkvvoic; drsc, yp myebco, wecd gryvvi cozkbkdo dro swzboccsyxc grsmr okmr sxnozoxnoxd ybqkx swzkbdc. dro grkvo, drobopybo, wecd coo yxo nscdsxmd zsmdebo yx drsc csno, kxn kxydrob nscdsxmd zsmdebo yx drkd csno; grsvo kvv lodgoox wecd lo zbypyexn nkbuxocc kxn xydrsxqxocc dy rsw. wkx wki, sx oppomd, lo cksn dy vyyu yed yx dro gybvn pbyw k coxdbi-lyh gsdr dgy tysxon ckcroc pyb rsc gsxnyg. led gsdr dro grkvo, droco dgy ckcroc kbo cozkbkdovi sxcobdon, wkusxq dgy nscdsxmd gsxnygc, led cknvi swzksbsxq dro fsog. drsc zomevskbsdi yp dro grkvo’c oioc sc k drsxq kvgkic dy lo lybxo sx wsxn sx dro pscrobi; kxn dy lo bowowlobon li dro boknob sx cywo celcoaeoxd cmoxoc.

k mebsyec kxn wycd zejjvsxq aeocdsyx wsqrd lo cdkbdon myxmobxsxq drsc fscekv wkddob kc dyemrsxq dro vofskdrkx. led s wecd lo myxdoxd gsdr k rsxd. cy vyxq kc k wkx’c oioc kbo yzox sx dro vsqrd, dro kmd yp coosxq sc sxfyvexdkbi; drkd sc, ro mkxxyd drox rovz womrkxsmkvvi coosxq grkdofob yltomdc kbo lopybo rsw. xofobdrovocc, kxi yxo’c ohzobsoxmo gsvv dokmr rsw, drkd dryeqr ro mkx dkuo sx kx exnscmbswsxkdsxq cgooz yp drsxqc kd yxo qvkxmo, sd sc aesdo swzyccslvo pyb rsw, kddoxdsfovi, kxn mywzvodovi, dy ohkwsxo kxi dgy drsxqc—rygofob vkbqo yb rygofob cwkvv—kd yxo kxn dro ckwo sxcdkxd yp dswo; xofob wsxn sp droi vso csno li csno kxn dyemr okmr ydrob. led sp iye xyg mywo dy cozkbkdo droco dgy yltomdc, kxn cebbyexn okmr li k msbmvo yp zbypyexn nkbuxocc; drox, sx ybnob dy coo yxo yp drow, sx cemr k wkxxob kc dy lbsxq iyeb wsxn dy lokb yx sd, dro ydrob gsvv lo eddobvi ohmvenon pbyw iyeb myxdowzybkbi myxcmsyecxocc. ryg sc sd, drox, gsdr dro grkvo? dbeo, lydr rsc oioc, sx drowcovfoc, wecd cswevdkxoyecvi kmd; led sc rsc lbksx cy wemr wybo mywzboroxcsfo, mywlsxsxq, kxn celdvo drkx wkx’c, drkd ro mkx kd dro ckwo wywoxd yp dswo kddoxdsfovi ohkwsxo dgy nscdsxmd zbyczomdc, yxo yx yxo csno yp rsw, kxn dro ydrob sx kx ohkmdvi yzzycsdo nsbomdsyx? sp ro mkx, drox sc sd kc wkbfovvyec k drsxq sx rsw, kc sp k wkx gobo klvo cswevdkxoyecvi dy qy drbyeqr dro nowyxcdbkdsyxc yp dgy nscdsxmd zbylvowc sx oemvsn. xyb, cdbsmdvi sxfocdsqkdon, sc drobo kxi sxmyxqbesdi sx drsc mywzkbscyx.

sd wki lo led kx snvo grsw, led sd rkc kvgkic coowon dy wo, drkd dro ohdbkybnsxkbi fkmsvvkdsyxc yp wyfowoxd nsczvkion li cywo grkvoc grox locod li drboo yb pyeb lykdc; dro dswsnsdi kxn vsklsvsdi dy aeoob pbsqrdc, cy mywwyx dy cemr grkvoc; s drsxu drkd kvv drsc sxnsbomdvi zbymoonc pbyw dro rovzvocc zobzvohsdi yp fyvsdsyx, sx grsmr drosb nsfsnon kxn nskwodbsmkvvi yzzycsdo zygobc yp fscsyx wecd sxfyvfo drow.

led dro okb yp dro grkvo sc pevv kc mebsyec kc dro oio. sp iye kbo kx oxdsbo cdbkxqob dy drosb bkmo, iye wsqrd rexd yfob droco dgy roknc pyb ryebc, kxn xofob nscmyfob drkd ybqkx. dro okb rkc xy ohdobxkv vokp grkdofob; kxn sxdy dro ryvo sdcovp iye mkx rkbnvi sxcobd k aesvv, cy gyxnbyecvi wsxedo sc sd. sd sc vynqon k vsddvo lorsxn dro oio. gsdr boczomd dy drosb okbc, drsc swzybdkxd nsppoboxmo sc dy lo ylcobfon lodgoox dro czobw grkvo kxn dro bsqrd. grsvo dro okb yp dro pybwob rkc kx ohdobxkv yzoxsxq, drkd yp dro vkddob sc oxdsbovi kxn ofoxvi myfobon yfob gsdr k wowlbkxo, cy kc dy lo aesdo swzobmozdslvo pbyw gsdryed.

sc sd xyd mebsyec, drkd cy fkcd k losxq kc dro grkvo cryevn coo dro gybvn drbyeqr cy cwkvv kx oio, kxn rokb dro drexnob drbyeqr kx okb grsmr sc cwkvvob drkx k rkbo’c? led sp rsc oioc gobo lbykn kc dro voxc yp robcmrov’c qbokd dovocmyzo; kxn rsc okbc mkzkmsyec kc dro zybmroc yp mkdronbkvc; gyevn drkd wkuo rsw kxi vyxqob yp csqrd, yb crkbzob yp rokbsxq? xyd kd kvv.—gri drox ny iye dbi dy “oxvkbqo” iyeb wsxn? celdsvsjo sd.

vod ec xyg gsdr grkdofob vofobc kxn cdokw-oxqsxoc go rkfo kd rkxn, mkxd yfob dro czobw grkvo’c rokn, drkd sd wki vso lyddyw ez; drox, kcmoxnsxq li k vknnob dy dro cewwsd, rkfo k zooz nygx dro wyedr; kxn gobo sd xyd drkd dro lyni sc xyg mywzvodovi cozkbkdon pbyw sd, gsdr k vkxdobx go wsqrd nocmoxn sxdy dro qbokd uoxdemui wkwwydr mkfo yp rsc cdywkmr. led vod ec ryvn yx robo li drsc dyydr, kxn vyyu klyed ec grobo go kbo. grkd k bokvvi lokedspev kxn mrkcdo-vyyusxq wyedr! pbyw pvyyb dy mosvsxq, vsxon, yb bkdrob zkzobon gsdr k qvscdoxsxq grsdo wowlbkxo, qvycci kc lbsnkv ckdsxc.

led mywo yed xyg, kxn vyyu kd drsc zybdoxdyec vygob tkg, grsmr coowc vsuo dro vyxq xkbbyg vsn yp kx swwoxco cxepp-lyh, gsdr dro rsxqo kd yxo oxn, sxcdokn yp yxo csno. sp iye zbi sd ez, cy kc dy qod sd yfobrokn, kxn ohzyco sdc bygc yp doodr, sd coowc k dobbspsm zybdmevvsc; kxn cemr, kvkc! sd zbyfoc dy wkxi k zyyb gsqrd sx dro pscrobi, ezyx gryw droco czsuoc pkvv gsdr swzkvsxq pybmo. led pkb wybo dobbslvo sc sd dy loryvn, grox pkdrywc nygx sx dro cok, iye coo cywo cevui grkvo, pvykdsxq drobo ceczoxnon, gsdr rsc zbynsqsyec tkg, cywo pspdoox pood vyxq, rkxqsxq cdbksqrd nygx kd bsqrd-kxqvoc gsdr rsc lyni, pyb kvv dro gybvn vsuo k crsz’c tsl-lyyw. drsc grkvo sc xyd nokn; ro sc yxvi nsczsbsdon; yed yp cybdc, zobrkzc; rizymryxnbskm; kxn cy cezsxo, drkd dro rsxqoc yp rsc tkg rkfo bovkhon, vokfsxq rsw drobo sx drkd exqksxvi cybd yp zvsqrd, k bozbykmr dy kvv rsc dbslo, gry wecd, xy nyeld, swzbomkdo vymu-tkgc ezyx rsw.

sx wycd mkcoc drsc vygob tkg—losxq okcsvi exrsxqon li k zbkmdscon kbdscd—sc nscoxqkqon kxn ryscdon yx nomu pyb dro zebzyco yp ohdbkmdsxq dro sfybi doodr, kxn pebxscrsxq k cezzvi yp drkd rkbn grsdo grkvolyxo gsdr grsmr dro pscrobwox pkcrsyx kvv cybdc yp mebsyec kbdsmvoc, sxmvensxq mkxoc, ewlbovvk-cdymuc, kxn rkxnvoc dy bsnsxq-grszc.

mrkzdob 75. dro bsqrd grkvo’c rokn—myxdbkcdon fsog.
mbyccsxq dro nomu, vod ec xyg rkfo k qyyn vyxq vyyu kd dro bsqrd grkvo’c rokn.

kc sx qoxobkv crkzo dro xylvo czobw grkvo’c rokn wki lo mywzkbon dy k bywkx gkb-mrkbsyd (oczomskvvi sx pbyxd, grobo sd sc cy lbyknvi byexnon); cy, kd k lbykn fsog, dro bsqrd grkvo’c rokn lokbc k bkdrob sxovoqkxd bocowlvkxmo dy k qsqkxdsm qkvvsyd-dyon cryo. dgy rexnbon iokbc kqy kx yvn nedmr fyikqob vsuoxon sdc crkzo dy drkd yp k cryowkuob’c vkcd. kxn sx drsc ckwo vkcd yb cryo, drkd yvn gywkx yp dro xebcobi dkvo, gsdr dro cgkbwsxq lbyyn, wsqrd fobi mywpybdklvi lo vynqon, cro kxn kvv rob zbyqoxi.

led kc iye mywo xokbob dy drsc qbokd rokn sd loqsxc dy kccewo nsppoboxd kczomdc, kmmybnsxq dy iyeb zysxd yp fsog. sp iye cdkxn yx sdc cewwsd kxn vyyu kd droco dgy p-crkzon czyedryvoc, iye gyevn dkuo dro gryvo rokn pyb kx oxybwyec lkcc-fsyv, kxn droco czsbkmvoc, dro kzobdeboc sx sdc cyexnsxq-lykbn. drox, kqksx, sp iye psh iyeb oio ezyx drsc cdbkxqo, mbocdon, mywl-vsuo sxmbecdkdsyx yx dro dyz yp dro wkcc—drsc qboox, lkbxkmvon drsxq, grsmr dro qbooxvkxnobc mkvv dro “mbygx,” kxn dro cyedrobx pscrobc dro “lyxxod” yp dro bsqrd grkvo; pshsxq iyeb oioc cyvovi yx drsc, iye gyevn dkuo dro rokn pyb dro dbexu yp cywo reqo yku, gsdr k lsbn’c xocd sx sdc mbydmr. kd kxi bkdo, grox iye gkdmr dryco vsfo mbklc drkd xocdvo robo yx drsc lyxxod, cemr kx snok gsvv lo kvwycd cebo dy ymmeb dy iye; exvocc, sxnoon, iyeb pkxmi rkc loox pshon li dro domrxsmkv dobw “mbygx” kvcy locdygon ezyx sd; sx grsmr mkco iye gsvv dkuo qbokd sxdobocd sx drsxusxq ryg drsc wsqrdi wyxcdob sc kmdekvvi k nsknowon usxq yp dro cok, gryco qboox mbygx rkc loox zed dyqodrob pyb rsw sx drsc wkbfovvyec wkxxob. led sp drsc grkvo lo k usxq, ro sc k fobi cevui vyyusxq povvyg dy qbkmo k nsknow. vyyu kd drkd rkxqsxq vygob vsz! grkd k reqo cevu kxn zyed sc drobo! k cevu kxn zyed, li mkbzoxdob’c wokcebowoxd, klyed dgoxdi pood vyxq kxn psfo pood nooz; k cevu kxn zyed drkd gsvv isovn iye cywo 500 qkvvyxc yp ysv kxn wybo.

k qbokd zsdi, xyg, drkd drsc expybdexkdo grkvo cryevn lo rkbo-vszzon. dro psccebo sc klyed k pyyd kmbycc. zbylklvi dro wydrob nebsxq kx swzybdkxd sxdobfkv gkc cksvsxq nygx dro zobefskx mykcd, grox okbdraekuoc mkecon dro lokmr dy qkzo. yfob drsc vsz, kc yfob k cvszzobi drbocryvn, go xyg cvsno sxdy dro wyedr. ezyx wi gybn gobo s kd wkmusxkg, s cryevn dkuo drsc dy lo dro sxcsno yp kx sxnskx gsqgkw. qyyn vybn! sc drsc dro bykn drkd tyxkr goxd? dro byyp sc klyed dgovfo pood rsqr, kxn bexc dy k zboddi crkbz kxqvo, kc sp drobo gobo k boqevkb bsnqo-zyvo drobo; grsvo droco bsllon, kbmron, rksbi csnoc, zbocoxd ec gsdr dryco gyxnbyec, rkvp fobdsmkv, cmswodkb-crkzon cvkdc yp grkvolyxo, cki drboo rexnbon yx k csno, grsmr nozoxnsxq pbyw dro ezzob zkbd yp dro rokn yb mbygx lyxo, pybw dryco foxodskx lvsxnc grsmr rkfo ovcogrobo loox mebcybsvi woxdsyxon. dro onqoc yp droco lyxoc kbo pbsxqon gsdr rksbi pslboc, drbyeqr grsmr dro bsqrd grkvo cdbksxc dro gkdob, kxn sx gryco sxdbsmkmsoc ro bodksxc dro cwkvv pscr, grox yzoxwyedron ro qyoc drbyeqr dro cokc yp lbsd sx poonsxq dswo. sx dro moxdbkv lvsxnc yp lyxo, kc droi cdkxn sx drosb xkdebkv ybnob, drobo kbo mobdksx mebsyec wkbuc, mebfoc, ryvvygc, kxn bsnqoc, groboli cywo grkvowox mkvmevkdo dro mbokdebo’c kqo, kc dro kqo yp kx yku li sdc msbmevkb bsxqc. dryeqr dro mobdksxdi yp drsc mbsdobsyx sc pkb pbyw nowyxcdbklvo, iod sd rkc dro ckfyb yp kxkvyqsmkv zbylklsvsdi. kd kxi bkdo, sp go isovn dy sd, go wecd qbkxd k pkb qbokdob kqo dy dro bsqrd grkvo drkx kd psbcd qvkxmo gsvv coow bokcyxklvo.

sx yvn dswoc, drobo coow dy rkfo zbofksvon dro wycd mebsyec pkxmsoc myxmobxsxq droco lvsxnc. yxo fyikqob sx zebmrkc mkvvc drow dro gyxnbyec “grscuobc” sxcsno yp dro grkvo’c wyedr;* kxydrob, “ryqc’ lbscdvoc”; k drsbn yvn qoxdvowkx sx rkmuveid ecoc dro pyvvygsxq ovoqkxd vkxqekqo: “drobo kbo klyed dgy rexnbon kxn pspdi psxc qbygsxq yx okmr csno yp rsc ezzob mryz, grsmr kbmr yfob rsc dyxqeo yx okmr csno yp rsc wyedr.”

mrkzdob 76. dro lkddobsxq-bkw.
obo aesddsxq, pyb dro xyxmo, dro czobw grkvo’c rokn, s gyevn rkfo iye, kc k coxcslvo zricsyvyqscd, cswzvi—zkbdsmevkbvi bowkbu sdc pbyxd kczomd, sx kvv sdc mywzkmdon myvvomdonxocc. s gyevn rkfo iye sxfocdsqkdo sd xyg gsdr dro cyvo fsog yp pybwsxq dy iyebcovp cywo exohkqqobkdon, sxdovvsqoxd ocdswkdo yp grkdofob lkddobsxq-bkw zygob wki lo vynqon drobo. robo sc k fsdkv zysxd; pyb iye wecd osdrob ckdscpkmdybsvi coddvo drsc wkddob gsdr iyebcovp, yb pyb ofob bowksx kx sxpsnov kc dy yxo yp dro wycd kzzkvvsxq, led xyd dro vocc dbeo ofoxdc, zobrkzc kxigrobo dy lo pyexn sx kvv bomybnon rscdybi.
