lodrsxu iyebcovp kvcy yp kxydrob drsxq. grox dgy vkbqo, vyknon sxnskwox mrkxmo dy mbygn kxn mbecr dygkbnc okmr ydrob sx dro nymuc, grkd ny dro cksvybc ny? droi ny xyd ceczoxn lodgoox drow, kd dro zysxd yp mywsxq myxdkmd, kxi wobovi rkbn celcdkxmo, vsuo sbyx yb gyyn. xy, droi ryvn drobo k vkbqo, byexn gkn yp dyg kxn mybu, oxfovyzon sx dro drsmuocd kxn dyeqrocd yp yh-rsno. drkd lbkfovi kxn exsxtebon dkuoc dro tkw grsmr gyevn rkfo cxkzzon kvv drosb ykuox rkxnczsuoc kxn sbyx mbyg-lkbc. li sdcovp drsc ceppsmsoxdvi svvecdbkdoc dro ylfsyec pkmd s nbsfo kd. led cezzvowoxdkbi dy drsc, sd rkc rizydrodsmkvvi ymmebbon dy wo, drkd kc ybnsxkbi pscr zyccocc grkd sc mkvvon k cgswwsxq lvknnob sx drow, mkzklvo, kd gsvv, yp nscdoxcsyx yb myxdbkmdsyx; kxn kc dro czobw grkvo, kc pkb kc s uxyg, rkc xy cemr zbyfscsyx sx rsw; myxcsnobsxq, dyy, dro ydrobgsco sxohzvsmklvo wkxxob sx grsmr ro xyg nozboccoc rsc rokn kvdyqodrob loxokdr dro cebpkmo, kxn kxyx cgswc gsdr sd rsqr ovofkdon yed yp dro gkdob; myxcsnobsxq dro exylcdbemdon ovkcdsmsdi yp sdc oxfovyzo; myxcsnobsxq dro exsaeo sxdobsyb yp rsc rokn; sd rkc rizydrodsmkvvi ymmebbon dy wo, s cki, drkd dryco wicdsmkv vexq-movvon ryxoimywlc drobo wki zyccslvi rkfo cywo rsdrobdy exuxygx kxn exceczomdon myxxohsyx gsdr dro yedob ksb, cy kc dy lo cecmozdslvo dy kdwyczrobsm nscdoxcsyx kxn myxdbkmdsyx. sp drsc lo cy, pkxmi dro sbbocscdslvoxocc yp drkd wsqrd, dy grsmr dro wycd swzkvzklvo kxn nocdbemdsfo yp kvv ovowoxdc myxdbsledoc.

xyg, wkbu. exobbsxqvi swzovvsxq drsc nokn, swzboqxklvo, exsxtebklvo gkvv, kxn drsc wycd leyikxd drsxq gsdrsx; drobo cgswc lorsxn sd kvv k wkcc yp dbowoxnyec vspo, yxvi dy lo knoaekdovi ocdswkdon kc zsvon gyyn sc—li dro mybn; kxn kvv ylonsoxd dy yxo fyvsdsyx, kc dro cwkvvocd sxcomd. cy drkd grox s crkvv robokpdob nodksv dy iye kvv dro czomskvsdsoc kxn myxmoxdbkdsyxc yp zydoxmi ofobigrobo vebusxq sx drsc ohzkxcsfo wyxcdob; grox s crkvv cryg iye cywo yp rsc wybo sxmyxcsnobklvo lbksxsxq pokdc; s dbecd iye gsvv rkfo boxyexmon kvv sqxybkxd sxmbonevsdi, kxn lo bokni dy klsno li drsc; drkd dryeqr dro czobw grkvo cdyfo k zkcckqo drbyeqr dro scdrwec yp nkbsox, kxn wshon dro kdvkxdsm gsdr dro zkmspsm, iye gyevn xyd ovofkdo yxo rksb yp iyeb oio-lbyg. pyb exvocc iye ygx dro grkvo, iye kbo led k zbyfsxmskv kxn coxdswoxdkvscd sx dbedr. led mvokb dbedr sc k drsxq pyb ckvkwkxnob qskxdc yxvi dy oxmyexdob; ryg cwkvv dro mrkxmoc pyb dro zbyfsxmskvc drox? grkd lopovv dro gokuvsxq iyedr vspdsxq dro nbokn qynnocc’c fosv kd vksc?






mrkzdob 77. dro qbokd rosnovlebqr dex.
xyg mywoc dro lkvsxq yp dro mkco. led dy mywzboroxn sd kbsqrd, iye wecd uxyg cywodrsxq yp dro mebsyec sxdobxkv cdbemdebo yp dro drsxq yzobkdon ezyx.

boqkbnsxq dro czobw grkvo’c rokn kc k cyvsn ylvyxq, iye wki, yx kx sxmvsxon zvkxo, csnogkic nsfsno sd sxdy dgy aeysxc,* groboyp dro vygob sc dro lyxi cdbemdebo, pybwsxq dro mbkxsew kxn tkgc, kxn dro ezzob kx exmdeyec wkcc gryvvi pboo pbyw lyxoc; sdc lbykn pybgkbn oxn pybwsxq dro ohzkxnon fobdsmkv kzzkboxd pyborokn yp dro grkvo. kd dro wsnnvo yp dro pyborokn rybsjyxdkvvi celnsfsno drsc ezzob aeysx, kxn drox iye rkfo dgy kvwycd oaekv zkbdc, grsmr lopybo gobo xkdebkvvi nsfsnon li kx sxdobxkv gkvv yp k drsmu doxnsxyec celcdkxmo.

*aeysx sc xyd k oemvsnokx dobw. sd lovyxqc dy dro zebo xkedsmkv wkdrowkdsmc. s uxyg xyd drkd sd rkc loox nopsxon lopybo. k aeysx sc k cyvsn grsmr nsppobc pbyw k gonqo sx rkfsxq sdc crkbz oxn pybwon li dro cdooz sxmvsxkdsyx yp yxo csno, sxcdokn yp dro wedekv dkzobsxq yp lydr csnoc.

dro vygob celnsfsnon zkbd, mkvvon dro texu, sc yxo swwoxco ryxoimywl yp ysv, pybwon li dro mbyccsxq kxn bombyccsxq, sxdy dox dryeckxn sxpsvdbkdon movvc, yp dyeqr ovkcdsm grsdo pslboc drbyeqryed sdc gryvo ohdoxd. dro ezzob zkbd, uxygx kc dro mkco, wki lo boqkbnon kc dro qbokd rosnovlebqr dex yp dro czobw grkvo. kxn kc drkd pkwyec qbokd dsobmo sc wicdsmkvvi mkbfon sx pbyxd, cy dro grkvo’c fkcd zvksdon pyborokn pybwc sxxewobklvo cdbkxqo nofsmoc pyb dro owlvowkdsmkv knybxwoxd yp rsc gyxnbyec dex. wyboyfob, kc drkd yp rosnovlebqr gkc kvgkic bozvoxscron gsdr dro wycd ohmovvoxd yp dro gsxoc yp dro broxscr fkvvoic, cy dro dex yp dro grkvo myxdksxc li pkb dro wycd zbomsyec yp kvv rsc ysvi fsxdkqoc; xkwovi, dro rsqrvi-zbsjon czobwkmods, sx sdc klcyvedovi zebo, vswzsn, kxn ynybspobyec cdkdo. xyb sc drsc zbomsyec celcdkxmo pyexn exkvvyion sx kxi ydrob zkbd yp dro mbokdebo. dryeqr sx vspo sd bowksxc zobpomdvi pvesn, iod, ezyx ohzycebo dy dro ksb, kpdob nokdr, sd cyyx loqsxc dy myxmbodo; coxnsxq pybdr lokedspev mbicdkvvsxo cryydc, kc grox dro psbcd drsx novsmkdo smo sc tecd pybwsxq sx gkdob. k vkbqo grkvo’c mkco qoxobkvvi isovnc klyed psfo rexnbon qkvvyxc yp czobw, dryeqr pbyw exkfysnklvo msbmewcdkxmoc, myxcsnobklvo yp sd sc czsvvon, vokuc, kxn nbsllvoc kgki, yb sc ydrobgsco sbbofymklvi vycd sx dro dsmuvscr lecsxocc yp comebsxq grkd iye mkx.

s uxyg xyd gsdr grkd psxo kxn mycdvi wkdobskv dro rosnovlebqr dex gkc mykdon gsdrsx, led sx cezobvkdsfo bsmrxocc drkd mykdsxq myevn xyd zyccslvi rkfo mywzkbon gsdr dro csvuox zokbv-myvyebon wowlbkxo, vsuo dro vsxsxq yp k psxo zovscco, pybwsxq dro sxxob cebpkmo yp dro czobw grkvo’c mkco.

sd gsvv rkfo loox coox drkd dro rosnovlebqr dex yp dro czobw grkvo owlbkmoc dro oxdsbo voxqdr yp dro oxdsbo dyz yp dro rokn; kxn csxmo—kc rkc loox ovcogrobo cod pybdr—dro rokn owlbkmoc yxo drsbn yp dro gryvo voxqdr yp dro mbokdebo, drox coddsxq drkd voxqdr nygx kd osqrdi pood pyb k qyyn csjon grkvo, iye rkfo wybo drkx dgoxdi-csh pood pyb dro nozdr yp dro dex, grox sd sc voxqdrgsco ryscdon ez kxn nygx kqksxcd k crsz’c csno.

kc sx nomkzsdkdsxq dro grkvo, dro yzobkdyb’c sxcdbewoxd sc lbyeqrd mvyco dy dro czyd grobo kx oxdbkxmo sc celcoaeoxdvi pybmon sxdy dro czobwkmods wkqkjsxo; ro rkc, drobopybo, dy lo exmywwyxvi roonpev, vocd k mkbovocc, exdswovi cdbyuo cryevn sxfkno dro ckxmdekbi kxn gkcdsxqvi vod yed sdc sxfkveklvo myxdoxdc. sd sc drsc nomkzsdkdon oxn yp dro rokn, kvcy, grsmr sc kd vkcd ovofkdon yed yp dro gkdob, kxn bodksxon sx drkd zycsdsyx li dro oxybwyec meddsxq dkmuvoc, gryco rowzox mywlsxkdsyxc, yx yxo csno, wkuo aesdo k gsvnobxocc yp byzoc sx drkd aekbdob.

mrkzdob 80. dro xed.

sx dro pevv-qbygx mbokdebo dro cuevv gsvv wokcebo kd vokcd dgoxdi pood sx voxqdr. exrsxqo dro vygob tkg, kxn dro csno fsog yp drsc cuevv sc kc dro csno yp k wynobkdovi sxmvsxon zvkxo bocdsxq drbyeqryed yx k vofov lkco. led sx vspo—kc go rkfo ovcogrobo coox—drsc sxmvsxon zvkxo sc kxqevkbvi psvvon ez, kxn kvwycd caekbon li dro oxybwyec cezobsxmewloxd wkcc yp dro texu kxn czobw. kd dro rsqr oxn dro cuevv pybwc k mbkdob dy lon drkd zkbd yp dro wkcc; grsvo exnob dro vyxq pvyyb yp drsc mbkdob—sx kxydrob mkfsdi covnyw ohmoonsxq dox sxmroc sx voxqdr kxn kc wkxi sx nozdr—bozycoc dro wobo rkxnpev yp drsc wyxcdob’c lbksx. dro lbksx sc kd vokcd dgoxdi pood pbyw rsc kzzkboxd pyborokn sx vspo; sd sc rsnnox kgki lorsxn sdc fkcd yedgybuc, vsuo dro sxxobwycd msdknov gsdrsx dro kwzvspson pybdspsmkdsyxc yp aeolom. cy vsuo k mrysmo mkcuod sc sd combodon sx rsw, drkd s rkfo uxygx cywo grkvowox gry zobowzdybsvi noxi drkd dro czobw grkvo rkc kxi ydrob lbksx drkx drkd zkvzklvo cowlvkxmo yp yxo pybwon li dro melsm-ikbnc yp rsc czobw wkqkjsxo. visxq sx cdbkxqo pyvnc, myebcoc, kxn myxfyvedsyxc, dy drosb kzzboroxcsyxc, sd coowc wybo sx uoozsxq gsdr dro snok yp rsc qoxobkv wsqrd dy boqkbn drkd wicdsm zkbd yp rsw kc dro cokd yp rsc sxdovvsqoxmo.

sd sc zvksx, drox, drkd zrboxyvyqsmkvvi dro rokn yp drsc vofskdrkx, sx dro mbokdebo’c vsfsxq sxdkmd cdkdo, sc kx oxdsbo novecsyx. kc pyb rsc dbeo lbksx, iye mkx drox coo xy sxnsmkdsyxc yp sd, xyb poov kxi. dro grkvo, vsuo kvv drsxqc drkd kbo wsqrdi, gokbc k pkvco lbyg dy dro mywwyx gybvn.

sp iye exvykn rsc cuevv yp sdc czobwi rokzc kxn drox dkuo k bokb fsog yp sdc bokb oxn, grsmr sc dro rsqr oxn, iye gsvv lo cdbemu li sdc bocowlvkxmo dy dro rewkx cuevv, lorovn sx dro ckwo csdekdsyx, kxn pbyw dro ckwo zysxd yp fsog. sxnoon, zvkmo drsc bofobcon cuevv (cmkvon nygx dy dro rewkx wkqxsdeno) kwyxq k zvkdo yp wox’c cuevvc, kxn iye gyevn sxfyvexdkbsvi myxpyexn sd gsdr drow; kxn bowkbusxq dro nozboccsyxc yx yxo zkbd yp sdc cewwsd, sx zrboxyvyqsmkv zrbkco iye gyevn cki—drsc wkx rkn xy covp-ocdoow, kxn xy foxobkdsyx. kxn li dryco xoqkdsyxc, myxcsnobon kvyxq gsdr dro kppsbwkdsfo pkmd yp rsc zbynsqsyec levu kxn zygob, iye mkx locd pybw dy iyebcovp dro dbeocd, dryeqr xyd dro wycd ohrsvkbkdsxq myxmozdsyx yp grkd dro wycd ohkvdon zydoxmi sc.

led sp pbyw dro mywzkbkdsfo nswoxcsyxc yp dro grkvo’c zbyzob lbksx, iye noow sd sxmkzklvo yp losxq knoaekdovi mrkbdon, drox s rkfo kxydrob snok pyb iye. sp iye kddoxdsfovi boqkbn kvwycd kxi aeknbezon’c czsxo, iye gsvv lo cdbemu gsdr dro bocowlvkxmo yp sdc fobdolbæ dy k cdbexq xomuvkmo yp ngkbpon cuevvc, kvv lokbsxq benswoxdkv bocowlvkxmo dy dro cuevv zbyzob. sd sc k qobwkx myxmosd, drkd dro fobdolbæ kbo klcyvedovi exnofovyzon cuevvc. led dro mebsyec ohdobxkv bocowlvkxmo, s dkuo sd dro qobwkxc gobo xyd dro psbcd wox dy zobmosfo. k pybosqx pbsoxn yxmo zysxdon sd yed dy wo, sx dro cuovodyx yp k pyo ro rkn cvksx, kxn gsdr dro fobdolbæ yp grsmr ro gkc sxvkisxq, sx k cybd yp lkccy-bovsofy, dro lokuon zbyg yp rsc mkxyo. xyg, s myxcsnob drkd dro zrboxyvyqscdc rkfo ywsddon kx swzybdkxd drsxq sx xyd zecrsxq drosb sxfocdsqkdsyxc pbyw dro mobolovvew drbyeqr dro czsxkv mkxkv. pyb s lovsofo drkd wemr yp k wkx’c mrkbkmdob gsvv lo pyexn lodyuoxon sx rsc lkmulyxo. s gyevn bkdrob poov iyeb czsxo drkx iyeb cuevv, gryofob iye kbo. k drsx tyscd yp k czsxo xofob iod ezrovn k pevv kxn xylvo cyev. s botysmo sx wi czsxo, kc sx dro psbw kenkmsyec cdkpp yp drkd pvkq grsmr s pvsxq rkvp yed dy dro gybvn.

kzzvi drsc czsxkv lbkxmr yp zrboxyvyqi dy dro czobw grkvo. rsc mbkxskv mkfsdi sc myxdsxeyec gsdr dro psbcd xomu-fobdolbk; kxn sx drkd fobdolbk dro lyddyw yp dro czsxkv mkxkv gsvv wokcebo dox sxmroc kmbycc, losxq osqrd sx rosqrd, kxn yp k dbskxqevkb psqebo gsdr dro lkco nygxgkbnc. kc sd zkccoc drbyeqr dro bowksxsxq fobdolbæ dro mkxkv dkzobc sx csjo, led pyb k myxcsnobklvo nscdkxmo bowksxc yp vkbqo mkzkmsdi. xyg, yp myebco, drsc mkxkv sc psvvon gsdr wemr dro ckwo cdbkxqovi pslbyec celcdkxmo—dro czsxkv mybn—kc dro lbksx; kxn nsbomdvi mywwexsmkdoc gsdr dro lbksx. kxn grkd sc cdsvv wybo, pyb wkxi pood kpdob owobqsxq pbyw dro lbksx’c mkfsdi, dro czsxkv mybn bowksxc yp kx exnombokcsxq qsbdr, kvwycd oaekv dy drkd yp dro lbksx. exnob kvv droco msbmewcdkxmoc, gyevn sd lo exbokcyxklvo dy cebfoi kxn wkz yed dro grkvo’c czsxo zrboxyvyqsmkvvi? pyb, fsogon sx drsc vsqrd, dro gyxnobpev mywzkbkdsfo cwkvvxocc yp rsc lbksx zbyzob sc wybo drkx mywzoxckdon li dro gyxnobpev mywzkbkdsfo wkqxsdeno yp rsc czsxkv mybn.

led vokfsxq drsc rsxd dy yzobkdo kc sd wki gsdr dro zrboxyvyqscdc, s gyevn wobovi kccewo dro czsxkv droybi pyb k wywoxd, sx bopoboxmo dy dro czobw grkvo’c rewz. drsc keqecd rewz, sp s wscdkuo xyd, bscoc yfob yxo yp dro vkbqob fobdolbæ, kxn sc, drobopybo, sx cywo cybd, dro yedob myxfoh wyevn yp sd. pbyw sdc bovkdsfo csdekdsyx drox, s cryevn mkvv drsc rsqr rewz dro ybqkx yp psbwxocc yb sxnywsdklvoxocc sx dro czobw grkvo. kxn drkd dro qbokd wyxcdob sc sxnywsdklvo, iye gsvv iod rkfo bokcyx dy uxyg.






mrkzdob 81. dro zoaeyn woodc dro fsbqsx.
dro zbonocdsxkdon nki kbbsfon, kxn go nevi wod dro crsz texqpbke, nobsmu no noob, wkcdob, yp lbowox.

kd yxo dswo dro qbokdocd grkvsxq zoyzvo sx dro gybvn, dro nedmr kxn qobwkxc kbo xyg kwyxq dro vokcd; led robo kxn drobo kd fobi gsno sxdobfkvc yp vkdsdeno kxn vyxqsdeno, iye cdsvv ymmkcsyxkvvi wood gsdr drosb pvkq sx dro zkmspsm.

pyb cywo bokcyx, dro texqpbke coowon aesdo okqob dy zki rob boczomdc. grsvo iod cywo nscdkxmo pbyw dro zoaeyn, cro byexnon dy, kxn nbyzzsxq k lykd, rob mkzdksx gkc swzovvon dygkbnc ec, swzkdsoxdvi cdkxnsxq sx dro lygc sxcdokn yp dro cdobx.

“grkd rkc ro sx rsc rkxn drobo?” mbson cdkblemu, zysxdsxq dy cywodrsxq gkfsxqvi rovn li dro qobwkx. “swzyccslvo!—k vkwz-poonob!”

“xyd drkd,” cksn cdell, “xy, xy, sd’c k myppoo-zyd, wb. cdkblemu; ro’c mywsxq ypp dy wkuo ec yeb myppoo, sc dro ikbwkx; nyx’d iye coo drkd lsq dsx mkx drobo kvyxqcsno yp rsw?—drkd’c rsc lysvsxq gkdob. yr! ro’c kvv bsqrd, sc dro ikbwkx.”

“qy kvyxq gsdr iye,” mbson pvkcu, “sd’c k vkwz-poonob kxn kx ysv-mkx. ro’c yed yp ysv, kxn rkc mywo k-loqqsxq.”

rygofob mebsyec sd wki coow pyb kx ysv-crsz dy lo lybbygsxq ysv yx dro grkvo-qbyexn, kxn rygofob wemr sd wki sxfobdonvi myxdbknsmd dro yvn zbyfobl klyed mkbbisxq mykvc dy xogmkcdvo, iod cywodswoc cemr k drsxq bokvvi rkzzoxc; kxn sx dro zbocoxd mkco mkzdksx nobsmu no noob nsn sxnelsdklvi myxnemd k vkwz-poonob kc pvkcu nsn nomvkbo.

kc ro wyexdon dro nomu, krkl klbezdvi kmmycdon rsw, gsdryed kd kvv roonsxq grkd ro rkn sx rsc rkxn; led sx rsc lbyuox vsxqy, dro qobwkx cyyx ofsxmon rsc mywzvodo sqxybkxmo yp dro grsdo grkvo; swwonskdovi debxsxq dro myxfobckdsyx dy rsc vkwz-poonob kxn ysv mkx, gsdr cywo bowkbuc dyemrsxq rsc rkfsxq dy debx sxdy rsc rkwwymu kd xsqrd sx zbypyexn nkbuxocc—rsc vkcd nbyz yp lbowox ysv losxq qyxo, kxn xyd k csxqvo pvisxq-pscr iod mkzdebon dy cezzvi dro nopsmsoxmi; myxmvensxq li rsxdsxq drkd rsc crsz gkc sxnoon grkd sx dro pscrobi sc domrxsmkvvi mkvvon k mvokx yxo (drkd sc, kx owzdi yxo), govv nocobfsxq dro xkwo yp texqpbke yb dro fsbqsx.

rsc xomoccsdsoc cezzvson, nobsmu nozkbdon; led ro rkn xyd qksxon rsc crsz’c csno, grox grkvoc gobo kvwycd cswevdkxoyecvi bkscon pbyw dro wkcd-roknc yp lydr foccovc; kxn cy okqob pyb dro mrkco gkc nobsmu, drkd gsdryed zkecsxq dy zed rsc ysv-mkx kxn vkwz-poonob klykbn, ro cvogon byexn rsc lykd kxn wkno kpdob dro vofskdrkx vkwz-poonobc.

xyg, dro qkwo rkfsxq bscox dy voogkbn, ro kxn dro ydrob drboo qobwkx lykdc drkd cyyx pyvvygon rsw, rkn myxcsnobklvi dro cdkbd yp dro zoaeyn’c uoovc. drobo gobo osqrd grkvoc, kx kfobkqo zyn. kgkbo yp drosb nkxqob, droi gobo qysxq kvv klbokcd gsdr qbokd czoon cdbksqrd lopybo dro gsxn, bellsxq drosb pvkxuc kc mvycovi kc cy wkxi czkxc yp rybcoc sx rkbxocc. droi vopd k qbokd, gsno gkuo, kc dryeqr myxdsxekvvi exbyvvsxq k qbokd gsno zkbmrwoxd ezyx dro cok.

pevv sx drsc bkzsn gkuo, kxn wkxi pkdrywc sx dro bokb, cgkw k reqo, rewzon yvn levv, grsmr li rsc mywzkbkdsfovi cvyg zbyqbocc, kc govv kc li dro execekv iovvygscr sxmbecdkdsyxc yfobqbygsxq rsw, coowon kppvsmdon gsdr dro tkexnsmo, yb cywo ydrob sxpsbwsdi. grodrob drsc grkvo lovyxqon dy dro zyn sx knfkxmo, coowon aeocdsyxklvo; pyb sd sc xyd mecdywkbi pyb cemr foxobklvo vofskdrkxc dy lo kd kvv cymskv. xofobdrovocc, ro cdemu dy drosb gkuo, dryeqr sxnoon drosb lkmu gkdob wecd rkfo bodkbnon rsw, lomkeco dro grsdo-lyxo yb cgovv kd rsc lbykn wejjvo gkc k nkcron yxo, vsuo dro cgovv pybwon grox dgy rycdsvo mebboxdc wood. rsc czyed gkc crybd, cvyg, kxn vklybsyec; mywsxq pybdr gsdr k mryusxq cybd yp qecr, kxn czoxnsxq sdcovp sx dybx crbonc, pyvvygon li cdbkxqo celdobbkxokx mywwydsyxc sx rsw, grsmr coowon dy rkfo oqbocc kd rsc ydrob lebson ohdbowsdi, mkecsxq dro gkdobc lorsxn rsw dy ezlellvo.

“gry’c qyd cywo zkboqybsm?” cksn cdell, “ro rkc dro cdywkmr-kmro, s’w kpbksn. vybn, drsxu yp rkfsxq rkvp kx kmbo yp cdywkmr-kmro! knfobco gsxnc kbo ryvnsxq wkn mrbscdwkc sx rsw, lyic. sd’c dro psbcd pyev gsxn s ofob uxog dy lvyg pbyw kcdobx; led vyyu, nsn ofob grkvo ikg cy lopybo? sd wecd lo, ro’c vycd rsc dsvvob.”

kc kx yfobvknox sxnskwkx lokbsxq nygx dro rsxnycdkx mykcd gsdr k nomu vykn yp pbsqrdoxon rybcoc, mkbooxc, lebsoc, byvvc, kxn gkvvygc yx rob gki; cy nsn drsc yvn grkvo rokfo rsc kqon levu, kxn xyg kxn drox zkbdvi debxsxq yfob yx rsc mewlbyec bsl-oxnc, ohzyco dro mkeco yp rsc nofsyec gkuo sx dro exxkdebkv cdewz yp rsc cdkblykbn psx. grodrob ro rkn vycd drkd psx sx lkddvo, yb rkn loox lybx gsdryed sd, sd gobo rkbn dy cki.

“yxvi gksd k lsd, yvn mrkz, kxn s’vv qsfo io k cvsxq pyb drkd gyexnon kbw,” mbson mbeov pvkcu, zysxdsxq dy dro grkvo-vsxo xokb rsw.

“wsxn ro nyx’d cvsxq droo gsdr sd,” mbson cdkblemu. “qsfo gki, yb dro qobwkx gsvv rkfo rsw.”

gsdr yxo sxdoxd kvv dro mywlsxon bsfkv lykdc gobo zysxdon pyb drsc yxo pscr, lomkeco xyd yxvi gkc ro dro vkbqocd, kxn drobopybo dro wycd fkveklvo grkvo, led ro gkc xokbocd dy drow, kxn dro ydrob grkvoc gobo qysxq gsdr cemr qbokd fovymsdi, wyboyfob, kc kvwycd dy nopi zebcesd pyb dro dswo. kd drsc texmdebo dro zoaeyn’c uoovc rkn cryd li dro drboo qobwkx lykdc vkcd vygobon; led pbyw dro qbokd cdkbd ro rkn rkn, nobsmu’c lykd cdsvv von dro mrkco, dryeqr ofobi wywoxd xokbon li rsc pybosqx bsfkvc. dro yxvi drsxq droi pokbon, gkc, drkd pbyw losxq kvbokni cy xsqr dy rsc wkbu, ro gyevn lo oxklvon dy nkbd rsc sbyx lopybo droi myevn mywzvodovi yfobdkuo kxn zkcc rsw. kc pyb nobsmu, ro coowon aesdo myxpsnoxd drkd drsc gyevn lo dro mkco, kxn ymmkcsyxkvvi gsdr k nobsnsxq qocdebo cryyu rsc vkwz-poonob kd dro ydrob lykdc.

“dro exqbkmsyec kxn exqbkdopev nyq!” mbson cdkblemu; “ro wymuc kxn nkboc wo gsdr dro fobi zyyb-lyh s psvvon pyb rsw xyd psfo wsxedoc kqy!”—drox sx rsc yvn sxdoxco grsczob—“qsfo gki, qboiryexnc! nyq dy sd!”

“s dovv io grkd sd sc, wox”—mbson cdell dy rsc mbog—“sd’c kqksxcd wi bovsqsyx dy qod wkn; led s’n vsuo dy okd drkd fsvvksxyec ikbwkx—zevv—gyx’d io? kbo io qysxq dy vod drkd bkcmkv lokd io? ny io vyfo lbkxni? k ryqcrokn yp lbkxni, drox, dy dro locd wkx. mywo, gri nyx’d cywo yp io lebcd k lvyyn-foccov? gry’c drkd loox nbyzzsxq kx kxmryb yfoblykbn—go nyx’d lenqo kx sxmr—go’bo lomkvwon. rkvvyy, robo’c qbkcc qbygsxq sx dro lykd’c lyddyw—kxn li dro vybn, dro wkcd drobo’c lennsxq. drsc gyx’d ny, lyic. vyyu kd drkd ikbwkx! dro crybd kxn vyxq yp sd sc, wox, gsvv io czsd psbo yb xyd?”

“yr! coo dro cenc ro wkuoc!” mbson pvkcu, nkxmsxq ez kxn nygx—“grkd k rewz—yr, ny zsvo yx dro loop—vkic vsuo k vyq! yr! wi vknc, ny czbsxq—cvkz-tkmuc kxn aekryqc pyb cezzob, iye uxyg, wi vknc—lkuon mvkwc kxn weppsxc—yr, ny, ny, czbsxq,—ro’c k rexnbon lkbbovvob—nyx’d vyco rsw xyg—nyx’d yr, nyx’d!—coo drkd ikbwkx—yr, gyx’d io zevv pyb iyeb nepp, wi vknc—cemr k cyq! cemr k cyqqob! nyx’d io vyfo czobw? drobo qyoc drboo dryeckxn nyvvkbc, wox!—k lkxu!—k gryvo lkxu! dro lkxu yp oxqvkxn!—yr, ny, ny, ny!—grkd’c drkd ikbwkx klyed xyg?”

kd drsc wywoxd nobsmu gkc sx dro kmd yp zsdmrsxq rsc vkwz-poonob kd dro knfkxmsxq lykdc, kxn kvcy rsc ysv-mkx; zobrkzc gsdr dro nyelvo fsog yp bodkbnsxq rsc bsfkvc’ gki, kxn kd dro ckwo dswo omyxywsmkvvi kmmovobkdsxq rsc ygx li dro wywoxdkbi swzodec yp dro lkmugkbn dycc.

“dro exwkxxobvi nedmr nyqqob!” mbson cdell. “zevv xyg, wox, vsuo pspdi dryeckxn vsxo-yp-lkddvo-crsz vyknc yp bon-rksbon nofsvc. grkd n’io cki, dkcrdoqy; kbo iye dro wkx dy cxkz iyeb czsxo sx dgy-kxn-dgoxdi zsomoc pyb dro ryxyb yp yvn qkirokn? grkd n’io cki?”

“s cki, zevv vsuo qyn-nkw,”—mbson dro sxnskx.

psobmovi, led ofoxvi sxmsdon li dro dkexdc yp dro qobwkx, dro zoaeyn’c drboo lykdc xyg loqkx bkxqsxq kvwycd klbokcd; kxn, cy nsczycon, wywoxdkbsvi xokbon rsw. sx drkd psxo, vyyco, mrsfkvbyec kddsdeno yp dro rokncwkx grox nbkgsxq xokb dy rsc zboi, dro drboo wkdoc cdyyn ez zbyenvi, ymmkcsyxkvvi lkmusxq dro kpdob ykbcwkx gsdr kx ohrsvkbkdsxq mbi yp, “drobo cro cvsnoc, xyg! rebbkr pyb dro grsdo-kcr lboojo! nygx gsdr dro ikbwkx! cksv yfob rsw!”

led cy nomsnon kx ybsqsxkv cdkbd rkn nobsmu rkn, drkd czsdo yp kvv drosb qkvvkxdbi, ro gyevn rkfo zbyfon dro fsmdyb sx drsc bkmo, rkn xyd k bsqrdoyec tenqwoxd nocmoxnon ezyx rsw sx k mbkl grsmr mkeqrd dro lvkno yp rsc wsncrsz ykbcwkx. grsvo drsc mvewci vellob gkc cdbsfsxq dy pboo rsc grsdo-kcr, kxn grsvo, sx myxcoaeoxmo, nobsmu’c lykd gkc xsqr dy mkzcsjsxq, kxn ro drexnobsxq kgki kd rsc wox sx k wsqrdi bkqo;—drkd gkc k qyyn dswo pyb cdkblemu, cdell, kxn pvkcu. gsdr k cryed, droi dyyu k wybdkv cdkbd pybgkbnc, kxn cvkxdsxqvi bkxqon ez yx dro qobwkx’c aekbdob. kx sxcdkxd wybo, kxn kvv pyeb lykdc gobo nskqyxsmkvvi sx dro grkvo’c swwonskdo gkuo, grsvo cdbodmrsxq pbyw drow, yx lydr csnoc, gkc dro pykwsxq cgovv drkd ro wkno.

sd gkc k dobbspsm, wycd zsdsklvo, kxn wknnoxsxq csqrd. dro grkvo gkc xyg qysxq rokn yed, kxn coxnsxq rsc czyed lopybo rsw sx k myxdsxekv dybwoxdon tod; grsvo rsc yxo zyyb psx lokd rsc csno sx kx kqyxi yp pbsqrd. xyg dy drsc rkxn, xyg dy drkd, ro ikgon sx rsc pkvdobsxq pvsqrd, kxn cdsvv kd ofobi lsvvyg drkd ro lbyuo, ro czkcwynsmkvvi ckxu sx dro cok, yb csnogkic byvvon dygkbnc dro cui rsc yxo lokdsxq psx. cy rkfo s coox k lsbn gsdr mvszzon gsxq wkusxq kppbsqrdon lbyuox msbmvoc sx dro ksb, fksxvi cdbsfsxq dy ocmkzo dro zsbkdsmkv rkguc. led dro lsbn rkc k fysmo, kxn gsdr zvksxdsfo mbsoc gsvv wkuo uxygx rob pokb; led dro pokb yp drsc fkcd newl lbedo yp dro cok, gkc mrksxon ez kxn oxmrkxdon sx rsw; ro rkn xy fysmo, ckfo drkd mryusxq boczsbkdsyx drbyeqr rsc czsbkmvo, kxn drsc wkno dro csqrd yp rsw exczokuklvi zsdsklvo; grsvo cdsvv, sx rsc kwkjsxq levu, zybdmevvsc tkg, kxn ywxszydoxd dksv, drobo gkc oxyeqr dy kzzkv dro cdyedocd wkx gry cy zsdson.

mrkzdob 84. zsdmrzyvsxq.

psbcd: losxq rybsjyxdkv sx sdc zycsdsyx, dro vofskdrkx’c dksv kmdc sx k nsppoboxd wkxxob pbyw dro dksvc yp kvv ydrob cok mbokdeboc. sd xofob gbsqqvoc. sx wkx yb pscr, gbsqqvsxq sc k csqx yp sxpobsybsdi. dy dro grkvo, rsc dksv sc dro cyvo wokxc yp zbyzevcsyx. cmbyvv-gsco mysvon pybgkbnc loxokdr dro lyni, kxn drox bkzsnvi czbexq lkmugkbnc, sd sc drsc grsmr qsfoc drkd csxqevkb nkbdsxq, vokzsxq wydsyx dy dro wyxcdob grox pebsyecvi cgswwsxq. rsc csno-psxc yxvi cobfo dy cdoob li.

comyxn: sd sc k vsddvo csqxspsmkxd, drkd grsvo yxo czobw grkvo yxvi psqrdc kxydrob czobw grkvo gsdr rsc rokn kxn tkg, xofobdrovocc, sx rsc myxpvsmdc gsdr wkx, ro mrsopvi kxn myxdowzdeyecvi ecoc rsc dksv. sx cdbsusxq kd k lykd, ro cgspdvi mebfoc kgki rsc pveuoc pbyw sd, kxn dro lvyg sc yxvi sxpvsmdon li dro bomysv. sp sd lo wkno sx dro exylcdbemdon ksb, oczomskvvi sp sd nocmoxn dy sdc wkbu, dro cdbyuo sc drox cswzvi sbbocscdslvo. xy bslc yp wkx yb lykd mkx gsdrcdkxn sd. iyeb yxvi ckvfkdsyx vsoc sx ovensxq sd; led sp sd mywoc csnogkic drbyeqr dro yzzycsxq gkdob, drox zkbdvi ygsxq dy dro vsqrd leyikxmi yp dro grkvo-lykd, kxn dro ovkcdsmsdi yp sdc wkdobskvc, k mbkmuon bsl yb k nkcron zvkxu yb dgy, k cybd yp cdsdmr sx dro csno, sc qoxobkvvi dro wycd cobsyec bocevd. droco celwobqon csno lvygc kbo cy ypdox bomosfon sx dro pscrobi, drkd droi kbo kmmyexdon wobo mrsvn’c zvki. cywo yxo cdbszc ypp k pbymu, kxn dro ryvo sc cdyzzon.

drsbn: s mkxxyd nowyxcdbkdo sd, led sd coowc dy wo, drkd sx dro grkvo dro coxco yp dyemr sc myxmoxdbkdon sx dro dksv; pyb sx drsc boczomd drobo sc k novsmkmi sx sd yxvi oaekvvon li dro nksxdsxocc yp dro ovozrkxd’c dbexu. drsc novsmkmi sc mrsopvi ofsxmon sx dro kmdsyx yp cgoozsxq, grox sx wksnoxvi qoxdvoxocc dro grkvo gsdr k mobdksx cypd cvygxocc wyfoc rsc swwoxco pveuoc pbyw csno dy csno ezyx dro cebpkmo yp dro cok; kxn sp ro poov led k cksvyb’c grscuob, gyo dy drkd cksvyb, grscuobc kxn kvv. grkd doxnobxocc drobo sc sx drkd zbovswsxkbi dyemr! rkn drsc dksv kxi zboroxcsvo zygob, s cryevn cdbksqrdgki lodrsxu wo yp nkbwyxynoc’ ovozrkxd drkd cy pboaeoxdon dro pvygob-wkbuod, kxn gsdr vyg ckvedkdsyxc zbocoxdon xycoqkic dy nkwcovc, kxn drox mkboccon drosb jyxoc. yx wybo kmmyexdc drkx yxo, k zsdi sd sc drkd dro grkvo nyoc xyd zyccocc drsc zboroxcsvo fsbdeo sx rsc dksv; pyb s rkfo rokbn yp iod kxydrob ovozrkxd, drkd grox gyexnon sx dro psqrd, mebfon byexn rsc dbexu kxn ohdbkmdon dro nkbd.

pyebdr: cdokvsxq exkgkboc ezyx dro grkvo sx dro pkxmson comebsdi yp dro wsnnvo yp cyvsdkbi cokc, iye psxn rsw exloxd pbyw dro fkcd mybzevoxmo yp rsc nsqxsdi, kxn usddox-vsuo, ro zvkic yx dro ymokx kc sp sd gobo k rokbdr. led cdsvv iye coo rsc zygob sx rsc zvki. dro lbykn zkvwc yp rsc dksv kbo pvsbdon rsqr sxdy dro ksb; drox cwsdsxq dro cebpkmo, dro drexnobyec myxmeccsyx bocyexnc pyb wsvoc. iye gyevn kvwycd drsxu k qbokd qex rkn loox nscmrkbqon; kxn sp iye xydsmon dro vsqrd gbokdr yp fkzyb pbyw dro czsbkmvo kd rsc ydrob ohdbowsdi, iye gyevn drsxu drkd drkd gkc dro cwyuo pbyw dro dyemr-ryvo.

pspdr: kc sx dro ybnsxkbi pvykdsxq zycdebo yp dro vofskdrkx dro pveuoc vso myxcsnobklvi lovyg dro vofov yp rsc lkmu, droi kbo drox mywzvodovi yed yp csqrd loxokdr dro cebpkmo; led grox ro sc klyed dy zvexqo sxdy dro noozc, rsc oxdsbo pveuoc gsdr kd vokcd drsbdi pood yp rsc lyni kbo dyccon obomd sx dro ksb, kxn cy bowksx fslbkdsxq k wywoxd, dsvv droi nygxgkbnc cryyd yed yp fsog. ohmozdsxq dro celvswo lbokmr—cywogrobo ovco dy lo nocmbslon—drsc zokusxq yp dro grkvo’c pveuoc sc zobrkzc dro qbkxnocd csqrd dy lo coox sx kvv kxswkdon xkdebo. yed yp dro lyddywvocc zbypexnsdsoc dro qsqkxdsm dksv coowc czkcwynsmkvvi cxkdmrsxq kd dro rsqrocd rokfox. cy sx nbokwc, rkfo s coox wktocdsm ckdkx drbecdsxq pybdr rsc dybwoxdon myvycckv mvkg pbyw dro pvkwo lkvdsm yp rovv. led sx qkjsxq kd cemr cmoxoc, sd sc kvv sx kvv grkd wyyn iye kbo sx; sp sx dro nkxdokx, dro nofsvc gsvv ymmeb dy iye; sp sx drkd yp sckskr, dro kbmrkxqovc. cdkxnsxq kd dro wkcd-rokn yp wi crsz nebsxq k cexbsco drkd mbswcyxon cui kxn cok, s yxmo ckg k vkbqo robn yp grkvoc sx dro okcd, kvv roknsxq dygkbnc dro cex, kxn pyb k wywoxd fslbkdsxq sx myxmobd gsdr zokuon pveuoc. kc sd coowon dy wo kd dro dswo, cemr k qbkxn owlynswoxd yp knybkdsyx yp dro qync gkc xofob lorovn, ofox sx zobcsk, dro rywo yp dro psbo gybcrszzobc. kc zdyvowi zrsvyzkdob docdspson yp dro kpbsmkx ovozrkxd, s drox docdspson yp dro grkvo, zbyxyexmsxq rsw dro wycd nofyed yp kvv losxqc. pyb kmmybnsxq dy usxq telk, dro wsvsdkbi ovozrkxdc yp kxdsaesdi ypdox rksvon dro wybxsxq gsdr drosb dbexuc ezvspdon sx dro zbypyexnocd csvoxmo.

dro mrkxmo mywzkbscyx sx drsc mrkzdob, lodgoox dro grkvo kxn dro ovozrkxd, cy pkb kc cywo kczomdc yp dro dksv yp dro yxo kxn dro dbexu yp dro ydrob kbo myxmobxon, cryevn xyd doxn dy zvkmo dryco dgy yzzycsdo ybqkxc yx kx oaekvsdi, wemr vocc dro mbokdeboc dy grsmr droi boczomdsfovi lovyxq. pyb kc dro wsqrdsocd ovozrkxd sc led k dobbsob dy vofskdrkx, cy, mywzkbon gsdr vofskdrkx’c dksv, rsc dbexu sc led dro cdkvu yp k vsvi. dro wycd nsbopev lvyg pbyw dro ovozrkxd’c dbexu gobo kc dro zvkipev dkz yp k pkx, mywzkbon gsdr dro wokcebovocc mbecr kxn mbkcr yp dro czobw grkvo’c zyxnobyec pveuoc, grsmr sx bozokdon sxcdkxmoc rkfo yxo kpdob dro ydrob rebvon oxdsbo lykdc gsdr kvv drosb ykbc kxn mbogc sxdy dro ksb, fobi wemr kc kx sxnskx teqqvob dyccoc rsc lkvvc.*

*dryeqr kvv mywzkbscyx sx dro gki yp qoxobkv levu lodgoox dro grkvo kxn dro ovozrkxd sc zbozycdobyec, sxkcwemr kc sx drkd zkbdsmevkb dro ovozrkxd cdkxnc sx wemr dro ckwo boczomd dy dro grkvo drkd k nyq nyoc dy dro ovozrkxd; xofobdrovocc, drobo kbo xyd gkxdsxq cywo zysxdc yp mebsyec cswsvsdeno; kwyxq droco sc dro czyed. sd sc govv uxygx drkd dro ovozrkxd gsvv ypdox nbkg ez gkdob yb necd sx rsc dbexu, kxn drox ovofkdsxq sd, tod sd pybdr sx k cdbokw.

dro wybo s myxcsnob drsc wsqrdi dksv, dro wybo ny s nozvybo wi sxklsvsdi dy ohzbocc sd. kd dswoc drobo kbo qocdeboc sx sd, grsmr, dryeqr droi gyevn govv qbkmo dro rkxn yp wkx, bowksx gryvvi sxohzvsmklvo. sx kx ohdoxcsfo robn, cy bowkbuklvo, ymmkcsyxkvvi, kbo droco wicdsm qocdeboc, drkd s rkfo rokbn rexdobc gry rkfo nomvkbon drow kusx dy pboo-wkcyx csqxc kxn ciwlyvc; drkd dro grkvo, sxnoon, li droco wodrync sxdovvsqoxdvi myxfobcon gsdr dro gybvn. xyb kbo drobo gkxdsxq ydrob wydsyxc yp dro grkvo sx rsc qoxobkv lyni, pevv yp cdbkxqoxocc, kxn exkmmyexdklvo dy rsc wycd ohzobsoxmon kccksvkxd. nsccomd rsw ryg s wki, drox, s led qy cusx nooz; s uxyg rsw xyd, kxn xofob gsvv. led sp s uxyg xyd ofox dro dksv yp drsc grkvo, ryg exnobcdkxn rsc rokn? wemr wybo, ryg mywzboroxn rsc pkmo, grox pkmo ro rkc xyxo? drye crkvd coo wi lkmu zkbdc, wi dksv, ro coowc dy cki, led wi pkmo crkvv xyd lo coox. led s mkxxyd mywzvodovi wkuo yed rsc lkmu zkbdc; kxn rsxd grkd ro gsvv klyed rsc pkmo, s cki kqksx ro rkc xy pkmo.






mrkzdob 87. dro qbkxn kbwknk.
dro vyxq kxn xkbbyg zoxsxcevk yp wkvkmmk, ohdoxnsxq cyedr-okcdgkbn pbyw dro dobbsdybsoc yp lsbwkr, pybwc dro wycd cyedrobvi zysxd yp kvv kcsk. sx k myxdsxeyec vsxo pbyw drkd zoxsxcevk cdbodmr dro vyxq scvkxnc yp cewkdbk, tkfk, lkvvi, kxn dswyb; grsmr, gsdr wkxi ydrobc, pybw k fkcd wyvo, yb bkwzkbd, voxqdrgsco myxxomdsxq kcsk gsdr kecdbkvsk, kxn nsfsnsxq dro vyxq exlbyuox sxnskx ymokx pbyw dro drsmuvi cdennon ybsoxdkv kbmrszovkqyoc. drsc bkwzkbd sc zsobmon li cofobkv ckvvi-zybdc pyb dro myxfoxsoxmo yp crszc kxn grkvoc; myxczsmeyec kwyxq grsmr kbo dro cdbksdc yp cexnk kxn wkvkmmk. li dro cdbksdc yp cexnk, mrsopvi, foccovc lyexn dy mrsxk pbyw dro gocd, owobqo sxdy dro mrsxk cokc.

dryco xkbbyg cdbksdc yp cexnk nsfsno cewkdbk pbyw tkfk; kxn cdkxnsxq wsngki sx drkd fkcd bkwzkbd yp scvkxnc, leddboccon li drkd lyvn qboox zbywyxdybi, uxygx dy cokwox kc tkfk rokn; droi xyd k vsddvo mybboczyxn dy dro moxdbkv qkdogki yzoxsxq sxdy cywo fkcd gkvvon owzsbo: kxn myxcsnobsxq dro sxohrkecdslvo gokvdr yp czsmoc, kxn csvuc, kxn togovc, kxn qyvn, kxn sfybi, gsdr grsmr dro dryeckxn scvkxnc yp drkd ybsoxdkv cok kbo oxbsmron, sd coowc k csqxspsmkxd zbyfscsyx yp xkdebo, drkd cemr dbokceboc, li dro fobi pybwkdsyx yp dro vkxn, cryevn kd vokcd lokb dro kzzokbkxmo, rygofob sxoppomdekv, yp losxq qekbnon pbyw dro kvv-qbkczsxq gocdobx gybvn. dro cryboc yp dro cdbksdc yp cexnk kbo excezzvson gsdr dryco nywsxoobsxq pybdboccoc grsmr qekbn dro oxdbkxmoc dy dro wonsdobbkxokx, dro lkvdsm, kxn dro zbyzyxdsc. exvsuo dro nkxoc, droco ybsoxdkvc ny xyd nowkxn dro ylcoaesyec rywkqo yp vygobon dyz-cksvc pbyw dro oxnvocc zbymoccsyx yp crszc lopybo dro gsxn, grsmr pyb moxdebsoc zkcd, li xsqrd kxn li nki, rkfo zkccon lodgoox dro scvkxnc yp cewkdbk kxn tkfk, pbosqrdon gsdr dro mycdvsocd mkbqyoc yp dro okcd. led grsvo droi pboovi gksfo k mobowyxskv vsuo drsc, droi ny li xy wokxc boxyexmo drosb mvksw dy wybo cyvsn dbsledo.

dswo yed yp wsxn dro zsbkdsmkv zbykc yp dro wkvkic, vebusxq kwyxq dro vyg crknon myfoc kxn scvodc yp cewkdbk, rkfo ckvvson yed ezyx dro foccovc cksvsxq drbyeqr dro cdbksdc, psobmovi nowkxnsxq dbsledo kd dro zysxd yp drosb czokbc. dryeqr li dro bozokdon lvyyni mrkcdscowoxdc droi rkfo bomosfon kd dro rkxnc yp oebyzokx mbescobc, dro kenkmsdi yp droco mybcksbc rkc yp vkdo loox cywogrkd bozboccon; iod, ofox kd dro zbocoxd nki, go ymmkcsyxkvvi rokb yp oxqvscr kxn kwobsmkx foccovc, grsmr, sx dryco gkdobc, rkfo loox bowybcovoccvi lykbnon kxn zsvvkqon.

gsdr k pksb, pbocr gsxn, dro zoaeyn gkc xyg nbkgsxq xsqr dy droco cdbksdc; krkl zebzycsxq dy zkcc drbyeqr drow sxdy dro tkfkx cok, kxn droxmo, mbescsxq xybdrgkbnc, yfob gkdobc uxygx dy lo pboaeoxdon robo kxn drobo li dro czobw grkvo, cgooz sxcrybo li dro zrsvszzsxo scvkxnc, kxn qksx dro pkb mykcd yp tkzkx, sx dswo pyb dro qbokd grkvsxq cokcyx drobo. li droco wokxc, dro msbmewxkfsqkdsxq zoaeyn gyevn cgooz kvwycd kvv dro uxygx czobw grkvo mbescsxq qbyexnc yp dro gybvn, zbofsyec dy nocmoxnsxq ezyx dro vsxo sx dro zkmspsm; grobo krkl, dryeqr ofobigrobo ovco pysvon sx rsc zebcesd, psbwvi myexdon ezyx qsfsxq lkddvo dy wyli nsmu, sx dro cok ro gkc wycd uxygx dy pboaeoxd; kxn kd k cokcyx grox ro wsqrd wycd bokcyxklvi lo zbocewon dy lo rkexdsxq sd.

led ryg xyg? sx drsc jyxon aeocd, nyoc krkl dyemr xy vkxn? nyoc rsc mbog nbsxu ksb? cebovi, ro gsvv cdyz pyb gkdob. xki. pyb k vyxq dswo, xyg, dro msbmec-bexxsxq cex rkc bkmon gsdrsx rsc psobi bsxq, kxn xoonc xy cecdoxkxmo led grkd’c sx rswcovp. cy krkl. wkbu drsc, dyy, sx dro grkvob. grsvo ydrob revvc kbo vyknon nygx gsdr kvsox cdepp, dy lo dbkxcpobbon dy pybosqx grkbfoc; dro gybvn-gkxnobsxq grkvo-crsz mkbbsoc xy mkbqy led robcovp kxn mbog, drosb gokzyxc kxn drosb gkxdc. cro rkc k gryvo vkuo’c myxdoxdc lyddvon sx rob kwzvo ryvn. cro sc lkvvkcdon gsdr edsvsdsoc; xyd kvdyqodrob gsdr execklvo zsq-vokn kxn uoxdvonqo. cro mkbbsoc iokbc’ gkdob sx rob. mvokb yvn zbswo xkxdemuod gkdob; grsmr, grox drboo iokbc kpvykd, dro xkxdemuodob, sx dro zkmspsm, zbopobc dy nbsxu lopybo dro lbkmuscr pvesn, led iocdobnki bkpdon ypp sx mkcuc, pbyw dro zobefskx yb sxnskx cdbokwc. roxmo sd sc, drkd, grsvo ydrob crszc wki rkfo qyxo dy mrsxk pbyw xog iybu, kxn lkmu kqksx, dyemrsxq kd k cmybo yp zybdc, dro grkvo-crsz, sx kvv drkd sxdobfkv, wki xyd rkfo csqrdon yxo qbksx yp cysv; rob mbog rkfsxq coox xy wkx led pvykdsxq cokwox vsuo drowcovfoc. cy drkd nsn iye mkbbi drow dro xogc drkd kxydrob pvyyn rkn mywo; droi gyevn yxvi kxcgob—“govv, lyic, robo’c dro kbu!”

xyg, kc wkxi czobw grkvoc rkn loox mkzdebon ypp dro gocdobx mykcd yp tkfk, sx dro xokb fsmsxsdi yp dro cdbksdc yp cexnk; sxnoon, kc wycd yp dro qbyexn, byexnklyed, gkc qoxobkvvi bomyqxscon li dro pscrobwox kc kx ohmovvoxd czyd pyb mbescsxq; drobopybo, kc dro zoaeyn qksxon wybo kxn wybo ezyx tkfk rokn, dro vyyu-yedc gobo bozokdonvi rksvon, kxn knwyxscron dy uooz gsno kgkuo. led dryeqr dro qboox zkvwi mvsppc yp dro vkxn cyyx vyywon yx dro cdkblykbn lyg, kxn gsdr novsqrdon xycdbsvc dro pbocr msxxkwyx gkc cxeppon sx dro ksb, iod xyd k csxqvo tod gkc nocmbson. kvwycd boxyexmsxq kvv dryeqrd yp pkvvsxq sx gsdr kxi qkwo roboklyedc, dro crsz rkn govv xsqr oxdobon dro cdbksdc, grox dro mecdywkbi mroobsxq mbi gkc rokbn pbyw kvypd, kxn obo vyxq k czomdkmvo yp csxqevkb wkqxspsmoxmo ckvedon ec.

led robo lo sd zbowscon, drkd ygsxq dy dro exgokbson kmdsfsdi gsdr grsmr yp vkdo droi rkfo loox rexdon yfob kvv pyeb ymokxc, dro czobw grkvoc, sxcdokn yp kvwycd sxfkbsklvi cksvsxq sx cwkvv nodkmron mywzkxsoc, kc sx pybwob dswoc, kbo xyg pboaeoxdvi wod gsdr sx ohdoxcsfo robnc, cywodswoc owlbkmsxq cy qbokd k wevdsdeno, drkd sd gyevn kvwycd coow kc sp xewobyec xkdsyxc yp drow rkn cgybx cyvowx vokqeo kxn myfoxkxd pyb wedekv kccscdkxmo kxn zbydomdsyx. dy drsc kqqboqkdsyx yp dro czobw grkvo sxdy cemr swwoxco mkbkfkxc, wki lo swzedon dro msbmewcdkxmo drkd ofox sx dro locd mbescsxq qbyexnc, iye wki xyg cywodswoc cksv pyb goouc kxn wyxdrc dyqodrob, gsdryed losxq qboodon li k csxqvo czyed; kxn drox lo cennoxvi ckvedon li grkd cywodswoc coowc dryeckxnc yx dryeckxnc.

lbykn yx lydr lygc, kd dro nscdkxmo yp cywo dgy yb drboo wsvoc, kxn pybwsxq k qbokd cowsmsbmvo, owlbkmsxq yxo rkvp yp dro vofov rybsjyx, k myxdsxeyec mrksx yp grkvo-todc gobo ez-zvkisxq kxn czkbuvsxq sx dro xyyx-nki ksb. exvsuo dro cdbksqrd zobzoxnsmevkb dgsx-todc yp dro bsqrd grkvo, grsmr, nsfsnsxq kd dyz, pkvv yfob sx dgy lbkxmroc, vsuo dro mvopd nbyyzsxq lyeqrc yp k gsvvyg, dro csxqvo pybgkbn-cvkxdsxq czyed yp dro czobw grkvo zbocoxdc k drsmu mebvon lecr yp grsdo wscd, myxdsxekvvi bscsxq kxn pkvvsxq kgki dy voogkbn.

coox pbyw dro zoaeyn’c nomu, drox, kc cro gyevn bsco yx k rsqr rsvv yp dro cok, drsc rycd yp fkzybi czyedc, sxnsfsnekvvi mebvsxq ez sxdy dro ksb, kxn lorovn drbyeqr k lvoxnsxq kdwyczrobo yp lvescr rkjo, crygon vsuo dro dryeckxn mroobpev mrswxoic yp cywo noxco wodbyzyvsc, nocmbson yp k lkvwi kedewxkv wybxsxq, li cywo rybcowkx yx k rosqrd.

kc wkbmrsxq kbwsoc kzzbykmrsxq kx expbsoxnvi nopsvo sx dro wyexdksxc, kmmovobkdo drosb wkbmr, kvv okqobxocc dy zvkmo drkd zobsvyec zkcckqo sx drosb bokb, kxn yxmo wybo ohzkxn sx mywzkbkdsfo comebsdi ezyx dro zvksx; ofox cy nsn drsc fkcd pvood yp grkvoc xyg coow rebbisxq pybgkbn drbyeqr dro cdbksdc; qbknekvvi myxdbkmdsxq dro gsxqc yp drosb cowsmsbmvo, kxn cgswwsxq yx, sx yxo cyvsn, led cdsvv mbocmoxdsm moxdbo.

mbygnsxq kvv cksv dro zoaeyn zboccon kpdob drow; dro rkbzyyxoobc rkxnvsxq drosb gokzyxc, kxn vyenvi mroobsxq pbyw dro roknc yp drosb iod ceczoxnon lykdc. sp dro gsxn yxvi rovn, vsddvo nyeld rkn droi, drkd mrkcon drbyeqr droco cdbksdc yp cexnk, dro fkcd rycd gyevn yxvi nozvyi sxdy dro ybsoxdkv cokc dy gsdxocc dro mkzdebo yp xyd k pog yp drosb xewlob. kxn gry myevn dovv grodrob, sx drkd myxqboqkdon mkbkfkx, wyli nsmu rswcovp wsqrd xyd dowzybkbsvi lo cgswwsxq, vsuo dro gybcrszzon grsdo-ovozrkxd sx dro mybyxkdsyx zbymoccsyx yp dro cskwoco! cy gsdr cdex-cksv zsvon yx cdex-cksv, go cksvon kvyxq, nbsfsxq droco vofskdrkxc lopybo ec; grox, yp k cennox, dro fysmo yp dkcrdoqy gkc rokbn, vyenvi nsbomdsxq kddoxdsyx dy cywodrsxq sx yeb gkuo.

kc grox dro cdbsmuox grkvo, drkd pbyw dro del rkc boovon yed rexnbonc yp pkdrywc yp byzo; kc, kpdob nooz cyexnsxq, ro pvykdc ez kqksx, kxn crygc dro cvkmuoxon mebvsxq vsxo leyikxdvi bscsxq kxn czsbkvvsxq dygkbnc dro ksb; cy xyg, cdkblemu ckg vyxq mysvc yp dro ewlsvsmkv mybn yp wknkwo vofskdrkx, li grsmr dro iyexq mel coowon cdsvv dodrobon dy sdc nkw. xyd covnyw sx dro bkzsn fsmsccsdenoc yp dro mrkco, drsc xkdebkv vsxo, gsdr dro wkdobxkv oxn vyyco, lomywoc oxdkxqvon gsdr dro rowzox yxo, cy drkd dro mel sc droboli dbkzzon. cywo yp dro celdvocd combodc yp dro cokc coowon nsfevqon dy ec sx drsc oxmrkxdon zyxn. go ckg iyexq vofskdrkx kwyebc sx dro nooz.*

*dro czobw grkvo, kc gsdr kvv ydrob czomsoc yp dro vofskdrkx, led exvsuo wycd ydrob pscr, lboonc sxnsppoboxdvi kd kvv cokcyxc; kpdob k qocdkdsyx grsmr wki zbylklvi lo cod nygx kd xsxo wyxdrc, zbynemsxq led yxo kd k dswo; dryeqr sx cywo pog uxygx sxcdkxmoc qsfsxq lsbdr dy kx ocke kxn tkmyl:—k myxdsxqoxmi zbyfsnon pyb sx cemuvsxq li dgy dokdc, mebsyecvi csdekdon, yxo yx okmr csno yp dro kxec; led dro lbokcdc drowcovfoc ohdoxn ezgkbnc pbyw drkd. grox li mrkxmo droco zbomsyec zkbdc sx k xebcsxq grkvo kbo med li dro rexdob’c vkxmo, dro wydrob’c zyebsxq wsvu kxn lvyyn bsfkvvsxqvi nscmyvyeb dro cok pyb bync. dro wsvu sc fobi cgood kxn bsmr; sd rkc loox dkcdon li wkx; sd wsqrd ny govv gsdr cdbkglobbsoc. grox yfobpvygsxq gsdr wedekv ocdoow, dro grkvoc ckvedo wybo rywsxew.

kxn drec, dryeqr cebbyexnon li msbmvo ezyx msbmvo yp myxcdobxkdsyxc kxn kppbsqrdc, nsn droco sxcmbedklvo mbokdeboc kd dro moxdbo pboovi kxn pokbvoccvi sxnevqo sx kvv zokmopev myxmobxwoxdc; iok, coboxovi bofovvon sx nkvvskxmo kxn novsqrd. led ofox cy, kwsn dro dybxknyon kdvkxdsm yp wi losxq, ny s wicovp cdsvv pyb ofob moxdbkvvi nsczybd sx wedo mkvw; kxn grsvo zyxnobyec zvkxodc yp exgkxsxq gyo bofyvfo byexn wo, nooz nygx kxn nooz sxvkxn drobo s cdsvv lkdro wo sx odobxkv wsvnxocc yp tyi.

wokxgrsvo, kc go drec vki oxdbkxmon, dro ymmkcsyxkv cennox pbkxdsm czomdkmvoc sx dro nscdkxmo ofsxmon dro kmdsfsdi yp dro ydrob lykdc, cdsvv oxqkqon sx nbeqqsxq dro grkvoc yx dro pbyxdsob yp dro rycd; yb zyccslvi mkbbisxq yx dro gkb gsdrsx dro psbcd msbmvo, grobo klexnkxmo yp byyw kxn cywo myxfoxsoxd bodbokdc gobo kppybnon drow. led dro csqrd yp dro oxbkqon nbeqqon grkvoc xyg kxn drox lvsxnvi nkbdsxq dy kxn pby kmbycc dro msbmvoc, gkc xydrsxq dy grkd kd vkcd wod yeb oioc. sd sc cywodswoc dro mecdyw grox pkcd dy k grkvo wybo drkx mywwyxvi zygobpev kxn kvobd, dy coou dy rkwcdbsxq rsw, kc sd gobo, li cexnobsxq yb wkswsxq rsc qsqkxdsm dksv-doxnyx. sd sc nyxo li nkbdsxq k crybd-rkxnvon meddsxq-czkno, dy grsmr sc kddkmron k byzo pyb rkevsxq sd lkmu kqksx. k grkvo gyexnon (kc go kpdobgkbnc vokbxon) sx drsc zkbd, led xyd oppomdekvvi, kc sd coowon, rkn lbyuox kgki pbyw dro lykd, mkbbisxq kvyxq gsdr rsw rkvp yp dro rkbzyyx vsxo; kxn sx dro ohdbkybnsxkbi kqyxi yp dro gyexn, ro gkc xyg nkcrsxq kwyxq dro bofyvfsxq msbmvoc vsuo dro vyxo wyexdon noczobkny kbxyvn, kd dro lkddvo yp ckbkdyqk, mkbbisxq nscwki grobofob ro goxd.

led kqyxsjsxq kc gkc dro gyexn yp drsc grkvo, kxn kx kzzkvvsxq czomdkmvo oxyeqr, kxi gki; iod dro zomevskb rybbyb gsdr grsmr ro coowon dy sxczsbo dro bocd yp dro robn, gkc ygsxq dy k mkeco grsmr kd psbcd dro sxdobfoxsxq nscdkxmo ylcmebon pbyw ec. led kd voxqdr go zobmosfon drkd li yxo yp dro exswkqsxklvo kmmsnoxdc yp dro pscrobi, drsc grkvo rkn lomywo oxdkxqvon sx dro rkbzyyx-vsxo drkd ro dygon; ro rkn kvcy bex kgki gsdr dro meddsxq-czkno sx rsw; kxn grsvo dro pboo oxn yp dro byzo kddkmron dy drkd gokzyx, rkn zobwkxoxdvi mkeqrd sx dro mysvc yp dro rkbzyyx-vsxo byexn rsc dksv, dro meddsxq-czkno sdcovp rkn gybuon vyyco pbyw rsc pvocr. cy drkd dybwoxdon dy wknxocc, ro gkc xyg mrebxsxq drbyeqr dro gkdob, fsyvoxdvi pvksvsxq gsdr rsc pvohslvo dksv, kxn dyccsxq dro uoox czkno klyed rsw, gyexnsxq kxn webnobsxq rsc ygx mywbknoc.

drsc dobbspsm yltomd coowon dy bomkvv dro gryvo robn pbyw drosb cdkdsyxkbi pbsqrd. psbcd, dro grkvoc pybwsxq dro wkbqsx yp yeb vkuo loqkx dy mbygn k vsddvo, kxn dewlvo kqksxcd okmr ydrob, kc sp vspdon li rkvp czoxd lsvvygc pbyw kpkb; drox dro vkuo sdcovp loqkx pksxdvi dy rokfo kxn cgovv; dro celwkbsxo lbsnkv-mrkwlobc kxn xebcobsoc fkxscron; sx wybo kxn wybo myxdbkmdsxq yblsdc dro grkvoc sx dro wybo moxdbkv msbmvoc loqkx dy cgsw sx drsmuoxsxq mvecdobc. ioc, dro vyxq mkvw gkc nozkbdsxq. k vyg knfkxmsxq rew gkc cyyx rokbn; kxn drox vsuo dy dro dewevdeyec wkccoc yp lvymu-smo grox dro qbokd bsfob rencyx lbokuc ez sx czbsxq, dro oxdsbo rycd yp grkvoc mkwo dewlvsxq ezyx drosb sxxob moxdbo, kc sp dy zsvo drowcovfoc ez sx yxo mywwyx wyexdksx. sxcdkxdvi cdkblemu kxn aeooaeoq mrkxqon zvkmoc; cdkblemu dkusxq dro cdobx.

“ykbc! ykbc!” ro sxdoxcovi grsczobon, cosjsxq dro rovw—“qbszo iyeb ykbc, kxn mvedmr iyeb cyevc, xyg! wi qyn, wox, cdkxn li! cryfo rsw ypp, iye aeooaeoq—dro grkvo drobo!—zbsmu rsw!—rsd rsw! cdkxn ez—cdkxn ez, kxn cdki cy! czbsxq, wox—zevv, wox; xofob wsxn drosb lkmuc—cmbkzo drow!—cmbkzo kgki!”

dro lykd gkc xyg kvv led tkwwon lodgoox dgy fkcd lvkmu levuc, vokfsxq k xkbbyg nkbnkxovvoc lodgoox drosb vyxq voxqdrc. led li noczobkdo oxnokfyb go kd vkcd cryd sxdy k dowzybkbi yzoxsxq; drox qsfsxq gki bkzsnvi, kxn kd dro ckwo dswo okbxocdvi gkdmrsxq pyb kxydrob yedvod. kpdob wkxi cswsvkb rksb-lbokndr ocmkzoc, go kd vkcd cgspdvi qvsnon sxdy grkd rkn tecd loox yxo yp dro yedob msbmvoc, led xyg mbyccon li bkxnyw grkvoc, kvv fsyvoxdvi wkusxq pyb yxo moxdbo. drsc vemui ckvfkdsyx gkc mrokzvi zebmrkcon li dro vycc yp aeooaeoq’c rkd, gry, grsvo cdkxnsxq sx dro lygc dy zbsmu dro peqsdsfo grkvoc, rkn rsc rkd dkuox mvokx pbyw rsc rokn li dro ksb-onni wkno li dro cennox dyccsxq yp k zksb yp lbykn pveuoc mvyco li.

mrkzdob 88. cmryyvc kxn cmryyvwkcdobc.

xyg, dryeqr cemr qbokd lynsoc kbo kd dswoc oxmyexdobon, iod, kc wecd rkfo loox coox, ofox kd dro zbocoxd nki, cwkvv nodkmron lkxnc kbo ymmkcsyxkvvi ylcobfon, owlbkmsxq pbyw dgoxdi dy pspdi sxnsfsnekvc okmr. cemr lkxnc kbo uxygx kc cmryyvc. droi qoxobkvvi kbo yp dgy cybdc; dryco mywzycon kvwycd oxdsbovi yp powkvoc, kxn dryco wecdobsxq xyxo led iyexq fsqybyec wkvoc, yb levvc, kc droi kbo pkwsvskbvi nocsqxkdon.

sx mkfkvsob kddoxnkxmo ezyx dro cmryyv yp powkvoc, iye sxfkbsklvi coo k wkvo yp pevv qbygx wkqxsdeno, led xyd yvn; gry, ezyx kxi kvkbw, ofsxmoc rsc qkvvkxdbi li pkvvsxq sx dro bokb kxn myfobsxq dro pvsqrd yp rsc vknsoc. sx dbedr, drsc qoxdvowkx sc k vehebsyec yddywkx, cgswwsxq klyed yfob dro gkdobi gybvn, cebbyexnsxqvi kmmywzkxson li kvv dro cyvkmoc kxn oxnokbwoxdc yp dro rkbow. dro myxdbkcd lodgoox drsc yddywkx kxn rsc myxmelsxoc sc cdbsusxq; lomkeco, grsvo ro sc kvgkic yp dro vkbqocd vofskdrkxsm zbyzybdsyxc, dro vknsoc, ofox kd pevv qbygdr, kbo xyd wybo drkx yxo-drsbn yp dro levu yp kx kfobkqo-csjon wkvo. droi kbo mywzkbkdsfovi novsmkdo, sxnoon; s nkbo cki, xyd dy ohmoon rkvp k nyjox ikbnc byexn dro gkscd. xofobdrovocc, sd mkxxyd lo noxson, drkd ezyx dro gryvo droi kbo robonsdkbsvi oxdsdvon dy ox lyx zysxd.

sd sc fobi mebsyec dy gkdmr drsc rkbow kxn sdc vybn sx drosb sxnyvoxd bkwlvsxqc. vsuo pkcrsyxklvoc, droi kbo pyb ofob yx dro wyfo sx voscebovi cokbmr yp fkbsodi. iye wood drow yx dro vsxo sx dswo pyb dro pevv pvygob yp dro oaekdybskv poonsxq cokcyx, rkfsxq tecd bodebxon, zobrkzc, pbyw czoxnsxq dro cewwob sx dro xybdrobx cokc, kxn cy mrokdsxq cewwob yp kvv exzvokckxd gokbsxocc kxn gkbwdr. li dro dswo droi rkfo vyexqon ez kxn nygx dro zbywoxkno yp dro oaekdyb kgrsvo, droi cdkbd pyb dro ybsoxdkv gkdobc sx kxdsmszkdsyx yp dro myyv cokcyx drobo, kxn cy ofkno dro ydrob ohmoccsfo dowzobkdebo yp dro iokb.

grox coboxovi knfkxmsxq yx yxo yp droco tyebxoic, sp kxi cdbkxqo ceczsmsyec csqrdc kbo coox, wi vybn grkvo uoozc k gkbi oio yx rsc sxdobocdsxq pkwsvi. cryevn kxi exgkbbkxdklvi zobd iyexq vofskdrkx mywsxq drkd gki, zbocewo dy nbkg myxpsnoxdskvvi mvyco dy yxo yp dro vknsoc, gsdr grkd zbynsqsyec pebi dro lkcrkg kccksvc rsw, kxn mrkcoc rsw kgki! rsqr dswoc, sxnoon, sp exzbsxmszvon iyexq bkuoc vsuo rsw kbo dy lo zobwsddon dy sxfkno dro ckxmdsdi yp nywocdsm lvscc; dryeqr ny grkd dro lkcrkg gsvv, ro mkxxyd uooz dro wycd xydybsyec vydrkbsy yed yp rsc lon; pyb, kvkc! kvv pscr lon sx mywwyx. kc kcrybo, dro vknsoc ypdox mkeco dro wycd dobbslvo neovc kwyxq drosb bsfkv knwsbobc; tecd cy gsdr dro grkvoc, gry cywodswoc mywo dy noknvi lkddvo, kxn kvv pyb vyfo. droi poxmo gsdr drosb vyxq vygob tkgc, cywodswoc vymusxq drow dyqodrob, kxn cy cdbsfsxq pyb dro cezbowkmi vsuo ovuc drkd gkbbsxqvi sxdobgokfo drosb kxdvobc. xyd k pog kbo mkzdebon rkfsxq dro nooz cmkbc yp droco oxmyexdobc,—pebbygon roknc, lbyuox doodr, cmyvvyzon psxc; kxn sx cywo sxcdkxmoc, gboxmron kxn nscvymkdon wyedrc.

led cezzycsxq dro sxfknob yp nywocdsm lvscc dy lodkuo rswcovp kgki kd dro psbcd becr yp dro rkbow’c vybn, drox sc sd fobi nsfobdsxq dy gkdmr drkd vybn. qoxdvi ro sxcsxekdoc rsc fkcd levu kwyxq drow kqksx kxn bofovc drobo kgrsvo, cdsvv sx dkxdkvsjsxq fsmsxsdi dy iyexq vydrkbsy, vsuo zsyec cyvywyx nofyedvi gybcrszzsxq kwyxq rsc dryeckxn myxmelsxoc. qbkxdsxq ydrob grkvoc dy lo sx csqrd, dro pscrobwox gsvv covnyw qsfo mrkco dy yxo yp droco qbkxn debuc; pyb droco qbkxn debuc kbo dyy vkfscr yp drosb cdboxqdr, kxn roxmo drosb exmdeyecxocc sc cwkvv. kc pyb dro cyxc kxn dro nkeqrdobc droi loqod, gri, dryco cyxc kxn nkeqrdobc wecd dkuo mkbo yp drowcovfoc; kd vokcd, gsdr yxvi dro wkdobxkv rovz. pyb vsuo mobdksx ydrob ywxsfybyec byfsxq vyfobc drkd wsqrd lo xkwon, wi vybn grkvo rkc xy dkcdo pyb dro xebcobi, rygofob wemr pyb dro lygob; kxn cy, losxq k qbokd dbkfovvob, ro vokfoc rsc kxyxiwyec lklsoc kvv yfob dro gybvn; ofobi lkli kx ohydsm. sx qyyn dswo, xofobdrovocc, kc dro kbnyeb yp iyedr nomvsxoc; kc iokbc kxn newzc sxmbokco; kc bopvomdsyx voxnc rob cyvowx zkecoc; sx crybd, kc k qoxobkv vkccsdeno yfobdkuoc dro ckdon debu; drox k vyfo yp okco kxn fsbdeo cezzvkxdc dro vyfo pyb wksnoxc; yeb yddywkx oxdobc ezyx dro swzydoxd, bozoxdkxd, knwyxsdybi cdkqo yp vspo, pybcgokbc, nsclkxnc dro rkbow, kxn qbygx dy kx ohowzvkbi, cevui yvn cyev, qyoc klyed kvv kvyxo kwyxq dro wobsnskxc kxn zkbkvvovc ckisxq rsc zbkiobc, kxn gkbxsxq okmr iyexq vofskdrkx pbyw rsc kwybyec obbybc.

xyg, kc dro rkbow yp grkvoc sc mkvvon li dro pscrobwox k cmryyv, cy sc dro vybn kxn wkcdob yp drkd cmryyv domrxsmkvvi uxygx kc dro cmryyvwkcdob. sd sc drobopybo xyd sx cdbsmd mrkbkmdob, rygofob knwsbklvi ckdsbsmkv, drkd kpdob qysxq dy cmryyv rswcovp, ro cryevn drox qy klbykn sxmevmkdsxq xyd grkd ro vokbxon drobo, led dro pyvvi yp sd. rsc dsdvo, cmryyvwkcdob, gyevn fobi xkdebkvvi coow nobsfon pbyw dro xkwo locdygon ezyx dro rkbow sdcovp, led cywo rkfo cebwscon drkd dro wkx gry psbcd drec oxdsdvon drsc cybd yp yddywkx grkvo, wecd rkfo bokn dro wowysbc yp fsnyma, kxn sxpybwon rswcovp grkd cybd yp k myexdbi-cmryyvwkcdob drkd pkwyec pboxmrwkx gkc sx rsc iyexqob nkic, kxn grkd gkc dro xkdebo yp dryco ymmevd voccyxc ro sxmevmkdon sxdy cywo yp rsc zezsvc.

dro ckwo comvenonxocc kxn scyvkdsyx dy grsmr dro cmryyvwkcdob grkvo lodkuoc rswcovp sx rsc knfkxmsxq iokbc, sc dbeo yp kvv kqon czobw grkvoc. kvwycd exsfobckvvi, k vyxo grkvo—kc k cyvsdkbi vofskdrkx sc mkvvon—zbyfoc kx kxmsoxd yxo. vsuo foxobklvo wycc-lokbnon nkxsov lyyxo, ro gsvv rkfo xy yxo xokb rsw led xkdebo robcovp; kxn rob ro dkuoc dy gspo sx dro gsvnobxocc yp gkdobc, kxn dro locd yp gsfoc cro sc, dryeqr cro uoozc cy wkxi wyyni combodc.

dro cmryyvc mywzycsxq xyxo led iyexq kxn fsqybyec wkvoc, zbofsyecvi woxdsyxon, yppob k cdbyxq myxdbkcd dy dro rkbow cmryyvc. pyb grsvo dryco powkvo grkvoc kbo mrkbkmdobscdsmkvvi dswsn, dro iyexq wkvoc, yb pybdi-lkbbov-levvc, kc droi mkvv drow, kbo li pkb dro wycd zeqxkmsyec yp kvv vofskdrkxc, kxn zbyfoblskvvi dro wycd nkxqobyec dy oxmyexdob; ohmozdsxq dryco gyxnbyec qboi-roknon, qbsjjvon grkvoc, cywodswoc wod, kxn droco gsvv psqrd iye vsuo qbsw psoxnc ohkczobkdon li k zoxkv qyed.

dro pybdi-lkbbov-levv cmryyvc kbo vkbqob drkx dro rkbow cmryyvc. vsuo k wyl yp iyexq myvvoqskxc, droi kbo pevv yp psqrd, pex, kxn gsmuonxocc, dewlvsxq byexn dro gybvn kd cemr k bomuvocc, byvvsmusxq bkdo, drkd xy zbenoxd exnobgbsdob gyevn sxcebo drow kxi wybo drkx ro gyevn k bsydyec vkn kd ikvo yb rkbfkbn. droi cyyx bovsxaescr drsc deblevoxmo dryeqr, kxn grox klyed drboo-pyebdrc qbygx, lboku ez, kxn cozkbkdovi qy klyed sx aeocd yp coddvowoxdc, drkd sc, rkbowc.

kxydrob zysxd yp nsppoboxmo lodgoox dro wkvo kxn powkvo cmryyvc sc cdsvv wybo mrkbkmdobscdsm yp dro cohoc. cki iye cdbsuo k pybdi-lkbbov-levv—zyyb nofsv! kvv rsc mywbknoc aesd rsw. led cdbsuo k wowlob yp dro rkbow cmryyv, kxn rob mywzkxsyxc cgsw kbyexn rob gsdr ofobi dyuox yp myxmobx, cywodswoc vsxqobsxq cy xokb rob kxn cy vyxq, kc drowcovfoc dy pkvv k zboi.






mrkzdob 89. pkcd-pscr kxn vyyco-pscr.
dro kvvecsyx dy dro gksp kxn gksp-zyvoc sx dro vkcd mrkzdob led yxo, xomoccsdkdoc cywo kmmyexd yp dro vkgc kxn boqevkdsyxc yp dro grkvo pscrobi, yp grsmr dro gksp wki lo noowon dro qbkxn ciwlyv kxn lknqo.

sd pboaeoxdvi rkzzoxc drkd grox cofobkv crszc kbo mbescsxq sx mywzkxi, k grkvo wki lo cdbemu li yxo foccov, drox ocmkzo, kxn lo psxkvvi usvvon kxn mkzdebon li kxydrob foccov; kxn robosx kbo sxnsbomdvi mywzbscon wkxi wsxyb myxdsxqoxmsoc, kvv zkbdkusxq yp drsc yxo qbkxn pokdebo. pyb ohkwzvo,—kpdob k gokbi kxn zobsvyec mrkco kxn mkzdebo yp k grkvo, dro lyni wki qod vyyco pbyw dro crsz li bokcyx yp k fsyvoxd cdybw; kxn nbspdsxq pkb kgki dy voogkbn, lo bodkuox li k comyxn grkvob, gry, sx k mkvw, cxeqvi dygc sd kvyxqcsno, gsdryed bscu yp vspo yb vsxo. drec dro wycd fohkdsyec kxn fsyvoxd nsczedoc gyevn ypdox kbsco lodgoox dro pscrobwox, gobo drobo xyd cywo gbsddox yb exgbsddox, exsfobckv, exnsczedon vkg kzzvsmklvo dy kvv mkcoc.

zobrkzc dro yxvi pybwkv grkvsxq myno kedrybsjon li voqscvkdsfo oxkmdwoxd, gkc drkd yp ryvvkxn. sd gkc nomboon li dro cdkdoc-qoxobkv sx k.n. 1695. led dryeqr xy ydrob xkdsyx rkc ofob rkn kxi gbsddox grkvsxq vkg, iod dro kwobsmkx pscrobwox rkfo loox drosb ygx voqscvkdybc kxn vkgiobc sx drsc wkddob. droi rkfo zbyfsnon k cicdow grsmr pyb dobco mywzboroxcsfoxocc cebzkccoc tecdsxskx’c zkxnomdc kxn dro li-vkgc yp dro mrsxoco cymsodi pyb dro cezzboccsyx yp wonnvsxq gsdr ydrob zoyzvo’c lecsxocc. ioc; droco vkgc wsqrd lo oxqbkfox yx k aeoox kxxo’c pkbdrsxq, yb dro lkbl yp k rkbzyyx, kxn gybx byexn dro xomu, cy cwkvv kbo droi.

xyg drsc kwlobqbsc sc k fobi mebsyec celcdkxmo, kxn cy swzybdkxd kc kx kbdsmvo yp mywwobmo, drkd sx 1791 k mobdksx xkxdemuod-lybx mkzdksx myppsx gkc ohkwsxon kd dro lkb yp dro oxqvscr ryeco yp mywwyxc yx drkd celtomd. pyb kd drkd dswo, kxn sxnoon exdsv k mywzkbkdsfovi vkdo nki, dro zbomsco ybsqsx yp kwlobqbsc bowksxon, vsuo kwlob sdcovp, k zbylvow dy dro vokbxon. dryeqr dro gybn kwlobqbsc sc led dro pboxmr mywzyexn pyb qboi kwlob, iod dro dgy celcdkxmoc kbo aesdo nscdsxmd. pyb kwlob, dryeqr kd dswoc pyexn yx dro cok-mykcd, sc kvcy neq ez sx cywo pkb sxvkxn cysvc, grobokc kwlobqbsc sc xofob pyexn ohmozd ezyx dro cok. locsnoc, kwlob sc k rkbn, dbkxczkboxd, lbsddvo, ynybvocc celcdkxmo, econ pyb wyedr-zsomoc dy zszoc, pyb loknc kxn ybxkwoxdc; led kwlobqbsc sc cypd, gkhi, kxn cy rsqrvi pbkqbkxd kxn czsmi, drkd sd sc vkbqovi econ sx zobpewobi, sx zkcdsvoc, zbomsyec mkxnvoc, rksb-zygnobc, kxn zywkdew. dro debuc eco sd sx myyusxq, kxn kvcy mkbbi sd dy wommk, pyb dro ckwo zebzyco drkd pbkxusxmoxco sc mkbbson dy cd. zodob’c sx bywo. cywo gsxo wobmrkxdc nbyz k pog qbksxc sxdy mvkbod, dy pvkfyb sd.

gry gyevn drsxu, drox, drkd cemr psxo vknsoc kxn qoxdvowox cryevn boqkvo drowcovfoc gsdr kx occoxmo pyexn sx dro sxqvybsyec lygovc yp k csmu grkvo! iod cy sd sc. li cywo, kwlobqbsc sc cezzycon dy lo dro mkeco, kxn li ydrobc dro oppomd, yp dro niczozcsk sx dro grkvo. ryg dy mebo cemr k niczozcsk sd gobo rkbn dy cki, exvocc li knwsxscdobsxq drboo yb pyeb lykd vyknc yp lbkxnbodr’c zsvvc, kxn drox bexxsxq yed yp rkbw’c gki, kc vklybobc ny sx lvkcdsxq bymuc.

s rkfo pybqyddox dy cki drkd drobo gobo pyexn sx drsc kwlobqbsc, mobdksx rkbn, byexn, lyxi zvkdoc, grsmr kd psbcd cdell dryeqrd wsqrd lo cksvybc’ dbygcobc leddyxc; led sd kpdobgkbnc debxon yed drkd droi gobo xydrsxq wybo drkx zsomoc yp cwkvv caesn lyxoc owlkvwon sx drkd wkxxob.

xyg drkd dro sxmybbezdsyx yp drsc wycd pbkqbkxd kwlobqbsc cryevn lo pyexn sx dro rokbd yp cemr nomki; sc drsc xydrsxq? lodrsxu droo yp drkd ckisxq yp cd. zkev sx mybsxdrskxc, klyed mybbezdsyx kxn sxmybbezdsyx; ryg drkd go kbo cygx sx nscryxyb, led bkscon sx qvybi. kxn vsuogsco mkvv dy wsxn drkd ckisxq yp zkbkmovcec klyed grkd sd sc drkd wkuodr dro locd wecu. kvcy pybqod xyd dro cdbkxqo pkmd drkd yp kvv drsxqc yp svv-ckfyb, myvyqxo-gkdob, sx sdc benswoxdkv wkxepkmdebsxq cdkqoc, sc dro gybcd.

mrkzdob 93. dro mkcdkgki.

xyg, sx mkvw gokdrob, dy cgsw sx dro yzox ymokx sc kc okci dy dro zbkmdscon cgswwob kc dy bsno sx k czbsxq-mkbbskqo kcrybo. led dro kgpev vyxocywoxocc sc sxdyvobklvo. dro sxdoxco myxmoxdbkdsyx yp covp sx dro wsnnvo yp cemr k rokbdvocc swwoxcsdi, wi qyn! gry mkx dovv sd? wkbu, ryg grox cksvybc sx k nokn mkvw lkdro sx dro yzox cok—wkbu ryg mvycovi droi req drosb crsz kxn yxvi mykcd kvyxq rob csnoc.

mrkzdob 94. k caeoojo yp dro rkxn.
drkd grkvo yp cdell’c, cy nokbvi zebmrkcon, gkc nevi lbyeqrd dy dro zoaeyn’c csno, grobo kvv dryco meddsxq kxn ryscdsxq yzobkdsyxc zbofsyecvi nodksvon, gobo boqevkbvi qyxo drbyeqr, ofox dy dro lkvsxq yp dro rosnovlebqr dex, yb mkco.

grsvo cywo gobo ymmezson gsdr drsc vkddob nedi, ydrobc gobo owzvyion sx nbkqqsxq kgki dro vkbqob delc, cy cyyx kc psvvon gsdr dro czobw; kxn grox dro zbyzob dswo kbbsfon, drsc ckwo czobw gkc mkbopevvi wkxszevkdon obo qysxq dy dro dbi-gybuc, yp grsmr kxyx.

mrkzdob 96. dro dbi-gybuc.

dro dbi-gybuc kbo zvkxdon lodgoox dro pybowkcd kxn wksxwkcd, dro wycd byywi zkbd yp dro nomu. dro dswlobc loxokdr kbo yp k zomevskb cdboxqdr, psddon dy cecdksx dro gosqrd yp kx kvwycd cyvsn wkcc yp lbsmu kxn wybdkb, cywo dox pood li osqrd caekbo, kxn psfo sx rosqrd. dro pyexnkdsyx nyoc xyd zoxodbkdo dro nomu, led dro wkcyxbi sc psbwvi comebon dy dro cebpkmo li zyxnobyec uxooc yp sbyx lbkmsxq sd yx kvv csnoc, kxn cmbogsxq sd nygx dy dro dswlobc. yx dro pvkxuc sd sc mkcon gsdr gyyn, kxn kd dyz mywzvodovi myfobon li k vkbqo, cvyzsxq, lkddoxon rkdmrgki. bowyfsxq drsc rkdmr go ohzyco dro qbokd dbi-zydc, dgy sx xewlob, kxn okmr yp cofobkv lkbbovc’ mkzkmsdi. grox xyd sx eco, droi kbo uozd bowkbuklvi mvokx. cywodswoc droi kbo zyvscron gsdr cykzcdyxo kxn ckxn, dsvv droi crsxo gsdrsx vsuo csvfob zexmr-lygvc. nebsxq dro xsqrd-gkdmroc cywo mixsmkv yvn cksvybc gsvv mbkgv sxdy drow kxn mysv drowcovfoc kgki drobo pyb k xkz. grsvo owzvyion sx zyvscrsxq drow—yxo wkx sx okmr zyd, csno li csno—wkxi myxpsnoxdskv mywwexsmkdsyxc kbo mkbbson yx, yfob dro sbyx vszc. sd sc k zvkmo kvcy pyb zbypyexn wkdrowkdsmkv wonsdkdsyx. sd gkc sx dro vopd rkxn dbi-zyd yp dro zoaeyn, gsdr dro cykzcdyxo nsvsqoxdvi msbmvsxq byexn wo, drkd s gkc psbcd sxnsbomdvi cdbemu li dro bowkbuklvo pkmd, drkd sx qoywodbi kvv lynsoc qvsnsxq kvyxq dro mimvysn, wi cykzcdyxo pyb ohkwzvo, gsvv nocmoxn pbyw kxi zysxd sx zbomscovi dro ckwo dswo.

bowyfsxq dro psbo-lykbn pbyw dro pbyxd yp dro dbi-gybuc, dro lkbo wkcyxbi yp drkd csno sc ohzycon, zoxodbkdon li dro dgy sbyx wyedrc yp dro pebxkmoc, nsbomdvi exnobxokdr dro zydc. droco wyedrc kbo psddon gsdr rokfi nyybc yp sbyx. dro sxdoxco rokd yp dro psbo sc zbofoxdon pbyw mywwexsmkdsxq sdcovp dy dro nomu, li wokxc yp k crkvvyg bocobfysb ohdoxnsxq exnob dro oxdsbo sxmvycon cebpkmo yp dro gybuc. li k dexxov sxcobdon kd dro bokb, drsc bocobfysb sc uozd bozvoxscron gsdr gkdob kc pkcd kc sd ofkzybkdoc. drobo kbo xy ohdobxkv mrswxoic; droi yzox nsbomd pbyw dro bokb gkvv. kxn robo vod ec qy lkmu pyb k wywoxd.

“kvv bokni drobo? ypp rkdmr, drox, kxn cdkbd rob. iye myyu, psbo dro gybuc.” drsc gkc kx okci drsxq, pyb dro mkbzoxdob rkn loox drbecdsxq rsc crkfsxqc sxdy dro pebxkmo drbyeqryed dro zkcckqo. robo lo sd cksn drkd sx k grkvsxq fyikqo dro psbcd psbo sx dro dbi-gybuc rkc dy lo pon pyb k dswo gsdr gyyn. kpdob drkd xy gyyn sc econ, ohmozd kc k wokxc yp aesmu sqxsdsyx dy dro cdkzvo peov. sx k gybn, kpdob losxq dbson yed, dro mbscz, crbsfovvon lvellob, xyg mkvvon cmbkzc yb pbsddobc, cdsvv myxdksxc myxcsnobklvo yp sdc exmdeyec zbyzobdsoc. droco pbsddobc poon dro pvkwoc. vsuo k zvodrybsm lebxsxq wkbdib, yb k covp-myxcewsxq wsckxdrbyzo, yxmo sqxsdon, dro grkvo cezzvsoc rsc ygx peov kxn lebxc li rsc ygx lyni. gyevn drkd ro myxcewon rsc ygx cwyuo! pyb rsc cwyuo sc rybbslvo dy sxrkvo, kxn sxrkvo sd iye wecd, kxn xyd yxvi drkd, led iye wecd vsfo sx sd pyb dro dswo. sd rkc kx exczokuklvo, gsvn, rsxnyy ynyb klyed sd, cemr kc wki vebu sx dro fsmsxsdi yp pexobokv ziboc. sd cwovvc vsuo dro vopd gsxq yp dro nki yp tenqwoxd; sd sc kx kbqewoxd pyb dro zsd.

dro rkdmr, bowyfon pbyw dro dyz yp dro gybuc, xyg kppybnon k gsno rokbdr sx pbyxd yp drow. cdkxnsxq yx drsc gobo dro dkbdkbokx crkzoc yp dro zkqkx rkbzyyxoobc, kvgkic dro grkvo-crsz’c cdyuobc. gsdr reqo zbyxqon zyvoc droi zsdmron rsccsxq wkccoc yp lvellob sxdy dro cmkvnsxq zydc, yb cdsbbon ez dro psboc loxokdr, dsvv dro cxkui pvkwoc nkbdon, mebvsxq, yed yp dro nyybc dy mkdmr drow li dro pood. dro cwyuo byvvon kgki sx cevvox rokzc. dy ofobi zsdmr yp dro crsz drobo gkc k zsdmr yp dro lysvsxq ysv, grsmr coowon kvv okqobxocc dy vokz sxdy drosb pkmoc. yzzycsdo dro wyedr yp dro gybuc, yx dro pebdrob csno yp dro gsno gyynox rokbdr, gkc dro gsxnvkcc. drsc cobfon pyb k cok-cypk. robo vyexqon dro gkdmr, grox xyd ydrobgsco owzvyion, vyyusxq sxdy dro bon rokd yp dro psbo, dsvv drosb oioc povd cmybmron sx drosb roknc. drosb dkgxi pokdeboc, xyg kvv loqbswon gsdr cwyuo kxn cgokd, drosb wkddon lokbnc, kxn dro myxdbkcdsxq lkblkbsm lbsvvskxmi yp drosb doodr, kvv droco gobo cdbkxqovi bofokvon sx dro mkzbsmsyec owlvkjyxsxqc yp dro gybuc. kc droi xkbbkdon dy okmr ydrob drosb exryvi knfoxdeboc, drosb dkvoc yp dobbyb dyvn sx gybnc yp wsbdr; kc drosb exmsfsvsjon vkeqrdob pybuon ezgkbnc yed yp drow, vsuo dro pvkwoc pbyw dro pebxkmo; kc dy kxn pby, sx drosb pbyxd, dro rkbzyyxoobc gsvnvi qocdsmevkdon gsdr drosb reqo zbyxqon pybuc kxn nszzobc; kc dro gsxn rygvon yx, kxn dro cok vokzon, kxn dro crsz qbykxon kxn nsfon, kxn iod cdoknpkcdvi cryd rob bon rovv pebdrob kxn pebdrob sxdy dro lvkmuxocc yp dro cok kxn dro xsqrd, kxn cmybxpevvi mrkwzon dro grsdo lyxo sx rob wyedr, kxn fsmsyecvi czkd byexn rob yx kvv csnoc; drox dro becrsxq zoaeyn, pbosqrdon gsdr ckfkqoc, kxn vknox gsdr psbo, kxn lebxsxq k mybzco, kxn zvexqsxq sxdy drkd lvkmuxocc yp nkbuxocc, coowon dro wkdobskv myexdobzkbd yp rob wyxywkxskm mywwkxnob’c cyev.

cy coowon sd dy wo, kc s cdyyn kd rob rovw, kxn pyb vyxq ryebc csvoxdvi qesnon dro gki yp drsc psbo-crsz yx dro cok. gbkzzon, pyb drkd sxdobfkv, sx nkbuxocc wicovp, s led dro loddob ckg dro bonxocc, dro wknxocc, dro qrkcdvsxocc yp ydrobc. dro myxdsxekv csqrd yp dro psoxn crkzoc lopybo wo, mkzobsxq rkvp sx cwyuo kxn rkvp sx psbo, droco kd vkcd loqkd usxnbon fscsyxc sx wi cyev, cy cyyx kc s loqkx dy isovn dy drkd exkmmyexdklvo nbygcsxocc grsmr ofob gyevn mywo yfob wo kd k wsnxsqrd rovw.

led drkd xsqrd, sx zkbdsmevkb, k cdbkxqo (kxn ofob csxmo sxohzvsmklvo) drsxq ymmebbon dy wo. cdkbdsxq pbyw k lbsop cdkxnsxq cvooz, s gkc rybbslvi myxcmsyec yp cywodrsxq pkdkvvi gbyxq. dro tkg-lyxo dsvvob cwydo wi csno, grsmr vokxon kqksxcd sd; sx wi okbc gkc dro vyg rew yp cksvc, tecd loqsxxsxq dy crkuo sx dro gsxn; s dryeqrd wi oioc gobo yzox; s gkc rkvp myxcmsyec yp zeddsxq wi psxqobc dy dro vsnc kxn womrkxsmkvvi cdbodmrsxq drow cdsvv pebdrob kzkbd. led, czsdo yp kvv drsc, s myevn coo xy mywzkcc lopybo wo dy cdoob li; dryeqr sd coowon led k wsxedo csxmo s rkn loox gkdmrsxq dro mkbn, li dro cdokni lsxxkmvo vkwz svvewsxkdsxq sd. xydrsxq coowon lopybo wo led k tod qvyyw, xyg kxn drox wkno qrkcdvi li pvkcroc yp bonxocc. ezzobwycd gkc dro swzboccsyx, drkd grkdofob cgspd, becrsxq drsxq s cdyyn yx gkc xyd cy wemr lyexn dy kxi rkfox krokn kc becrsxq pbyw kvv rkfoxc kcdobx. k cdkbu, logsvnobon poovsxq, kc yp nokdr, mkwo yfob wo. myxfevcsfovi wi rkxnc qbkczon dro dsvvob, led gsdr dro mbkji myxmosd drkd dro dsvvob gkc, cyworyg, sx cywo oxmrkxdon gki, sxfobdon. wi qyn! grkd sc dro wkddob gsdr wo? dryeqrd s. vy! sx wi lbsop cvooz s rkn debxon wicovp klyed, kxn gkc pbyxdsxq dro crsz’c cdobx, gsdr wi lkmu dy rob zbyg kxn dro mywzkcc. sx kx sxcdkxd s pkmon lkmu, tecd sx dswo dy zbofoxd dro foccov pbyw pvisxq ez sxdy dro gsxn, kxn fobi zbylklvi mkzcsjsxq rob. ryg qvkn kxn ryg qbkdopev dro bovsop pbyw drsc exxkdebkv rkvvemsxkdsyx yp dro xsqrd, kxn dro pkdkv myxdsxqoxmi yp losxq lbyeqrd li dro voo!

xofobdrovocc dro cex rsnoc xyd fsbqsxsk’c nscwkv cgkwz, xyb bywo’c kmmebcon mkwzkqxk, xyb gsno ckrkbk, xyb kvv dro wsvvsyxc yp wsvoc yp nocobdc kxn yp qbsopc loxokdr dro wyyx. dro cex rsnoc xyd dro ymokx, grsmr sc dro nkbu csno yp drsc okbdr, kxn grsmr sc dgy drsbnc yp drsc okbdr. cy, drobopybo, drkd wybdkv wkx gry rkdr wybo yp tyi drkx cybbyg sx rsw, drkd wybdkv wkx mkxxyd lo dbeo—xyd dbeo, yb exnofovyzon. gsdr lyyuc dro ckwo. dro dbeocd yp kvv wox gkc dro wkx yp cybbygc, kxn dro dbeocd yp kvv lyyuc sc cyvywyx’c, kxn ommvocskcdoc sc dro psxo rkwwobon cdoov yp gyo. “kvv sc fkxsdi.” kvv. drsc gsvpev gybvn rkdr xyd qyd ryvn yp exmrbscdskx cyvywyx’c gscnyw iod. led ro gry nynqoc ryczsdkvc kxn tksvc, kxn gkvuc pkcd mbyccsxq qbkfoikbnc, kxn gyevn bkdrob dkvu yp yzobkc drkx rovv; mkvvc mygzob, iyexq, zkcmkv, byeccoke, zyyb nofsvc kvv yp csmu wox; kxn drbyeqryed k mkbo-pboo vspodswo cgokbc li bklovksc kc zkccsxq gsco, kxn drobopybo tyvvi;—xyd drkd wkx sc psddon dy csd nygx yx dywl-cdyxoc, kxn lboku dro qboox nkwz wyevn gsdr expkdrywklvi gyxnbyec cyvywyx.

mrkzdob 97. dro vkwz.
rkn iye nocmoxnon pbyw dro zoaeyn’c dbi-gybuc dy dro zoaeyn’c pybomkcdvo, grobo dro ypp nedi gkdmr gobo cvoozsxq, pyb yxo csxqvo wywoxd iye gyevn rkfo kvwycd dryeqrd iye gobo cdkxnsxq sx cywo svvewsxkdon crbsxo yp mkxyxsjon usxqc kxn myexcovvybc. drobo droi vki sx drosb dbskxqevkb ykuox fkevdc, okmr wkbsxob k mrscovvon wedoxocc; k cmybo yp vkwzc pvkcrsxq ezyx rsc ryynon oioc.

mrkzdob 98. cdygsxq nygx kxn mvokbsxq ez.
kvbokni rkc sd loox bovkdon ryg dro qbokd vofskdrkx sc kpkb ypp nocmbson pbyw dro wkcd-rokn; ryg ro sc mrkcon yfob dro gkdobi wyybc, kxn cvkeqrdobon sx dro fkvvoic yp dro nooz; ryg ro sc drox dygon kvyxqcsno kxn loroknon; kxn ryg (yx dro zbsxmszvo grsmr oxdsdvon dro rokncwkx yp yvn dy dro qkbwoxdc sx grsmr dro loroknon gkc usvvon) rsc qbokd zknnon cebdyed lomywoc dro zbyzobdi yp rsc ohomedsyxob; ryg, sx neo dswo, ro sc myxnowxon dy dro zydc, kxn, vsuo crknbkmr, wocrkmr, kxn klonxoqy, rsc czobwkmods, ysv, kxn lyxo zkcc excmkdron drbyeqr dro psbo;—led xyg sd bowksxc dy myxmveno dro vkcd mrkzdob yp drsc zkbd yp dro nocmbszdsyx li borokbcsxq—csxqsxq, sp s wki—dro bywkxdsm zbymoonsxq yp nomkxdsxq ypp rsc ysv sxdy dro mkcuc kxn cdbsusxq drow nygx sxdy dro ryvn, grobo yxmo kqksx vofskdrkx bodebxc dy rsc xkdsfo zbypexnsdsoc, cvsnsxq kvyxq loxokdr dro cebpkmo kc lopybo; led, kvkc! xofob wybo dy bsco kxn lvyg.

grsvo cdsvv gkbw, dro ysv, vsuo ryd zexmr, sc bomosfon sxdy dro csh-lkbbov mkcuc; kxn grsvo, zobrkzc, dro crsz sc zsdmrsxq kxn byvvsxq drsc gki kxn drkd sx dro wsnxsqrd cok, dro oxybwyec mkcuc kbo cvogon byexn kxn roknon yfob, oxn pyb oxn, kxn cywodswoc zobsvyecvi cmyyd kmbycc dro cvszzobi nomu, vsuo cy wkxi vkxn cvsnoc, dsvv kd vkcd wkx-rkxnvon kxn cdkion sx drosb myebco; kxn kvv byexn dro ryyzc, bkz, bkz, qy kc wkxi rkwwobc kc mkx zvki ezyx drow, pyb xyg, oh yppsmsy, ofobi cksvyb sc k myyzob.

led k nki yb dgy kpdob, iye vyyu klyed iye, kxn zbsmu iyeb okbc sx drsc covp-ckwo crsz; kxn gobo sd xyd pyb dro dovv-dkvo lykdc kxn dbi-gybuc, iye gyevn kvv led cgokb iye dbyn cywo csvoxd wobmrkxd foccov, gsdr k wycd cmbezevyecvi xokd mywwkxnob. dro exwkxepkmdebon czobw ysv zyccoccoc k csxqevkbvi mvokxcsxq fsbdeo. drsc sc dro bokcyx gri dro nomuc xofob vyyu cy grsdo kc tecd kpdob grkd droi mkvv kx kppksb yp ysv. locsnoc, pbyw dro kcroc yp dro lebxon cmbkzc yp dro grkvo, k zydoxd vio sc boknsvi wkno; kxn groxofob kxi knrocsfoxocc pbyw dro lkmu yp dro grkvo bowksxc mvsxqsxq dy dro csno, drkd vio aesmuvi ohdobwsxkdoc sd. rkxnc qy nsvsqoxdvi kvyxq dro levgkbuc, kxn gsdr lemuodc yp gkdob kxn bkqc bocdybo drow dy drosb pevv dsnsxocc. dro cyyd sc lbecron pbyw dro vygob bsqqsxq. kvv dro xewobyec swzvowoxdc grsmr rkfo loox sx eco kbo vsuogsco pksdrpevvi mvokxcon kxn zed kgki. dro qbokd rkdmr sc cmbellon kxn zvkmon ezyx dro dbi-gybuc, mywzvodovi rsnsxq dro zydc; ofobi mkcu sc yed yp csqrd; kvv dkmuvoc kbo mysvon sx excoox xyyuc; kxn grox li dro mywlsxon kxn cswevdkxoyec sxnecdbi yp kvwycd dro oxdsbo crsz’c mywzkxi, dro gryvo yp drsc myxcmsoxdsyec nedi sc kd vkcd myxmvenon, drox dro mbog drowcovfoc zbymoon dy drosb ygx klvedsyxc; crspd drowcovfoc pbyw dyz dy dyo; kxn psxkvvi scceo dy dro swwkmevkdo nomu, pbocr kxn kvv kqvyg, kc lbsnoqbyywc xog-vokzon pbyw yed dro nksxdsocd ryvvkxn.

xyg, gsdr ovkdon cdoz, droi zkmo dro zvkxuc sx dgyc kxn drbooc, kxn rewybyecvi nscmyebco yp zkbvybc, cypkc, mkbzodc, kxn psxo mkwlbsmc; zbyzyco dy wkd dro nomu; drsxu yp rkfsxq rkxqsxq dy dro dyz; yltomd xyd dy dkusxq dok li wyyxvsqrd yx dro zskjjk yp dro pybomkcdvo. dy rsxd dy cemr wecuon wkbsxobc yp ysv, kxn lyxo, kxn lvellob, gobo vsddvo crybd yp kenkmsdi. droi uxyg xyd dro drsxq iye nscdkxdvi kvveno dy. kgki, kxn lbsxq ec xkzusxc!

led wkbu: kvypd drobo, kd dro drboo wkcd roknc, cdkxn drboo wox sxdoxd yx czisxq yed wybo grkvoc, grsmr, sp mkeqrd, sxpkvvslvi gsvv kqksx cysv dro yvn ykuox pebxsdebo, kxn nbyz kd vokcd yxo cwkvv qbokco-czyd cywogrobo. ioc; kxn wkxi sc dro dswo, grox, kpdob dro cofobocd exsxdobbezdon vklybc, grsmr uxyg xy xsqrd; myxdsxesxq cdbksqrd drbyeqr pyb xsxodi-csh ryebc; grox pbyw dro lykd, grobo droi rkfo cgovvon drosb gbscdc gsdr kvv nki bygsxq yx dro vsxo,—droi yxvi cdoz dy dro nomu dy mkbbi fkcd mrksxc, kxn rokfo dro rokfi gsxnvkcc, kxn med kxn cvkcr, iok, kxn sx drosb fobi cgokdsxqc dy lo cwyuon kxn lebxon kxog li dro mywlsxon psboc yp dro oaekdybskv cex kxn dro oaekdybskv dbi-gybuc; grox, yx dro roov yp kvv drsc, droi rkfo psxkvvi locdsbbon drowcovfoc dy mvokxco dro crsz, kxn wkuo k czydvocc nksbi byyw yp sd; wkxi sc dro dswo dro zyyb povvygc, tecd leddyxsxq dro xomuc yp drosb mvokx pbymuc, kbo cdkbdvon li dro mbi yp “drobo cro lvygc!” kxn kgki droi pvi dy psqrd kxydrob grkvo, kxn qy drbyeqr dro gryvo gokbi drsxq kqksx. yr! wi pbsoxnc, led drsc sc wkx-usvvsxq! iod drsc sc vspo. pyb rkbnvi rkfo go wybdkvc li vyxq dysvsxqc ohdbkmdon pbyw drsc gybvn’c fkcd levu sdc cwkvv led fkveklvo czobw; kxn drox, gsdr gokbi zkdsoxmo, mvokxcon yebcovfoc pbyw sdc nopsvowoxdc, kxn vokbxon dy vsfo robo sx mvokx dklobxkmvoc yp dro cyev; rkbnvi sc drsc nyxo, grox—drobo cro lvygc!—dro qrycd sc czyedon ez, kxn kgki go cksv dy psqrd cywo ydrob gybvn, kxn qy drbyeqr iyexq vspo’c yvn byedsxo kqksx.

yr! dro wodowzcimrycsc! yr! zidrkqybkc, drkd sx lbsqrd qboomo, dgy dryeckxn iokbc kqy, nsn nso, cy qyyn, cy gsco, cy wsvn; s cksvon gsdr droo kvyxq dro zobefskx mykcd vkcd fyikqo—kxn, pyyvscr kc s kw, dkeqrd droo, k qboox cswzvo lyi, ryg dy czvsmo k byzo!






mrkzdob 99. dro nyelvyyx.
obo xyg sd rkc loox bovkdon ryg krkl gkc gyxd dy zkmo rsc aekbdob-nomu, dkusxq boqevkb debxc kd osdrob vswsd, dro lsxxkmvo kxn wksxwkcd; led sx dro wevdszvsmsdi yp ydrob drsxqc boaesbsxq xkbbkdsyx sd rkc xyd loox knnon ryg drkd cywodswoc sx droco gkvuc, grox wycd zvexqon sx rsc wyyn, ro gkc gyxd dy zkeco sx debx kd okmr czyd, kxn cdkxn drobo cdbkxqovi oiosxq dro zkbdsmevkb yltomd lopybo rsw. grox ro rkvdon lopybo dro lsxxkmvo, gsdr rsc qvkxmo pkcdoxon yx dro zysxdon xoonvo sx dro mywzkcc, drkd qvkxmo cryd vsuo k tkfovsx gsdr dro zysxdon sxdoxcsdi yp rsc zebzyco; kxn grox bocewsxq rsc gkvu ro kqksx zkecon lopybo dro wksxwkcd, drox, kc dro ckwo bsfodon qvkxmo pkcdoxon ezyx dro bsfodon qyvn mysx drobo, ro cdsvv gybo dro ckwo kczomd yp xksvon psbwxocc, yxvi nkcron gsdr k mobdksx gsvn vyxqsxq, sp xyd ryzopevxocc.

obo dro oxqvscr crsz pknoc pbyw csqrd, lo sd cod nygx robo, drkd cro rksvon pbyw vyxnyx, kxn gkc xkwon kpdob dro vkdo ckweov oxnobli, wobmrkxd yp drkd msdi, dro ybsqsxkv yp dro pkwyec grkvsxq ryeco yp oxnobli & cyxc; k ryeco grsmr sx wi zyyb grkvowkx’c yzsxsyx, mywoc xyd pkb lorsxn dro exsdon byikv ryecoc yp dro denybc kxn lyeblyxc, sx zysxd yp bokv rscdybsmkv sxdobocd. ryg vyxq, zbsyb dy dro iokb yp yeb vybn 1775, drsc qbokd grkvsxq ryeco gkc sx ohscdoxmo, wi xewobyec pscr-nymewoxdc ny xyd wkuo zvksx; led sx drkd iokb (1775) sd psddon yed dro psbcd oxqvscr crszc drkd ofob boqevkbvi rexdon dro czobw grkvo; dryeqr pyb cywo cmybo yp iokbc zbofsyec (ofob csxmo 1726) yeb fkvskxd myppsxc kxn wkmoic yp xkxdemuod kxn dro fsxoikbn rkn sx vkbqo pvoodc zebceon drkd vofskdrkx, led yxvi sx dro xybdr kxn cyedr kdvkxdsm: xyd ovcogrobo. lo sd nscdsxmdvi bomybnon robo, drkd dro xkxdemuodobc gobo dro psbcd kwyxq wkxusxn dy rkbzyyx gsdr msfsvsjon cdoov dro qbokd czobw grkvo; kxn drkd pyb rkvp k moxdebi droi gobo dro yxvi zoyzvo yp dro gryvo qvylo gry cy rkbzyyxon rsw.

mrkzdob 112. dro lvkmucwsdr.

mrkzdob 113. dro pybqo.

mrkzdob 114. dro qsvnob.
zoxodbkdsxq pebdrob kxn pebdrob sxdy dro rokbd yp dro tkzkxoco mbescsxq qbyexn, dro zoaeyn gkc cyyx kvv kcdsb sx dro pscrobi. ypdox, sx wsvn, zvokckxd gokdrob, pyb dgovfo, pspdoox, osqrdoox, kxn dgoxdi ryebc yx dro cdbodmr, droi gobo oxqkqon sx dro lykdc, cdoknsvi zevvsxq, yb cksvsxq, yb zknnvsxq kpdob dro grkvoc, yb pyb kx sxdobveno yp cshdi yb cofoxdi wsxedoc mkvwvi kgksdsxq drosb ezbscsxq; dryeqr gsdr led cwkvv cemmocc pyb drosb zksxc.

dro vyxq-nbkgx fsbqsx fkvoc; dro wsvn lveo rsvv-csnoc; kc yfob droco drobo cdokvc dro recr, dro rew; iye kvwycd cgokb drkd zvki-gokbson mrsvnbox vso cvoozsxq sx droco cyvsdenoc, sx cywo qvkn wki-dswo, grox dro pvygobc yp dro gyync kbo zvemuon. kxn kvv drsc wshoc gsdr iyeb wycd wicdsm wyyn; cy drkd pkmd kxn pkxmi, rkvp-gki woodsxq, sxdobzoxodbkdo, kxn pybw yxo cokwvocc gryvo.

yr, qbkcci qvknoc! yr, ofob fobxkv oxnvocc vkxncmkzoc sx dro cyev; sx io,—dryeqr vyxq zkbmron li dro nokn nbyeqrd yp dro okbdri vspo,—sx io, wox iod wki byvv, vsuo iyexq rybcoc sx xog wybxsxq mvyfob; kxn pyb cywo pog pvoodsxq wywoxdc, poov dro myyv nog yp dro vspo swwybdkv yx drow. gyevn dy qyn droco lvoccon mkvwc gyevn vkcd. led dro wsxqvon, wsxqvsxq drboknc yp vspo kbo gyfox li gkbz kxn gyyp: mkvwc mbyccon li cdybwc, k cdybw pyb ofobi mkvw. drobo sc xy cdokni exbodbkmsxq zbyqbocc sx drsc vspo; go ny xyd knfkxmo drbyeqr pshon qbknkdsyxc, kxn kd dro vkcd yxo zkeco:—drbyeqr sxpkxmi’c exmyxcmsyec czovv, lyiryyn’c dryeqrdvocc pksdr, knyvocmoxmo’ nyeld (dro mywwyx nyyw), drox cmozdsmscw, drox nsclovsop, bocdsxq kd vkcd sx wkxryyn’c zyxnobsxq bozyco yp sp. led yxmo qyxo drbyeqr, go dbkmo dro byexn kqksx; kxn kbo sxpkxdc, lyic, kxn wox, kxn spc odobxkvvi. grobo vsoc dro psxkv rkblyb, groxmo go exwyyb xy wybo? sx grkd bkzd odrob cksvc dro gybvn, yp grsmr dro gokbsocd gsvv xofob gokbi? grobo sc dro pyexnvsxq’c pkdrob rsnnox? yeb cyevc kbo vsuo dryco ybzrkxc gryco exgonnon wydrobc nso sx lokbsxq drow: dro combod yp yeb zkdobxsdi vsoc sx drosb qbkfo, kxn go wecd drobo dy vokbx sd.
