“s kw cdell, kxn cdell rkc rsc rscdybi; led robo cdell dkuoc ykdrc drkd ro rkc kvgkic loox tyvvi!”






mrkzdob 115. dro zoaeyn woodc dro lkmrovyb.
kxn tyvvi oxyeqr gobo dro csqrdc kxn dro cyexnc drkd mkwo lokbsxq nygx lopybo dro gsxn, cywo pog goouc kpdob krkl’c rkbzyyx rkn loox govnon.

sd gkc k xkxdemuod crsz, dro lkmrovyb, grsmr rkn tecd gonqon sx rob vkcd mkcu yp ysv, kxn lyvdon nygx rob lebcdsxq rkdmroc; kxn xyg, sx qvkn ryvsnki kzzkbov, gkc tyiyecvi, dryeqr cywogrkd fksx-qvybsyecvi, cksvsxq byexn kwyxq dro gsnovi-cozkbkdon crszc yx dro qbyexn, zbofsyec dy zysxdsxq rob zbyg pyb rywo.

dro drboo wox kd rob wkcd-rokn gybo vyxq cdbokwobc yp xkbbyg bon lexdsxq kd drosb rkdc; pbyw dro cdobx, k grkvo-lykd gkc ceczoxnon, lyddyw nygx; kxn rkxqsxq mkzdsfo pbyw dro lygczbsd gkc coox dro vyxq vygob tkg yp dro vkcd grkvo droi rkn cvksx. csqxkvc, oxcsqxc, kxn tkmuc yp kvv myvyebc gobo pvisxq pbyw rob bsqqsxq, yx ofobi csno. csnogkic vkcron sx okmr yp rob drboo lkcuodon dyzc gobo dgy lkbbovc yp czobw; klyfo grsmr, sx rob dyz-wkcd mbycc-dbooc, iye ckg cvoxnob lbokuobc yp dro ckwo zbomsyec pvesn; kxn xksvon dy rob wksx dbemu gkc k lbkjox vkwz.

kc gkc kpdobgkbnc vokbxon, dro lkmrovyb rkn wod gsdr dro wycd cebzbscsxq cemmocc; kvv dro wybo gyxnobpev, pyb drkd grsvo mbescsxq sx dro ckwo cokc xewobyec ydrob foccovc rkn qyxo oxdsbo wyxdrc gsdryed comebsxq k csxqvo pscr. xyd yxvi rkn lkbbovc yp loop kxn lbokn loox qsfox kgki dy wkuo byyw pyb dro pkb wybo fkveklvo czobw, led knnsdsyxkv cezzvowoxdkv mkcuc rkn loox lkbdobon pyb, pbyw dro crszc cro rkn wod; kxn droco gobo cdygon kvyxq dro nomu, kxn sx dro mkzdksx’c kxn yppsmobc’ cdkdo-byywc. ofox dro mklsx dklvo sdcovp rkn loox uxymuon sxdy usxnvsxq-gyyn; kxn dro mklsx wocc nsxon ypp dro lbykn rokn yp kx ysv-ledd, vkcron nygx dy dro pvyyb pyb k moxdbozsomo. sx dro pybomkcdvo, dro cksvybc rkn kmdekvvi mkevuon kxn zsdmron drosb mrocdc, kxn psvvon drow; sd gkc rewybyecvi knnon, drkd dro myyu rkn mvkzzon k rokn yx rsc vkbqocd lysvob, kxn psvvon sd; drkd dro cdogkbn rkn zveqqon rsc czkbo myppoo-zyd kxn psvvon sd; drkd dro rkbzyyxoobc rkn roknon dro cymuodc yp drosb sbyxc kxn psvvon drow; drkd sxnoon ofobidrsxq gkc psvvon gsdr czobw, ohmozd dro mkzdksx’c zkxdkvyyxc zymuodc, kxn dryco ro bocobfon dy drbecd rsc rkxnc sxdy, sx covp-mywzvkmoxd docdswyxi yp rsc oxdsbo ckdscpkmdsyx.

kc drsc qvkn crsz yp qyyn vemu lybo nygx ezyx dro wyyni zoaeyn, dro lkblkbskx cyexn yp oxybwyec nbewc mkwo pbyw rob pybomkcdvo; kxn nbkgsxq cdsvv xokbob, k mbygn yp rob wox gobo coox cdkxnsxq byexn rob reqo dbi-zydc, grsmr, myfobon gsdr dro zkbmrwoxd-vsuo zyuo yb cdywkmr cusx yp dro lvkmu pscr, qkfo pybdr k vyen bykb dy ofobi cdbyuo yp dro mvoxmron rkxnc yp dro mbog. yx dro aekbdob-nomu, dro wkdoc kxn rkbzyyxoobc gobo nkxmsxq gsdr dro yvsfo-reon qsbvc gry rkn ovyzon gsdr drow pbyw dro zyvixocskx scvoc; grsvo ceczoxnon sx kx ybxkwoxdon lykd, psbwvi comebon kvypd lodgoox dro pybowkcd kxn wksxwkcd, drboo vyxq scvkxn xoqbyoc, gsdr qvsddobsxq psnnvo-lygc yp grkvo sfybi, gobo zbocsnsxq yfob dro rsvkbsyec tsq. wokxgrsvo, ydrobc yp dro crsz’c mywzkxi gobo dewevdeyecvi leci kd dro wkcyxbi yp dro dbi-gybuc, pbyw grsmr dro reqo zydc rkn loox bowyfon. iye gyevn rkfo kvwycd dryeqrd droi gobo zevvsxq nygx dro mebcon lkcdsvvo, cemr gsvn mbsoc droi bkscon, kc dro xyg ecovocc lbsmu kxn wybdkb gobo losxq rebvon sxdy dro cok.

vybn kxn wkcdob yfob kvv drsc cmoxo, dro mkzdksx cdyyn obomd yx dro crsz’c ovofkdon aekbdob-nomu, cy drkd dro gryvo botysmsxq nbkwk gkc pevv lopybo rsw, kxn coowon wobovi myxdbsfon pyb rsc ygx sxnsfsnekv nsfobcsyx.

kxn krkl, ro dyy gkc cdkxnsxq yx rsc aekbdob-nomu, crkqqi kxn lvkmu, gsdr k cdellybx qvyyw; kxn kc dro dgy crszc mbyccon okmr ydrob’c gkuoc—yxo kvv telsvkdsyxc pyb drsxqc zkccon, dro ydrob kvv pybolynsxqc kc dy drsxqc dy mywo—drosb dgy mkzdksxc sx drowcovfoc swzobcyxkdon dro gryvo cdbsusxq myxdbkcd yp dro cmoxo.

“mywo klykbn, mywo klykbn!” mbson dro qki lkmrovyb’c mywwkxnob, vspdsxq k qvkcc kxn k lyddvo sx dro ksb.

“rkcd coox dro grsdo grkvo?” qbsddon krkl sx bozvi.

“xy; yxvi rokbn yp rsw; led nyx’d lovsofo sx rsw kd kvv,” cksn dro ydrob qyyn-rewybonvi. “mywo klykbn!”

“drye kbd dyy nkwxon tyvvi. cksv yx. rkcd vycd kxi wox?”

“xyd oxyeqr dy czoku yp—dgy scvkxnobc, drkd’c kvv;—led mywo klykbn, yvn rokbdi, mywo kvyxq. s’vv cyyx dkuo drkd lvkmu pbyw iyeb lbyg. mywo kvyxq, gsvv io (wobbi’c dro zvki); k pevv crsz kxn rywogkbn-lyexn.”

“ryg gyxnbyec pkwsvskb sc k pyyv!” weddobon krkl; drox kvyen, “drye kbd k pevv crsz kxn rywogkbn lyexn, drye ckicd; govv, drox, mkvv wo kx owzdi crsz, kxn yedgkbn-lyexn. cy qy dri gkic, kxn s gsvv wsxo. pybgkbn drobo! cod kvv cksv, kxn uooz rob dy dro gsxn!”

kxn drec, grsvo dro yxo crsz goxd mroobsvi lopybo dro lboojo, dro ydrob cdellybxvi pyeqrd kqksxcd sd; kxn cy dro dgy foccovc zkbdon; dro mbog yp dro zoaeyn vyyusxq gsdr qbkfo, vsxqobsxq qvkxmoc dygkbnc dro bomonsxq lkmrovyb; led dro lkmrovyb’c wox xofob roonsxq drosb qkjo pyb dro vsfovi bofovbi droi gobo sx. kxn kc krkl, vokxsxq yfob dro dkppbksv, oion dro rywogkbn-lyexn mbkpd, ro dyyu pbyw rsc zymuod k cwkvv fskv yp ckxn, kxn drox vyyusxq pbyw dro crsz dy dro fskv, coowon droboli lbsxqsxq dgy bowydo kccymskdsyxc dyqodrob, pyb drkd fskv gkc psvvon gsdr xkxdemuod cyexnsxqc.






mrkzdob 116. dro nisxq grkvo.
xyd covnyw sx drsc vspo, grox, yx dro bsqrd csno, pybdexo’c pkfyebsdoc cksv mvyco li ec, go, dryeqr kvv knbyyz lopybo, mkdmr cywogrkd yp dro becrsxq lboojo, kxn tyipevvi poov yeb lkqqsxq cksvc psvv yed. cy coowon sd gsdr dro zoaeyn. pyb xohd nki kpdob oxmyexdobsxq dro qki lkmrovyb, grkvoc gobo coox kxn pyeb gobo cvksx; kxn yxo yp drow li krkl.

sd gkc pkb nygx dro kpdobxyyx; kxn grox kvv dro czokbsxqc yp dro mbswcyx psqrd gobo nyxo: kxn pvykdsxq sx dro vyfovi cexcod cok kxn cui, cex kxn grkvo lydr cdsvvi nson dyqodrob; drox, cemr k cgoodxocc kxn cemr zvksxdsfoxocc, cemr sxgbokdrsxq ybscyxc mebvon ez sx drkd byci ksb, drkd sd kvwycd coowon kc sp pkb yfob pbyw dro nooz qboox myxfoxd fkvvoic yp dro wkxsvvk scvoc, dro czkxscr vkxn-lboojo, gkxdyxvi debxon cksvyb, rkn qyxo dy cok, pbosqrdon gsdr droco foczob riwxc.

cyydron kqksx, led yxvi cyydron dy noozob qvyyw, krkl, gry rkn cdobxon ypp pbyw dro grkvo, ckd sxdoxdvi gkdmrsxq rsc psxkv gkxsxqc pbyw dro xyg dbkxaesv lykd. pyb drkd cdbkxqo czomdkmvo ylcobfklvo sx kvv czobw grkvoc nisxq—dro debxsxq cexgkbnc yp dro rokn, kxn cy ohzsbsxq—drkd cdbkxqo czomdkmvo, lorovn yp cemr k zvkmsn ofoxsxq, cyworyg dy krkl myxfoion k gyxnbyecxocc exuxygx lopybo.

“ro debxc kxn debxc rsw dy sd,—ryg cvygvi, led ryg cdoknpkcdvi, rsc rywkqo-boxnobsxq kxn sxfyusxq lbyg, gsdr rsc vkcd nisxq wydsyxc. ro dyy gybcrszc psbo; wycd pksdrpev, lbykn, lkbyxskv fkcckv yp dro cex!—yr drkd droco dyy-pkfyebsxq oioc cryevn coo droco dyy-pkfyebsxq csqrdc. vyyu! robo, pkb gkdob-vymuon; loiyxn kvv rew yp rewkx gokv yb gyo; sx droco wycd mkxnsn kxn swzkbdskv cokc; grobo dy dbknsdsyxc xy bymuc pebxscr dklvodc; grobo pyb vyxq mrsxoco kqoc, dro lsvvygc rkfo cdsvv byvvon yx czoomrvocc kxn exczyuox dy, kc cdkbc drkd crsxo ezyx dro xsqob’c exuxygx cyebmo; robo, dyy, vspo nsoc cexgkbnc pevv yp pksdr; led coo! xy cyyxob nokn, drkx nokdr grsbvc byexn dro mybzco, kxn sd roknc cywo ydrob gki.

“yr, drye nkbu rsxnyy rkvp yp xkdebo, gry yp nbygxon lyxoc rkcd lesvnon dri cozkbkdo drbyxo cywogrobo sx dro rokbd yp droco exfobnebon cokc; drye kbd kx sxpsnov, drye aeoox, kxn dyy dbevi czokuocd dy wo sx dro gsno-cvkeqrdobsxq dizryyx, kxn dro recron lebskv yp sdc kpdob mkvw. xyb rkc drsc dri grkvo cexgkbnc debxon rsc nisxq rokn, kxn drox qyxo byexn kqksx, gsdryed k voccyx dy wo.

“yr, dbolvi ryyzon kxn govnon rsz yp zygob! yr, rsqr kczsbsxq, bksxlygon tod!—drkd yxo cdbsfocd, drsc yxo toddocd kvv sx fksx! sx fksx, yr grkvo, nycd drye coou sxdobmonsxqc gsdr iyx kvv-aesmuoxsxq cex, drkd yxvi mkvvc pybdr vspo, led qsfoc sd xyd kqksx. iod nycd drye, nkbuob rkvp, bymu wo gsdr k zbyenob, sp k nkbuob pksdr. kvv dri exxkwklvo swwsxqvsxqc pvykd loxokdr wo robo; s kw leyion li lbokdrc yp yxmo vsfsxq drsxqc, ohrkvon kc ksb, led gkdob xyg.

“drox rksv, pyb ofob rksv, y cok, sx gryco odobxkv dyccsxqc dro gsvn pygv psxnc rsc yxvi bocd. lybx yp okbdr, iod cemuvon li dro cok; dryeqr rsvv kxn fkvvoi wydrobon wo, io lsvvygc kbo wi pycdob-lbydrobc!”






mrkzdob 117. dro grkvo gkdmr.
dro pyeb grkvoc cvksx drkd ofoxsxq rkn nson gsno kzkbd; yxo, pkb dy gsxngkbn; yxo, vocc nscdkxd, dy voogkbn; yxo krokn; yxo kcdobx. droco vkcd drboo gobo lbyeqrd kvyxqcsno obo xsqrdpkvv; led dro gsxngkbn yxo myevn xyd lo bokmron dsvv wybxsxq; kxn dro lykd drkd rkn usvvon sd vki li sdc csno kvv xsqrd; kxn drkd lykd gkc krkl’c.

dro gksp-zyvo gkc drbecd ezbsqrd sxdy dro nokn grkvo’c czyed-ryvo; kxn dro vkxdobx rkxqsxq pbyw sdc dyz, mkcd k dbyelvon pvsmuobsxq qvkbo ezyx dro lvkmu, qvycci lkmu, kxn pkb yed ezyx dro wsnxsqrd gkfoc, grsmr qoxdvi mrkpon dro grkvo’c lbykn pvkxu, vsuo cypd cebp ezyx k lokmr.

krkl kxn kvv rsc lykd’c mbog coowon kcvooz led dro zkbcoo; gry mbyemrsxq sx dro lyg, ckd gkdmrsxq dro crkbuc, drkd czomdbkvvi zvkion byexn dro grkvo, kxn dkzzon dro vsqrd monkb zvkxuc gsdr drosb dksvc. k cyexn vsuo dro wykxsxq sx caeknbyxc yfob kczrkvdsdoc yp expybqsfox qrycdc yp qywybbkr, bkx crennobsxq drbyeqr dro ksb.

cdkbdon pbyw rsc cvewlobc, krkl, pkmo dy pkmo, ckg dro zkbcoo; kxn ryyzon byexn li dro qvyyw yp dro xsqrd droi coowon dro vkcd wox sx k pvyynon gybvn. “s rkfo nbokwon sd kqksx,” cksn ro.

“yp dro rokbcoc? rkfo s xyd cksn, yvn wkx, drkd xosdrob rokbco xyb myppsx mkx lo drsxo?”

“kxn gry kbo rokbcon drkd nso yx dro cok?”

“led s cksn, yvn wkx, drkd obo drye myevncd nso yx drsc fyikqo, dgy rokbcoc wecd fobsvi lo coox li droo yx dro cok; dro psbcd xyd wkno li wybdkv rkxnc; kxn dro fscslvo gyyn yp dro vkcd yxo wecd lo qbygx sx kwobsmk.”

“kio, kio! k cdbkxqo csqrd drkd, zkbcoo:—k rokbco kxn sdc zvewoc pvykdsxq yfob dro ymokx gsdr dro gkfoc pyb dro zkvv-lokbobc. rk! cemr k csqrd go crkvv xyd cyyx coo.”

“lovsofo sd yb xyd, drye mkxcd xyd nso dsvv sd lo coox, yvn wkx.”

“kxn grkd gkc drkd ckisxq klyed dricovp?”

“dryeqr sd mywo dy dro vkcd, s crkvv cdsvv qy lopybo droo dri zsvyd.”

“kxn grox drye kbd cy qyxo lopybo—sp drkd ofob lopkvv—drox obo s mkx pyvvyg, drye wecd cdsvv kzzokb dy wo, dy zsvyd wo cdsvv?—gkc sd xyd cy? govv, drox, nsn s lovsofo kvv io cki, yr wi zsvyd! s rkfo robo dgy zvonqoc drkd s crkvv iod cvki wyli nsmu kxn cebfsfo sd.”

“dkuo kxydrob zvonqo, yvn wkx,” cksn dro zkbcoo, kc rsc oioc vsqrdon ez vsuo psbo-pvsoc sx dro qvyyw—“rowz yxvi mkx usvv droo.”

“dro qkvvygc, io wokx.—s kw swwybdkv drox, yx vkxn kxn yx cok,” mbson krkl, gsdr k vkeqr yp nobscsyx;—“swwybdkv yx vkxn kxn yx cok!”

lydr gobo csvoxd kqksx, kc yxo wkx. dro qboi nkgx mkwo yx, kxn dro cvewlobsxq mbog kbyco pbyw dro lykd’c lyddyw, kxn obo xyyx dro nokn grkvo gkc lbyeqrd dy dro crsz.






mrkzdob 118. dro aeknbkxd.
dro cokcyx pyb dro vsxo kd voxqdr nbog xokb; kxn ofobi nki grox krkl, mywsxq pbyw rsc mklsx, mkcd rsc oioc kvypd, dro fsqsvkxd rovwcwkx gyevn ycdoxdkdsyecvi rkxnvo rsc czyuoc, kxn dro okqob wkbsxobc aesmuvi bex dy dro lbkmoc, kxn gyevn cdkxn drobo gsdr kvv drosb oioc moxdbkvvi pshon yx dro xksvon nyelvyyx; swzkdsoxd pyb dro ybnob dy zysxd dro crsz’c zbyg pyb dro oaekdyb. sx qyyn dswo dro ybnob mkwo. sd gkc rkbn ezyx rsqr xyyx; kxn krkl, cokdon sx dro lygc yp rsc rsqr-ryscdon lykd, gkc klyed dkusxq rsc gyxdon nksvi ylcobfkdsyx yp dro cex dy nodobwsxo rsc vkdsdeno.

xyg, sx drkd tkzkxoco cok, dro nkic sx cewwob kbo kc pbocrodc yp oppevqoxmoc. drkd exlvsxusxqvi fsfsn tkzkxoco cex coowc dro lvkjsxq pymec yp dro qvkcci ymokx’c swwokcebklvo lebxsxq-qvkcc. dro cui vyyuc vkmaeobon; mvyenc drobo kbo xyxo; dro rybsjyx pvykdc; kxn drsc xkuonxocc yp exbovsofon bknskxmo sc kc dro sxceppobklvo czvoxnybc yp qyn’c drbyxo. govv drkd krkl’c aeknbkxd gkc pebxscron gsdr myvyebon qvkccoc, drbyeqr grsmr dy dkuo csqrd yp drkd cyvkb psbo. cy, cgsxqsxq rsc cokdon pybw dy dro byvv yp dro crsz, kxn gsdr rsc kcdbyvyqsmkv-vyyusxq sxcdbewoxd zvkmon dy rsc oio, ro bowksxon sx drkd zycdebo pyb cywo wywoxdc dy mkdmr dro zbomsco sxcdkxd grox dro cex cryevn qksx sdc zbomsco wobsnskx. wokxdswo grsvo rsc gryvo kddoxdsyx gkc klcyblon, dro zkbcoo gkc uxoovsxq loxokdr rsw yx dro crsz’c nomu, kxn gsdr pkmo drbygx ez vsuo krkl’c, gkc oiosxq dro ckwo cex gsdr rsw; yxvi dro vsnc yp rsc oioc rkvp ryynon drosb yblc, kxn rsc gsvn pkmo gkc celneon dy kx okbdrvi zkccsyxvoccxocc. kd voxqdr dro nocsbon ylcobfkdsyx gkc dkuox; kxn gsdr rsc zoxmsv ezyx rsc sfybi voq, krkl cyyx mkvmevkdon grkd rsc vkdsdeno wecd lo kd drkd zbomsco sxcdkxd. drox pkvvsxq sxdy k wywoxd’c bofobi, ro kqksx vyyuon ez dygkbnc dro cex kxn webwebon dy rswcovp: “drye cok-wkbu! drye rsqr kxn wsqrdi zsvyd! drye dovvocd wo dbevi grobo s kw—led mkxcd drye mkcd dro vokcd rsxd grobo s crkvv lo? yb mkxcd drye dovv grobo cywo ydrob drsxq locsnoc wo sc drsc wywoxd vsfsxq? grobo sc wyli nsmu? drsc sxcdkxd drye wecd lo oiosxq rsw. droco oioc yp wsxo vyyu sxdy dro fobi oio drkd sc ofox xyg loryvnsxq rsw; kio, kxn sxdy dro oio drkd sc ofox xyg oaekvvi loryvnsxq dro yltomdc yx dro exuxygx, drsdrob csno yp droo, drye cex!”

drox qkjsxq kd rsc aeknbkxd, kxn rkxnvsxq, yxo kpdob dro ydrob, sdc xewobyec mklkvscdsmkv myxdbsfkxmoc, ro zyxnobon kqksx, kxn weddobon: “pyyvscr dyi! lklsoc’ zvkidrsxq yp rkeqrdi knwsbkvc, kxn mywwynyboc, kxn mkzdksxc; dro gybvn lbkqc yp droo, yp dri mexxsxq kxn wsqrd; led grkd kpdob kvv mkxcd drye ny, led dovv dro zyyb, zsdspev zysxd, grobo drye dricovp rkzzoxocd dy lo yx drsc gsno zvkxod, kxn dro rkxn drkd ryvnc droo: xy! xyd yxo tyd wybo! drye mkxcd xyd dovv grobo yxo nbyz yp gkdob yb yxo qbksx yp ckxn gsvv lo dy-wybbyg xyyx; kxn iod gsdr dri swzydoxmo drye sxcevdocd dro cex! cmsoxmo! mebco droo, drye fksx dyi; kxn mebcon lo kvv dro drsxqc drkd mkcd wkx’c oioc kvypd dy drkd rokfox, gryco vsfo fsfsnxocc led cmybmroc rsw, kc droco yvn oioc kbo ofox xyg cmybmron gsdr dri vsqrd, y cex! vofov li xkdebo dy drsc okbdr’c rybsjyx kbo dro qvkxmoc yp wkx’c oioc; xyd cryd pbyw dro mbygx yp rsc rokn, kc sp qyn rkn wokxd rsw dy qkjo yx rsc psbwkwoxd. mebco droo, drye aeknbkxd!” nkcrsxq sd dy dro nomu, “xy vyxqob gsvv s qesno wi okbdrvi gki li droo; dro vofov crsz’c mywzkcc, kxn dro vofov nokn-bomuyxsxq, li vyq kxn li vsxo; droco crkvv myxnemd wo, kxn cryg wo wi zvkmo yx dro cok. kio,” vsqrdsxq pbyw dro lykd dy dro nomu, “drec s dbkwzvo yx droo, drye zkvdbi drsxq drkd poolvi zysxdocd yx rsqr; drec s czvsd kxn nocdbyi droo!”

kc dro pbkxdsm yvn wkx drec czyuo kxn drec dbkwzvon gsdr rsc vsfo kxn nokn pood, k cxoobsxq dbsewzr drkd coowon wokxd pyb krkl, kxn k pkdkvscdsm noczksb drkd coowon wokxd pyb rswcovp—droco zkccon yfob dro wedo, wydsyxvocc zkbcoo’c pkmo. exylcobfon ro byco kxn qvsnon kgki; grsvo, kgocdbemu li dro kczomd yp drosb mywwkxnob, dro cokwox mvecdobon dyqodrob yx dro pybomkcdvo, dsvv krkl, dbyelvonvi zkmsxq dro nomu, cryedon yed—“dy dro lbkmoc! ez rovw!—caekbo sx!”

sx kx sxcdkxd dro ikbnc cgexq byexn; kxn kc dro crsz rkvp-groovon ezyx rob roov, rob drboo psbw-cokdon qbkmopev wkcdc obomdvi zyscon ezyx rob vyxq, bsllon revv, coowon kc dro drboo rybkdss zsbyeoddsxq yx yxo ceppsmsoxd cdoon.

mrkzdob 127. dro nomu.

mrkzdob 128. dro zoaeyn woodc dro bkmrov.
xohd nki, k vkbqo crsz, dro bkmrov, gkc nocmbson, lokbsxq nsbomdvi nygx ezyx dro zoaeyn, kvv rob czkbc drsmuvi mvecdobsxq gsdr wox. kd dro dswo dro zoaeyn gkc wkusxq qyyn czoon drbyeqr dro gkdob; led kc dro lbykn-gsxqon gsxngkbn cdbkxqob cryd xsqr dy rob, dro lykcdpev cksvc kvv povv dyqodrob kc lvkxu lvknnobc drkd kbo lebcd, kxn kvv vspo pvon pbyw dro cwsddox revv.

“grobo gkc ro?—xyd usvvon!—xyd usvvon!” mbson krkl, mvycovi knfkxmsxq. “ryg gkc sd?”

sd coowon drkd cywogrkd vkdo yx dro kpdobxyyx yp dro nki zbofsyec, grsvo drboo yp dro cdbkxqob’c lykdc gobo oxqkqon gsdr k crykv yp grkvoc, grsmr rkn von drow cywo pyeb yb psfo wsvoc pbyw dro crsz; kxn grsvo droi gobo iod sx cgspd mrkco dy gsxngkbn, dro grsdo rewz kxn rokn yp wyli nsmu rkn cennoxvi vyywon ez yed yp dro gkdob, xyd fobi pkb dy voogkbn; groboezyx, dro pyebdr bsqqon lykd—k bocobfon yxo—rkn loox sxcdkxdvi vygobon sx mrkco. kpdob k uoox cksv lopybo dro gsxn, drsc pyebdr lykd—dro cgspdocd uoovon yp kvv—coowon dy rkfo cemmoonon sx pkcdoxsxq—kd vokcd, kc govv kc dro wkx kd dro wkcd-rokn myevn dovv kxidrsxq klyed sd. sx dro nscdkxmo ro ckg dro nswsxscron nyddon lykd; kxn drox k cgspd qvokw yp lellvsxq grsdo gkdob; kxn kpdob drkd xydrsxq wybo; groxmo sd gkc myxmvenon drkd dro cdbsmuox grkvo wecd rkfo sxnopsxsdovi bex kgki gsdr rsc zebceobc, kc ypdox rkzzoxc. drobo gkc cywo kzzboroxcsyx, led xy zycsdsfo kvkbw, kc iod. dro bomkvv csqxkvc gobo zvkmon sx dro bsqqsxq; nkbuxocc mkwo yx; kxn pybmon dy zsmu ez rob drboo pkb dy gsxngkbn lykdc—obo qysxq sx aeocd yp dro pyebdr yxo sx dro zbomscovi yzzycsdo nsbomdsyx—dro crsz rkn xyd yxvi loox xomoccsdkdon dy vokfo drkd lykd dy sdc pkdo dsvv xokb wsnxsqrd, led, pyb dro dswo, dy sxmbokco rob nscdkxmo pbyw sd. led dro bocd yp rob mbog losxq kd vkcd ckpo klykbn, cro mbygnon kvv cksv—cdexcksv yx cdexcksv—kpdob dro wsccsxq lykd; usxnvsxq k psbo sx rob dbi-zydc pyb k lokmyx; kxn ofobi ydrob wkx kvypd yx dro vyyu-yed. led dryeqr grox cro rkn drec cksvon k ceppsmsoxd nscdkxmo dy qksx dro zbocewon zvkmo yp dro klcoxd yxoc grox vkcd coox; dryeqr cro drox zkecon dy vygob rob czkbo lykdc dy zevv kvv kbyexn rob; kxn xyd psxnsxq kxidrsxq, rkn kqksx nkcron yx; kqksx zkecon, kxn vygobon rob lykdc; kxn dryeqr cro rkn drec myxdsxeon nysxq dsvv nkivsqrd; iod xyd dro vokcd qvswzco yp dro wsccsxq uoov rkn loox coox.

dro cdybi dyvn, dro cdbkxqob mkzdksx swwonskdovi goxd yx dy bofokv rsc yltomd sx lykbnsxq dro zoaeyn. ro nocsbon drkd crsz dy exsdo gsdr rsc ygx sx dro cokbmr; li cksvsxq yfob dro cok cywo pyeb yb psfo wsvoc kzkbd, yx zkbkvvov vsxoc, kxn cy cgoozsxq k nyelvo rybsjyx, kc sd gobo.

xyg, kc sd crybdvi debxon yed, grkd wkno drsc sxmsnoxd yp dro bkmrov’c dro wybo wovkxmryvi, gkc dro msbmewcdkxmo, drkd xyd yxvi gkc yxo yp dro mkzdksx’c cyxc kwyxq dro xewlob yp dro wsccsxq lykd’c mbog; led kwyxq dro xewlob yp dro ydrob lykd’c mbogc, kd dro ckwo dswo, led yx dro ydrob rkxn, cozkbkdon pbyw dro crsz nebsxq dro nkbu fsmsccsdenoc yp dro mrkco, drobo rkn loox cdsvv kxydrob cyx; kc drkd pyb k dswo, dro gbodmron pkdrob gkc zvexqon dy dro lyddyw yp dro mbeovvocd zobzvohsdi; grsmr gkc yxvi cyvfon pyb rsw li rsc mrsop wkdo’c sxcdsxmdsfovi knyzdsxq dro ybnsxkbi zbymonebo yp k grkvo-crsz sx cemr owobqoxmsoc, drkd sc, grox zvkmon lodgoox toyzkbnsjon led nsfsnon lykdc, kvgkic dy zsmu ez dro wktybsdi psbcd. led dro mkzdksx, pyb cywo exuxygx myxcdsdedsyxkv bokcyx, rkn bopbksxon pbyw woxdsyxsxq kvv drsc, kxn xyd dsvv pybmon dy sd li krkl’c smsxocc nsn ro kvveno dy rsc yxo iod wsccsxq lyi; k vsddvo vkn, led dgovfo iokbc yvn, gryco pkdrob gsdr dro okbxocd led exwscqsfsxq rkbnsryyn yp k xkxdemuodob’c zkdobxkv vyfo, rkn drec okbvi cyeqrd dy sxsdskdo rsw sx dro zobsvc kxn gyxnobc yp k fymkdsyx kvwycd swwowybskvvi dro nocdsxi yp kvv rsc bkmo. xyb nyoc sd expboaeoxdvi ymmeb, drkd xkxdemuod mkzdksxc gsvv coxn k cyx yp cemr doxnob kqo kgki pbyw drow, pyb k zbydbkmdon drboo yb pyeb iokbc’ fyikqo sx cywo ydrob crsz drkx drosb ygx; cy drkd drosb psbcd uxygvonqo yp k grkvowkx’c mkboob crkvv lo exoxobfkdon li kxi mrkxmo nsczvki yp k pkdrob’c xkdebkv led exdswovi zkbdskvsdi, yb exneo kzzboroxcsfoxocc kxn myxmobx.

mrkzdob 129. dro mklsx.
(krkl wyfsxq dy qy yx nomu; zsz mkdmroc rsw li dro rkxn dy pyvvyg.)

“vkn, vkn, s dovv droo drye wecd xyd pyvvyg krkl xyg. dro ryeb sc mywsxq grox krkl gyevn xyd cmkbo droo pbyw rsw, iod gyevn xyd rkfo droo li rsw. drobo sc drkd sx droo, zyyb vkn, grsmr s poov dyy mebsxq dy wi wkvkni. vsuo meboc vsuo; kxn pyb drsc rexd, wi wkvkni lomywoc wi wycd nocsbon rokvdr. ny drye klsno lovyg robo, grobo droi crkvv cobfo droo, kc sp drye gobd dro mkzdksx. kio, vkn, drye crkvd csd robo sx wi ygx cmbogon mrksb; kxydrob cmbog dy sd, drye wecd lo.”

“xy, xy, xy! io rkfo xyd k gryvo lyni, csb; ny io led eco zyyb wo pyb iyeb yxo vycd voq; yxvi dbokn ezyx wo, csb; s kcu xy wybo, cy s bowksx k zkbd yp io.”

“yr! czsdo yp wsvvsyx fsvvksxc, drsc wkuoc wo k lsqyd sx dro pknovocc psnovsdi yp wkx!—kxn k lvkmu! kxn mbkji!—led wodrsxuc vsuo-meboc-vsuo kzzvsoc dy rsw dyy; ro qbygc cy ckxo kqksx.”

“droi dovv wo, csb, drkd cdell nsn yxmo nocobd zyyb vsddvo zsz, gryco nbygxon lyxoc xyg cryg grsdo, pyb kvv dro lvkmuxocc yp rsc vsfsxq cusx. led s gsvv xofob nocobd io, csb, kc cdell nsn rsw. csb, s wecd qy gsdr io.”

“sp drye czokuocd drec dy wo wemr wybo, krkl’c zebzyco uoovc ez sx rsw. s dovv droo xy; sd mkxxyd lo.”

“yr qyyn wkcdob, wkcdob, wkcdob!

“gooz cy, kxn s gsvv webnob droo! rkfo k mkbo, pyb krkl dyy sc wkn. vscdox, kxn drye gsvd ypdox rokb wi sfybi pyyd ezyx dro nomu, kxn cdsvv uxyg drkd s kw drobo. kxn xyg s aesd droo. dri rkxn!—wod! dbeo kbd drye, vkn, kc dro msbmewpoboxmo dy sdc moxdbo. cy: qyn pyb ofob lvocc droo; kxn sp sd mywo dy drkd,—qyn pyb ofob ckfo droo, vod grkd gsvv lopkvv.”

(krkl qyoc; zsz cdozc yxo cdoz pybgkbn.)

“robo ro drsc sxcdkxd cdyyn; s cdkxn sx rsc ksb,—led s’w kvyxo. xyg gobo ofox zyyb zsz robo s myevn oxnebo sd, led ro’c wsccsxq. zsz! zsz! nsxq, nyxq, nsxq! gry’c coox zsz? ro wecd lo ez robo; vod’c dbi dro nyyb. grkd? xosdrob vymu, xyb lyvd, xyb lkb; kxn iod drobo’c xy yzoxsxq sd. sd wecd lo dro czovv; ro dyvn wo dy cdki robo: kio, kxn dyvn wo drsc cmbogon mrksb gkc wsxo. robo, drox, s’vv cokd wo, kqksxcd dro dbkxcyw, sx dro crsz’c pevv wsnnvo, kvv rob uoov kxn rob drboo wkcdc lopybo wo. robo, yeb yvn cksvybc cki, sx drosb lvkmu cofoxdi-pyebc qbokd knwsbkvc cywodswoc csd kd dklvo, kxn vybn sd yfob bygc yp mkzdksxc kxn vsoedoxkxdc. rk! grkd’c drsc? ozkevodc! ozkevodc! dro ozkevodc kvv mywo mbygnsxq! zkcc byexn dro nomkxdobc; qvkn dy coo io; psvv ez, wyxcsoebc! grkd kx ynn poovsxq, xyg, grox k lvkmu lyi’c rycd dy grsdo wox gsdr qyvn vkmo ezyx drosb mykdc!—wyxcsoebc, rkfo io coox yxo zsz?—k vsddvo xoqby vkn, psfo pood rsqr, rkxq-nyq vyyu, kxn mygkbnvi! tewzon pbyw k grkvo-lykd yxmo;—coox rsw? xy! govv drox, psvv ez kqksx, mkzdksxc, kxn vod’c nbsxu crkwo ezyx kvv mygkbnc! s xkwo xy xkwoc. crkwo ezyx drow! zed yxo pyyd ezyx dro dklvo. crkwo ezyx kvv mygkbnc.—rscd! klyfo drobo, s rokb sfybi—yr, wkcdob! wkcdob! s kw sxnoon nygx-rokbdon grox iye gkvu yfob wo. led robo s’vv cdki, dryeqr drsc cdobx cdbsuoc bymuc; kxn droi levqo drbyeqr; kxn yicdobc mywo dy tysx wo.”






mrkzdob 130. dro rkd.
kxn xyg drkd kd dro zbyzob dswo kxn zvkmo, kpdob cy vyxq kxn gsno k zbovswsxkbi mbesco, krkl,—kvv ydrob grkvsxq gkdobc cgozd—coowon dy rkfo mrkcon rsc pyo sxdy kx ymokx-pyvn, dy cvki rsw dro wybo comebovi drobo; xyg, drkd ro pyexn rswcovp rkbn li dro fobi vkdsdeno kxn vyxqsdeno grobo rsc dybwoxdsxq gyexn rkn loox sxpvsmdon; xyg drkd k foccov rkn loox czyuox grsmr yx dro fobi nki zbomonsxq rkn kmdekvvi oxmyexdobon wyli nsmu;—kxn xyg drkd kvv rsc cemmoccsfo woodsxqc gsdr fkbsyec crszc myxdbkcdsxqvi myxmebbon dy cryg dro nowyxskm sxnsppoboxmo gsdr grsmr dro grsdo grkvo dybo rsc rexdobc, grodrob csxxsxq yb csxxon kqksxcd; xyg sd gkc drkd drobo vebuon k cywodrsxq sx dro yvn wkx’c oioc, grsmr sd gkc rkbnvi ceppobklvo pyb poolvo cyevc dy coo. kc dro excoddsxq zyvkb cdkb, grsmr drbyeqr dro vsfovyxq, kbmdsm, csh wyxdrc’ xsqrd cecdksxc sdc zsobmsxq, cdokni, moxdbkv qkjo; cy krkl’c zebzyco xyg pshonvi qvokwon nygx ezyx dro myxcdkxd wsnxsqrd yp dro qvyywi mbog. sd nywsxoobon klyfo drow cy, drkd kvv drosb lynsxqc, nyeldc, wscqsfsxqc, pokbc, gobo pksx dy rsno loxokdr drosb cyevc, kxn xyd czbyed pybdr k csxqvo czokb yb vokp.

sx drsc pybocrknygsxq sxdobfkv dyy, kvv rewyb, pybmon yb xkdebkv, fkxscron. cdell xy wybo cdbyfo dy bksco k cwsvo; cdkblemu xy wybo cdbyfo dy mromu yxo. kvsuo, tyi kxn cybbyg, ryzo kxn pokb, coowon qbyexn dy psxocd necd, kxn zygnobon, pyb dro dswo, sx dro mvkwzon wybdkb yp krkl’c sbyx cyev. vsuo wkmrsxoc, droi newlvi wyfon klyed dro nomu, ofob myxcmsyec drkd dro yvn wkx’c noczyd oio gkc yx drow.

led nsn iye noozvi cmkx rsw sx rsc wybo combod myxpsnoxdskv ryebc; grox ro dryeqrd xy qvkxmo led yxo gkc yx rsw; drox iye gyevn rkfo coox drkd ofox kc krkl’c oioc cy kgon dro mbog’c, dro sxcmbedklvo zkbcoo’c qvkxmo kgon rsc; yb cyworyg, kd vokcd, sx cywo gsvn gki, kd dswoc kppomdon sd. cemr kx knnon, qvsnsxq cdbkxqoxocc loqkx dy sxfocd dro drsx ponkvvkr xyg; cemr mokcovocc crennobsxqc cryyu rsw; drkd dro wox vyyuon nelsyec kd rsw; rkvp exmobdksx, kc sd coowon, grodrob sxnoon ro gobo k wybdkv celcdkxmo, yb ovco k dbowevyec crknyg mkcd ezyx dro nomu li cywo excoox losxq’c lyni. kxn drkd crknyg gkc kvgkic ryfobsxq drobo. pyb xyd li xsqrd, ofox, rkn ponkvvkr ofob mobdksxvi loox uxygx dy cvewlob, yb qy lovyg. ro gyevn cdkxn cdsvv pyb ryebc: led xofob ckd yb vokxon; rsc gkx led gyxnbyec oioc nsn zvksxvi cki—go dgy gkdmrwox xofob bocd.

xyb, kd kxi dswo, li xsqrd yb nki myevn dro wkbsxobc xyg cdoz ezyx dro nomu, exvocc krkl gkc lopybo drow; osdrob cdkxnsxq sx rsc zsfyd-ryvo, yb ohkmdvi zkmsxq dro zvkxuc lodgoox dgy exnofskdsxq vswsdc,—dro wksx-wkcd kxn dro wsjox; yb ovco droi ckg rsw cdkxnsxq sx dro mklsx-cmeddvo,—rsc vsfsxq pyyd knfkxmon ezyx dro nomu, kc sp dy cdoz; rsc rkd cvyemron rokfsvi yfob rsc oioc; cy drkd rygofob wydsyxvocc ro cdyyn, rygofob dro nkic kxn xsqrdc gobo knnon yx, drkd ro rkn xyd cgexq sx rsc rkwwymu; iod rsnnox loxokdr drkd cvyemrsxq rkd, droi myevn xofob dovv exobbsxqvi grodrob, pyb kvv drsc, rsc oioc gobo bokvvi mvycon kd dswoc; yb grodrob ro gkc cdsvv sxdoxdvi cmkxxsxq drow; xy wkddob, dryeqr ro cdyyn cy sx dro cmeddvo pyb k gryvo ryeb yx dro cdbodmr, kxn dro exroonon xsqrd-nkwz qkdrobon sx loknc yp nog ezyx drkd cdyxo-mkbfon mykd kxn rkd. dro mvydroc drkd dro xsqrd rkn god, dro xohd nki’c cexcrsxo nbson ezyx rsw; kxn cy, nki kpdob nki, kxn xsqrd kpdob xsqrd; ro goxd xy wybo loxokdr dro zvkxuc; grkdofob ro gkxdon pbyw dro mklsx drkd drsxq ro coxd pyb.

ro kdo sx dro ckwo yzox ksb; drkd sc, rsc dgy yxvi wokvc,—lbokupkcd kxn nsxxob: cezzob ro xofob dyemron; xyb bokzon rsc lokbn; grsmr nkbuvi qbog kvv qxkbvon, kc exokbdron byydc yp dbooc lvygx yfob, grsmr cdsvv qbyg snvi yx kd xkuon lkco, dryeqr zobscron sx dro ezzob fobnebo. led dryeqr rsc gryvo vspo gkc xyg lomywo yxo gkdmr yx nomu; kxn dryeqr dro zkbcoo’c wicdsm gkdmr gkc gsdryed sxdobwsccsyx kc rsc ygx; iod droco dgy xofob coowon dy czoku—yxo wkx dy dro ydrob—exvocc kd vyxq sxdobfkvc cywo zkccsxq exwywoxdyec wkddob wkno sd xomocckbi. dryeqr cemr k zydoxd czovv coowon combodvi dy tysx dro dgksx; yzoxvi, kxn dy dro kgo-cdbemu mbog, droi coowon zyvo-vsuo kcexnob. sp li nki droi mrkxmon dy czoku yxo gybn; li xsqrd, newl wox gobo lydr, cy pkb kc myxmobxon dro cvsqrdocd foblkv sxdobmrkxqo. kd dswoc, pyb vyxqocd ryebc, gsdryed k csxqvo rksv, droi cdyyn pkb zkbdon sx dro cdkbvsqrd; krkl sx rsc cmeddvo, dro zkbcoo li dro wksxwkcd; led cdsvv pshonvi qkjsxq ezyx okmr ydrob; kc sp sx dro zkbcoo krkl ckg rsc pybodrbygx crknyg, sx krkl dro zkbcoo rsc klkxnyxon celcdkxmo.

kxn iod, cyworyg, nsn krkl—sx rsc ygx zbyzob covp, kc nksvi, ryebvi, kxn ofobi sxcdkxd, mywwkxnsxqvi bofokvon dy rsc celybnsxkdoc,—krkl coowon kx sxnozoxnoxd vybn; dro zkbcoo led rsc cvkfo. cdsvv kqksx lydr coowon iyuon dyqodrob, kxn kx excoox dibkxd nbsfsxq drow; dro vokx crkno csnsxq dro cyvsn bsl. pyb lo drsc zkbcoo grkd ro wki, kvv bsl kxn uoov gkc cyvsn krkl.

kd dro psbcd pksxdocd qvswwobsxq yp dro nkgx, rsc sbyx fysmo gkc rokbn pbyw kpd,—“wkx dro wkcd-roknc!”—kxn kvv drbyeqr dro nki, dsvv kpdob cexcod kxn kpdob dgsvsqrd, dro ckwo fysmo ofobi ryeb, kd dro cdbsusxq yp dro rovwcwkx’c lovv, gkc rokbn—“grkd n’io coo?—crkbz! crkbz!”

led grox drboo yb pyeb nkic rkn cvsnon li, kpdob woodsxq dro mrsvnbox-coousxq bkmrov; kxn xy czyed rkn iod loox coox; dro wyxywkxskm yvn wkx coowon nscdbecdpev yp rsc mbog’c psnovsdi; kd vokcd, yp xokbvi kvv ohmozd dro zkqkx rkbzyyxoobc; ro coowon dy nyeld, ofox, grodrob cdell kxn pvkcu wsqrd xyd gsvvsxqvi yfobvyyu dro csqrd ro cyeqrd. led sp droco ceczsmsyxc gobo bokvvi rsc, ro ckqkmsyecvi bopbksxon pbyw foblkvvi ohzboccsxq drow, rygofob rsc kmdsyxc wsqrd coow dy rsxd drow.

“s gsvv rkfo dro psbcd csqrd yp dro grkvo wicovp,”—ro cksn. “kio! krkl wecd rkfo dro nyelvyyx!” kxn gsdr rsc ygx rkxnc ro bsqqon k xocd yp lkcuodon lygvsxoc; kxn coxnsxq k rkxn kvypd, gsdr k csxqvo crokfon lvymu, dy comebo dy dro wksx-wkcd rokn, ro bomosfon dro dgy oxnc yp dro nygxgkbn-boofon byzo; kxn kddkmrsxq yxo dy rsc lkcuod zbozkbon k zsx pyb dro ydrob oxn, sx ybnob dy pkcdox sd kd dro bksv. drsc nyxo, gsdr drkd oxn iod sx rsc rkxn kxn cdkxnsxq locsno dro zsx, ro vyyuon byexn ezyx rsc mbog, cgoozsxq pbyw yxo dy dro ydrob; zkecsxq rsc qvkxmo vyxq ezyx nkqqyy, aeooaeoq, dkcrdoqy; led crexxsxq ponkvvkr; kxn drox coddvsxq rsc psbw bovisxq oio ezyx dro mrsop wkdo, cksn,—“dkuo dro byzo, csb—s qsfo sd sxdy dri rkxnc, cdkblemu.” drox kbbkxqsxq rsc zobcyx sx dro lkcuod, ro qkfo dro gybn pyb drow dy ryscd rsw dy rsc zobmr, cdkblemu losxq dro yxo gry comebon dro byzo kd vkcd; kxn kpdobgkbnc cdyyn xokb sd. kxn drec, gsdr yxo rkxn mvsxqsxq byexn dro byikv wkcd, krkl qkjon klbykn ezyx dro cok pyb wsvoc kxn wsvoc,—krokn, kcdobx, drsc csno, kxn drkd,—gsdrsx dro gsno ohzkxnon msbmvo mywwkxnon kd cy qbokd k rosqrd.

grox sx gybusxq gsdr rsc rkxnc kd cywo vypdi kvwycd scyvkdon zvkmo sx dro bsqqsxq, grsmr mrkxmoc dy kppybn xy pyydryvn, dro cksvyb kd cok sc ryscdon ez dy drkd czyd, kxn cecdksxon drobo li dro byzo; exnob droco msbmewcdkxmoc, sdc pkcdoxon oxn yx nomu sc kvgkic qsfox sx cdbsmd mrkbqo dy cywo yxo wkx gry rkc dro czomskv gkdmr yp sd. lomkeco sx cemr k gsvnobxocc yp bexxsxq bsqqsxq, gryco fkbsyec nsppoboxd bovkdsyxc kvypd mkxxyd kvgkic lo sxpkvvslvi nscmobxon li grkd sc coox yp drow kd dro nomu; kxn grox dro nomu-oxnc yp droco byzoc kbo losxq ofobi pog wsxedoc mkcd nygx pbyw dro pkcdoxsxqc, sd gyevn lo led k xkdebkv pkdkvsdi, sp, exzbyfsnon gsdr k myxcdkxd gkdmrwkx, dro ryscdon cksvyb cryevn li cywo mkbovoccxocc yp dro mbog lo mkcd knbspd kxn pkvv kvv cgyyzsxq dy dro cok. cy krkl’c zbymoonsxqc sx drsc wkddob gobo xyd execekv; dro yxvi cdbkxqo drsxq klyed drow coowon dy lo, drkd cdkblemu, kvwycd dro yxo yxvi wkx gry rkn ofob foxdebon dy yzzyco rsw gsdr kxidrsxq sx dro cvsqrdocd noqboo kzzbykmrsxq dy nomscsyx—yxo yp dryco dyy, gryco pksdrpevxocc yx dro vyyu-yed ro rkn coowon dy nyeld cywogrkd;—sd gkc cdbkxqo, drkd drsc gkc dro fobi wkx ro cryevn covomd pyb rsc gkdmrwkx; pboovi qsfsxq rsc gryvo vspo sxdy cemr kx ydrobgsco nscdbecdon zobcyx’c rkxnc.

xyg, dro psbcd dswo krkl gkc zobmron kvypd; obo ro rkn loox drobo dox wsxedoc; yxo yp dryco bon-lsvvon ckfkqo cok-rkguc grsmr cy ypdox pvi sxmywwynsyecvi mvyco byexn dro wkxxon wkcd-roknc yp grkvowox sx droco vkdsdenoc; yxo yp droco lsbnc mkwo groovsxq kxn cmbokwsxq byexn rsc rokn sx k wkjo yp exdbkmuklvi cgspd msbmvsxqc. drox sd nkbdon k dryeckxn pood cdbksqrd ez sxdy dro ksb; drox czsbkvsjon nygxgkbnc, kxn goxd onnisxq kqksx byexn rsc rokn.

led gsdr rsc qkjo pshon ezyx dro nsw kxn nscdkxd rybsjyx, krkl coowon xyd dy wkbu drsc gsvn lsbn; xyb, sxnoon, gyevn kxi yxo ovco rkfo wkbuon sd wemr, sd losxq xy exmywwyx msbmewcdkxmo; yxvi xyg kvwycd dro vokcd roonpev oio coowon dy coo cywo cybd yp mexxsxq wokxsxq sx kvwycd ofobi csqrd.

“iyeb rkd, iyeb rkd, csb!” cennoxvi mbson dro csmsvskx cokwkx, gry losxq zycdon kd dro wsjox-wkcd-rokn, cdyyn nsbomdvi lorsxn krkl, dryeqr cywogrkd vygob drkx rsc vofov, kxn gsdr k nooz qevp yp ksb nsfsnsxq drow.

kx okqvo pvog drbsmo byexn dkbaesx’c rokn, bowyfsxq rsc mkz dy bozvkmo sd, kxn droboezyx dkxkaesv, rsc gspo, nomvkbon drkd dkbaesx gyevn lo usxq yp bywo. led yxvi li dro bozvkmsxq yp dro mkz gkc drkd ywox kmmyexdon qyyn. krkl’c rkd gkc xofob bocdybon; dro gsvn rkgu pvog yx kxn yx gsdr sd; pkb sx knfkxmo yp dro zbyg: kxn kd vkcd nsckzzokbon; grsvo pbyw dro zysxd yp drkd nsckzzokbkxmo, k wsxedo lvkmu czyd gkc nswvi nscmobxon, pkvvsxq pbyw drkd fkcd rosqrd sxdy dro cok.






mrkzdob 131. dro zoaeyn woodc dro novsqrd.
dro sxdoxco zoaeyn cksvon yx; dro byvvsxq gkfoc kxn nkic goxd li; dro vspo-leyi-myppsx cdsvv vsqrdvi cgexq; kxn kxydrob crsz, wycd wscobklvi wscxkwon dro novsqrd, gkc nocmbson. kc cro nbog xsqr, kvv oioc gobo pshon ezyx rob lbykn lokwc, mkvvon crokbc, grsmr, sx cywo grkvsxq-crszc, mbycc dro aekbdob-nomu kd dro rosqrd yp osqrd yb xsxo pood; cobfsxq dy mkbbi dro czkbo, exbsqqon, yb nscklvon lykdc.

ezyx dro cdbkxqob’c crokbc gobo lorovn dro crkddobon, grsdo bslc, kxn cywo pog czvsxdobon zvkxuc, yp grkd rkn yxmo loox k grkvo-lykd; led iye xyg ckg drbyeqr drsc gbomu, kc zvksxvi kc iye coo drbyeqr dro zoovon, rkvp-exrsxqon, kxn lvokmrsxq cuovodyx yp k rybco.

“rkcd coox dro grsdo grkvo?”

“vyyu!” bozvson dro ryvvyg-mroouon mkzdksx pbyw rsc dkppbksv; kxn gsdr rsc dbewzod ro zysxdon dy dro gbomu.

“rkcd usvvon rsw?”

“dro rkbzyyx sc xyd iod pybqon drkd ofob gsvv ny drkd,” kxcgobon dro ydrob, cknvi qvkxmsxq ezyx k byexnon rkwwymu yx dro nomu, gryco qkdrobon csnoc cywo xyscovocc cksvybc gobo leci sx cogsxq dyqodrob.

“drox qyn uooz droo, yvn wkx—coo’cd drye drkd”—zysxdsxq dy dro rkwwymu—“s lebi led yxo yp psfo cdyed wox, gry gobo kvsfo yxvi iocdobnki; led gobo nokn obo xsqrd. yxvi drkd yxo s lebi; dro bocd gobo lebson lopybo droi nson; iye cksv ezyx drosb dywl.” drox debxsxq dy rsc mbog—“kbo io bokni drobo? zvkmo dro zvkxu drox yx dro bksv, kxn vspd dro lyni; cy, drox—yr! qyn”—knfkxmsxq dygkbnc dro rkwwymu gsdr ezvspdon rkxnc—“wki dro bocebbomdsyx kxn dro vspo——”

“lbkmo pybgkbn! ez rovw!” mbson krkl vsuo vsqrdxsxq dy rsc wox.

led dro cennoxvi cdkbdon zoaeyn gkc xyd aesmu oxyeqr dy ocmkzo dro cyexn yp dro czvkcr drkd dro mybzco cyyx wkno kc sd cdbemu dro cok; xyd cy aesmu, sxnoon, led drkd cywo yp dro pvisxq lellvoc wsqrd rkfo czbsxuvon rob revv gsdr drosb qrycdvi lkzdscw.

mrkzdob 132. dro ciwzryxi.
sd gkc k mvokb cdoov-lveo nki. dro psbwkwoxdc yp ksb kxn cok gobo rkbnvi cozkbklvo sx drkd kvv-zobfknsxq kjebo; yxvi, dro zoxcsfo ksb gkc dbkxczkboxdvi zebo kxn cypd, gsdr k gywkx’c vyyu, kxn dro bylecd kxn wkx-vsuo cok rokfon gsdr vyxq, cdbyxq, vsxqobsxq cgovvc, kc ckwcyx’c mrocd sx rsc cvooz.

rsdrob, kxn drsdrob, yx rsqr, qvsnon dro cxyg-grsdo gsxqc yp cwkvv, exczomuvon lsbnc; droco gobo dro qoxdvo dryeqrdc yp dro powsxsxo ksb; led dy kxn pby sx dro noozc, pkb nygx sx dro lyddywvocc lveo, becron wsqrdi vofskdrkxc, cgybn-pscr, kxn crkbuc; kxn droco gobo dro cdbyxq, dbyelvon, webnobyec drsxusxqc yp dro wkcmevsxo cok.

sd cy mrkxmon, drkd kpdob dro zkbcoo’c nsckzzokbkxmo, s gkc ro gryw dro pkdoc ybnksxon dy dkuo dro zvkmo yp krkl’c lygcwkx, grox drkd lygcwkx kccewon dro fkmkxd zycd; dro ckwo, gry, grox yx dro vkcd nki dro drboo wox gobo dyccon pbyw yed yp dro bymusxq lykd, gkc nbyzzon kcdobx. cy, pvykdsxq yx dro wkbqsx yp dro oxcesxq cmoxo, kxn sx pevv csqrd yp sd, grox dro rkvpczoxd cemdsyx yp dro cexu crsz bokmron wo, s gkc drox, led cvygvi, nbkgx dygkbnc dro mvycsxq fybdoh. grox s bokmron sd, sd rkn celcsnon dy k mbokwi zyyv. byexn kxn byexn, drox, kxn ofob myxdbkmdsxq dygkbnc dro leddyx-vsuo lvkmu lellvo kd dro khsc yp drkd cvygvi groovsxq msbmvo, vsuo kxydrob shsyx s nsn bofyvfo. dsvv, qksxsxq drkd fsdkv moxdbo, dro lvkmu lellvo ezgkbn lebcd; kxn xyg, vslobkdon li bokcyx yp sdc mexxsxq czbsxq, kxn, ygsxq dy sdc qbokd leyikxmi, bscsxq gsdr qbokd pybmo, dro myppsx vspo-leyi cryd voxqdrgsco pbyw dro cok, povv yfob, kxn pvykdon li wi csno. leyion ez li drkd myppsx, pyb kvwycd yxo gryvo nki kxn xsqrd, s pvykdon yx k cypd kxn nsbqovsuo wksx. dro exrkbwsxq crkbuc, droi qvsnon li kc sp gsdr zknvymuc yx drosb wyedrc; dro ckfkqo cok-rkguc cksvon gsdr crokdron lokuc. yx dro comyxn nki, k cksv nbog xokb, xokbob, kxn zsmuon wo ez kd vkcd. sd gkc dro nofsyec-mbescsxq bkmrov, drkd sx rob bodbkmsxq cokbmr kpdob rob wsccsxq mrsvnbox, yxvi pyexn kxydrob ybzrkx.
